Detailed Description: SLEDGE is a first-person action platformer with a heavy emphasis on speed and style. You can slam your rocket sledgehammer off of walls, floors, and enemies to launch yourself off in the opposite direction, as well as destroy enemies and parry their blows.
Short Description: Take your explosive sledgehammer to the skies to pulverize the machines that killed gods and usurped the heavens.
About the Game: SLEDGE is a first-person action platformer with a heavy emphasis on speed and style. You can slam your rocket sledgehammer off of walls, floors, and enemies to launch yourself off in the opposite direction, as well as destroy enemies and parry their blows.

Detailed Description: Warriors of Thalyrion is a 2D pixelart action game in which you can fight short and fun battles against your friends. As a classic couch game, you play on the same PC as your friend and you share the same game world.Choose a heroBefore starting the game, you decide on a hero. You can choose between different archetypes and weapons. Do you prefer the sword or the bow? Every character has a weapon for close combat and one for distance fight.Choose a game modePvP: In PvP mode, your teammate is your opponent. Try to achieve the round objectives and score more points than your opponent. Each arena is set up differently and a round is limited in time. With targeted attacks, you can prevent your opponent from collecting points.Co-op: In the co-op campaign, you play together with your teammate. Complete the round objectives together to reach the next level. A campaign consists of several levels, which are completed with a boss fight.Solo: You can also play through the campaigns alone. But be aware that it won’t be easy.
Short Description: Choose your hero and fight against your friends in different 2D pixelart worlds . Collect more items than your opponent and fight him in close combat or with a ranged weapon.

Detailed Description: On running your own Shooting Range Shop Adventure you willHost customers every day and try to fulfill their orders, expand and upgrade your shop for even host large numbers of customers. You can buy better guns and gun parts as your popularity level goes up, customers will always wants more! You need to manage your resources to grow every day and remain in these hard business environments. Modify your weapons as you like and see what customers will do with them. If they do suspicious acts just use your good old stun gun.When the time comes you can take your business outside of your shop and create military companies, explore new areas that you can do exciting things like joining shooting competitions and more. You can choose your own way in this world and no one can stop you because you will have lots and lots of guns.
Short Description: Run your own Shooting Range. Manage your supplies, rent guns and sell ammos which suits guns calibre. Expand and upgrade your shop, level up your popularity to get even better equipment. Customize your guns as you like. Join shooting tournaments or shoot your guns in your own range.

Detailed Description: MY ADAPTATION IN(TO) HUMAN is a point and click horror adventure.Choose your human vessel and inhabit it! Adapt to life in a human body in a fictional post-Soviet country.Look around, socialize with others, and try to adapt to this new life.Make decisions in dialogues, the ending of the game depends on it.GAME'S KEY FEATURES:- A unique visual style made entirely of photographs.- An original story in which you play the role of a monster who has captured someone else's body.- A short and dynamic story about the life of an alien creature.- Easy to learn combat system.- About 20 minutes per run.- 2 Endings.
Short Description: You are a body snatching creature. Capture the body, explore the environment, reproduce.

Detailed Description: Welcome to Xi-Portal, an immersive visual novel experience that invites you into the vibrant world of KaKaMigu, Ai, Schneider, Hikari, and Ayako, as you navigate the twists and turns of high school life.Embark on a journey of friendship, discovery, and unexpected adventures as you step into the shoes of the protagonist, forging new bonds and unraveling mysteries along the way. From heartwarming encounters to pulse-pounding moments, every choice you make will shape the course of your story.But beware, as the halls of your new school hold secrets darker than you could ever imagine. Just when you least expect it, the tranquil atmosphere may be shattered by spine-chilling jump scares and flashing danger lights. Stay on your toes and trust your instincts as you navigate through the unknown.Xi-Portal promises an unforgettable experience filled with laughter, tears, and everything in between. Are you ready to dive into this captivating tale and uncover the truth hidden beneath the surface?WARNING: This game contains flashing lights, scary images, loud sounds, and jumpscares; it's not recommended for people who suffer from any kind of phobia. (Especially those who have a weak heart.)Genre: Visual novel, HorrorPlatform: Windows, Android.Engine: Ren'PyLanguages: English, Arabic61,000+ wordsNameable MCFive characters are available. Maybe?Map feature: You can go anywhere you want.Reading time: 4 hours and 8 minutesEstimated gameplay time: +8 hours for new playersChallenging puzzles11 different endings (4 true endings  | 1 good ending | 1 normal ending | 3 bad endings  | 2 worst endings )Point of no return game.

Detailed Description:
"Myths and Legends" is our next-gen semi-idle, trading real time strategy,  that takes the player 2500 years back in time, but with a sense of humor.

The game combines elements of exploration, combat, trade and diplomacy.

The world in which our story takes place is the period before 500 BCE.

The locations in which the game takes place are procedurally generated so that each game is different.

The basic version of the game includes 3 ancient Greek factions.
Each faction has unique units and statistics for many units and its own huge beasts that can be bred.

The game is the next big step in the development of our engine. The lighting in the game changes as the day and night progress. Trade ships and new arrivals arrive on the player's island, and units can be sent to raid enemy lands.

We intend to introduce the ability to collect materials and create items for heroes.

The player will not only have the opportunity to discover and manage islands, but also conduct diplomacy, trade and war with the outside world and factions.

The islands themselves and their biomes will also be diverse.

Other factions such as the Persians, Thracians, Phoenicians. Altants ( why not to add something more ancient than 500 BCE - it's just a game ) and several others will be available to players as separate DLCs.

Detailed Description: The Witch's Bakery is a 2D Aventure RPG about a joyful witch who opens her bakery in modern Paris. She has one special power: she can see into people's heart and heal emotions through magic!YOUR DAILY LIFE AS A WITCH-BAKER IN PARIS!You play as Lunne, who has just arrived in the city! Each day is split into three phases:Daytime, where Lunne manages her bakery and serves clients with her team of friends.Evening, where Lunne explores Paris, builds relationships, discovers the city's secrets and goes inside her friends' troubled heart.Night, where Lunne rests, improves her magic, decorates her bakery and spends time in her cosy atelier.The story progresses through the days as you earn experience, money, and fame, meet new friends and heal their heart.A COLORFUL PARIS IN A JOYFUL ADVENTURE!Once your work day is done, you can visit several districts of Paris to meet with main characters, engage in activities to learn new skills, buy books for new recipes, etc.The above example is "Le Quai des Bouquinistes" located in the 6th arrondissement of Paris! This place is known for its book sellers and its collectors of various entertainment goods, like vinyls, posters, old magazines... But also, of course, for the beautiful Notre-Dame.Each district has its own characters, activities and shops! A STORY ABOUT EMOTIONS AND VULNERABILITYFor some people, their emotion is locked away so strongly than Lunne needs to go inside their heart to help them. She enters their "Heart Palace", a magical space where emotions and thoughts take shape. Lunne needs to guide the personified Emotion back to the heart.Inside the Heart Palace, Lunne discovers the person's deepest struggles and finds the key ingredient she needs to make a bread that will heal them!ABOUT SUNNY LABWe are an indie team of experienced developers from France! We have gathered to create hopeful stories, filled with lovable characters, happy smiles and deep emotional journeys. We are always reachable on our socials @SunnyLabGames!We are so happy to share our first game "The Witch's Bakery" with you! We are still at the beginning of production and we'll be sharing all our progress with you! Feel free to ask us any question!

Detailed Description: Add To WishlistAbout the Game Show the city who’s boss! Become the crime boss of your dreams, crushing rival mafia gangs, taking on dirty jobs, and making that cash until you own the entire city! Dirty JobsManage various illegal activities. Become the master of dark dealings by drug trafficking, counterfeiting, arms smuggling, and theft. Purchase legitimate businesses to conceal your operations and secretly run your operations from behind these establishments. Complete trade missions successfully to generate more revenue and open new businesses, using your strategic and risk management skills to reach the top!Build Your GangCreate a powerful gang by offering the no good and desperate jobs. The larger and more skilled your team, the more you’ll crush any mafia rivals. Build a strong team so your business operates more efficiently and produces faster. With your people by your side, become the most feared power in the city!Become FearedExpand your empire by taking rival mafia groups' businesses and territories. Use your gang to steal raw materials needed for drugs, counterfeit money, and weapons production. Each victory brings you one step closer to becoming the city’s most feared crime leader.Take Over the City and Become the BossTake over the city step by step by crushing the rival mafia and claiming their territory for yourself. Each area you capture brings you one step closer to the ultimate confrontation with the city’s biggest cartel. Will you destroy them and solidify your throne as the undisputed leader of the criminal world?
Short Description: Begin your rise as a crime lord! Mafia Simulator blends action, strategy, and an open world packaged in a simulation game. Conquer the city by managing illicit businesses like weed farms, weapons manufacturing, and cocaine trading…Just be careful; the choices you make could mean life or death.

Detailed Description: ----This is an RPG that connects two worlds----Tetsuya and his friends receive a stone called “Link's Quartz” from a girl named Mina, who says she comes from another world.The “Link's Quartz” increases the user's physical abilities and triggers the activation of mysterious powers.Tetsuya and his friends, now able to use their magical powers, throw themselves into a grueling battle to protect their town from the hordes of magical beasts that have suddenly begun attacking the town.The mysterious graphics of 2D dot-picture characters moving through a 3D space.Use the “Shift” command to change the character's standing position to gain an advantage in the battle.Each character has his or her own special standing position, so it may be a good idea to consider their personalities when placing them.This game is only available in Japanese.
Short Description: A turn-based RPG with mysterious graphics in which dot-picture characters move through 3D space. Use the “Shift” command to change the character's standing position to gain an advantage in the battle.

Detailed Description:
Exodus: Creepy Time" is an exciting casual style game with elements of a simplified roguelike. An ominous journey through dark and gloomy locations awaits you, where every action you take has serious consequences. Survive in a world where darkness and horror lurk at every turn. Collect resources, upgrade your character and develop new skills to survive in this horror world.

Trapped in a world steeped in darkness and horror, where sinister forces rule every corner. The main character discovers that the world he is in has turned out to be cursed. People and animals have turned into mutants and monsters under the influence of dark forces. He is left alone with this horror, and his only goal is to find a way out of this nightmarish reality, but keep in mind time is inexorably ticking, and the curse is getting stronger by the hour. Will the hero be able to find the strength and wisdom to overcome the horrors of this "Creepy Time" and free himself from this dark web?
Immerse yourself in "Exodus: Creepy Time", where your every decision

Features:
- Simple and Addictive Gameplay
- Constant Threat
- Improvements and New Skills
- Bright cartoon graphics
- Cool characters
- An invigorating soundtrack
Short Description: Join the battle in the dark world of the Middle Ages, shrouded in evil and magic, as brave knights, each of whom fights to save their native lands from mystical threats. "Exodus: Creepy Time" is an exciting shoot 'em up with a top view, combining elements of roguelike and arcade games.

Detailed Description: Slay thousands of monsters and survive the night raids, where new bosses and monsters appear. Magic Storm is a casual game with roguelite elements where your choices make all the difference, create custom builds and survive the final eclipse.About the gameYou have been summoned by a wizard to another world dominated by monsters and your task is to free this world from the rule of these creatures. But be careful, every night new bosses and beings emerge, increasingly stronger until the arrival of the Final Eclipse, a famous prophecy of the end of times, which brings an eternal night and also the return of the supreme monster.GameplaySimilar to Vampire Survivor, Magic Storm is also a Bullet Hell with Roguelite elements, where at each level you choose which skill to improve, the main difference is that you are the one who uses the skills, but we also have the Arcade mode, where damage skills are triggered automatically, a good way to start and adapt to the game.Game Modes- Arcade: all damaging skills are used automatically by the game, you need to worry about using buff skills, such as life recovery, increased movement speed and etc.- Hardcore: you decide the best time and where to use ALL your skills. Try this mode, I made this game with this gameplay in mind :DSkillsThere are 5 main categories of skills:- Fire;- Water;- Air;- Earth;- General;Initially you start by being able to select only the General skills, but when defeating the elemental bosses you acquire magical knowledge of that element, for example, when eliminating the Fire Elemental Boss you will be able to use fire skills when you level up, even in other matches, is a permanent achievement. You can even start another game with some initial fire skills.In the DEMO version we only have one build, which is fire and some buff skills.Important messageHelp me build this game, any feedback is welcome!This is my first commercial game and I'm making it with great care for you, I'm trying to translate it into some languages ​​to make it as accessible as possible, if there are any errors let me know, I'll be happy to improve the experience in your language.If possible, follow me on social media and join our discord so we can make a beautiful game together.

Detailed Description: A short horror experience, focusing on a simple but immersive story and a dark atmosphere.In "Geras" players find themselves at the precipice of their 30th birthday, a milestone often fraught with existential dread and looming fears about the passage of time. As the clock strikes midnight on the eve of their 30th year, their deepest fears of aging manifest into a malevolent entity – a demon that relentlessly haunts them.To survive, players must confront their fears head-on, delving deep into the darkest corners of their psyche to unravel the mystery behind the demon's origins. "Geras" is a psychological horror game that explores themes of aging, mortality, and the fear of the unknown. With its haunting atmosphere, and storytelling, it challenges players to confront their deepest fears and emerge stronger on the other side. But beware – in the world of "Geras" not everything is as it seems, and the line between reality and nightmare blurs with each passing moment.It offers a small, but atmospheric environment. It's a first-person walking simulator horror with some puzzle elements to complete. Explore your surroundings, that change through the progress of the storyline, and find out the truth, while something awaits you in the dark.This is my first attempt at making a game. I have no previous experience with game development or even coding.So I hope you enjoy. :)

Detailed Description: DEAD DETENTION is a scribbly coming of age/adventure/comedy visual novel about a nerdy teen turned dooms day survivor. Will you and your new friends get to safety?! 14 year old Max is given a detention for falling asleep in class - but a zombie outbreak suddenly interrupts it! Senior student Naomi saves him from a deadly attack, but can't leave campus without her lost sister Sora. Deciding to stay behind and help her, Max and Naomi begin their quest to find Sora, while struggling to survive the quickly spreading virus...Make narrative choices that are brave, scared, nice or mean.Your choices will compound and lead to 1 of 3 endings, including a special true ending.Complete quick microgames throughout the story to swing your bat, run from zombies, climb ladders, and much more.Each episode builds to a fun boss challenge - such as target shooting and boxing!Features 3 difficulties, including an unlockable Hard Mode. DEAD DETENTION is a rescribbled and fully remade version of the cult flash series. It features 5 episodes of chaotic fun, plus a special epilogue unlocked by achieving either of the good endings.

Detailed Description: You have become part of a recruitment program for some shady company.The plan was to enter an underwater ruin, explore it, and give a large prize to anyone who escaped.Be sure to remember the instructions given by the company.If you find any anomalies, descend.If there are no anomalies, ascend.If you reach sea level, you have escaped safely.GameplayThis is a walking simulator genre game inspired by The Exit 8.Explore underwater ruins to discover anomalies and decide whether to ascend or descend.Some anomalies may attack you.The game supports two difficulty levels: Classic (Easy) mode and Normal mode. Classic mode: This is a basic mode where you have to find anomalies and escape. The difficulty level is low and you start out in classic mode. Normal mode: This mode increases the level of difficulty by adding oxygen management and photo taking functions. Unlocked upon clearing Classic Mode.The average play time of the game is expected to be around 1 to 2 hours.ControlsWASD: MoveLeft Shift: ThrusterSpacebar: AscendLeft Ctrl: DescendLeft mouse button: HeadlightRight mouse button: Take photoStreaming GuidelinesAnyone, regardless of whether they are an individual or a corporation, can broadcast without permission.There are no sounds that could be a copyright issue.We would appreciate it if you could write down the title of the game and a link to the Steam store.

Detailed Description: Red Trees Rail Co is a Virtual Reality Horror Train simulator that puts you in the seat of a steam train operator.There is a recent need for a night train from town to town in the lovely Redwood Forest. It is cozy, dark, and quiet. To keep costs low, a once decommissioned steam engine will now be brought back to service with a few modern upgrades. However, recent reports have noted creepy sightings and unusual events occurring on this train route. Exploring this new opportunity, you play as a character who is trying to pay off some debt.Operator Duties include:Driving the Train using Realistic Locomotive ControlsPicking Up and Dropping Off Passengers at StationsChecking Passenger TicketsYou may experience hallucinations during your journey. Some see ghosts, wrecked interior, and more.Thankfully, you are provided the past engineer's notebook for info and survival.Can You Stay Calm and Survive the Night?

Detailed Description: Femdom Game World - is a fascinating series of video games, the story centers on strong and sexy women who exercise dominance over men and more. In these games, players are immersed in a world where female domination reigns in all aspects of relationships, providing a unique gaming experience. Experience an exciting world of lust and depravity in Femdom Game World.Story:Ethan was a young boy living with his aunt, in a cozy house on the outskirts of town. He was surrounded from childhood by the care and attention of his aunt, who replaced his parents. However, Ethan had a secret dream, which he did not dare to talk about for a long time. He wanted to become a slave for his aunt, to obey her in everything and fulfill her every whim. But how to offer her such a thing? Thinking long and hard about his actions, Ethan decided to start small. One evening, when his aunt came home after a long day at work, he timidly offered to give her a foot massage, hoping it would be the first step toward his dream. The aunt, a woman of discernment and intelligence, immediately realized what was involved. She saw in her nephew's eyes a sincere desire and, realizing his intentions, took the situation into her own hands. Soon she began to give him more and more assignments and tasks. So, gradually, Ethan became her faithful servant, fulfilling her every wish.Key Features:Deep narrative: Immerse yourself in an intriguing story full of unexpected twists and secrets.Quality Animation: Enjoy detailed and high quality sex animations.Cool soundtrack: Discover the atmosphere of the game with an emotionally rich soundtrack.

Detailed Description: The finest in Edutainment for all ages. Pay once, play forever. No ads.Follow the trails, hunt through abandoned ruins, and caves as you solve puzzles and try to avoid traps laid by a bandit. Travel through breathtaking scenes that showcase clay sculpted characters. This is not a game of action and shooting, but is peppered with fun surprises.If you like to wander and figure things out while you hunt for treasures of gold in more than 15 fascinating Inca sites, this game is for you whether you are a seasoned adventure gamer or are new to the genre. There are 3 levels of difficulty which can be switched during play and your earned awards will be on display in your game.We hope that beyond the fun, The Ransom of Atawallpa (*Quechua for Atahualpa) will inspire you to dig deeper into the many mysteries of the Incas still hidden in Perú.Playable with Mouse and TouchscreenWishlist now to get notified when it is released!

Detailed Description: 《Dark Door》 is a reasoning game developed by the Mallet Games, a studio composed of students from Bilibili. Adapted from "It's Your Turn"A variety of decryption experiences suitable for players around the world are waiting for you. [/h2] · Silent music experience  Let you immerse yourself in its surroundings  · Real scene experience  Use Unreal Engine to Enhance Your Experience  · Unique plot  Unrealistic yet reasonable  · Passionate development team  Produced by a game studio composed of students from Bilibili  《Dark Door》 is adapted from the game 《It's Your Turn》 The design inspiration for the game "It's Your Turn" comes from the Japanese mystery drama of the same name. In the game, players will participate in a strange game about residents and solve puzzles through logical reasoning. The features of the game "It's Your Turn" include:[/h2] · Inference Elements: The game is full of reasoning elements, and players need to infer the truth of events by analyzing clues and evidence.·Multiplayer gameplay: The game supports multiplayer online gameplay, allowing players to solve puzzles together with other players, increasing the interactivity and challenge of the game.·Social function: The game also has a social function, allowing players to communicate and learn from reasoning enthusiasts from different regions, and jointly solve puzzles.·Suitable for detective fans: For players who enjoy detective and puzzle solving, this game provides a great platform to exercise and showcase their reasoning skills.Overall, 《It's Your Turn》 is a game that combines reasoning, leisure, and puzzle elements. It not only provides players with an entertainment experience, but also exercises their thinking and logical abilities. If you are a fan of mystery dramas or enjoy puzzle games, then "It's Your Turn" would be a good choice. If you need a better gaming experience, you can come and play the game 《Dark Door》! [/h2]《Dark Door》 takes advantage of the great advantages of the Unreal Engine to make a great adaptation and leap in the gaming experience of 《It's Your Turn》.Off topic: 《It's Your Turn》 has received support and encouragement from multiple parties since its launch, and it also stopped serving once on the way before being released again. But contrary to expectations, it still ceased service at 0:00 on June 20, 2024.Official announcement:Dear residentsThank you all for your continuous support and love for the 《It's Your Turn》 app.Since its launch,《It's Your Turn》 has gained tens of thousands of players. It is precisely because of everyone's continuous participation that we have always had enough motivation to improve the gaming experience and improve the playability. We hope to explore new game modes with everyone.It is an honor to join hands with all of you on this journey, and we also thank you for sharing and creating unforgettable memories with us. Detailed Description:
Barako and his crew are a group of benevolent pirates who fight fist to fist against a variety of enemies, going on adventures and giving their treasure to the poor. But one day, they find a 10 year old boy hidden among their latest plunder...

Are you ready to go on a high seas adventure? Join Barako and his crew as they fight against rival pirate crews, monsters, hunt for buried treasure and sail the seas in an exciting pirate themed adventure!


Features:

Passive skill system
Each crew member has their own set of unique skills which only they can use outside of combat.  For example, Barako can lift heavy objects, Vincenzo can jump a long distance and play musical instruments, Cedric can heal NPCs and can detect useable herbs, just to name a few!  Just choose which character you want to use by placing them at the head of the party!

Combat isn't just mashing attack!  
The player is encouraged to use a variety of skills due to cooldowns and each attack having unique properties and status effects attached to them!

Tools aplenty! 
Dig for buried treasure with a shovel, bust open locked doors with a crowbar, light dungeons and set fires with a lantern, and fish for aquatic life with a fishing rod. Items won't be automatically used either, you have to use your brain and use them manually!

Trauma Points
Also features the trauma point system.  The more TP a character accumulates by getting hit, the more damage they will take. Can only make TP go down by resting at an inn or at certain save points.

Gameplay Trailer Credits
Battle Music - Let's Go Do Pirate Stuff (Instrumental) by Voltz Supreme
Victory Music - Monkey Island Band (Looping) by Eric Matyas

Detailed Description: Ballistic is an exhilarating third-person multiplayer game that redefines the classic game of dodgeball into a fast-paced party experience. Compete with your friends to be the last one standing in a chaotic arena. Dodge, throw and strategize as you eliminate opponents by hitting them with well-aimed throws. The game unfolds over a series of rounds, if you accumulate the most round wins you will be crowned the ultimate BALLER! But that’s not all - Ballistic features ball buffs and power-ups that spice up the gameplay, and help players dominate the field. And with a diverse range of maps, each boasting its own unique theme, the excitement never wanes, ensuring no two rounds are ever the same. Gear up for pure, chaotic fun in Ballistic!

Detailed Description: In They Remain embark on a harrowing journey of survival in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by the undead. In this massively multiplayer online game, band together with other survivors to scavenge for resources across the wildlands, fortify and upgrade your base, and fend off relentless hordes of zombies. Will you thrive amidst the chaos or succumb to the ever-present threat of those who remain?  SURVIVE AT ALL COSTS Choose your battles wisely. Death is permanent there is no coming back. Survive against those who remain, Survive against the living. Collect valuable loot. Death comes for us all. How long will you survive?DISCOVER THE HARSH REALITY OF THE WILDLANDS Explore All Corners Of the wildlands. Enter the city for high risk and high reward or explore its surrounding farmlands Find useful resources you can take back to the settlement for money or upgrades.BUILD A NEW WORLD Join a new settlement at the bottom of the ranks and work your way up to the top Trade items in your settlement to further your growth  Upgrade your settlement with different areas, Kitchens, Allotments, infirmary's to help you survive this harsh world. Defend your base from hordes of zombies Manage your base's survivors to ensure its running at peak performance

Detailed Description: This is an open-world story about VAN CAT (that's his name, no affiliations with vehicles), a duduk player from a regular family, who tracks down his CULT-LEADING UNCLE through spacetime to talk him out of creating a WORLDWIDE DICTATORSHIP!!!Explore three surreal, immersive worlds swirling with music, light and color, inspired by the Ottoman Empire, Soviet Armenia and modern day Armenia to rescue your best friend, talk some sense to your weird, weird uncle, and destroy his time machine.This Game Includes: Unique visuals by the developer herself Beautiful music Sunlight and other cute lighting to make it feel like you're actually outside and touching grass Battling mechanics Puzzle solving, using pattern recognition to unlock doors and find hidden keys... Open world exploration, I don't want to control you :D
Short Description: A surreal story-driven game that uses puzzle-solving, turn based battling, and open world navigation to help Van Cat track down his evil uncle and put an end to his nefarious plans!

Detailed Description: A pointy-clicky corporate thriller that’s a little bit Monkey Island, a little bit Metal Gear Solid, and which is kinda like a Kafkaesque version of 1984 – so long as your definition of ‘kinda like’ is quite broad.What I can say is that this is most definitely a point-and-click adventure video game, and it’s one I think you should probably buy.Intriguing plot!Tom’s dangerously late for work, he hasn’t started his big Project AGER pitch, and – to be frank – he doesn’t even know what Project AGER is. Maybe because its true nature is much more disturbing than he could ever possibly understand... But we’ll get to that.Either way, getting up to his desk without Mr Biggleboss suspecting anything won’t be easy. In his way stands a boatload of bureaucracy, a furlong of fetch quests, and a pretty ominous set of warnings from a mysterious voice in the air vents.Just what is going on at Biggleboss Inc.? What does it have to do with Tom? And why does it suddenly feel like his day is only set to get weirder?In The Biggleboss Incident, you’ll solve puzzles, shirk responsibility, and figure out what’s really happening behind the scenes in the world’s weirdest office.Look at the moving pictures and hear the lovely noises!This game is fully voiced by real human beings who all got paid for their talent and time. It’s also got lots of whizzy animations and cutscenes and fun touches that took ages to do.This is a game I made with my own bare hands!It took me like five years, so if you play it I sure hope you like it. If you don’t then I guess I’ll try and make something better next time. Maybe something with guns and a season pass.It’s (hopefully) funny and entertaining and intriguing, and functions – for all intents and purposes – like a genuine video game. It doesn’t push the genre forward or break any new ground or anything, but I’ll leave that stuff to the pros. And, hey, if you ignore some of the rougher edges I’ll forget all about that embarrassing thing you did that one time. You know the one.Anyway it should take you around 6~ hours to complete, but it’s hard to tell with these things. It largely depends on how fast you figure out the puzzle with the coffee.Game features:Voices!Pointing!Clicking!Intrigue and mystery!Mild peril!A bit where you can flick a light switch that serves absolutely no purpose!Pervasive, crushing satire about the pointlessness of corporate culture!
Short Description: There is NOTHING sinister happening at Biggleboss Inc. Or at least that’s what the company motto says. Tom doesn’t have time to debate semantics, though; he’s dangerously late for work – and he hasn’t even started his big Project AGER pitch. …Or is that just what they want him to think?

Detailed Description:
A lo largo de este juego acompañarás a Galilei a través de ocho mundos para ayudarle a resolver ocho cuestiones relacionadas con el ámbito STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering y Mathematics).
 En cada mundo, tendrás que resolver un problema STEM, para lo que, no solamente deberás apuntar y destruir las estrellas que contienen las variables (datos) que necesitas para poder resolver este problema, sino que tendrás que decidir si la variable (dato) que te ofrece esa estrella es realmente útil para poder alcanzar la respuesta. 
OJO!! Porque habrá estrellas con variables que no necesitas y estrellas con variables, que aunque te podrían ser útiles, su utilización supone un coste adicional de telescopios, es decir, se puede alcanzar la solución mediante el uso de otras variables y utilizando menos telescopios. 
Cada mundo tiene la posibilidad de resolver tres veces el problema planteado mediante tres combinaciones de datos diferentes. Una vez que entras en un mundo, jugarás con la misma combinación de datos hasta que alcances la solución con esa combinación… en caso de que desees cambiar de combinación, puedes pulsar el botón correspondiente a la “recarga de escena” y comenzarás a jugar con una combinación nueva. 
Finalmente, para destruir estrellas necesitas manzanas; si se te acaban deberás conseguir más manzanas respondiendo preguntas STEM, buscando combinaciones STEAM (incluyendo las humanidades y ciencias sociales) o jugando a juegos clásicos.

Detailed Description: Get ready for heart-pounding action in Speedy 500, where the roar of engines and the smell of burning rubber fill the air. This adrenaline-fueled racing game pays homage to the iconic Speedianapolis 500 & 90s arcade racing games, combining high-speed thrills with strategic manoeuvring. Here’s what awaits you on the track:It’s the day of the prestigious Speedy 500, held at the legendary Speedianapolis Motor Speedway Circuit. The stands are packed, and the tension is palpable. You step into the shoes of a skilled race driver, aiming for victory. Your goal? To conquer 500 miles of intense racing, battling competitors, mastering pit stops, and navigating treacherous turns.Features:Authentic Cars: Choose from a line-up of meticulously modelled race cars, each with its own strengths and weaknesses. Arcade Physics: Experience the thrill of high-speed racing with arcade-based handling. Feel the g-forces as you hug the corners and accelerate down the straightaways.Dynamic Weather: The weather can change in an instant. Rain-soaked tracks demand caution, while sunny skies allow you to push the limits.Pit Stops: Manage tire wear, fuel levels, and repairs during pit stops. A well-executed stop can make or break your race.Challenging Tracks: The iconic oval track of the Speedianapolis Motor Speedway Circuit awaits. Master the art of drafting, slingshotting, and maintaining speed through the turns. Several other road courses are also included. Nail those hairpin turns, and strategically use the long straights to overtake opponents.Hall of Fame: Join the ranks of racing greats by winning multiple Speedy 500 championships.Speedy 500 isn’t just a race; it’s a quest for immortality. Strap in, rev those engines, and chase the chequered flag. The countdown begins—500 miles await!

Detailed Description:
"Yin-Yang Labyrinth" is a Chinese-style multiplayer online Roguelike dungeon crawler game.
One step to life, one step to death. Mysterious and deadly labyrinths. You and your companions find yourselves trapped in a bizarre maze. You must work together to overcome challenges and escape the labyrinth.
Diverse Maps: The game features a variety of level designs with different gameplay, and each level is randomly generated.
Multiple Professions: Players can choose from various professions to collaborate and navigate through levels.
Diverse Builds: In addition to professional skills, the game offers Yin-Yang glyphs, magical treasures, equipment, and general skills to construct various gameplay builds.

Detailed Description: This Game is Open World Action RPG including Shooting and Racing.WarOfGods 2, Modern World is the story of Greek goddesses coming from the multiverse world to the modern world, encountering various modern civilizations, having new experiences, and ruling the city with their pets. Each goddess has the abilities of a god, but as they experience modern civilization, they use a variety of modern equipment to rule and protect the city.An open world adventure where you decorate and protect the city with Greek goddesses and pets. Experience various interesting events that occur when modernity and mythology meet. Enjoy exciting racing, control robots, explore the world with various creatures such as dragons, horses, and pets, and rule the city. You'll get the game for early adopters around October 2024..

Detailed Description:
Hardly recovered from a series of catastrophes of the XXII, the world was hit by a new one — a mysterious object, called the Mandate of Heaven has hit Earth, killing the fifth part of humanity. Twenty years later, the MEMORIAL cemetery city was built on the site of a huge crater, in commemoration of the victims. While staying out of any state's jurisdiction, it annually welcomes millions of visitors and pilgrims, but its permanent residents can be counted on fingers. Those are espers who guard alive people from the unexplained occurrences that happen more and more frequently. It seems those who died under the ruins began to coming back to life, but in creepy and insane guises....

Together with Mirai Kagami, a young esper who has come to the city with a mission entrusted from a secret organisation, you will have to find out what secrets the MEMORIAL hides, what the Ocean's Lodge is and when the countdown before the Apocalypse will come to an end. The mankind's destiny is up to Mirai's investigation outcome, but the hero is confident in his own abilities — though he has no idea what destiny is prepared for him indeed.

Game Features:

· The branching story where the outcome depends on your choices

· Variety of routes offering different gameplay experiences

· Four romantic interests to suit all tastes

· Original soundtrack and mesmerizing locations

Detailed Description: Development is in its early stage, screenshots will be updated as finalized artwork is implemented.Welcome to Solitary Sentinel, a captivating single-player roguelike tower defense experience that combines strategic depth with accessible gameplay! Immerse yourself in a world of minimalist visuals and intuitive controls as you defend against relentless waves of evolving enemies.Key Features:Simple Yet Deep Tower Defense: Take command of a single, endlessly upgradable tower in a visually clean and minimalist environment. Dive into the strategic depths of tower defense with easy-to-understand controls that allow for seamless gameplay.Strategic Upgrades: Customize your tower's abilities and strengths as you progress, adapting to the ever-changing threats and challenges. Experience the satisfaction of mastering your tactics with synergy between mechanics.Dynamic Targeting: Engage enemies at your own pace with the convenience of using the tower's auto-targeting feature or take matters into your own hands by manually selecting your targets.Diverse Arsenal: Explore a vast array of weaponry at your disposal, including powerful lasers, electrifying Tesla coils, mesmerizing black hole generators, and devastating meteor callers. Experiment with different strategies and weapon combinations to find the perfect defense against evolving enemies.Progressive Difficulty: Survive more waves to unlock new difficulty levels for future runs. Challenge yourself with higher difficulty levels to unlock more powerful perks that enhance your sentinel's abilities and maximize your chances of survival.Augmented Enemy Waves: Feeling lucky? Greatly increase challenge of individual enemy waves by augmenting them in exchange for more rewarding loot upon clearing them. Test your skills against the toughest foes and reap the rewards of victory.Gameplay ExperiencePrepare for an immersive journey where every decision counts. Enjoy the simplicity of clean visuals and intuitive controls while delving into the strategic depths of tower defense. With minimalist design and accessible gameplay, Solitary Sentinel offers a rewarding experience for players of all skill levels.Challenge YourselfWith each passing wave, the challenge intensifies as enemies evolve, becoming more cunning and formidable. Every run is different as enemies evolve different evolutionary traits, requiring different strategies to deal with. Stay vigilant, adapt your strategies on the fly, and unleash the full potential of your arsenal to survive against the odds.Are You Ready to Defend Against the Onslaught?Prepare for an epic battle where survival depends on your wit, skill, and strategic prowess. Can you endure the relentless assault and emerge victorious, or will your defenses crumble under the pressure? The fate of the sector rests in your hands.

Detailed Description: Zombots is a fast-paced FPS inspired by the intensity of Doom and the charm and replayability of Brotatoe. Blast your way through hordes of enemies in style while listening to the adrenaline-pumping soundtrack. Features:Roguelike Gameplay: Survive wave after wave as you upgrade your arsenal and unlock new abilities to meet the increasing difficulty. Survive until daybreak, or die trying. Powerful Weapons: Fire away with a variety of exotic guns. From the rapid-fire shotgun to the sticky plasma launcher, you’ll surely find the right tool for the job. Upgrade your weapons to unlock their full potential. Unique Abilities: Augment your character to turn the tides against the invaders with abilities such as an evasive dash, devastating energy sword, automatic shoulder-turrets and more.Dangerous Enemies: Between the mindless drones, stealthy assassins, towering titans and more, you’ll need to keep your senses sharp and your fingers trigger-happy if you want to survive each night.Leaderboards: Grow and maintain your score multiplier while clearing levels to set a new high score as you work your way up the ranks.
Short Description: Zombots is a fast-paced, wave-based survival FPS where players will have to utilize unique weapons, powerful upgrades, and exciting abilities to fend off hordes of invading robot zombies!

Detailed Description: You are just a runner, who keeps running. You are unlucky enough to always end up finding your life in great danger. However, thanks to your amazing parkour skills, you navigate through hazardous environments with ease and live to see another day.There is always a reason to run for. Whether a security drone chasing you down, unexpected results of failed experiments or (un)planned explosions.You might be unlucky, but you can still do:Slide and rollWall run, wall jump and climbingGlide on ropesVault on obstacles and keep runninKey Features:Thematic Environments: Traverse through diverse settings with unique challenges and themes, from neon streets to high-tech labs and immerse yourself in the vibrant and detailed world of Keep Runnin.Thrilling Obstacles: Overcome various obstacles that require precise movements and planning on the run.Intense Pursuits: Try your luck on running away from security drones and environmental hazards that push you to keep running.Fluid Parkour Mechanics: Enjoy smooth and responsive controls that make every jump, slide, and sprint feel natural.Collectible items: Catch different energy drinks scattered throughout the levels during your run to gain boosts and enhance your parkour abilities. Collect unique items and unlock new skins.Test your reflexes and embrace the excitement of a high-stakes chase in this exhilarating adventure.Just Keep Runnin!
Short Description: Keep Runnin is a 2D sidescrolling parkour-platformer game where you navigate through various, visually stunning environments, overcome obstacles, and evade unexpected hazards. Test your reflexes and embrace the excitement of a high-stakes chase in this exhilarating adventure.

Navigate through various floors as you climb upwards in a quest to get to the top.Features include 100+ procedurally generated floors, tons of different tiles with different mechanics, and an exciting story about a space accident. Detailed Description: Mass destruction and newt goodness awaits you in Volcanewt!Play as the Volcanewt, a volcanic salamander ready to destroy the World Wide Defense Force(WWDF) for leeching off his volcanic energy. In this action packed city destruction game, you go across the 3 Hawiwi Islands, a tropical archipelago that on any other day would be a tropical paradise to visit. These three islands are Beginners Bay, a tourist hotspot where our newt makes their humble beginnings, to Hawiwi Resort, a beautiful resort with a more mustered militia to defend against the Volcanewt, to Mamba Metropolis, a metropolis that also acts as the WWDF's main headquarters.In Volcanewt, to complete each level you must fill out your destruction meter, a tool to determine how much of the city you have annihilated, and claim back your thermal energy from the clusters of the WWDF in the form of destroying powerplants. Doing so will further unlock the Volcanewt's dormant powers.These powers consist of a thermally powered charge, a fireball projectile, and a beam for destruction on a massive scale.The WWDF won't allow their cities to be destroyed that easily though, as they droves of soldiers to fend you off, and the creations of General Hugh Gexplosion to further halt the Volcanewt's Advance.Play as the massive Volcanewt, destroy the cities to progress, and unlock abilities that will aid in the total destruction of the WWDF!

Detailed Description: Oasis Blitz is a speedrunning 3D platformer focused around a unique movement mechanic: drilling into the ground. Play as Bandit, a drill-wielding fennec fox on a quest to reach the Oasis in the sky.DrillUse your drill to move fluidly through the environment.SurfSurf down slopes on your sandboard to gain speed.GrappleGrapple to enemies, then smash through them with your drill!Discover the DesertSpeed through racetrack inspired levels formed by floating desert islands.Restore your homeBring flowers back to your home, and chat with friends that you meet along the way.

Detailed Description: Summoned by Accident is a text based rpg focused mainly on m/m content with character driven plot. In it, you explore and run into inhabitants of the world. Some friendly, some foe. Inspired by other text based games and some videos.You play as a visitor to the world who's trapped here till you can get a way back home. Luckily, your first encounter is with a short blue fox that seems to have the hook up. Able to get you a place to stay and even a new job as you wait. This, much like the inhabitants of the world, is something more than what first comes to eye. As you meet new people and learn what exactly you're being set up for, you'll be forced to choose who's allegiance you stand for. Even if that is mainly for one other person than group.At first, you'll be restricted on what you can do. Exploring and finding about the little part of the city you stay at, but as you progress further in the story, so too does your freedom along with others. What starts out as you learning about the world and meeting new people, will evolve into you changing yourself to fit the occasion. Whether it's changing your looks for the right guy to be interested in you or people to give you the time of day. The way you fight so you can stand a chance against something you're dragged in to. Or just to do it so you can see that something special only a certain few can, you won't be leaving this world the same way you came into it.

Detailed Description:
Loki, the god of trickery, is up to his grandest scheme yet and to see it to fruition, Baldr, the god of wisdom and light, must be out of the way. Slain by Loki, Baldr is cast to the underworld. Loki uses this opportunity to his advantage to introduce intoxicating technology to the Aesir and dwarves, which the dwarves embed into the world causing an imbalance. Reborn by Hel, Baldr must restore balance to the world and regain godhood. Over Light Reforged, the player travels between four of the realms of Norse mythology. These include Helheim, the home of the dead; Asgard, the home of the Aesir; Vanaheim, the home of the Vanir; and Svartalfheim, the home of the Dwarves. 

The Realms:
Vanaheim - realm of the Vanir and nature – is the last stand between Ivaldi and his goal of technological takeover. As such, it’s the most naturalistic and least steampunk in visual design. 
Asgard - Asgard  is more technologically advanced than Vanaheim. The Asgard arena is a sacred battleground, but small glimpses of technology can be seen around the outer rim of the arena.
Svartalfheim is home of the Dwarves and ruled by the Sons of Ivaldi. The city is the most corrupted realm, void of any lush nature. The water and sky are stained red from use of the magic cores. Roads, sidewalks, and large buildings are dirtied by the smog that persists through the city. Located in the city are three cores that power the city.

Throughout the game, the player has multiple combat mechanics at their disposal for fighting different enemies throughout the levels: a dash, a melee attack, projectile weapons, the Prismatic Light Meter, and special actions. 

Use The Elements To Fight:
 As you fight you increase your Prismatic Light Meter. Prismatic Light allows you to use the elements to the advantage. There are three elements that can be chosen from. Fire, Ice, and Wind. Each of these elements has three tiers. Each elements offer a variety of offensive and defensive capabilities. You can get burn damage on your enemy over time, freeze them in place, or blow away large groups of enemies.

Hack N Slash Your Way Through:
Light Reforged focuses on hacking and slashing your enemies. Use fluid combat to strategically dodge enemies and gain the advantage on your foes. Challenge bosses and a variety of enemies throughout the realm that require you to think before you jump. If you feel overwhelmed, use your cannon to clear waves of enemies. Use your dash to mow through hordes and slash enemies as they try to surround you.
Short Description: Light Reforged features Baldr, the god of wisdom and light, as he travels the Nine Realms to rid the world of technology that was designed by Loki and is slowly bewitching the realms. Exploring vibrant and technological worlds while defeating a variety of opponents.
About the Game:
Loki, the god of trickery, is up to his grandest scheme yet and to see it to fruition, Baldr, the god of wisdom and light, must be out of the way. Slain by Loki, Baldr is cast to the underworld. Loki uses this opportunity to his advantage to introduce intoxicating technology to the Aesir and dwarves, which the dwarves embed into the world causing an imbalance. Reborn by Hel, Baldr must restore balance to the world and regain godhood. Over Light Reforged, the player travels between four of the realms of Norse mythology. These include Helheim, the home of the dead; Asgard, the home of the Aesir; Vanaheim, the home of the Vanir; and Svartalfheim, the home of the Dwarves. 

The Realms:
Vanaheim - realm of the Vanir and nature – is the last stand between Ivaldi and his goal of technological takeover. As such, it’s the most naturalistic and least steampunk in visual design. 
Asgard - Asgard  is more technologically advanced than Vanaheim. The Asgard arena is a sacred battleground, but small glimpses of technology can be seen around the outer rim of the arena.
Svartalfheim is home of the Dwarves and ruled by the Sons of Ivaldi. The city is the most corrupted realm, void of any lush nature. The water and sky are stained red from use of the magic cores. Roads, sidewalks, and large buildings are dirtied by the smog that persists through the city. Located in the city are three cores that power the city.

Throughout the game, the player has multiple combat mechanics at their disposal for fighting different enemies throughout the levels: a dash, a melee attack, projectile weapons, the Prismatic Light Meter, and special actions. 

Use The Elements To Fight:
 As you fight you increase your Prismatic Light Meter. Prismatic Light allows you to use the elements to the advantage. There are three elements that can be chosen from. Fire, Ice, and Wind. Each of these elements has three tiers. Each elements offer a variety of offensive and defensive capabilities. You can get burn damage on your enemy over time, freeze them in place, or blow away large groups of enemies.

Hack N Slash Your Way Through:
Light Reforged focuses on hacking and slashing your enemies. Use fluid combat to strategically dodge enemies and gain the advantage on your foes. Challenge bosses and a variety of enemies throughout the realm that require you to think before you jump. If you feel overwhelmed, use your cannon to clear waves of enemies. Use your dash to mow through hordes and slash enemies as they try to surround you.

Detailed Description: Block Trucks is a competitive, real time, ranked multiplayer racing game. Race against opponents on a variety of challenging track surfaces, upgrade your truck and rank up as you win.CLIMB THE RANKSStart in BRONZE and climb the ranks as you win races. Do you have what it takes to ascend to the esteemed rank of GRAND CHAMPION?DIVERSE UPGRADE SYSTEMUpgrade your truck across 9 different categories to suit your racing strategy. Do you get physical and bump opponents into the barriers, or rely on raw nitro boost and engine upgrades to speed your way to victory?TOUGH RACING CONDITIONSUnlock challening racing conditions as you progress. Start on tarmac where grip is plenty, then slide onto sand, trawl through mud and slippery snow with each track surface testing your racing skills to the limit.FULL AERIAL CONTROLExecute aerial control on any axis with back flips, front flips, air roll and spins for show or line up your truck to make perfect landings for better lap times.ON-TRACK PICKUPSFend off opponents as you collect valuable nitro boost, upgrade cards and cosmetic cards on the race track.CUSTOMISE YOUR TRUCKStand out from the crowd with a vast array of paints, tyre sets, decals, and nitro boosts. From common to legendary, there’s a look for every competitor.FULL CONTROLLER SUPPORTWith comprehensive support for most gamepads and Bluetooth controllers, you’ll have all the control you need right at your fingertips.

You've been hired as the newest member of the sales team for Orbot co.!During your work day, you will be subject to multiple tasks of which your initial contract was not privy to!You're due diligence in your daily quotas for bot sales and file management are of the upmost importance. Detailed Description: terminal connection is a metaphor for doomscrolling. You fly a plane. Stay close to surfaces to keep your engine running as hyperreal landscapes flood your senses. You find yourself in a cozy airplane hanger, seated in a cockpit. As you attempt to start your flight, a glowing cave fades in around you. You go through the standard flight checks, testing your controls, and begin to glitch through overwhelming and disorienting spaces. Terms and conditions fly by you, the love you've never had is advertised – demanded – of you, your interests are weaponized in your workplace, and you're forced to see visceral vulnerability. Finally, space seems to collapse onto itself, threatening to overpower you, but you find yourself flying into a never-ending void. Will you end your terminal connection?terminal connection is an observation of the resting state of capitalist-hyperreality. Capitalist-hyperreality is a phenomenon brought about by the exponential growth of hyperreal influences within a capitalistic structure. Hyperreality is – the abstracted and self-referential understanding of reality that comes about as a result of human communication and, more relevantly, mass media. It identifies the distance we have created between our subjective realities and objective reality as a result of our construction of experienced reality based on the subjectivity of others rather than what actually might be real. If a rare flower were to be found in the modern day, a hyperreal construct of the flower would be created through language, videos, images, songs, artworks, and poems of said flower. The average person’s understanding of the flower would almost certainly be based on the hyperreal construct of the flower, and more hyperreal constructs would be created based on the existing hyperreal constructs. This perpetuating web of abstraction extends until the real flower itself is nearly forgotten. Only a minute few would have ever actually seen the real flower.terminal connection diagnoses the consequences of when hyperreal abstraction is driven by monetary incentives. This game is a metaphor for doomscrolling and expects to simulate the emotions brought forth by ever invasive social media, in a critical space. We hope to accentuate the adverse consequences of capital incentives on the otherwise natural processes of abstraction spreading throughout mass media. We've attempted to depict some of the relational cycles of oppression/oppressing present in capital driven social media and provide the player with the first step out of the cycle - the moment you choose to leave.Extensive writing about terminal connection and the process of creating it can be found on our blog, .

Detailed Description: FRAY spawned from the story of Tullio and Ziya, two deeply bonded brothers who share a passion for movement, hip hop culture, and a competitive zeal for video games.  Their brotherly connection frays as the elder brother Ziya is lured into a wondrous video game world by Lucious, a beguiling AI character he conjures up for a gaming contest.  The contest calls for building a great puzzle game, but as Ziya’s foray into AI blurs the line between real and virtual, the brothers are drawn into a real-life quandary in which restoring the frayed connections of their relationship means confronting the reality that people are the greatest puzzles of all.The FRAY team invites fans into both worlds through a hip hop dance theatre production, and through  a video game for PC's launching on Steam June 15th.  FRAY Game is an imaginative, rhythm based puzzle game in which the player takes control of Tullio to light the way through a maze-like world of isometric dance puzzles and rhythm based challenges. Along the way, cunning enemies attempt to break the bond between the brothers and seduce Ziya into the underworld forever. By moving to the rhythm and mastering energy-blasting dance routines, Tullio must keep improving his dancing skills to acquire enough energy to carry his ailing brother to the final level’s end - an allegorical home.  FRAY Game was built by Herobeat Studios in Barcelona. Unreal Engine.The FRAY Show is a unique and game-changing new production that intersects hip hop dance theatre with gaming and a conceptual AI world, and is coming to the state of the art stage of Lilian Baylis Studio, Sadlers Wells for an exclusive two night run on Friday 21st and Saturday 22nd June, with tickets on sale now here. The FRAY Show brings together an innovative team of creators, including writer/Executive Producer/Director Kate Duhamel of Candy Bomber Productions and the Olivier award nominated MC, dancer, director and founder of Breakin’ Convention and maverick hip hop dance pioneer  Jonzi D, who is FRAY’s Artistic Director, with music supervision by respected UK hip hop artist Micall Parknsn, live music performed by the award-winning saxophonist, composer and broadcaster Soweto Kinch, with choreography by dance captain Ola Papiór.
Short Description: FRAY Game is a rhythm based puzzle game about two brothers Tullio and Ziya. Take control of Tullio to move to the beat and master energy blasting dance moves to light the way through a maze-like world of dance challenges and to battle cunning enemies who attempt to break the bond between brothers.

Detailed Description: A researcher wakes up alone, trapped in a dark building, drawn into the heart of a sinister experiment.Unstoppable: Breakout is an exhilarating action game based on a souls-like system. Strategic thinking and resource management are essential, and as night deepens, you'll face increasingly menacing enemies. This game delivers relentless tension through its rich art style and gripping soundtrack, characterized by the unsettling atmosphere revealed during exploration. Will you uncover the dark secrets? The fight for survival in this mysterious space is finally beginning. Step into the darkness.

Detailed Description: Defeat a Demonic OutbreakAn endless wave-based shooter where you and your foes become increasingly more powerful. Battle your way through hordes of demons using the power of whatever weird and magical drinks your local vending machine has to offer.Keep the Fight GoingAfter beating the game you can enter Endless mode, where enemies get exponentially more powerful with each new wave. How long can you last against the onslaught?Get InvolvedAs a first-time solo developer, I am still learning lots about game-making. Reach out if you encounter any bugs or if you have your own ideas about things to add to the game. Any idea submissions added to future updates will be credited to you, so be sure to include a name or pseudonym for accreditation!

Detailed Description: Immerse yourself in the role of a guardian of wildlife! In this captivating 3D toon-styled simulation game, you'll shape lush environments and carefully manage diverse species of animals to maintain harmony. Balance is key as you strategically place different creatures within the ecosystem, ensuring populations thrive without upsetting the delicate equilibrium. But beware, challenges arise as you navigate the intricate web of nature's cycles.Unlock upgrades to bolster your animal's resilience against threats, from starvation to natural predators. As you progress, witness your creations flourish as you upgrade animals' ability to have more babies, search for food more effectively, and more!Are you ready to embark on a journey of conservation and discovery? Play Wild Harmony now and experience the joy of nurturing nature in this delightful casual strategy simulation!"

Detailed Description: “Mama Wan has just passed. Mum had to leave work early today to prepare for the funeral. Brother and I will be taking the bus after school. It’s been a while since we have gone back there.“A Forlorn HomecomingExplore the decrepit apartments of Wallace Court as either Wan Zi Min or Wan Zi Han, a sister-brother duo with a formerly unknown heritage, as they are unwittingly dragged into thwarting a sinister disturbance so close to home.A Trial of Two WanderersFeaturing the option for either a single-player experience or two-player co-op, you and a friend can journey into the spiritual realm together. Solve puzzles, ward off phantoms, and engage in bouts of sibling rivalry. After all, two heads are supposedly better than one.An Old-School PerspectiveDrawing inspiration from other classics of survival horror, experience the nostalgia when the genre was first being defined as you search through haunted remains and unravel dark mysteries. Confront the supernatural using modernised controls with classic gameplay.A Time When Spirits Walk the EarthSet during the late 20th century, when superstition and folklore were inseparable from everyday life, you will encounter various ghosts and spirits during your journey. While some would love to talk your young ears off, others may be less than pleased to meet you.A World to ExploreFrom dilapidated apartment blocks (inspired by Southeast Asian structures) to other less-than-normal environments, you will traverse a number of varying landscapes as you attempt to piece together the unfolding truth. Keep your wits about you as the realms can be misleading.An Ending Driven by ChoiceEvery action you take, has a consequence. From spending time with a stray cat to assisting strange neighbours with equally strange requests, the ending of YAN魇: PARASOMNIA is wholly and directly driven by your very actions. You choose your ending. Dying is entirely optional but available.Final DisclaimerThe toilets do not contain any form of hidden treasures. Maybe.

Detailed Description: Welcome to Starsand Island—a tranquil island farming SLG that lifts away your weariness, allowing you to experience a leisurely pastoral life in your self-built realm.Escape to A Ghibli-esque island ParadiseStarsand Island is more than just a game—it's a journey for the soul. Imagine yourself amidst warm sunshine, soft sands, lush meadows, gentle windmills, friendly townsfolk, mild dolphins, vibrant corals, cozy cabins, and lively squirrels. This is an island world inspired by the whimsical style of Ghibli where you can shed the burdens of reality and enjoy the peace and beauty of your very own slice of paradise.A Rich Farming and Exploration ExperienceExperience the joy of gathering treasures from the sea, witnessing the growth of your crops, fishing in abundant waters, and discovering minerals and tropical plants on your adventurous expeditions. Dive into the depths for colorful corals and seek out hidden pearls, indulging in a diverse environment where every effort rewards you with a profound sense of accomplishment.Genuine Community Interaction and Real-life CaringThe town is home to 40+ unique NPCs, each with their own secret stories for you to unfold. Build close relationships and possibly find a life partner. These residents will respond to your actions with daily greetings and care, granting you a true sense of belonging and the warmth of home within the island community.Endless Possibilities In Home CreationChoose the perfect location between the mountains and the seas to build your dream home. Construction goes beyond mere brick and mortar; this is your canvas for creativity. Whether designing murals, customizing sounds, or programming interactive props, you're free to express yourself and create a space that's uniquely yours.In Starsand Island, you embody more than just a player—you are a creator, explorer, and guardian of this land. Join us, embark on your countryside living, and let your spirit find true release and nourishment.

Detailed Description: In Jordi & Oslo and the Lost Tail, Oslo the Dragon has gone missing. You impersonate two characters, Jordi and Sígrid, as they try to piece together who is behind their friend’s mysterious disappearance. In this humorous point-and-click adventure, you solve smart puzzles, crack punch lines, and explore beautiful watercolour-painted locations inspired by the Spanish countryside.Get priority-mailed out of your home, beat an indefense wooden log, and discover off-limit underground facilities. Then, find your way out to a charming rural village full of quirky characters, lovely animals, and obsolete technology. Cozy banter, hot chocolate, and fussball challenges await you!Jordi and Oslo and the lost tail is a 5x game: Exchange items between Jordi and Sígrid’s inventories, explore lovely homely locations, explode untidy rooms, examine clues until the characters say something funny,  and expose a shady plan to gain magical powers.A comic blend: The video game is based on the ‘Jordi and Oslo’ comic strips that feature in the Spanish local newspaper, Segre, and it is entirely hand-drawn and hand-animated by their author, JoveGuille. The videogame mixes the whimsical 1990s point-and-click adventures style with the playful art and the dialogue style of the comic strips.
Short Description: Jordi & Oslo and the Lost Tail is a humorous point and click adventure game. Explore beatiful watercolour- painted locations, interact with quirky characters, and solve witty puzzles to help Jordi and Sigrid investigate the disappearence of their missing friend Oslo.
About the Game: In Jordi & Oslo and the Lost Tail, Oslo the Dragon has gone missing. You impersonate two characters, Jordi and Sígrid, as they try to piece together who is behind their friend’s mysterious disappearance. In this humorous point-and-click adventure, you solve smart puzzles, crack punch lines, and explore beautiful watercolour-painted locations inspired by the Spanish countryside.Get priority-mailed out of your home, beat an indefense wooden log, and discover off-limit underground facilities. Then, find your way out to a charming rural village full of quirky characters, lovely animals, and obsolete technology. Cozy banter, hot chocolate, and fussball challenges await you!Jordi and Oslo and the lost tail is a 5x game: Exchange items between Jordi and Sígrid’s inventories, explore lovely homely locations, explode untidy rooms, examine clues until the characters say something funny,  and expose a shady plan to gain magical powers.A comic blend: The video game is based on the ‘Jordi and Oslo’ comic strips that feature in the Spanish local newspaper, Segre, and it is entirely hand-drawn and hand-animated by their author, JoveGuille. The videogame mixes the whimsical 1990s point-and-click adventures style with the playful art and the dialogue style of the comic strips.

Detailed Description:
《致过去破损的时光》是一款情感驱动的2D像素艺术冒险游戏，专为喜欢深入探索自我和心灵故事的玩家设计。在这个游戏中，你将扮演一位拥有修复灵魂能力的神秘修灵师，你的主要任务是修复自己的杯具，通过这个过程发现并恢复自己遗失的记忆。

叙事与角色：

游戏采用一种线性叙事方式，玩家在开发者安排好的剧情中，体验一段完整且精彩的故事。这种开放式的叙事结构允许玩家在探索过程中自由选择路径，揭开主角复杂过去的层层面纱。
角色的对话和内心独白丰富了游戏的故事深度。
玩家体验与互动：

游戏中的互动元素设计巧妙，这些都与主角的记忆恢复紧密相关，旨在增强玩家的参与感和挑战性。
玩家将体验到角色成长的每一个阶段，每一次成功的记忆恢复不仅带来故事的进展，也是玩家自身技能和理解的提升。
创新与技术：

游戏采用了先进的像素渲染技术，使得像素艺术的细节和色彩更加丰富和生动，提升了视觉效果的同时，保持了经典像素游戏的韵味。
整个游戏的设计注重玩家体验的流畅性和界面的直观性，确保玩家能够无障碍地沉浸在游戏的故事和世界中。
《致过去破损的时光》不仅仅是一场游戏冒险，它是一次深刻的心灵旅程，挑战玩家的智慧和情感，探索身份、记忆和个人历史的复杂层次。这款游戏是对那些渴望在游戏中寻找深度和意义的玩家的一次独特邀请。
如果对游戏的剧情感兴趣的，可以打开游戏文件夹，里面附带的有游戏的原剧本！
Short Description: 《致过去破损的时光》是一款独特的像素风格纯剧情游戏。玩家扮演着拥有特殊使命的主角，开始调查一些奇怪的事件，最后发现令人惊奇的秘密，玩家将跟随主角的脚步，体验一段深刻而动人的故事。游戏通过精美的像素艺术，将玩家带入一个充满想象力的梦境空间，让玩家在探索剧情的同时，感受到视觉与心灵的双重震撼。这是一款感动的纯剧情游戏。我们诚挚邀请您踏入这个充满惊喜的故事，展开一段最过去的时光的寻找之旅。在这个世界里。

Detailed Description: Once, humanity fought ceaselessly over trivial matters, and now they face dire consequences: alien races from distant stars have observed the conflicts raging on this planet. Today, three powerful extraterrestrial civilizations continue their endless war for their respective purposes, turning the planet into a wasteland where humanity struggles to survive amidst their power struggles.Your village has been destroyed by the war. To survive in this chaotic world, you must quickly familiarize yourself with the technologies and skills upon which humanity relies, unite reliable companions, and build and defend your own camp.As you establish your foothold, chaos and mysteries will assail you, and the fate of you and your people will depend on your choices.Gather resources from the surroundings, fill your belly, and then build your own base. You can cultivate various crops to ensure a food supply for yourself and your companions. Utilize the limited resources on the wasteland to build comfortable houses.Reputation reflects your influence in this world, which you can gradually accumulate through various actions. Reputation is crucial; for instance, when you need to recruit companions, they will judge whether you are a competent leader based on your reputation level. It's worth noting that reputation is a double-edged sword: the higher your reputation, the more attention you will attract from powerful factions, which could potentially bring you into crisis.Players can utilize a wide array of weapons and equipment for combat, including melee and ranged weapons. Master various weapons to enhance your proficiency and prepare to face even stronger enemies on the battlefield.The control of this planet is no longer in human hands, and the alien races do not regard humanity highly. Perhaps you can take full advantage of this opportunity to gradually establish your own power from scratch.You can build your own armed forces and become a dominant force. You can also seek the protection of powerful factions, or use strategy and diplomacy to turn enemies into allies. In times of chaos, no one can criticize your choices: for survival, all means are fair!
Short Description: Habitants is an open-world survival game for 1-8 players. Set on a tumultuous planet, players must contend with mysterious alien races, survive in the midst of powerful factions vying for dominance, and build your own base through construction, combat, and strategy.

Detailed Description: Bellerophon is a hero from Greek mythology. With his flying horse Pegasus, he defeated many monsters like the Chimera, and now you're headed to Olympus to become a god.Can your spirit of adventure reach beyond Mount Olympus to the temple high in the sky?It's okay to quit after flying a bit.His fate is up to you, after all.Not everyone has to be a hero, right?The goal of the game is simple. You have to overcome terrain features, traps, and fly endlessly. - Move and jump Fly with simple controls. Stay focused and you'll never fall.- Pegasus looks a little wild, but that's okay, use the jump key to tame him.- You are an invincible hero. No attack can stop you, except maybe gravity.- Watch out for the flies. Pesky beings and trials of the gods stand in your way.- If you're afraid of heights, beware of the gameplay.The game is basically a permadeath jumping platformer.Yeah... It's the game you're imagining, but maybe a little different.Because it's always nice to fly through the sky, and it might just reduce your anger and stress.If you ever imagined as a kid running around on top of the clouds, Unreal Engine can now make that dream come true.In this world, there is day and night. Enjoy flying through the beautiful sky as it changes from hour to hour.Collect scattered constellations and stitch them into the night sky to make your journey more romantic.
Short Description: You are Bellerophon, a hero who dreams of becoming a god and rises to the heavens and beyond. Overcome obstacles and trials to reach the heavens and become a god! But for some reason, Pegasus is the only one who seems excited.

Detailed Description:
This is a farming simulator game!

Here, you need to manage your resources to expand your ranch, raise farm livestock such as chickens, cows, and sheep, and grow a large selection of crops! You can sell your produce for gold to purchase resources and gadgets that will improve your ranch.

As you oversee your ranch, you will also have to take care of yourself, and stay healthy and alive. The game utilizes a dynamic season/weather system, which can interfere with the behavior of certain animals, and the growth of certain crops. There is also a combat system that allows the player to hunt wild animals, and fend off dangerous beasts that might assault your ranch at midnight and eat your livestock (which is also why NOT leaving them wandering outside your ranch at night is a good idea). Lastly, there will also be cute critters who will not-so-cutely eat your crops.

The game allows for multiplayer gameplay, collaborate with your friends to manage the ranch together, hunt or fish for a homemade delicious meal, snuggle with your family cat(s) and dog(s), and much more!
Short Description: This is an open-world farm game that includes planting, raising, building, survival, fishing, and other gameplay elements. In this game, you need to manage your resources wisely to expand your farm.

Detailed Description:
This is a short-process game made with Godot engine. In this game, players can control the toy excavator to move, jump and attack.
There will be some items and target scores in the game level. By smashing the items, you can earn points and enter the next level by accumulating the target score.
The target objects in the game have physical effects. Players need to consider how to complete the goal cleverly. If the brutal attack makes the target scattered all over the ground, it will make the game more difficult.
In this process, you will encounter some other toy cars, and players need to repel them.
In the game, you can use the mouse to control the direction of movement.
There are 5 maps in the game, each with its own unique boss.
Short Description: A relaxing and casual decompression game. Control the naughty alloy toy excavator to smash the objects in the game. Have fun and relieve stress.
