Detailed Description: Impostor Online is a murder mystery and detective-style game inspired by social deduction games like Werewolf and Town of Salem. In each match, players are assigned random roles and must identify the Impostors before it's too late. The game is played between two teams: the Blue Team (the good guys) and the Red Team (the bad guys). The Blue Team wins by eliminating all Impostors, while the Red Team wins by either killing all the Ghost Investigators or all the civilians.  The Impostors are the main murderers. Each night, they can see and communicate with one another in a separate chat window (or through voice chat) and select one player to eliminate.Ghost Investigators play a crucial role on the Blue Team. Each night, they can communicate and choose one player to investigate, revealing their role and guiding the team’s strategy. During the day, players gather to debate who they believe is guilty. Through voting, they can lynch a suspect. Innocents must collaborate with Investigators to eliminate the Impostors and secure their victory. In addition to Impostors and Investigators, there are also other special roles, such as the Butcher, Joker, Guardian... each with unique abilities.FEATURES: Multiplayer: play online, from 6 to 12 players. You can play with your friends or join other players. Written and vocal chat: Communication is key in Impostor Online, as you have to either accuse suspicious players or defend yourself against their accusations! Many playable characters: Special roles and abilities are available in Impostor Online. Such as Impostors, Ghost Investigators, Butcher, Guardian, Joker...  Customization: Personalize your character from head to foot. Progression and statistics: Earn experience points and rewards from every game you win. As you level up, unlock new titles and cosmetic items to showcase your rank and style.
Short Description: Inspired by party games like Werewolf and Mafia, Impostor Online is a 6-12 player online game of murder and deception. Join friends and play as a civilian, impostor, butcher, joker, or unique characters to strategize your way to victory!

Detailed Description:
Synthetic Soul 3 is an immersive modern life sim with in-depth robot companions. 

This idea allows you to play the game your way, with the player choice being our guiding gameplay mechanic.

Play out true rags to riches tales with different origin stories. From an orphan from birth to a wealthy CEO’s successor, begin your ascent to the top.

Ascending allows you to buy different houses you can move into, robot companions, outfits, and personality modules for your robots.

Earn money from odd jobs, daily stock trading, Real Estate, Commercial Real Estate, and purchasing multiple corporations and their upgrades.

What kind of person will you become when you have it all?

Discover your true worth and climb to the peak.

Detailed Description:
Synthetic Soul: Reset is a remaster of our first game in the series, remade in our new engine. 

The game is an immersive modern life sim with in-depth robot companions. 

This idea allows you to play the game your way, with the player choice being our guiding gameplay mechanic.

After a Greydoll robot is sent to your front door without buying it, you start climbing the social ladder.

Climbing allows you to buy different houses you can move into, robot companions, outfits, and personality modules for your robots.

Earn money from odd jobs, daily stock trading, Real Estate, Commercial Real Estate, and purchasing multiple corporations and their upgrades.

What kind of person will you become once you truly have it all?

Discover the secret of your robot, and change the world.

Detailed Description:
Cute Bless is a whimsical and adorable game where you embark on a journey to discover what haunts this world.

Get ready to face various bosses and earn their blessings, which will aid you in your quest for the truth of your past.

Explore the world by saving lives and helping nearby residents, trying to protect them from the cute darkness lurking around.

Use the remains of your enemies to become stronger and exterminate them once and for all.

Uncover the story behind the food chain of beings from another world.

Detailed Description:
Embark on an engaging adventure with 'May’s Journey', a 2.5D puzzle game that seamlessly integrates programming concepts into its gameplay. Navigate through a maze-like environment and employ the game’s intuitive pseudo code to manipulate various objects and overcome challenges.

Designed as an interactive learning experience, 'May’s Journey' immerses players in the fundamentals of programming, emphasizing logical thinking and object-oriented abstractions. 

Set in a crafted fictional world thrown into disarray, players assume the role of the guide and helper of May, the determined protagonist on a quest to restore balance and uncover the enigma behind her world's fracture.

Detailed Description:
GROKAI

This is an A.I. Generated Text Based "Create Your Own Adventure" Game
You help form a Team of worthy Adventurers to go on Several Quests over Many Challenging Levels

Characters:
You the Player are the heart of the Team, 
and Grok is a brave and adventurous hero, 
while Archor Wright is a witty and resourceful sidekick who provides comic relief and support.

Setting:
In an unknown time, the world has become a place where PUNs and MEMEs reign supreme. The International Court of Justice has ruled that all conflicts must be resolved through the use of wordplay and humor, and the United Nations has been replaced by the United PUNs and MEMEs (UPM). In this brave new world, even the most serious of issues are tackled with a healthy dose of laughter.

In this setting, the "Choose Your Own Adventure" game genre has become the primary form of entertainment, as people seek to escape the absurdity of everyday life. Players can explore a variety of humorous and pun-filled worlds, where they can make choices and shape their own destinies. From the post-apocalyptic wasteland there is something for everyone in this diverse and engaging genre.

As players embark on their adventures, they can take comfort in the fact that they have the power to make a difference in their own virtual worlds. In a time of laughter and absurdity, these games offer a unique opportunity to explore, learn, and grow, all while having a bit of fun along the way.


Features :

Choices Matter
Multi-Path
Cool Text Styling
Uses a Unique A.I. Generated Text Based System

Can You spot ALL of the "Easter Eggs" in the Game?


* NOTE : The Game is TEXT BASED and ENGLISH ONLY at this time. *

Detailed Description: Automata Streetcar is an interactive, digital-media art project that uses historic streetcars as a metaphor to explore ideas about connection, communication, and community.  The project is inspired by the four historic streetcar systems that once operated in British Columba - in Victoria, Vancouver, North Vancouver, and in particular the small, remote mountain community of Nelson.  ​As mechanical devices, streetcars may be interpreted as a type of automata: self-guided, interactive mechanisms that respond to a sequence of predetermined instructions.  They follow a fixed track through city streets, stopping to collect passengers at predetermined locations, operating within a sequential yet highly interactive environment.The project is primarily intended to be a gallery / museum installation in which visitors use custom-made game controllers to interact with a digital recreation of Nelson's main street, as it was 100 years ago when streetcars operated there.  Players take on the roles of the conductor and driver to operate a streetcar, collect passengers, and build community confidence. The project can also be downloaded directly to experience at home, using either home-built Arduino-based game controllers, or a standard keyboard and mouse arrangement.Home Play VersionThe project can be downloaded and played at home with a standard keyboard and mouse arrangement, or with two home-built, Arduino-based game controllers (one for the streetcar conductor, and one for the streetcar driver). The home play option was developed using Arduino Uno R3 compatible controller boards.  If you wish to build your own Arduino-based game controllers, you will need a separate USB connection and one Arduino-compatible controller board (plus other parts and components) for each game-controller (the materials and components are not included).

Detailed Description:
AZEM is a psychological horror game that plunges players into a disorienting labyrinth, where every room is unique, and the environment is constantly shifting. As a first-person single-player exploration experience, the game challenges players to navigate intricate puzzles while immersing them in a tense, atmospheric world. Currently in its alpha stage, AZEM promises a deeply unsettling journey through an ever-evolving maze.

Key Features:

Dynamic Labyrinth: Navigate a labyrinth that constantly shifts.
Atmospheric Horror: Experience an intense atmosphere designed to create constant tension and dread.
Immersive Exploration: Explore the environment in first-person perspective, with each room offering unique puzzles and challenges.
Psychological Horror Elements: Unsettling visuals and mind-bending environments designed to blur the line between reality and hallucination.
Single-Player Experience: Focused on personal immersion, offering a solitary journey through the unknown.

Detailed Description: Nortown, a once vibrant community, now faces imminent demolition to make way for a bustling commercial hub. Its residents must now find new directions for their lives amidst this upheaval.As Milly Sommerville, a detached tattoo artist who sets out to complete a forgotten wish from years ago, you will explore Nortown and learn the past and present of its people through the remnants of the neighborhood. COLOR REVELATION: Witness your surrounding's true colors as you receive newfound impressions.STORIES OF LIFE TOLD THROUGH TATTOOS: Record stories through new tattoo designs based on your impressions of the neighborhood.TATTOO: Practice your skills as a tattoo artist at The Blindfolded, give your clients their desired ink as you learn more about them through chit-chats.HERE, THEM, YOU: The intersection of different lives, struggles, and decisions intertwining to tell the story of an everyday neighborhood.
Short Description: Enter the world of Milly Sommerville, a troubled tattoo artist who sets out to capture the remnants of her nearly-demolished neighborhood through her art. Walk the streets of her dark world, reconcile with her own past, and redefine the meanings of impressions in this first person narrative game.

Detailed Description:
You wake up on an alien space station. In this expansive sequel, every decision you make shapes your journey. Will you seize control of the station, flee to unknown territories, ignite a galactic conflict, broker peace, aid your newfound companions, or pursue riches? The choice is yours.

Engage in the unique game called 'Manludo'—a hand game of rock, paper, scissors—to challenge and outsmart the station's alien inhabitants. Success in these contests can elevate your status and influence within the station, unlocking new paths and possibilities.

Gameplay: 
Experience a richly branching narrative in this game. Replay it many times. Simply press the spacebar or click to progress through the dialog. When faced with a choice, click on the corresponding button to determine your character's fate. Navigate through complex interactions and pivotal decisions to craft your unique story amidst the stars.

--- Esperanto ---
Vi vekiĝas sur ekstertera kosmostacio. En ĉi tiu vasta aventuro, ĉiu decido, kiun vi faras, formigas vian vojaĝon. Ĉu vi prenos kontrolon de la stacio, fuĝos al nekonataj teritorioj, komencos galaksian konflikton, intertraktos pacon, helpos viajn novajn kunulojn, aŭ ĉasos riĉaĵojn? La elekto estas via.

Partoprenu en la unika ludo nomata 'Manludo'— ŝtono, papero, tondilo—por defii kaj superlerti la eksterterajn loĝantojn de la stacio. Sukceso en ĉi tiuj konkuroj povas altigi vian statuson kaj influon en la stacio, malŝlosante novajn vojojn kaj eblecojn.

Spertu riĉe branĉan rakonton en ĉi tiu ludo. Vi povas reludi la ludon multfoje. Simple premu la spacan breton aŭ klaku por antaŭenigi la dialogon. Kiam vi alfrontiĝos kun elekto, klaku la korespondan butonon por determini la sorton de via rolulo. Navigu tra kompleksaj interagoj kaj decidoj, kiuj estas klavaj, por teksi vian unikan rakonton inter la steloj.

Detailed Description: Defeat all those who seek your power and become even stronger! Magic Venue is an action roguelike game where you must become as strong as you can! Reach the last minute and defeat the bosses of each level! Only then can you prove your worth! During combat, your character will be teleported to various dimensions, you never know what to expect! From losing powers to becoming completely 3D, the dimensions will leave you amazed!- Confront waves of strange, strong, and bizarre enemies!- Utilize your skills to collect cards and assemble your unique deck!- Use the dimensions to your advantage and devise strategies to win!- Call your friends!- Assemble a team of up to 4 local players!- Create decks that complement each other!

Try to figure out human behavior patterns, let themattack themselves!From a certain point in time, non-stop snowstorms cut humans into small settlements. Enslaved, domesticated, they tried to find a way out of the crows.Is there still fire in this frozen world?Save the crows, even if everything is irretrievably lost...

Dodge the spreading flames, they will kill anything; dodge the human shots, the bullets will destroy everything.

Detailed Description:
*ding-dong*
You're playing at your friend's house when you hear the doorbell ring. 
His parents are coming home late today, so your friend has to go look.

■About the Game
This is a horror game where you must escape while avoiding the enemy and collecting specified items. 
There are elements of being chased, but no jump scares (sudden loud noises or scary images).

The expected playtime is around 15 to 20 minutes.

There are 3 endings: BAD (Game Over), NORMAL, and TRUE.

The game does not feature a progress-saving function (only mouse sensitivity and volume settings are saved).

■Controls
WASD: Move
L Shift: Sprint
E: Interact
Esc: Menu

■Regarding Video Streaming
Streaming and Let's Play videos are permitted without requiring permission.
If possible, please include the game's name in the title of your stream or video, and include a link to the Steam page in the description.

Game Name: 吞食HD2D - Three Kingdoms: Zhuge Liang
Detailed Description:
Unique HD2D Pixel Art Style:
       The game is developed using the Unreal Engine 5, blending traditional pixel art with modern engine lighting and shadows to deliver a visual feast.

Rich Storyline with the Following Chapters:
       Yellow Turban Rebellion
       The Rise and Fall of Xuzhou
       Battle of Guandu
       Awakening of the Sleeping Dragon
       Battle of Red Cliff
       Southern Campaign of Four Commanderies
       Western Campaign in Bashu
       Northern Expeditions to the Central Plains
       Eastern Conquest of Sun Wu
       Unification of the Land

Diverse Tactics:
       In battle, you can not only use strategies but also combine different skills. Renowned generals will have unique talents.
Short Description: Three Kingdoms: Zhuge Liang is a 3D pixel-style RPG game. In the late Eastern Han dynasty, Players will take on the roles of famous Shu Han heroes such as Liu Bei, Guan Yu, and Zhang Fei, embarking on a heroic journey to restore the Han dynasty and ultimately unify China.

Detailed Description: Escape The Void First Person is a single-player cooperative horror exploration game. In this game consisting of different levels, your only goal is to survive and find the exit. While doing this, you will need to use your logic, solve puzzles and take each step carefully. You must be alert to the dangers that await you around every corner. As the tension builds to a fever pitch, your heart will pound and adrenaline will course through your veins.Realistic graphics: Step into another world with visuals that go beyond graphic quality realism and evoke emotion in every detail.Intuitive User Interface: Instantly find what you are looking for and start enjoying it with a simple and easy-to-use interface that eliminates complexity.Mysterious Atmosphere: Go on an exploration into the unknown with an atmosphere full of mystery, every corner of which arouses curiosity.Unique Sound Design: Feel yourself right in the middle of the story with an unforgettable sound experience that complements every emotion and atmosphere.Unlimited Exploration: Embark on an unlimited adventure with different worlds waiting to be discovered, with a new surprise around every corner.

Detailed Description: Welcome to our Relaxing Simulator, a unique experience designed to calm the senses, relax the mind, and nurture the soul. In a hectic world where stress and hustle are omnipresent, our game offers an oasis of serenity and tranquility.Immerse yourself in an immersive environment filled with natural beauty. Each location has been carefully crafted to create an atmosphere of relaxation and peace. Listen to the soothing sounds and enjoy the surroundings. Interact with objects as needed to view, turn on, or open them.Our game offers relaxing activities aimed at calming the mind and relaxing the body. Explore locations in the virtual world to establish a deeper connection with yourself.Our aim is to create a digital sanctuary where players can take a break from the stresses of everyday life. With a harmonious combination of visual aesthetics, relaxing music, and soothing activities, we invite players to leave the hustle and bustle of life behind and immerse themselves in the world of inner peace. Welcome to our Relaxing Simulator - a place where relaxation and rejuvenation take center stage.Features:- Experience complete freedom in first-person perspective to move around freely.- Enjoy the surroundings with music or ambient sounds.- There are 8 different environments available.- Interact with objects, furniture, and doors to actively explore the world.- Set the time of day to create the desired atmosphere in your surroundings. You can also watch the sunrise and sunset.Highlights:- Earn numerous achievements through diverse challenges.- A global leaderboard to showcase how long you've enjoyed your tranquility.More:- You love this game and want additional environments to relax in. Share your ideas in the CommunityHUB and let's talk about them together.Note:This experimental project offers you a digital sanctuary. The game has no story, no characters, no running or jumping or anything like that. You move forward standing and running and are located on mini-maps.

Detailed Description: Take on the challenge as you build and manage your dream horse ranch. Ride in competitions to rise through the ranks and become one of the best, or focus on creating the best experience for your guests to attract them in the masses. Become a renown breeder that sells horses all over the world, or just live a cozy life with horses on the estate you always dreamed of. Whatever you choose, the world is yours!Utilizing a mixture of large-scale, top-down and detailed, first-person building, you can construct the horse ranch of your dreams. No matter if this means creating a breathtaking resort that leaves guests wanting to stay forever, or your personal equestrian retreat where you can recover from thrilling competitions, or the stress of everyday life.Owning horses and running a ranch is more than just riding. Breed, train and trade horses realistically as you plan the financing of your next building project or horse purchase. Open your ranch to visitors and pick activities that match the interests of your guests. Hiring the right staff not only impacts many aspects of your ranch but also eliminates gameplay that feels grindy or like a chore.Besides being able to expand your ranch, gaining money and reputation lets you unlock various areas that you can explore freely. This lets you relax while riding out and experiencing the beautiful nature.
Short Description: Dive into this immersive equestrian simulation and experience realistic horseback riding. Build your dream ranch and establish deep bonds with your horses. You are the boss! Manage staff and guests, or focus on challenging competitions. Breed, trade and raise foals as you choose your own destiny.

Detailed Description: I love ragdolls and I love physics, so I thought I would mush the two together with a level editor and make a cool sandbox game for people to play around in. Currently, there is a very basic JSON-based level editor and 20 pre-built levels. I am in the process of adding more items to the sandbox and would like to get community feedback and hopefully grow the game into something really fun.

Detailed Description:
It's your first day at the compressor factory. 

But what is that? Almost all internal parts of the demonstrator compressor seem to have disappeared over night!

Help finding the missing parts by searching the factory in this violence-free, top-down pixel-art adventure.

The game contains four puzzles as well as two timed mini games and should take approximately 30-45 minutes on the first play-through.

Detailed Description: The Devil's GameThis is not a detective story.There are conspiracies, crimes, and malevolent individuals.But... when dealing with the supernatural evils at play, don't try to understand them with human logic.Choices of Life and DeathChoices follow us throughout our lives; sometimes we can avoid them, but other times we must confront them. Some decisions can save you from immediate danger, while others will shape your future.Forbidden Love?Falling for someone you shouldn't? Do you protect the ones you love, or sacrifice them for something greater? After all, if they truly love you, they should be willing to give everything, even their lives, right?And...? ? ?Unveil the hidden truths behind the main story and uncover the dark secrets of other characters.But remember, the truth always comes at a cost; you might have to die a few more times to uncover it.
Short Description: You were Arenda Finch, a fifteen-year-old girl who had inherited a vast fortune. Expelled from your old school, you were transferred to a new school located within Dunkenwood House. The dark side of elitism awaited. Humanity or demonic nature? Love or desire? Your choices would determine her fate.
About the Game: The Devil's GameThis is not a detective story.There are conspiracies, crimes, and malevolent individuals.But... when dealing with the supernatural evils at play, don't try to understand them with human logic.Choices of Life and DeathChoices follow us throughout our lives; sometimes we can avoid them, but other times we must confront them. Some decisions can save you from immediate danger, while others will shape your future.Forbidden Love?Falling for someone you shouldn't? Do you protect the ones you love, or sacrifice them for something greater? Detailed Description: Embark on a chilling journey with "Look Closer!" a horror surveillance game where your task is to monitor haunted locations via live camera feeds. Keep a vigilant eye on the eerie scenes as anomalies manifest before your very eyes. From disappearing objects to shifting shadows and flickering lights, each anomaly challenges your observation skills.Your role is simple yet crucial: detect these disturbances and report them accurately. Each report will require you to specify the type and location of the anomaly observed. Sounds straightforward, but don't be fooled; you'll need keen eyes and an excellent memory to make it through the night.Are you ready to take on this spine-tingling challenge? Keep your wits about you—perhaps you'll uncover hidden secrets as you delve into the unknown.Step into "Look Closer!" and prove you have what it takes to master the art of paranormal surveillance. Will you survive until dawn?"Look Closer!" now comes with full Twitch integration, enhancing the interaction between streamers and their viewers. Viewers can actively participate in the game by using chat commands to report anomalies directly within the stream. The fastest chatter to report accurately earns points, adding a competitive edge to the viewing experience. At the end of each session, a leaderboard showcases the top contributors, making every game session unique and engaging. Join in and help your favorite streamer navigate the haunted locales of "Look Closer!"—your sharp eyes could lead the way to victory!Don’t miss out on our exciting trailer that gives you a sneak peek into the thrilling Twitch gameplay features. Check it out now to see the integration in action!

Detailed Description: This is a very interesting puzzle game where players need to place bricks of different shapes or functions. When the bricks are filled vertically or horizontally, the elimination effect will be triggered to earn game points. The difficulty of the game will become increasingly difficult as the player's points increase. There are no limitations such as time or operational requirements in the entire game. Players only need to use their intelligence to make the most reasonable placement of different bricks according to the game, and cleverly utilize various functional bricks that appear in the game to achieve desired results.
Short Description: A puzzle game The game has no upper limit on points, no time limit, no operational requirements, just thinking about it As the score increases, the difficulty will also become increasingly difficult. Come challenge your brain's limits!

Detailed Description: Norowareta: The Three Treasures is a first-person survival horror game set in Edo period Japan from a small team of game development students working under the name of Studio Crying Spider.Assume the role of Lumi as she travels back to Japan in search of uncovering her past, only to find herself in an abnormal situation dragged back in time. Explore an isolated shrine tormented by the events of the past only equipped with a lantern and your trusty journal.Solve puzzles and uncover the shrine's unspoken secrets and the terrors of one fateful night. Unravel the story of the former residents and those who were against them. Figure out what happened - is everyone else dead? What is the purpose of the three sacred treasures? Who is the malevolent entity that keeps whispering from the deep?Navigate your way through the horrors buried deep beneath the shrine grounds and try to find your way out before one malevolent entity that controls the souls of the deep. Use the vast environment and items at hand as the means to defend yourself and find your way to escape before it's too late. A large game world to explore with rewards and the possibility to move freely between explored areas  Scavenge for items and resources to aid you on your journey  Various puzzles and riddles guarding the shrine's most well-kept secrets and mysteries  Uncover the shrine's dark history — a tale of betrayal, revenge, and spirits unable to find peace Discover the three sacred treasures kept in the depths in the shrine  Tormented souls and malevolent entities haunting anyone traversing through the dark-lit corridors Norowareta: The Three Treasures takes heavy inspiration from retro horror games, heavily inspiring the game feel and visuals. Rather than taking all of the inspirations as technical restrictions, Norowareta takes them as visual and mechanical tools to aid in the game's atmosphere and unique game feel.
Short Description: Embark on a chilling journey as a young woman uncovers her past, answering the call of a tormented soul. Explore an isolated shrine in Japan and be transported back to the Edo period. Navigate through the mysteries and terrors of a fateful night in this spine-chilling horror survival game.

Detailed Description: Explore the past and gather information.Uncover the lore of the town through pages scattered around the town’s randomly generated landscape. With each new finding, you’ll begin to fill out the codex, which holds everything you’ve learned from creature weaknesses to potion recipes, and even the story you will piece together.Upgrade your combat based on your playstyle. Collect plants and drops from creatures or animals and use them in your recipes. Players can choose to create and upgrade weapons to fight off enemies from a distance, or craft potions to change their abilities for a more direct and effective approach. Be careful, however, as changing yourself too drastically may end in disaster.Use elemental strengths and weaknesses to your advantage. There is an array of status effects and buffs that will impact both you and the creatures. You can use this to your advantage while upgrading and in combat. In crafting, give careful consideration to your status effect combinations - some may be especially powerful, while others may leave your weapon useless. The same goes for combat against creatures - some creatures will have weaknesses against particular status effects, and strength against others. Be cautious in combat, as these effects can be used against you as well.Coming Soon:Experience the cycles of the moon. Moon cycles will affect the behaviors of the monsters within the world. The moon brings out the aggressiveness in some monsters, making the night all the more dangerous for the player to survive. Decide your future. Your actions will lead to one of five unique endings. You could solve the town's problems once and for all, or risk making things even worse. Be careful how you die, as it may come back to haunt you in future playthroughs in the form of a mutated monster, or even aid you if you come across a past grave.
Short Description: Hunter’s Requiem is a rogue-lite horror game. Coming from a long lineage of monster hunters, you must protect your town from the creatures surrounding it. Through crafting and exploration, you will discover the town's history and find a way to solve its monster problem once and for all.

Detailed Description: Continue a Journey of Treachery...Continue DNA in Season 2 Episode 2 as Leo continues his journey to avenge his wife Luna, where he must then pass the dangerous volcanic mountains of Papura to seek out Terius.Enter Scorching Papura...Traverse through the unforgiving volcanic lands of Papura as Leo continues searches for Terius.Play through rewarding challenges fueled by vengeance. Fight against ruthless Papura creatures that have been under the control of Onaclov...Fuel Your Vengeance...Pick back up this season with DNA's epic 2D Beat'em up gameplay with new abilities to acquire!Experience a challenging gameplay formula building upon last season's rewarding difficulties. Battle diverse creatures as you make your way through the treacherous volcanic lands of Papura. Find Your Nemesis.Watch as the story develops further into intriguing events in Season 2: Episode 2 of DNA.Search for your great nemesis Terius, in a challenging level of intense difficulty and grit. Fight through a volcanic world full of dangerous creatures native to the lands of Papura...

Detailed Description: Add to your wishlistAbout the GameThe "Streamer Guy" is doing his routine live stream while his frustration serves as content and entertainment. In the midst of it, he reaches his limit and, after rage-quitting, decides to embark on a journey of self-discovery to find out who he is and what his position is in the world and the universe. Help Streamer Guy in this difficult journey using only a mouse!Enjoy:A simple mechanic! Move the mouse cursor using the center of the screen as the base, and Streamer Guy will move in the same intensity. Anyone can get the hang of it!Punitive level design? You punish yourself, the level design doesn't react! With that in mind, you'll do very well in this peculiar platform and climbing game :DSuper personalized gameplay time! Your skills and persistence will completely dictate the game's duration. You're in charge!Curiously random and mysteriously satisfying scenarios! (Wow) Talk to NPCs during the journey!Microscopic budget! (But 100% effective!) You wouldn't expect anything less from this genre of game, especially coming from an indie group called "rotten post" :)Have fun at a low cost or give it as a gift to your dear friend ;)

Detailed Description: Background SettingIn a future world, an explorer named Shimo, who has lost his childhood memories, arrives at a place known as a "singularity"—a sealed town shrouded in thick fog—in search of his origins and recollections. However, on his very first night there, a murder occurs, marking just the beginning of a series of events. As Shimu gradually forms bonds with others, he works to solve these incidents while also uncovering the truth behind the town. Ultimately, this truth leads back to his own identity and lost memories.Gameplay OverviewThe basic controls involve using the keyboard and mouse to move the character around the horizontal screen, interact with objects, and solve puzzles. The puzzle-solving aspect involves collecting clues through dialogue and investigation. During subsequent group discussion sessions, players use the information they have to agree or disagree with others' opinions, present clues, identify contradictions, and ultimately uncover the truth.Game FeaturesStoryline StructureThe game features a storyline with multiple branching options, allowing players to explore various endings flexibly.Puzzle DesignThe game's puzzles emphasize "orthodox detection" elements, designed based on the form of orthodox detection to create a classic plot structure akin to "Ten Little Indians." They focus on clue collection and logical reasoning, enhancing the player's immersion and providing a direct experience of the pleasure of logical deduction while deeply engaging in the game's detective mode.Game SystemThe game includes systems such as notes, inventory, clues, and maps that serve the plot and facilitate the narrative and deduction aspects.Art StyleThe game employs a low saturation and washed-out style that combines 2D and 3D elements, creating a sense of subdued colors and fading tones. This visual approach conveys a tranquil yet melancholic atmosphere, offering a unique aesthetic experience within the game.Music StyleThe game music consists of original compositions by Evalia-爱娃、沉林川、黑金雨, and more. The original soundtrack will be available for purchase at a later date.

Detailed Description: You Go Boom is a game created by one person, using only three different programs (Gdevelop - the game engine, Studio One - for music & sounds, Clip Studio Paint - for all graphics). For the most part, YGB is a collection of simple games with simple controls. Some games require you to complete the level, while others are endless, high score challenges.Features*  Lightweight - under 300MB install size, low system requirements (just about any windows PC made in the last 10 years, with a 3D card, should be able to run it) *  Variety - a total of 18 mini games, many different genres including platformers, vertical shooters, horizontal shooters, tower defense, pinball, shooting gallery, etc...*  Unlockable items - lots of little things to discover and unlock, an evolving/customizable title screen and shooting gallery game*  2 Modes of play - try your hand at story mode or just jump straight into arcade mode*  No Saving/Loading - high scores and story progressions are automatically saved and loaded, no need to deal with save files, quit anytime you like (outside of a mini game or story intro) and continue later
Short Description: Are you a true gamer? Do you have what it takes to prove your skills across a variety of simplistic mini games? Test your skills against Jeb's collection of homemade arcade games. But be warned, you'll get no help from him, not even instructions for how to play his silly games.

Detailed Description: Background StoryWhen the miners were digging underground, they accidentally opened some channels, inside which a continuous stream of monsters that would attack the precious energy crystals emerged. Fortunately, the miners have mastered a technique of using ore to synthesize defense towers. In order to resist the monster's attack, an adventure journey of mining and building defense towers begins!Gameplay Features1.The combination of mining and tower defenseYou need to plant defense towers by mining and gathering minerals to resist monsters' attacks. I believe this innovative game mode that combines mining and tower defense can give you a different experience.Mining:Place defense towers to resist monsters:2.Learn to utilize terrainThere are intricate underground channels, and by modifying these channels to create favorable terrain, you can pass the levels more smoothly!3.Rich gameplayThis game includes 42 regular levels, 9 unique entertainment levels, 3 boss levels, and 3 endless mode levels.In addition, you will gain various tools and talismans on your adventure journey, which will make you even stronger!In short, the rich gameplay makes mining never boring!Unknown Minesweeper Mode:Powerful BOSS:Hope you enjoy this indie game!

Detailed Description: Join the CommunityAbout the GameGreetings, Settlers!Welcome to the Alpha Centauri Settlement.Settler, this is your home. Located near the marshlands of this alien planet, it's the perfect place to rest your worn-out body. I hope you like it. This place is your digital refuge. Visit whenever things aren't going well. Your stay will help you tackle real-life tasks while keeping you calm and relaxed, by providing built-in productivity features and a soothing environment.Keep this digital comfort zone on the side of your screen while burning the midnight oil. With its low memory usage and 'Always on Top' feature, you can run it alongside other applications.FeaturesThis is a hybrid of a productivity tool and game. Use provided productivity features and unlock new customization items as reward.Productivity ToolsTimersA Pomodoro timer and a classic alarm is provided. Detailed Description: Rabbidom is a centennial kingdom that has witnessed more and more curious things in its ups and downs. Therefore, Corenemo the rabbit decides to set off on a journey, looking for a treasure told in ancient stories, the Apple, which has a connection to whatever is happening in the kingdom. Now, you will help Corenemo find out the truth.Thrilling CombatAgile little rabbit Corenemo is a master of diverse combat moves, allowing you to tackle various challenges based on conditions. Feel the flow of combat and use abilities or moves at the right time to defeat formidable enemies. The sense of accomplishment and excitement of the combat  won't upset you!Easy but Deep Character Building SystemAlter the effect of your weapons using Beads, an innovative system for you to build your own combat style with different combinations of Beads. Putting them together is enough to leverage their power... However, your weapons will benefit from placements showing your unique understanding! Find the Bead Manuals for placement references. Your luck will bring you to some rare manuals offering special effects!Meet Various Friends and FoesYou will encounter many characters on this continent. Some might be your foes, while others are allies. Help or kill them, and you won't go unrewarded. This is not only about finishing quests but also about growth and precious experiences in this adventure.
Short Description: An ARPG featuring an immersive adventurous story! Playing as Corenemo the rabbit, you will explore the Rabbidom for treasures to boost your abilities. Encounter various characters, whom you choose to aid or kill. Time to find the Apple and resolve the crisis for the Rabbidom!

Detailed Description:
Embark on an otherworldly odyssey unlike any other in "Beyond Horizon - The Astral Expedition." Step into a realm where reality and dreams converge, and the line between the possible and the fantastical blurs.

Awaken amidst towering insects, surrounded by a surreal landscape that defies explanation. With the guidance of a mysterious companion, learn to navigate this enigmatic world, mastering movement controls as you traverse its surreal expanse.

Customize your journey by selecting your outfit from the companion's wardrobe, adding a personal touch to your adventure. As you delve deeper into the astral realm, uncover the truth behind your existence: to return to reality, you must reach a mystical orb guarded by powerful forces.

Driven by a desire to break free from this dreamlike state, embark on a quest to collect the orb and restore order to the distorted world around you. Along the way, uncover fragments of your past life through flashbacks, adding layers of intrigue to your journey.

Participate in missions to rebuild the city, contributing to its restoration while unraveling the secrets hidden within the astral realm. But beware, moments of memory recall and sudden lapses challenge your perception of reality, blurring the boundaries between dreams and truth.

Join the inhabitants of the city in celebrating its reconstruction, seizing the opportunity to escape the confines of the astral realm. However, as you venture forth, the grip of memory outages tightens, threatening to obscure your path.

Experience a captivating tale of self-discovery and determination in "Beyond Horizon - The Astral Expedition." Will you break free from the confines of this surreal realm, or will the allure of the astral keep you captive? Embark on your odyssey today and unlock the secrets that lie beyond the horizon.

Complete missions to rebuild the city and pursue a mystical orb to return to reality. Will you escape or remain captivated by the astral world?

Detailed Description:
Where it all began is a high-quality, Interactive Visual Novel and the first game of a big universe. 

This game is about reconnection, healing, overcoming past traumas, and building a criminal empire.  


Essential topics like mental health, ambition & love play a primary role.


Much emphasis is on worldbuilding, interpersonal connection, and especially the characters. 
The premise of Where it all began is reconnection, forgiveness, dating, love, and dealing with underworld kingpins.
Short Description: Where it all began is a high-quality, interactive Visual Novel. Face demons of the past, deal with underworld kingpins, and see where life takes you.

Detailed Description: "A curious and a little painful adventure story about leaving to find a lost body."Pammy (main character) opens her eyes one day in a strange place. In a strange space with a strange structure that she has never seen before, and a handful of colors,For some reason, even if I try to move my body, all body parts except the head have disappeared.Confused for a moment, I can feel a familiar energy in the distance. Let's roll right now and get going.Will Pammy be able to regain her body beyond countless crises and bizarre obstacles in a space where there is no end in sight?The space that leads to one consists of several sections that can properly utilize and avoid various terrain, footholds, and obstacles.Use all your skills, strategies, memory, and luck to get to your destination safely after a difficult journey.In the process of attacking the strange space, boil up your desire for challenge and feel the ultimate sense of accomplishment through the ever-changing appearance of Pammy and various records.A simple but messy, fun manipulation that incorporates the laws of physics! I think anyone can challenge and easily get through with a simple drawing style and bright music!It induces detailed manipulation with movements that reflect braking distance, acceleration, gravity, and sense of balance.Pammy's movement can be moved by left and right direction keys, and there are normal and acceleration statesThere will be completely different results depending on the distance required for acceleration, the falling height, and the jumping position.The increasingly difficult obstacle structure, the complicated terrain, and the pain you create with your hands!It will come as a bigger difficulty as the mistakes and curiosity that inevitably arise as you explore and learn strange spaces come together.As soon as you make the wrong choice, the difficulty will become more and more difficult, and clumsy challenges will also make it difficult.You can strategically crash to make up for mistakes in this process, or you can bump yourself into it.You can try again and again, and try your luck, until your memory takes hold.You can also experience a device that can embarrass you and something that makes you feel secure.Amid countless challenges, you will feel various difficulties and despair, but don't give up!In the challenge, you will learn the ropes, you will be lucky, and you will move forward little by little!Escape the strange space safely, as seen through your persistence and all your experiences! Find You!
Short Description: This is a 2D flatformer game where you go on an adventure to regain your body, and you arrive at your destination through various sections. Lots of prepared obstacles, traps, and tricks. I hope you reach your destination with all your detailed manipulation, memory, persistence, and luck.

Detailed Description: Embark on the ultimate urban adventure in City Bus Simulator 2024, where the bustling streets are your playground and the city's pulse beats through every road. Get ready to take the wheel of intricately detailed buses, transporting passengers through a dynamic metropolis teeming with life, energy, and endless possibilities!Step into the shoes of a skilled bus driver, navigating through the vibrant streets of a sprawling city. From the iconic landmarks to the cozy neighborhoods, every corner of the urban landscape is yours to explore. Whether it's the early morning rush hour or the tranquil evening commute, every moment behind the wheel presents new challenges and experiences.But it's not just about getting from point A to point B – it's about the journey itself. Enjoy your route, manage your schedule, and interact with a diverse cast of passengers, each with their own stories and destinations. Will you be the friendly driver who brightens their day with a warm greeting, or the efficient professional who ensures they reach their destination on time?With stunning graphics and immersive gameplay, City Bus Simulator 2024 delivers a true-to-life experience that puts you in the driver's seat like never before. Feel the thrill of mastering the intricacies of bus operation, from navigating tight corners to managing traffic flow. Every decision you make affects the lives of your passengers and the reputation of your transit company.But the city is not without its challenges. From unpredictable weather conditions to unexpected detours, you'll need to stay alert and adaptable to succeed in this fast-paced urban environment. Can you rise to the occasion and become the undisputed king of the city streets?Whether you're a seasoned bus driver or a newcomer to the world of public transportation, City Bus Simulator 2024 offers something for everyone. With its realistic physics, engaging gameplay, and endless replayability, it's the ultimate simulation experience for players of all ages.So grab your ticket, hop on board, and get ready to experience the thrill of city bus driving like never before. The city is waiting – are you ready to take the wheel?

Detailed Description: You are the last surviving keeper, Tasked with the recovery of the relics dropped by your fellow fallen keepers.Explore a fully destructible dark fantasy post apocalypse world, filled with challenges and difficulties that you must overcome and grow to achieve your goals.With help from your own relic which allows you to absorb the power of defeated foes.As well as the ability to zoom in all the way on a target area materializing at a smaller size.─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────Destructible World:The game takes place 800 years after the apocalypses, in a world that is slightly different from ours "less boring".The Final Keeper enables unlimited destruction and building of blocks, we have 6 sizes of blocks, ranging from typical size at scale 1, to a microscopic size at scale 6, the smallest placeable block is 32000 times smaller than the biggest block.  Unlimited means you can theoretically keep placing micro blocks until you crash the game!  ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────The Final Keeper has a large focus on itemization, bossing, and RPG mechanics: Itemization:Every mob in the world has a chance to drop an item besides their normal loot table.Every mob you kill will become a spawnable mob type in the underworld, allowing you to farm them deterministically.But don't stay in the underworld too long as things will get nightmarishly worse the longer you stay.Farmed loot from the underworld includes bosses which drop their own unique items with variable modifiers. Dropped items will be generated with various algorithms and loot tables to make sure that every item is unique in its own way.Bossing:On your journey, you will encounter very challenging and rewarding bosses that will put your skills to the test.The Final Keeper has no difficulty options, we strongly believe in making a game that is fun to play, Enjoying the game is mandatory,progressing further in it however... is entirely optional and will depend on your skill and gear!RPG mechanics:The power gained from killing mobs comes in the form of XP, There are currently 30 levels in the game.Each level up will offer you an ultimatum between 2 unique character upgrades, choosing one will lock the other one, adding impact to every choice you make and enforcing build diversity.On the other hand you can play multiple characters within one world, such as having separate bossing and farming builds.Each mob will resist certain types of damage and be weaker to others, encouraging the player to have multiple loadouts of gear.And putting the extra gear you get from looting to good use.  ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────There is a lot more waiting for you in the forgotten world of The Final Keeper!The Final Keeper is being developed by an entirely independent indie studio, and is using a funding campaign to support the development of the game.

Detailed Description:
In this game, you merge two tiny fruits to increase their size and eventually form giant watermelons.

This is an easy, fun, and addictive puzzle game. You start with small fruits, and identical fruits merge to become larger. The game becomes harder and more interesting as your bowl fills with fruits. You need to score a lot of points and climb the global leaderboard. Try to be the best!

-Addictive gameplay
-Excellent music
-Controller support
-Leaderboard

Detailed Description: Overview:Cybernetic Apocalypse: Rogue Shooter is an action-packed roguelike shooter set in a dystopian cyberpunk future overrun by hordes of zombies, giants, and even dragons. As a lone survivor equipped with high-tech weaponry and cybernetic enhancements, you must navigate through levels filled with relentless enemies, deadly traps, and scarce resources. Each playthrough offers a unique experience, challenging you to adapt and survive in a hostile world where death lurks around every corner.Intense Roguelike Shooter Action: Experience adrenaline-pumping, fast-paced gameplay as you fight your way through generated levels filled with relentless enemies and challenging obstacles.Diverse Enemies: Encounter a variety of enemies, including hordes of undead zombies, towering giants, and fearsome dragons. Each enemy type presents unique challenges and requires different strategies to defeat.Sci-Fi Cyberpunk Setting: Immerse yourself in a gritty cyberpunk world filled with neon lights, futuristic technology as you uncover the secrets of the zombie outbreak.Upgradeable Weapons and Abilities: Customize your playstyle with a wide range of weapons, upgrade your arsenal and unlock devastating abilities to turn the tide of battle in your favor.
Short Description: Survive the cybernetic apocalypse in this intense roguelike shooter. Fight hordes of zombies, giants, and dragons with high-tech weaponry. Navigate deadly traps and scarce resources for a unique challenge in every playthrough.

Game Name: Colony : Part I The Moon Castle
Detailed Description: StoryThe story of the game takes place in 2222, 200 years from today. Humanity has experienced many technological revolutions in 200 years. The most important of these technological revolutions are; hologram technology, artificial intelligence technology and the analysis of gravity.Thanks to these developments, humanity has begun to spread into space. They managed to establish colonies on Mars and the Moon. By solving gravity, they built large ships to travel in space.Robots made great contributions to this spread. Their biggest advantage was that they could function even in difficult environmental conditions. Robots have developed so much over time that they have reached a point very close to humans in terms of abilities and behavior.On the other hand, humanity was also able to achieve peace within themself. There has been no war in the last hundred years. It was a time when people literally lived in utopia. But this peaceful period ended with a surprise attack on the Moon colony.People who were unprepared for this attack suffered great damage. Moreover, it was not known who the attackers were.Now, in this period when people are in a difficult situation, a robot will fight on behalf of humanity. A robot named Sasa will fight against these mysterious enemies. On the one hand, he will fight the enemies, and on the other hand, he will reveal the mystery of the enemy.A challenging journey awaits you in this adventure 200 years later...Features- The story of the game is divided into 16 chapters.- The person who purchases the game owns the entire game. Can play all parts.- Future updates for the game will be free.- The game is played for single player.- Character development and appearance changes over time depending on the story.- In each episode, the player encounters different locations.- In general, it is a war-oriented game. But there are also different mission styles in some departments.- The game type is a shooter game. There are also different styles of gameplay in some stages.- Some missions require the use of vehicles.- In some chapters, the story takes place in very large areas. The progression strategy depends on the player.- It would not be correct to describe the game as an open world game, but at some stages, the player is offered a wide range of action as an open world game.- The game is designed for 16:9 screen width.- There is a DLSS option for Nvidia graphics cards and an FSR option for AMD graphics cards. The versions used are the most current.- Developed with Unreal Engine 5.2.- Played with keyboard and mouse.- The camera style is played as "third person".- Approximate playing time is 10 hours. (It may take longer)- For best performance, DirectX must be installed and your video card driver must be up to date.

Detailed Description: GRID RANGER is a short, hyperspeed 3D shmuplike with laser sharp aesthetics and a retro-futuristic soundtrack.  Dodge and blast your way through 3 super-intense levels and see what lies beyond the grid... Mouse-oriented controls for extra precision and agility Uses the V99 vector engine (like its sister game UTOPIA MUST FALL) for a clean & classic look 3 levels total, each increasing in difficulty, to reach insane levels of intensity by the very end 7 original tracks by Miles Tilmann, composer for NOVA DRIFT

Detailed Description: Dive into the depths of Nether Heroes, an exciting action-platformer with roguelike elements that challenges you to conquer danger-infested dungeons. In this dark world, you will have to face menacing monsters and ruthless bosses that will test your combat skills.Dungeon Exploration: Adventure through several levels, each with its own layout and unique enemies.Diversity of Weapons and Items: Unlock and master a variety of weapons and items to demolish your enemies.Character Progression: Earn money and experience to upgrade your hero in the rest areas, where you can recover health, acquire advanced equipment, and purchase new weapons.Deep Customization: Use the character editor to create a unique hero with custom skins or your own designs.Arena Mode: Show your bravery and face endless waves of enemies in an ultimate survival challenge, where the only objective is to survive as long as possible.Every game in Nether Heroes is an opportunity to demonstrate your skill and strategy. Are you ready to brave the depths and reveal the secrets hidden beneath them?

Detailed Description: Travel seamlessly from ground to space and back without a hitch in a truly interconnected Galaxy. Experience a one of kind top down procedurally generated open world that lets you navigate both the stars and the surfaces of planets.Fight against numerous creatures, robots and human enemies across different environments. Learn and adapt to the fighting styles of adversaries from various planets. Then take to the skies and reach space to discover a whole new battle space against other hostile spacecraft pilots.War over the valuable Ether is already breaking. Any small settlement across the Galaxy has the potential to expand through force and become a star spanning empire. But only if they had the support of an Etherbound to aid their armies in ground and space battles.As you grow more powerful you will gain access to magical ethereal abilities to help you in battle. These skills paired with an arsenal of ever more powerful weapons, armor and ships will let you become a force to be reckoned with that can single-handedly take on any threat.Throughout the story campaign you will be faced with choices that will affect your relationships with other factions as well as the ultimate Fate of the Galaxy. The various parties at play have opposing motivations and it's up to you decide which narrative to believe in.You are the Etherbound - a reluctant hero bound to the magical substance called Ether that permeates the Galaxy. Though Ether is used as a fuel source for technology, only the Etherbound can unlock the true power that lies within it. You will need all the power you can get to prevent the prophesied Collapse looming over the Galaxy. As you uncover more knowledge from the past however, the future becomes all the more uncertain as the choices you make culminate in one of the different outcomes to the fate of the Galaxy.
Short Description: Blast your way through an Isometric Open World Galaxy. Fly seamlessly to space. Lead your chosen faction in ground and space battles. Stop the imminent Collapse of civilization... Or let it all fall into ruin.

Detailed Description: Yapori Minigames is a multiplayer game with 6 mini-games and several playable characters. Various different and challenging mini-games, such as the meteor mini-game where you have to dodge meteors until time runs out, a soccer mini-game where you have to score a specific number of goals before time runs out to win, and more.Level up to earn rewards;Over 4 playable characters to unlock, such as Darkpori, a fox with a gray scarf and blue shoes, Aybo, an intelligent and somewhat annoying robot, Jack, a crazy yellow monkey, and more;Comic strips to read, which you unlock by leveling up in the game; there are about 2 strips to read and unlock;And much more!

Detailed Description: Early Beta AccessThis game is in early access, full game release is coming soon!About the GameRaid On Rift is a video game featuring a turn-based strategy system with customizable teams made of unique characters. Our game centers on the fearsome and rugged Space Pirates as they face off against the militant and legendary Galactic Navy, fighting on an alien mining outpost to fight over a coveted and extremely valuable source of ore. Our game also includes lan multiplayer capabilities so that players can play with their friends across separate devices. Furthermore explore the legend of the characters and learn their unique move sets within our games tutorial, story, and helpful UI features. Raid on Rift features an extremely dynamic playstyle, as their is draft phases, placement phases, and neutral zone phases before the game even begins. Challenge your friends and learn new strategies and army's to master your playstyle! Whether your interested in the lore or the infinite strategy variants and opportunities, our game has something to offer to gaming enthusiasts alike.
Short Description: Be prepared to defend your Ore in this multiplayer turn-based strategy game! Take control of the Imperial Navy or the dreaded Space Pirates, and use a variety of crewmates to take your opponent's Ore before they take yours!

Detailed Description: In this game, you will take control of the policeman John Smith from the remote town of Moonriver. Together with him, you will find yourself in the epicenter of a zombie apocalypse. You'll have to battle hordes of enemies, conduct an investigation, complete various quests, and find out what exactly happened here.Use transportation to explore the open world of the town of Moonriver. All vehicles behave differently, find the one that suits you.Find an advantage in the interactive environment. Create barricades from furniture and block enemies to save ammo.A dense atmosphere of an 80s horror movies, created by hand-drawn high-resolution 2D graphics, as well as an original soundtrack.A large number of different enemies on the screen. Remember: "One zombie - an annoyance, three - a danger, fifteen - a natural disaster."You will have access to an arsenal of various weapons, which will give you the freedom to choose your strategy - eliminate the enemy quietly without attracting unnecessary attention, or create some action.A detective story with SCI-FI elements. You will need to complete quests, find clues, and solve puzzles to uncover the truth.The game allows you to team up with friends of up to four people and conduct the investigation together in cooperative mode.
Short Description: An atmospheric 2D top-down shooter with an open world and physics. Step into the role of a police officer from an old horror movie. Discover what happened in the town of Moonriver. Use your brain against zombies - create barricades with the furniture, stay quiet, or unleash full-blown action!

Detailed Description: Day-Night cycle and realistic water physics!Plan your Mission!For each mission, you'll receive crucial intel in advance and must carefully plan the tools you want to bring. Consider the time of day, type of terrain, and distance from your generator to your electric tools. Working late into the evening? Don't forget floodlights! Need to drain multiple areas simultaneously? Bring extra pumps and generators! Is there digable Ground? Better bring a Shovel!With each mission success, you'll earn recognition and unlock new tools and upgrades to boost your drainage capabilities.Loads of different tools and unique LevelsArmed with an assortment of drain-clearing tools and equipment, from your trusty rake to water pumps, you'll tackle every challenge with precision and skill. From casual players to seasoned pros, DrainSim offers an engaging experience for all who seek the satisfaction of restoring order to the city's drainage system. So dive in, roll up your sleeves, and let DrainSim flush away your concerns one drain at a time.
Short Description: Dive into DrainSim and seize control of the floods! Clear the city's submerged streets, with a huge range of different tools from rakes to submersible pumps. Embrace the satisfaction of restoring the water flow. Become the city's hero, one drain at a time.

Detailed Description: RoadmapAbout the GameDive with a team of up to 8 to the bottom of the ocean. Your mission: Remove all corpses from Pharma Corps' abandoned labs. Erase any evidence of their failed experiments. Use your caddie to extract dead bodies from the wrecks that used to be labs. But be careful! There are things lurking and oxygen might run out quicker than you expect. Do not die: the wrecks are filled with dangers and creatures ready to kill you.Destroy proof to gain credits: bring the bodies back to the sub and destroy them using a shredder.There are numerous abandoned labs spread across the ocean floor. Coordinate with your team to pilot the submarine towards them. Piloting: the sub is blind, you must rely on sonar and stations to "see" and pilot it.Dangers: you have to identify and avoid what lurks in the open ocean. Survived? Good. Spend your hard-earned credits to buy items and modules to better your chances for the next expeditions. Up to 8 Player Online Co-op Proximity Voice ChatImmersive 3D AudioProcedurally generated wrecksThalassophobia freely included

Detailed Description: Become a shepherd with your trusty dog in the alps!Matthias, a young shepherd in a rural Austrian town, embarks on a new journey with his loyal canine friend, Rocky. They face the challenges of shepherding: training the sheepdogs, herding the sheep, and defending them from wolves. On his journey, Matthias forms new friendships, rekindles old relationships, and even comes across a few rivals. However, he knows Rocky, his trusted friend, stands beside him in every situation, ready to lend a paw. The bond between Matthias and his animal companions forms the heart of this fun role-playing adventure that offers players a chance to experience the beauty of rural life in the Alps and the adventures that come along with it.Train and play with your dog(s) to make them the best girls and boys! They learn by the way you treat them, making training as realistic as possible.Sophisticated Dog-AI, trained on your level of care and commitmentMake profit on your farm by breeding animals Compete in Dog and Herding Shows to win the coveted grand prize (during Early Access)Unlock new dog breeds and customize them with accessories (during Early Access)Direct your dog to herd the sheep with an all new herding behavior. The better your companion is trained, the better the sheep follow.A branching interactive dialogue system as well as a reputation system with every person in town help bring the narrative adventure to life. Some events will only unfold with a person that likes you - others with people who don't.Branching DialogueFun side stories with the townsfolk based on your reputationFully voiced in English and GermanWith a special exploration system you can hike the Austrian Alps and uncover the minor and major legends, like the Mystery of the Black Sheep.Interactive exploration to find gifts and moreHiking system requiring supplies and toolsTied to the storyNeed a break from reality? A vacation in the mountains? The Shepherd: Black Sheep is designed from the ground up to be a relaxing and cozy experience.
Short Description: Delve into The Shepherd: Black sheep for a cozy, alpine Adventure. Play as Matthias and his fluffy friend Rocky and meet the citizens of Hochboden. Train your animals, keep them safe from danger, become a master shepherd and explore the alps! Will you be able to fulfill your family's destiny?

Detailed Description: AboutIt's about a role-playing game with turn-based combat mechanics and choices that have a relative impact on the world.The general concept of the gameIn this world with 9 different kingdoms, it allows the main character, who starts as an ordinary person, to lead a daily life or to have a say in the village, town, city or country (depending on the intervention effect). The people in the game (regardless of the main character) have their own life cycle. Preferred professions (but not all) provide some advantages and disadvantages. Relationships with other characters (not effective in this version) have an effect in a good or bad way (there may be more influence depending on the other character's profession).Feature highlightsRegardless of the main character, the characters on the map continue their life cycle.Each character has a system of relationships with the main character and other characters. Characters have their own professions.It is a world of magic and swords set in the medieval time period.It contains some of the main features of the sandbox game genre.Developed with RPG Maker Mz, it is aimed to make the role-playing experience as simple as possible and uncomplicated to play, so that the player can control it comfortably.The main character can get a profession Currently, the main character can earn income by taking and completing tasks that are allowed to be taken by the user through waiter, porter (transporting materials from point a to point b), mining and guild.The following sections are under planning and/or construction and are subject to change.It can have an impact on the region through relationships or professions. Villages do not have administrators. Towns may be headed by an administrator (district governor) and may vary from country to country. There is a governor in the cities, but the security guards at the gate do not allow every passer-by to meet. Capitals have a king and/or queen and it is only possible to meet under certain conditions (the public is not allowed except in exceptional cases). There may also be a prince and/or princess. Administrators can walk around the zone in different outfits to conduct supervision within the zone.Wandering merchants aim to travel between regions and buy products from cheap markets and sell them at high prices (they can have cheap or expensive products in the stores within the region) on a weekly and/or monthly basis.Borders are suitable for illegal crossing, but in case of caught, criminal action is applied and may vary from country to country. The practice of execution is common in times of war. It is possible to pass between countries with a transition document, and there is also the opportunity to travel quickly to certain regions.Professions such as farming, diplomatic/political professions (the main character cannot do it in this version), merchant (over the price difference between cities and/or items that fall and are considered loot) are provided with the opportunity to earn money and status.
Short Description: A role-playing game where the player can interact with npc in the game world and have a real-time life cycle. The relationships of the found NPCs among themselves and with the player have an effect on the region they are in and the relations with the surrounding regions.

Detailed Description: It’s a challenging 1980s like platformer game with a serious story. For the Nintendo Entertainment System® and Famicom.Game in active development. Demo download below.The story of the gameThe magic of words gave you everything and suddenly took everything from you.A little sad and disappointed you make your way through a dangerous world. Embark on the difficult journey through the jungle, icy landscapes and dangerous caves. Collect scrolls and combine their words, face your fear and the ticking clock.But whatever happens, never forget your most important goal: find Anna.The deeper meaning of the storyThe game is more than a typical 1980s platformer. The game itself is just a shell. The shell for a process of self-discovery, healing, motivation and the strong will not to give up. The character embarks on an arduous journey and search for Anna.Even if you’ve already guessed it, Anna doesn’t have to be human or animal. Anna can just as well be representative of a favourite place, a feeling, family, being at home, feeling good or the satisfaction of a completed task or with yourself, but of course also a single person.There is no right or wrong answer to the meaning of the game title. You decide. You are also welcome to simply ignore the psychological aspect and concentrate fully on playing this challenging platforming title. Just pay attention to the little hearts and the ticking clock. ;-PGame controlsAfter the first game start, there is a standard keyboard layout configured already:D-Pad: W-A-S-DSelect button: KStart button: LB button: ,A button: .If you like to use another configuration, press ESCAPE while the game is running and select "Remap buttons" from the menu.Game titleThe official name of the game is Anna: The Magic of Words (english) or アンナ: 言葉の魔法 (japanese).

Detailed Description: Welcome, Defenders!"Random Core Defense" is a unique single-player strategy defense game where you must acquire and enhance random cores using limited resources. Stand your ground and survive against powerful enemy assaults!Caution: Complacency is your enemy!Defeat waves of enemies, strengthen your cores, and prepare for even greater threats. Each wave cleared allows you to choose powerful upgrades applicable to all cores. Your choices are crucial, as poor decisions can lead directly to game over.Encounters with Formidable BossesSpecific rounds feature unique bosses that are deadly and offer significant rewards. Test your luck and strategy against these bosses, striving to survive until the very end. The challenge is tough, but the rewards are equally gratifying.In "Random Core Defense," your strategic thinking and quick decision-making are put to the test. Are you ready? Take on the challenge now and become the ultimate defender!Playtime20 to 40 minutesAbout image distribution·Distribution is possible without permission for both individuals and corporations.·Profits can only be generated when using the functions provided by the video distribution site.·We would appreciate it if you could include the game name in the video title or the live broadcast title.We are not liable for any damages caused by the distribution of this game video.The contents of this guideline are subject to change without notice.

Detailed Description: FIGHT AGAINST HUMANITY.The game features six stages taking place during judgement day 2351. Fight from the depths of hell up until the gates of heaven and everything in between with a finale above a crowd of 60000 cultists.ACTION MECH COMBATThe game is a crossover between a fighting game and an arena shooter. Fight one on one against a mech and use various abilities triggered by key combos to destroy your opponent.SIX PLAYABLE MECHSPlay as one of six mechs representing the forces of doom. Fight as dawnbringer dual wielding giant swords or use the brute force of a giant minigun when playing as wrath.

Detailed Description:
You are a penguin who has unexpectedly fallen into a crevasse.

Use the keys W, A, S, D to move and the mouse to aim and fire your grappling hook.
Use Q and E to adjust the length of your grappling hook.
1,2 and F to use items.
With practice, you'll be able to find quick moves and shortcuts.
Beware of moving platforms, slippery ice platforms and other obstacles.
Can you reach the top of the crevasse?

There's also an easy mode for those who don't like challenges, so even beginners can take on the challenge.

Good luck, everyone!

Detailed Description: The main character is a journalist who arrived at a large warehouse to record a documentary about the warehouse operation. But instead, he is faced with a real nightmare. The warehouse turns out to be populated by hungry guards and crazy warehouse operators who turn it into a death trap. The journalist will have to try very hard to survive in this hell, uncover the secret of the warehouse and get out.The player will have to explore the warehouse, solve puzzles and escape from monsters. The game will keep the player in suspense from start to finish.Features of the gameAtmosphere of horror: A gloomy warehouse filled with insane employees creates an atmosphere of horror and tension.A variety of enemies: hungry guards and their superiors will monitor the player's actions and try to catch him.Mysticism and riddles: the player will have to find a way out of confusing situations in order to advance through the plot and uncover the secrets of the warehouse.Hopelessness: the player will have only a camera and a flashlight at his disposal.Freedom of movement: the player can freely explore the warehouse and meet new employees, as well as find Easter eggs.Backstage: Maybe you'll get lucky and find the Backstage of a warehouse where many employees have disappeared.Are you ready for a fulfillment adventure?

Detailed Description: Welcome to the warehouse!The main character is a journalist who goes to a fulfillment warehouse to record a documentary. He had never been to warehouses, but he had heard many scary stories about what was happening there: how an employee was sucked into a conveyor belt, how a person was sorted and shipped in a box during the sorting of goods, how cutlets were made in the dining room from an employee who did not fulfill the norm for placing goods...Ominous SEASON!The warehouse guards look strange and aggressive, and the warehouse operators behave like madmen, there is a mess around and tense stares from the workers. This is not the apocalypse, this is the sales season, which the warehouse cannot cope with and the only thing that can help is a new sacrifice to the spirit of the warehouse. Who will be chosen for this role?Endless shelving.If you are not careful enough and accidentally get to the paranormal floor, then you will find yourself in the most eerie place in the warehouse - rows of shelves leading nowhere. The same type of shelving shelves, the incessant light of fluorescent lamps and approximately 1.5 million m2 of randomly constructed shelving alleys. And God forbid if you hear the voices of the security service nearby, because it means that they already see you.During the game, you will encounter various dangers, riddles and guards who will try to stop you from revealing the terrible truth about the warehouse. Will you be able to survive and make your own movie, or will you become another victim of warehouse madness?Game Features:Terrifying atmosphere and intense gameplayRealistic graphicsImmersive voice acting in the history of the warehouseExistential horrorFree warehouse researchFirst-person viewTry not to make your trip to the warehouse your last.
Short Description: The journalist goes to the warehouse to record a documentary, but becomes a witness to creepy stories. The guards and warehouse workers look very strange. What is really hidden behind the endless shelves and how not to become a victim of the warehouse?
