Detailed Description: Have you experienced the tranquillity of a little village in the countryside on a warm Sunday afternoon? With leaves rustling, birds chirping and big friendly clouds drawing shadows over the rolling hills covered in fields and forest?Relax and Take a BreakHamlet in a Pond is a simple and relaxed city builder which wants to instil this very feeling in you. Where other city builders ask you to always expand, manage und juggle resources, here you are welcome to take a break, listen to the birds and just enjoy playing a game.No Goals, no PressureThere is no goal and no end to reach in Hamlet in a Pond apart from your pond running out of space. But even then you can always adjust your little paradise, make changes, and design it according to your ideas.A Unique Mix of Pixel Art in a 3D WorldIn Hamlet in a Pond you are creating a sanctuary for inhabitants of a 2D pixel art world in a 3D reality. And they bring with them their colourful houses, plants and animal friends.Be CuriousYou only start with a few simple structures: a house here, a tiny park there… but combine buildings with each other and unlock barns, ranches, apartment buildings and more. Stay curious and try out different combinations.ExplorePause for a moment and look what you created. Hamlet in A Pond invites you to explore your own village. Meet its inhabitants, count the sheep or zoom out and see your hamlet bustling.
Short Description: Hamlet in a Pond is a unique looking relaxed city builder. Live out your creativity and build your own little slice of paradise in a tiny pond - with no pressure like goals to reach and no stress from juggling resources.

Detailed Description: DescriptionWhispering Age: A Medieval Strategy Game with a TwistStep into the world of Whispering Age, where your strategic prowess is tested not only by your decisions but also by your words. In this unique medieval real-time strategy game, you won't control your units directly. Instead, you'll communicate your commands to generals and managers, who will then relay your orders to your army. Just like a game of Chinese whispers, your instructions may evolve as they pass down the chain of command, adding an exciting layer of unpredictability and challenge. Manage resources, build your empire, and defend your base against waves of enemies.In Whispering Age, your voice is your greatest weapon. Can you lead your kingdom to glory, or will your words get lost in the whispers?Wishlist Whispering Age on Steam now and prepare to command your medieval empire like never before!Important NoticeWhispering Age relies on ChatGPT and its API to deliver its unique gameplay experience. The game's core mechanic of relaying commands through generals and managers is powered by the ChatGPT API, so any disruptions or changes to the API service may impact the game's functionality. The availability and performance of the game depend on the operational status of the ChatGPT API, meaning that in the event of API outages or maintenance, gameplay may be affected. Additionally, any unexpected updates or changes to the ChatGPT API could potentially alter the game's behavior. We are committed to addressing any issues promptly, but please understand that some disruptions may occur beyond our control.
Short Description: Whispering Age is a strategy where you command your army through written orders. Manage resources, build your empire, and defend your base against waves of enemies. Adapt to the unique dynamic of indirect control and lead your kingdom to glory!

Detailed Description: Welcome to the South Pole, where you will have to lift penguins!Penguin Helper is a fun 3D first-person game in which you become a real hero to these funny creatures.Take a walk among the snowy open spaces and watch the southern lights. But be careful! Penguins lose coordination as soon as a plane flies over them. Your task is to put them on their feet.Explore frosty landscapes, enjoy the beauty of vast expanses and skies, and enjoy the calm and tranquility of the South Pole.Key Features: The breathtaking expanses of the South Pole Interaction with penguins Raising penguins as the main mechanic of the game Meditative atmosphere with pleasant sound Counter of raised penguinsAre you ready to become a real hero of the South Pole? Put on warm clothes, stock up on tea and start your Penguin Helper adventure!

Detailed Description: 💕ONANIましょう👉👌About the GameTo execute her command “Bring Mankind happiness,”Robot Rurumu hopes she can understand the "Happiness of Mankind" by becoming more human-like.When she fights to protect Noruru Village,she is on the journey of finding her “Fighting Style.”RurumuCore Awakened Maid RobotAfter Rurumu has the desire to “Live happily ever after with the Village Head,”her core awakened and she became conscious.However, that hindered her pursuit of the “Happiness of Mankind.”To achieve her goal, she hopes she can become human-like one day.Yet, in one incident, the Village Head was in danger,even though they avoided the tragedy, she found out her incompetency in combat.She then set her goal to "Protect the Village."Kitsunetsuki KoharuA War Shrine Maiden from Demon Slayer InstitutionDemons haunt mankind all over the world,but because of Demon Slayer Institution's active engagement,regular people are not threatened by demons.Kitsunestsuki Koharu has been trained to become a War Shrine Maiden since she was young,her success is unparalleled among her peers, but she has ended more corrupted shrine maidens than demons.Her mind is tortured by having to kill her corrupted friends in battle.However, the battle against demons goes on....“If only I could become a heartless demon-slaying robot one day.”Koharu thought to herself.This is a side-scroller action game,The characters can switch between different fighting styles that have respective features,Choose your style tactically to counter various situations!During missions, there are a variety of enemies and treasures,finish mission challenges and aim for the highest score!There are two playable characters,each has unique fighting styles and enhancements,there are also RPG elements such as equipment and equipment upgrades!

Detailed Description: Whether you're a cleaning enthusiast or just looking for a fun way to spend your time, The game offers an engaging and humorous look into the behind-the-scenes lives of your favorite gaming personalities. Get ready to clean up and shine in the world of streaming!Dynamic EnvironmentsEach streamer's room offers a different level of mess and items to interact with, ranging from pizza boxes and soft drink cans to high-tech gaming gear and collectibles.Time ChallengesRace against the clock to clean up before the next live stream starts. Earn extra money for speed and efficiency.Customizable ToolsUnlock and upgrade cleaning tools like turbo vacuums, super sprays, and robotic assistants to tackle tougher messes faster.Streamer RequestsMeet specific demands from streamers to increase your reputation and unlock new cleaning gigs. Each streamer has unique needs and preferences.

Detailed Description:
What if I, an ordinary chicken delivery man, have a chance to wins a 1-million-dollar prize?

Just as he was delivering a chicken, 'Baro' was unexpectedly invited to a couple-matching program.

The process involves four women and three men participating, choosing their preferred partners among each other. However, 'Baro' lacks charm compared to other male participants, making him unpopular among the women. How could you appeal to the women and make them choose 'Baro' despite his lack of charm?

The last day of the third day, Couples who are successfully matched can challenge the ultimate chicken game. 
If they succeed, they will receive a prize of 1-million-dollar. 
However, if they fail, they will have to pay a corresponding price.

What kind of ending can they reach in the battle over love and money?

 is an interactive content that allows viewers to see different story endings according to their choices
The story contains a total of four genres:
romance, comedy, thriler, and mystery:
Depending on the viewer's choice, a completely different story will unfold.

This game contains content that may stimulate sexual curiosity among adolescents. Additionally, it includes scenes of alcohol consumption and slight nudity. Depending on the outcome of the game, there may be endings that involve death. Special caution is advised for adolescents.

Detailed Description: Gameplay Introduction:Marble Madness is a game that combines marble collisions and card construction gameplay.There are three types of items in the game: marbles, placements, and relics.Placements will be randomly generated and will have different special effects.You need to launch marbles and collide with placements to earn points, obtain relics to enhance the effects of marbles and placements, and ultimately achieve the specified points to pass the level.In the game, some Placing items will be enchanted, with a total of three enchanting effects.Fragile: One impact can damage the Placing items and earn a large amount of rewardsBonus: Obtained bonus from the first X impactsProtection: The first X impacts on the Placing items have no effect. After destroying the enchantment, you will receive a large amount of rewardsIn the game, the Magic Comes effect will be randomly triggered.Wood: Randomly enchant X Placing items to protect themWater: Randomly X Placing items constantly changing positionsFire: Destroy X Placing itemsEarth: Randomly appear X stone on the field that will not trigger an effect
Short Description: Marble Madness is a tense and exciting pinball card building game. Using pinball collision as the main gameplay, supplemented by card construction, each game has a different experience, so experience the exhilaration of each collision.

Detailed Description: Unique Game Features- Fully integrated first-person perspective, immersive real-life interaction——The game is shot entirely in first-person perspective, allowing players to fully immerse themselves in the role of Tian Long( Main Character ), interact closely with the different beauties, and experience the emotional pulls of nightclub life in an immersive way.- The first nightclub-themed romance simulation game——The game’s theme revolves around nightclubs, a popular aspect of contemporary society, showcasing the art of flirting within nightclub culture.- Real-life improvisation, fully on-location filming——Characters in the game abandon traditional rigid scripts, letting natural dialogue development guide the narrative. This makes the interactions more realistic and provides a more immersive experience for the players. It also brings the actors closer to their roles, allowing players to understand the inner world of the actors as they play.- Multiple heroines to pursue, multi-branching storylines——In real life, choices are often singular, but in the game, players can correct past mistakes, encouraging them to embrace love boldly and passionately. The game offers multiple beauties  storylines to pursue, with personalities ranging from pure and playful to elegant, fiery, and sexy. There's always one that will catch your eye. This time, be a "nightclub master" and capture all the goddesses in your grasp!Which beauty will you be mesmerised by?ViVi - The adorable, sweet looking beauty? Mia - A beauty with a love for children? Lily - Does the dream of a beauty aspiring to be a singer appeal to you?Eva - Would you mind a beauty who has experienced troubled past relationships? Ella - A beauty with a masculine heart but occasionally shows her feminine side? Monica - Or a beauty who occasionally flashes a beautiful smile?
Short Description: This game is to rekindle the exhilarating sensation of youthful passion—to perfectly capture the essence of romantic endeavors, making the experience of falling in love both sweet and meaningful, and to inspire players with the beauty of love within the nightlife entertainment industry.

Detailed Description:
Anders: The Dark Coast is a gripping third-person action-adventure game set to release in 2024. Players step into the shoes of Anders, the protagonist drawn into a sinister underworld after a volatile encounter with a group of dangerous criminals. As Anders delves deeper, he discovers that these felons are far more malevolent than he initially thought. Joined by his friends, Anders traverses the rugged wilderness of Australia, unraveling the mysteries of the menacing gang he stumbled upon. The plot thickens as the quest to confront Jayden, the elusive gang leader, turns deeply personal for Anders, connecting disturbingly to his own origins.


NOTE: Some levels have bright lights and sensitive lighting. Play with caution if your sensitive to bright lights and loud sounds.

Detailed Description: A gripping Roguelite adventure that blends heart-pounding action with innovative echolocation mechanics.As the Shogun's greatest assassin, you find yourself betrayed and your eyes stolen by a demon. Now blinded, armed with nothing but your skills and cold-blooded rage, you rush towards the Shogun to warn him of the danger in his castle..Master Echolocation!Every move you make is shrouded in darkness, and only through the power of sound can you illuminate your path. Emit pulses of sound to reveal the environment around you, uncover hidden traps, and detect the presence of lurking adversaries. Upgrade your senses as you play to unlock new abilities and hear new sounds to help you in battle! .Fight bosses in total darkness! Face off against challenging bosses and hordes of foes that will test your senses to their limits! Each is more cunning and ruthless than the last in your climb to the top of the Shogun's castle.Expand your Weapon Arsenal!Master a multitude of weapons at your disposal! Just remember the heavier they are the louder they hit! .Make pacts with Demons!As you delve deeper into the heart of darkness, uncover the truth behind your betrayal and confront demons who offer great power through their pacts. Offering supernatural abilities, weapon skills and secret moves! Use them at your own risk and bring carnage to every enemy in your way!.Create your own story!Interact with the residents of the Shoguns castle, both human and demonic, and pick your allies and pave the way for your own ending. The story is just as dynamic as the gameplay and your choices will affect both the world and the characters..
Short Description: A Roguelite RPG about betrayal, revenge, and how much you’re willing to pay to get it. Use echolocation to fight your enemies, make pacts with demons to grow stronger, gather weapons, find the one who stole your eyes and make them pay!

Use them at your own risk and bring carnage to every enemy in your way!.Create your own story!Interact with the residents of the Shoguns castle, both human and demonic, and pick your allies and pave the way for your own ending. The story is just as dynamic as the gameplay and your choices will affect both the world and the characters..

Detailed Description:
Join Arishia, an 11-year-old girl with a brave spirit, on an epic adventure through a world of fantasy and mystery in our exciting action and exploration game!

On a peaceful night, Arishia is startled awake by a mysterious noise in her room. Peering out the window, she discovers a mischievous cat stealing her school clothes. This unexpected encounter is just the beginning of an incredible journey that will lead Arishia to uncover the hidden secrets of the forest.

With captivating anime-style art that brings the game world to life, accompany Arishia on her quest to retrieve her clothes and discover a world full of surprises and challenges. As Arishia ventures deeper into the forest, she faces formidable enemies and uncovers the truth behind the mysteries that shroud this place.

Get ready for an unforgettable experience in our new action and exploration game, where every twist of the story will keep you on edge and leave you eager to discover what fate has in store for Arishia.

Key Features:

Explore a world of fantasy filled with mysteries and wonders waiting to be discovered.
Enjoy captivating anime-style art that brings the game world to life.
Accompany Arishia on her journey full of action, intrigue, and magic.
Immerse yourself in a captivating story of friendship, courage, and redemption.
Get ready for an unforgettable experience in our new action and exploration game!
Short Description: Immerse yourself in an exciting anime-style metroidvania, where each skill unlocks new areas and secrets on the vast map. Face powerful bosses, acquire unique abilities, and uncover hidden mysteries in this ever-evolving world, all with traditional anime-inspired animation.

Detailed Description: Join Pippa Pillowfeather in her bid to escape the Fluffquake Fury before Bedtime!She must use her pillow to whack, spin and jump her way through various bedroom skirmishes before the lights go out!This is the debut release from novice developer JustAlexGames!Play as Pippa Pillowfeather, the cute and feisty young pillow whacking girl who's dressed ready for bed - but has no intention of closing the curtains until she's defeated all the baddies in the bedroom! Lights are out soon, so she has to use her pillow to whack 'em fast before its too late! She starts off in her own bedroom and once the Mousey is defeated a new room will be unlocked. The challenges get tougher and tougher as she unlocks more rooms until the corridor is complete and she's granted with a new Pillow Spin ability! The next world is her Mum and Dad's room - she really shouldn't be in there but there's many, many new baddies to conquer first! Next is a hotel - with some really tricky situations in the rooms and corridor! There's even a lift you can use to explore the basement, stock up on health and strength and escape from the nasty green smoke that comes when you throw one of your new poison pillows!If you survive all that, then there's one final boss to conquer! He is armed with devastating exploding pillows and is weaving in and out of falling beds as he runs to the finish line! Enjoy playing this simple, quick, light hearted game - the debut game from JustAlexGames.Music composed by the developer - I challenge you to keep the theme out of your head!
Short Description: A light-hearted, fun, simple RPG where you play as bedroom hero Pippa Pillowfeather and try and beat lights out by using her Pillow to defeat any monsters in the bedroom! Use new pillow attack abilities as she progresses to different bedroom scenes.

Detailed Description: You are an employee working overtime for Genesis, a genome research facility. You are tasked with activating location trackers on four vehicles belonging to a competitor. Navigate through an underground parking lot in search of the vehicles. Find all four vehicles to escape from the parking lot.Be careful; there are abnormals sent to intercept you. Do not fight them; they have unique abilities.Below Level is a first-person survival horror game inspired by the liminal atmosphere of underground parking spaces. There are a total of six unique abnormals, each with carefully crafted perception systems. The player must figure out what type of perception each abnormal possesses in order to avoid them (ie vision, hearing, or both).
Short Description: Navigate through an underground parking lot in search of four important cars. Armed with only a phone, evade the abnormals that are sent to intercept you and make it out alive.

Detailed Description: Randall is a young teen living a completely normal life for a nerd in the 80s. Apart from often being the main target of bullying by his school's American football stars (Scott, Chad and Biff), Randall likes to spend his time lost in the world of video games and comics, as well as dreaming about his crush, Becky, the most popular girl in school who barely knows he exists. One Saturday, on his way to a card tournament, Randall unexpectedly runs into Scott and his gang outside. Nearly facing a round of bullying once again, the situation takes a surprising turn when a mysterious presence suddenly intervenes and scares the bullies away. In the face of this event, Randall presumes that he is now in the company of a divine entity that's come to his aid, and gains newfound confidence to stand up to Scott and finally win Becky over. Codename: GOD immerses the player in a small 16-bit universe somewhere in the 1980s, where they act as a divine figure following the ordinary and unexciting life of a nerd in a point-and-click adventure packed with a variety of puzzles. Every character has a story, every choice matters, and the solution to each problem is limited only by the player's own imagination!Features Point & click adventure game  Randall, a nerdy kid on a quest to win the heart of the most popular girl in school  You, a wise(?) figure to guide him on his journey  16-bit pixel art aesthetic  A few delightful characters, some obnoxious, most kind of dull  An inspiring story told with humor, but also with profound moments of reflection  Diverse puzzles and mini-games  Developed by a team of 4 delusional but nice people  Not really an amazing soundtrack because no budget  Warning: filled with tropes from 80s pop culture  (Extra: yes, you can pet the dog)
Short Description: Randall is your typical nerdy kid living a normal, unexciting life in the 80s. Secretly in love with the most popular girl in school and bullied by the soccer team gang, one day he meets you, a divine entity who can change everything!

Detailed Description: Rusty Flesh is a sci-fi horror puzzle platformer for the Game Boy Color where you switch gravity instead of jumping (guess you could call it a VVVVVV-like!). Explore the different areas of a derelict spaceship putting together all the pieces of its lovecraftian mistery, and enjoy its retro-futuristic aesthetics.In the near future, Earth has become a wasteland, unfit for any kind of life. Nations fell, and big tech corporations seized power. They had been getting ready for this. They built massive spaceships where a few chosen ones would travel for hundreds of years, looking for a new home. The Grampus was one of those ships... but something went wrong.FeaturesExplore a derelict spaceship: Something's wrong in this spaceship, and it's up to you to discover what happened. Explore the ship and find clues in a non-linear narrative.Solve gravity-based puzzles: Combine your gravity switch with other mechanics to progress through Rusty Flesh's series of puzzles.Fight undead abominations: The former crew members have been turned into undead monsters, and they are after you.8-bit retro gaming fun: Get back to the glorious days of 8-bit handheld gaming! Rusty Flesh actually runs on a Game Boy Color, with all its limitations.Note: The description, screenshots and trailer you see depict a game that is still in development. All content is subject to change as development continues.

Detailed Description:
Welcome to "MoonMan Adventures" – an adrenaline-fueled odyssey of an extraterrestrial stranded on a hostile planet, determined to find a way home!

Embark on a pixelated adventure in this retro-inspired 2D platformer, where every leap could mean survival and every dash brings you closer to salvation. Navigate treacherous terrain, scale daunting walls, and engage in heart-pounding shootouts as you battle your way through three immersive levels filled with danger and discovery.

But beware, fellow traveler, for this alien world is not without its challenges. Encounter formidable bosses blocking your path, each demanding skill, strategy, and sheer determination to overcome. And amidst the chaos, face off against a diverse array of enemies hell-bent on your demise.

Fear not, for amidst the chaos, there is hope. Seek out power-ups scattered across the landscape,  these precious resources may be the key to unlocking your passage home.

With stunning pixel art visuals and immersive soundscapes, "MoonMan Adventures" delivers an unforgettable journey. Are you ready to defy the odds, brave the unknown, and reclaim your destiny?

Features :

- 1 tutorial level and 3 levels, each with their unique pixel-art graphics, boss and challenges.
- A complete movement set including a dash and wall climbing / jumping.
- Hidden hearts container to increase your chances of survival and a little (big) hidden upgrade in the last level.
- Checkpoint system.
- a Fully functional autosave system.
- No controller support, but the possibility to rebind the controls.
Short Description: Lunar was on a routine mission when something went wrong. He crashed on a hostile planet and must now find a way home.

Detailed Description: Evolution sims.Seldom representing the concept of "adaptation" all too well, and often not particularly fun in the first place, games like Evo and Spore have always been the epitome of "mixed bag, missed potential." But what if we took a different approach? Instead of attempting to adapt Darwin and Gregor Mendel's notebooks into a multi-genre anthology game about evolving from slime mold to a race of gods, ErMa (Early Mammal) focuses on being a heck of a fun topdown action game powered by triple-distilled character customization.What makes Erma different?- A highly developed movement and procedural animation system. Much work has gone into balancing ease of control with making it fun and challenging to chase down prey and flee from predators.- Over 100 interchangeable body parts, organs, and elemental gland weapons let you turn Erma into anything you see fit. Want to play a fire-breathing dragon that flies over the land and snatches up prey with its pincer tail? A giant sea monster that picks off foes from the river with its elongated neck and tongue? A tiny rodent that avoids predators while scooping up small lizards with its vacuum mouth? A menacing mole that ambushes from the walls, swallows enemies its own size whole, and covers its retreat with a cloud of paralyzing electric vapor? The possibilities are as impactful as they are numerous!- An arcady gameplay loop keeps the action and adaptation going nonstop. Spawn into large, procedural maps, complete various objectives while staving off starvation, and move onto the next challenge!- Bosses; like, some PROPER, multi-phase action game battles with unique gimmicks and movesets, not just a handful of bigger enemies.
Short Description: Evolutionary action at an intelligently designed pace! Tear through hordes of enemies, thrash colossal bosses, and collect new body parts to adapt your way through the increasingly deathly levels of this arcade survival adventure!

Detailed Description:
You wake up on an alien space station. To leave, you need to win at manludo/hand game (rock, paper, scissors) against three aliens. You can leave your fate up to chance, exploit your opponent's weakness, or bluff your way to victory. Be careful with bluffing, the more you bluff the more likely you are to lose everyone's trust: making bluffing more difficult in the future. 

Gameplay: Use mouse or touchscreen. Click or touch the blue arrow ➡️ to move forward in dialog. When making a decision click on the text you would like to do. During the hand game click on the hands, either rock, paper, scissors, or bluff. Icons show the number of wins you have in a match 🏆, the number of coins you have 💰, and your trust score ⚖️ (how much people trust you). The higher your trust score the more likely you are to successfully bluff. If you lose turn you get an option to talk to your opponent 🗣️, you might find a weakness you can exploit. The game can be completed in about 5 minutes. 

--- Esperanto ---

Vi vekiĝas sur ekstertera kosmostacio. Por forlasi la stacion, vi devas venki tri eksterteranojn en ludo de roko, papero, tondilo. Vi povas lasi vian sorton en la manoj de la hazardo, ekspluati la malfortecon de via kontraŭulo, aŭ blufi por venki. Estu singarda pri blufado; ju pli vi blufas, des pli probable vi perdos la fidon de ĉiuj: tio igas blufadon pli malfacila estontece.

Uzu muson aŭ tuŝekranon. Klaku aŭ tuŝu la bluan sagon ➡️ por antaŭeniri en dialogo. Kiam vi faras decidon, klaku sur la tekston, kiun vi volas elekti. Dum la manludo, klaku sur la manojn por ŝtono, papero, tondilo, aŭ blufi. Ikonetoj montras la nombron de viaj venkoj en matĉo 🏆, la kvanton de viaj moneroj 💰, kaj vian fidindecon ⚖️ (kiom multe homoj fidas vin). Ju pli alta via fido-poentaro, des pli verŝajne vi sukcesos blufi. Se vi perdas vicon, vi ricevas opcion paroli kun via kontraŭulo 🗣️; vi eble malkovros malfortecon, kiun vi povas ekspluati. La ludo povas esti finita en ĉirkaŭ 5 minutoj.

Detailed Description: Oh, you want to play a game? Do I really have a choice? A card game? Interesting. And who is this chick on the cards? She looks like a thief in a manor, doesn't she? Okay, so what do I do? Whoa, whoa, whoa! Why are you pulling that?What the HELL is this? A BOARD? Okay, tell me the rules, you b****! Build your deck and uncover the story of the thief girl as she:• delves deeper into the manor,• steals valuable items,• evades the killers' attacks,• heals herself to survive longer, • and (hopefully) escapes alive. And if you master the card battle against the Madam, you will also get out alive.

Experience her horror story: hiding from killers, crawling, evading attacks, stealing valuable items and… hopefully getting out alive. She, and you as well.

Detailed Description: Antisuns is a turn-based tactical game where you are always on the run.The device you carry can change the course of history, so everyone is gunning for you.If you try to flee in your spaceship, you will be tracked and caught.You'll have to take any enemy ships apart from within if you want to escape.Board the pursuing ship and wreak havoc inside with your rag-tag boarding party.Fire your ship-to-ship weapons to support your boarding party.Then disable the enemy and leave before the reinforcements come.If you fail, it's never truly over. Use the device to turn back time and begin another run.Every attempt presents you with new randomly generated challenges.Key FeaturesDeep Tactical Gameplay: In the heat of battle, manage your spaceship and its crew, direct your boarding party in turn-based combat, and escape before enemy reinforcements arrive. Diverse Character Classes: Every class has its own skill tree. Try out unique combinations of characters and build your favorite squad. Turn your rag-tag crew into hardened killers - then, wonder if that was such a good idea.Never Miss a Shot: Attacks always hit in shipboard combat. Enemy attacks are telegraphed, so you can come up with the perfect counter every turn. Rewind at Any Time: Experiment freely, and don't shy away from crazy ideas - you can always rewind your turn to the start and find a better solution. Modular Destruction: Blow up the wall with breach charges to get to the next room. Blow up the room with ship-to-ship missiles to clear it. Tear the ship in half if it helps.
Short Description: Antisuns is a tactical RPG set in the far future. Command your crew in turn-based combat across multiple spaceships. See enemy moves ahead of time, and come up with the perfect response. Push your luck for greater rewards. If you fail, go back in time, for another randomly-generated run.

Detailed Description: Ruins of Endoth is a Third-Person ARPG set in a dark fantasy world with a focus on hack-and-slash, random loot and replayability.Endoth is a broken world. A world ravaged by war over many centuries. A world where evil reigns and only pockets of survivors remain, huddled in the dark awaiting the arrival of a prophesised hero.It combines classic ARPG elements such as stats, skills, swordplay, magic and levelling up with a mix of hand-crafted and procedurally generated maps to make every new game a fresh and exciting experience!Dark fantasy ARPGThird-PersonHand-crafted and procedural levelsRandomised lootRandomised enemiesMercenary contractsSkillsMagicCrafting

Detailed Description: Generation Exile is a turn-based city-builder taking place aboard a generation starship where instead of extracting more and more natural resources to meet your populace’s needs, you only have what you brought with you. Rebuild the ship’s fragile ecosystems before the ship reaches the end of its journey. Procedurally generated characters and storylines mean that every journey — spanning several hundred years — will be uniquely yours. Build and rebuild a functioning city, carefully marshalling scarce resources. Tear down inefficient buildings and use their materials to make better ones! Craft a sustainable circular economy, using biological waste to grow new vital resources and repurposing material waste into new structures, tools and technologies. Lay out your city to maximize benefits, providing synergies to benefit your population’s wellbeing and to restore the ship’s damaged ecosystems. Near-future solarpunk setting anchored in real-world ecological calamities and opportunities. The ship’s characters are procedurally generated at the start of playthrough, resulting in a unique cast of NPCs every game. Events differ in every playthrough, according to large and small choices you make — and how you treat people. Aboard this generation ship, characters will form families and you will get to know them as well as their descendants. Memories pass down through generations, meaning choices you made in the past will be remembered in the future. Community is important to your survival — but not everyone agrees with each other. You’ll encounter all kinds of people aboard the ship, some of whom are more helpful and friendly than others. As you build your society, this will trigger situations and crises where you must determine a path forward. These choices will have consequences for how you manage resources, research new technologies and develop each of the ship’s biomes. Build a roster of talented experts to accomplish tasks, each of whom has different skills and traits as well as opinions of one another — not always positive ones! Striking sci-fi visuals with vibrant, diverse shipboard biomes that you must restore to health to ensure your society can survive. Detailed 3D scenes provide more specificity for the ship and its population, raising the bar for narrative strategy games. Inhabit and interact with scenes to gather more information before making meaningful decisions. Survive and adapt to the strange ecological entity that was never meant to be aboard the ship.Team led by Nels Anderson (co-creator of Firewatch, designer of Mark of the Ninja) and Karla Zimonja (co-creator of Gone Home and Tacoma) Distributed team comprising veterans from titles like Baldur’s Gate 3, Far Cry 5+6 and the creator of the Game Dev Guide Youtube channel Sound by Power Up Audio, audio designers of Celeste, Tunic and the Darkest Dungeon series Soundtrack by Ben Prunty, composer of Into the Breach and FTL
Short Description: You are aboard humanity’s first and final generation ship, a last-chance expedition now teetering on the rim of collapse. One step at a time you must rebuild society and the ship’s fragile ecosystems — using only what you brought with you — in this turn-based narrative city-builder.

Detailed Description: Get behind the wheel in Taxi Rush: Prologue and transport your passengers in this crazy big city! As a crazy taxi driver, get your passengers where they need to go on time. Traffic? Traffic Rules? Police? Red Lights? No, no, no, no, no, no. You're a crazy, lawless driver. Jump with your car if you have to!🚖 Become a Taxi Driver  Pick up customers and take them where they want to go on time. Traffic rules? Ha ha, drive as you like. Don't like your customer or they talk too much? Then throw them out of your car! Use all your skills to earn tips. Discover different customers. Maybe an alien? Drive, explore the city and earn money.🚖 Grow Your Business  Build your own taxi empire! Hire cabbies as crazy as you. Modify your car however you want.🚖 Different Cars & Different Stories  Buy your new car and new character with the money you earn! Each character and car has different features. Get the best taxi car!Taxi Rush: Prologue is not just a driving game, but an experience that combines speed, strategy and a story of personal achievement. Do you have what it takes to become the best taxi driver in town? Then, press the starter and go on an adventure!
Short Description: Hey hey, hop in the seat and drive through the crazy city in Taxi Rush Prologue! Feel the thrill as you weave through bustling streets, dodging traffic and delivering passengers to their destinations on time.

Detailed Description: Kickstarter Camapign!If you'd like to see Madame Fifi's Bakery be turned into a full game, back on Kickstarter today!About the GameBack Madame Fifi's Bakery on Kickstarter today!Welcome to Madame Fifi’s Bakery! After her grandmother's passing, Madame Fifi feels called to pack her bags and move back to her grandmother's hometown. She decides to turn the house that she inherited from her grandmother into a bakery! She must cater to the friendly animal townsfolks' unique taste preferences, and interpret her grandmother's recipe book.Bake Tasty Pastries:Follow the steps of each recipe and bake pastries using all the different tools available! Experience a satisfying moment as there is no stress from time limits or repetitive work.Experiment with ingredients:Mix additional ingredients or twist the steps to find a new recipe! Make your original pastries and see what your customers think about them! Imagine all that you can create!Show your artistic talent:Reveal the aesthetic aspects of your pastries! Display your creations in a colorful display. It might catch the eye of new customers and attract them to the bakery!Communicate with customers:Build relationships with the adorable animal customers! Listen to their stories and desires and use your newly acquired knowledge to restore your recipe book, and find the best pastry for each customer. If they are satisfied, they might give you surprising gifts!

Detailed Description: Reclaim the world from the clutches of the feline empire in this destruction-packed game! Travel from the depths of underground caverns to the peaks of towering mountains, and obliterate every stronghold of the kitty cats!Expansive ArsenalWield a diverse collection of  extraordinary weapons, each uniquely engineered to wreak havoc on structures and outwit cat adversaries. From triggering explosive chain reactions to deploying inventive gadgets like expanding cubes and lava tornadoes, every weapon offers a new way to approach your tactical battles.Destructive Gameplay: Inspired by the mechanics of games like Angry Birds and Teardown, use precision and strategy to topple buildings and overcome obstacles in your path!Vibrant Environments: Each map offers a new visual theme and architectural style, requiring you to adapt your strategy and weapon choice.Multiple Levels and Challenges: Navigate through a series of diverse environments, each presenting unique challenges that will test your tactical skills and creativity. Explore and liberate varied landscapes, adapting your strategy with every new scene to effectively use your arsenal and outmaneuver the cat empire.

Cause maximum destruction using a variety of weapons to collapse structures and earn 5 stars. Master each level, perfecting the art of destruction!

Detailed Description: Glitchworld is a retro-platform-shooter where the levels change WHILE YOU PLAY!     How did it come to this? Well we’re sorry to admit it, but our main pixel character was trying to use cheat codes in his own game and ended up breaking it… Now a massive glitch will teleport our hero randomly from one level to the next and back again… while you are playing!  Sorry about that…Well, let’s make the best out of it, shall we? How long can you last in this challenging, fast-paced and fun endless runner? Chase the high score in stunning pixel art backgrounds fighting off retro-styled enemies.Main Features:Stunning pixel art graphicsRandomly generated levels - never play the same game twiceSimple, fun and challengingPlay Glitchworld either as a short, casual “palate-cleanser”-game…OR play it for hours, chasing the best high score!

Detailed Description: Settle into Cape Fathom where you have been tasked with restoring an abandoned restaurant in an effort to return prosperity to a once bustling region. Meet the locals and learn their culinary preferences; then utilize various, but limited, resources to source the highest quality ingredients for your patrons. Use your influence to pass or repeal town policies, shaping the local economy and environment.Mechanics:Manage and grow your restaurant; customize your menu and serving hours. Fill your kitchen with various appliances to prepare and produce fresh meals, then setup your dining space with seating, decorations and lighting. Expand your floor space and hire workers to assist with taking orders and running food to patrons.Fish, forage, hunt, and grow gardens to source your recipe ingredients. Carefully balance a diverse environment as you encounter over-fishing, crop rotation, crop disease, over-hunting, and more.Integrate with the local community! Dozens of characters with unique backgrounds, motives, and purpose; earn their respect, trust, and increase your influence to shape the environment and local economy through various governmental policies.Gain experience to increase your skills and learn new recipes, unlock new items, and improve your overall effectiveness in fishing, foraging, hunting, gardening, and of course, cooking!Satisfy your character's basic needs. Hunger, thirst, energy, stress, and socialization will affect your overall mood impacting your overall effectiveness and productivity.Restore prosperity to the region. As your reputation expands, expect increased tourist activity to benefit not only your restaurant, but the entire community as a whole.Explore the open world! Shop for ingredients or furniture and appliances; visit the brewer and place orders to fill your kegs, or bring freshly hunted game to the animal processor and receive various cuts of meat, and more.

Detailed Description: AboutBanana Cowboy is an adventure platformer set in a fruit-themed universe. You are the Banana Cowboy, the outcasted son of the king of the Banana Planet. However, your tyrannical twin brother has taken control of the fruit worlds with his evil blender, and it is up to you to liberate the universe. Save your scattered people from the Orange Bikers and Blueberry Pirates using your trusty lasso!Swing Your Way ThroughUse your trusty lasso to swing on different objects ranging from soda cans and bottles!Throw Enemies and BombsGrab hold onto objects and throw them to break barriers or fight the bosses!Explore Fruit WorldsYou will make your way through 5 fruit themed planets, the Prickly Pear Cowboys, the Orange Bikers, the Blueberry Pirates, the Strawberry Mafia, and the Banana Kingdom!
Short Description: Play as Banana Cowboy and adventure in fruit-themed universe, rescuing your people from your evil twin who has taken over the Banana Kingdom. Use your trusty lasso and spaceship horse to travel to the Orange Biker and Blueberry Pirate planets and save the universe from the Evil King!

Game Name: The Midnight Town Stories: Matt's Nightmare
Detailed Description: In The Midnight Town Stories: Matt's Nightmare, you dive into a nightmare where the line between reality and madness blurs. Matt is trapped in a dark spiral of fear and mystery, with no memories and no answers. It’s up to you to guide him through levels filled with secrets buried in the past. Each memory recovered reveals a piece of the truth—but not all truths should be uncovered.Feel the tension rise as you explore decaying, shadowy environments where horror lurks around every corner. The nostalgic 90s setting only heightens the terror, evoking a lost era amidst the chaos. Prepare to face your deepest fears and discover whether Michael can escape the nightmare—or if he’s doomed to live forever in the shadows of The Midnight Town.Features:The Midnight Town Stories: Matt's Nightmare is a single-player survival horror game.Matt, trapped in a nightmare, must recover his memories and uncover the truth behind his dark past.Face terrifying environments while solving puzzles and confronting enemies that represent Matt's deepest fears.The story dives into a spiral of mystery and terror, challenging players to reveal buried secrets.Environment design and art inspired by the 90s, creating a nostalgic and unsettling atmosphere.Meticulously crafted soundtrack to heighten the sense of isolation and fear.Players can choose between first-person and third-person perspectives for an immersive horror experience.Fully compatible with Steam Deck, allowing you to take the terror wherever you go.Prepare for a psychological horror journey, where uncovering certain truths can be more frightening than remaining in the darkness.

Detailed Description: The twin stars 『Gemini』, who wandered through cosmos, were attacked by chaos that disrupted the universe and fell to a strange star. The twin starts an adventure to defeat the chaos and bring back the peace to the universe. is an online Co-op puzzle adventure game where two players cooperative to solve puzzles. Work together to finish adventure successfully!Wandering through the stars!.Cooperate Online! Adventure through space to challenge 4 different stars with your friends!  The chaos might be waiting for you at the end of your adventure.Complete the request of the star!.Every star you visit has their own challenges. Interact with stars to find out what they are going through. Complete their request. Then the stars will help you proceed to the next star.Use the power of a mystic star!.Adventures allow players to acquire mysterious star powers. Solve puzzles, defeat enemies, and move forward with four abilities: ejection, manipulation, assimilation, and projection!Ejection : Releases a huge amount of star energy, activating the object.Manipulation : Can move an object that has star energy within. Assimilation : It can be colored by the stars and move along the traces of the stars.Projection : By borrowing the story of the stars, you can use sword and bow for a moment.Defeat Chaos!.The ultimate goal of the adventure is to defeat the chaos that disrupts the universe. Defeat the chaos with the wisdom you have accumulated through the adventure!

Detailed Description: Shore Doodle: Drawing in the Sand is a drawing app that allows you to use your own personal beach as a canvas for your art.There are no obstacles, no enemies obstructing you from your goal. So grab a branch or a rake and draw whatever you feel like in the sand!Perfect for whenever you want a little moment to yourself, or if you want to recapture that summer feeling while you’re hanging out at home.When night falls, the tide will come in and begin to wash away your drawings bit by bit, but that's part of the fun! Draw something and experience the unique comfort in knowing that it will not be forever.While the app is running, the sky also changes based on how much time has passed. Try looking up as you draw to see it change from daytime, to sunset, to a starry night sky!You might even see and hear a passing flock of birds! Seeing your surroundings change in real time is also part of the fun.
Short Description: Let's enjoy your own personal beach. Wander around at your leisure and use a branch to draw in the sand. What will you draw in the short time you have before the sea washes it away? The time-of-day changes as you draw, bringing you relaxation, and perhaps new discoveries...

Detailed Description: Submergent is a short horror game where you explore an oppressive underwater cave in a submarine.FEATURES A dingy submarine. An underwater light. Old mapping technology. Some flares. A short experience that is finished in less than an hour.GAMEPLAYPilot your submarine through an underwater cave system using minimal resources. Sunlight doesn't penetrate this deeply, so you'll need to rely on your submarine's lights to navigate the murky depths. Initial attempts to map the cave have proven unsuccessful, so you'll need to rely on the submarine's scanner. It's old tech and it's not the clearest, but it'll work. You're equipped with a limited set of flares to help mark your path, but use them sparingly, as once they're gone, you'll be left at the mercy of the deep.Don't get lost.STORYAs a crew member of an oceanography team, you find yourself in the Arctic Sea, facing a startling discovery: a vast underwater cave system lying approximately 1000 feet below sea level. Two exploration teams, Alpha and Beta, were dispatched to survey the caves, but they've now been missing for four days, far beyond the expected duration of their mission. You've been tasked with piloting the last remaining submarine, dubbed "The Tin Can" due to its rusted and deteriorating condition. Locate the missing exploration teams and ensure their safe return home.

Your task is extremely simple - escape the room ..... With multiple endings and an intriguing hidden lore , it is the perfect game to test out your wits while experiencing a creepy setting.

Game Name: Dünnes Eis - Das Spiel zum Song
Detailed Description: Dünnes Eis is a point-and-click short story by award-winning game designer Jan “Poki” Baumann, who has won numerous awards for games such as Edna & Harvey: The breakout and the Deponia series. Since 2021, Poki has been fully dedicated to his music and band Baumann Bergmann Pokinsson.Dünnes Eis bridges the gap between Poki's music and his games: it is an interactive music video for the well-known song of the same name, which Baumann Bergmann Pokinsson re-released in 2024.In the usual Pokiesque manner, the game deals with the themes of the song in three densely narrated chapters. Players accompany South Pole explorer Cliffi on his lonely work at an Antarctic station. Both the song and the game are about missing and being missed.Anyone who misses Poki's games will love Dünnes Eis.

Detailed Description: The End of You is a short, emotional narrative game about love lost, the ghosts of the past, and the ungraceful clambering, oftentimes painful crawl towards closure. Interact with domestic objects, seek out  memories, and embrace feelings that cut as sharp as a knife.Sometimes, you have to say goodbye a thousand times over.It feels like the apartment is alive with the remnants of her in every corner. The mug she left behind rattles. Her toothbrush buzzes. The battered cassette whirs. You can’t remember what was even on the tape. “Our song” is written on it. Should the tape be yours or hers? How do you decide? You hesitate over whether the tape should be tossed in her box, simply labeled Emily.When you close your eyes, you dream of her.When the lights are off, you see her. Not her exactly, but the past version of her. Is that even accurate? Perhaps it’s simply a version of her you’ve created in your head. You see her everywhere - the kitchen, the bedroom, and the balcony. Who knew such a tiny apartment could contain so many ghosts of her. You decide what you say to her. You rehearse these conversations even though you know the ending.Are you afraid to find closure?As Walter, you will reluctantly pack away all the objects from a past relationship. Heartbreak exists in every crevice and in the seemingly most ordinary items. Can all the ghosts and the heavy weight of the past fit in a cardboard box? It seems impossible, and yet, you will try anyway. Wrestle with Walter’s mental health, listen to the whispers of old memories, and find some closure.

Detailed Description: Tame It Too! is a survival harem breeding game! Here you'll find everything you love about these genres. Every day will be a challenge, because survival is not just for show! You'll have to take care of yourself and your girlfriends, evolve, adapt to the local flora and fauna, conquer, build, learn and teach!The story of Lee's adventures from Tame It! game, who crashed and found himself on a desert island, continues! Now a new island awaits Lee, much bigger than the previous one, and this time it is very inhabited! Exciting adventures are waiting for you in a tropical paradise full of dangers.  A large island is available for you to explore freely. Lee can run anywhere and look under every bush! You'll encounter both small animals that you can hunt on, as well as dangerous predators that can hunt you.  You will encounter both aggressive locals and meet new wild beauties that you can tame and turn into your loyal allies and lovers. But winning the hearts of the girls won't be so easy, because each one has her own character, special tastes and preferences! All the main girls have their own storylines that will help you get to know them better, overcome their fears, learn their secrets and kinks.And where would we be without hot scenes! Interactive real-time animated spicy moments of interaction with tamed beauties! Unusual angles, interesting poses, choices of actions and, of course, the opportunity to conceive and have offspring to develop your own village! Moreover, you'll be able to breed new beauties with the appearance features you prefer, such as big breasts or a juicy ass! Many secrets lie ahead, beautiful but dangerous monster girls to tame, new enemies, the mystery of a lost civilization, and of course the search for the kidnapped pilot girl Tonya, who is being held somewhere on the island! Start your adventure now!Key FeaturesA big completely new island;Open world to explore and conquer;3 sexy girlfriends and a lot more monster girls to tame;Beautiful monster girls breeding;Hot scenes with realtime animations;Building and developing your own village;Interesting storyline with an extensive system of quests and minigames;Crafting, hunting, fishing, gathering and cooking;Several endings depending on your choices.

Detailed Description: 《WarOFuture》 is an online two-player card and chess game. You need to use pre-build magic decks and chess units to play against with each other. Taking advantage of the unique "flipping" characteristics of the chess pieces to get a unique game experience! · Chesses that can be flipped:  Your chess has the  "flipped"  characteristic. If it's  "un-flipped" , the opponent cannot see the specific information of the piece. The winning goal of the game is to kill the "crystal". You can use this characteristic to hide your chesses, or use the unique "flip ability" of the chess piece to surprise your opponent! Positioning different professions:  Different chess pieces have unique characteristics and  "flipping abilities" , causing powerful attacks, obtaining opponent information, and even causing large-scale control effects. It's up to you to make good use of the coordination between chess pieces. Rich card selection:   Presets of magic cards from three color systems, powerful red cards for killing, blue cards for field control skills, and green cards for protecting and obtaining resources. They combine with chess pieces to achieve excellent results. Diverse chessboard venues:  Rivers in the forest slow down the movement, volcanic magma directly causes destructive damage, and desert quicksand changes the position of chess. Different gameplay of the maps can bring a completely different gaming experience!
Short Description: 《WarOFuture》 is a two-player card and chess game inspired by military chess, where two players are divided into red and blue factions, manipulate their own chess to attack and destroy each other's chess pieces. You can also use pre-builded magic cards with different effects to assist in battle.

Detailed Description:
Aquelarre is an historical immersive episodic Visual Novel. A narrative-driven game with RPG and Point And Click elements that transports you to a Medieval Spain in which beliefs and superstitions are true. Your decisions will make the legends come to life, influencing the story and developing your character.

✓ Your decisions change history
Choose between different options throughout the adventure, discover all the possible endings and live how your decisions affect your characters.
✓ Build your character 
Your choices don't just affect the story. Choose how your character will develop, gaining skills that will facilitate your passage through the world of Aquelarre.
✓ Find out if the legends are true
Enter a disturbing time in which the line that divides reality and myth barely exists. Be part of the legends, reveal the most hidden mysteries and meet all the characters who will guide you (or not) during the adventure.
✓ Immerse yourself in their universe by being an active part of it.
Enjoy the complete plot that will captivate you for hours, accompanied by the inspiring art and the immersive soundtrack. Transport yourself to the universe of Aquelarre completely with a graphic and sound aspect that conveys the message of the game.

This game contains adult content, including violence, nudity, and mature themes. Player discretion is advised.

Travel to a Medieval Spain in which beliefs and superstitions are true. Your decisions will make the legends come to life, influencing the story.

Detailed Description: BEYOND TENMEI can be described as a solo board game adventure where dice determine what spaces you land on, how much damage you deal and take, and what happens during various events.The dice won't always roll in your favor, but you can spend MP to cast Spells and change any dice on the board. Weigh the cost of doing so carefully, however, as running out of MP before a bad roll can be rather grave!Combatants will react to the dice based on what Talents they possess. Keep the dice off of values that benefit the opponent, aim for triggering your own beneficial effects, and fight back against RNG!The game can be played methodically with long, well-planned turns, or briskly in quicker sessions. Play through Story Mode once, or do just one more run in Hero Mode with harsher modifiers. Truly formidable foes and rewarding victories await those who see what the game has to offer, but you're free to do so at your own pace!-GAME MODES- BEYOND TENMEI features a variety of game-modes to appeal to fans of the "Rogue-lite" genre as well as the linear story-based progression you've come to expect from more traditional RPGs.  Brave Mode - Journey as a lone Brave of Salvation against the Demon Duke's forces in a 100-space, rogue-lite session where you choose new spells as you progress!Rebel Mode - Having trouble with Brave Mode? This remix allows you to play with a party of monster-kin adventurers instead of a lone hero! Let your hearts held aloft see you through your quest!Hero Mode - The Quarrelsome Quartet have gathered to try and bring forth the Demonarch! Starting at 150 spaces, this rogue-lite mode features many new Spells, the introduction of player Talents, additional event spaces, and several run modifiers to unlock. The real BEYOND TENMEI starts here!Story Mode - A longer, persistent game mode that follows the story of a group of monster-kin as they discover the truth of their world. This twist on the plot of many RPG stories will take you through 16 stages with persistent character progression and customization. Completing stages and fulfilling objectives will award items that power up your party, allowing you to unlock Talents and Spells to confront increasingly menacing opponents. ... And maybe some additional modes down the line!
Short Description: Roll dice, then cheat the dice with magic! Foil foes and trigger powerful talent synergies in this simple-but-deep twist on the turn-based RPG.

Detailed Description: ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~【Invitation】~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Dear high witchness,The Lanternville is glad to inform you that the next Magic Lantern Festival will soon be held.Everything you need to participate is thirst for wisdom and a nice little familiar.Under the name of The Great Witch, let us praise every single drop of knowledge!Sincerely yours,Magic Lantern Festival Committee~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~To newborn witches, the Magic Lantern Festival is a feast held in Lanternville every time the committee feels motivated.This time, the rule is very simple; let your familiar survive a bullet hell of magic for a certain period of time.Each witch you encounter in Lanternville will continuously emit magic while giving random quizzes on their field of specialty.Not answering or making mistakes on the given quiz will result in tough penalty... Don't think about doing so on purpose!-----------------------------------------------------------------------On a pixel-designed 2D stage, you will have to survive a bullet hell for a certain time period.Not only that... you also need to answer quizzes simultaneously in order not to let the bullet hell become more and more dense.During the Early Access, players can access to 9 genres of quizzes, each of them with an Easy mode and Hard mode.There is also a practice mode where you can only practice solving the quizzes (without the bullet hell).
Short Description: Magic Lantern Festival is a hyper multitask 2D bullet hell. Players are required to recreate their brain in order to dodge all the magic bullets and answer random quizzes simultaneously.

Detailed Description: GAMES FROM FRIENDSAbout the GameEmbark on a cosmic journey as you build and manage your space tavern! Discover exotic ingredients, craft unique cocktails, and create a bustling atmosphere with live music performances. Explore the depths of space and become the ultimate entrepreneur in this management simulation adventure!WISHLIST!Add it to your wishlist today and follow us for updates on the game's development.Welcome to Galactic Tavern, the ultimate spacefaring adventure where you'll build, manage, and expand your very own interstellar watering hole! Set in a vibrant corner of the cosmos, Galactic Tavern invites you to embark on a journey across the stars as you strive to become the galaxy's most renowned tavern owner.Key Features:🌌 Cosmic Tavern Customization: Design and personalize your space tavern to attract customers from across the galaxy.🌟 Exotic Mixology: Craft and serve a diverse array of cosmic cocktails using rare ingredients discovered in your space adventures.👨‍🌾 Space Farming: Cultivate your own space farm to grow fresh ingredients for your drinks and dishes, ensuring top-quality fare for your patrons.🚀 Galactic Exploration: Send out intrepid explorers on daring missions to uncover new recipes, ingredients, and treasures in uncharted space.🎵 Entertainment Extravaganza: Keep your patrons entertained with live music performances from talented bands, creating an electrifying atmosphere.💫 Empire Expansion: Grow your tavern empire by upgrading your establishment, expanding your facilities, and attracting new customers from across the galaxy.Experience the Adventure:Galactic Tavern offers a unique blend of management simulation, exploration, and space-faring adventure. Whether you're crafting cocktails, discovering alien delicacies, or charting new territories, the galaxy is yours to explore in this cosmic journey of entrepreneurship and discovery.Embark on Your Journey:Are you ready to embark on the ultimate space tavern adventure? Gather your ingredients, cue the music, and prepare for an unforgettable journey across the cosmos in Galactic Tavern!

Detailed Description: Recursive Riftfall is a game about exploring exotic dungeons for loot to power your ship and yourself. Each dungeon has it’s own themes which will determine the equipment you take and how to you tackle it’s challenges. Multiplayer – Play with as many people as the host’s network can handle. Dungeon size, difficulty, and resources dynamically adjust to suit the current number of players.Proximity Voice Chat – The classic feature is here and well-integrated. Traps, sprawling dungeons, radios, and co-op puzzles all cater to endless memorable experiences.Singleplayer – Like the challenge or the solitude? Play alone in a mode adjusted to suit solo play.Equipment – Use the right tool for the job! Scanners, radios, jump boots, cloaking devices, and many more provide ample ways to tackle endless challenges.Procedural Dungeons – Dungeons are diverse and exotic, each with their own gameplay themes. You’ll encounter them in waves – work together to figure out a dungeon group’s main dangers to be as well-prepared as possible.Obstacles – The dungeon could have a confusing labyrinthian layout, or lots of verticality. It could have hidden pushers ready to plunge you into the abyss, or flamethrowers ready to burn you to a crisp. It could have doors that require teamwork to open. It could be extra dark, or the floor could be made of ice. And on top of all those possible dangers, there are the Obeloids.
Short Description: Explore dungeons, collect loot, and avoid dangers in this exotic looter! Play solo or with as many as the host can handle. Power your ship and yourselves with the resources you find to ensure your continued survival.

Detailed Description: Dare to a real challenge? ATTENTION!This game may test your skills and patience with its challenging core game mechanics! Celestial Contact is the perfect blend of shooter and rogue-lite genre in an arena where you journey through an atmosphere of mystery and suspense shaped by stunning 2D pixel art.  Featuring an immersive atmosphere and a compelling soundtrack, you'll fight for survival by clearing an alien-robot invasion in this challenging game! Clear waves of enemies, collect GEAR, defeat BOSSes and upgrade your character. Aim for the highest score by lasting the longest! Who knows, maybe you'll clear the station of enemies forever!  Use the Gears you collect throughout the game to buy character and weapon upgrades in the store.  Experience different gameplay experiences by upgrading different costumes and weapons that give you different positive and negative traits!  Get support from Pax to collect items dropped by enemies! If Luke is close enough to the dropped items, Pax automatically picks them up.
Short Description: Experience Celestial Contact, a captivating fusion of shooter and rogue-lite genres set in a mysterious arena adorned with beautiful 2D pixel art. Battle through waves of enemies, gather gear, conquer bosses, and enhance your character to strive for the highest score and lasting survival!

Detailed Description: Play as a national secret agent blessed with extraordinary abilities designed to face disaster events. Entrusted with the crucial task of saving the nation's vital assets, you must navigate dangerous situations and make split-second decisions to ensure mission success. Equipped with special tools, you must confront perilous environments, using your skills to overcome obstacles and fulfill your duty.Your mission unfolds against the backdrop of a city plunged into turmoil by a devastating disaster. As a national secret agent, you are thrust into the heart of the crisis, where molten lava courses through the streets, threatening to engulf everything in its path. With agility and precision, you must traverse the urban landscape, leaping across buildings to evade the relentless flow of magma. Amidst this perilous environment, your objective is clear: procure vital national assets and retrieve classified documents crucial for the nation's security and stability.As the intensity of the disaster escalates, your role as a national secret agent becomes even more vital. With the essential items and documents secured, the next phase of your mission begins. Maneuvering an evacuation vehicle through the debris-laden streets, you must navigate obstacles and hazards while racing against the clock to reach the safety of the designated zone.Disaster Slayer offers numerous key features and content to ensure an immersive gaming adventure:1. Navigate between buildings with parkour abilities.2. Drive to the Safety Zone.3. Experience an apocalyptic environment.4. Enjoy a linear game design.As for the content:1. Collect various items.2. Utilize 3 types of cars.3. Embark on 20 challenging missions.
Short Description: Be a national secret agent with special abilities to face disasters. Leap across buildings to avoid lava in a disaster-stricken city. Procure vital national assets and classified documents. Drive an evacuation vehicle through debris-filled streets to reach the safe zone.

Maneuvering an evacuation vehicle through the debris-laden streets, you must navigate obstacles and hazards while racing against the clock to reach the safety of the designated zone.Disaster Slayer offers numerous key features and content to ensure an immersive gaming adventure:1. Navigate between buildings with parkour abilities.2. Drive to the Safety Zone.3. Experience an apocalyptic environment.4. Enjoy a linear game design.As for the content:1. Collect various items.2. Utilize 3 types of cars.3. Embark on 20 challenging missions.

Detailed Description: Feature List🤠 Roguelike of duels in the Wild West.🔫 Challenge the fiercest gunslingers in intense card duels.🃏 Collect and build your deck with unique ability and weapon cards.🏜️ Explore a map full of dangers and opportunities different in each game.⚙️ Unlock cards, enemies, characters, and increasingly difficult challenges.🤖 Face bosses with special abilities and unique strategies.🔥 Tactical decisions that will change the course of each duel.📜 Discover the hidden history of the Wild West through your adventures.About the GameActive Cards: These cards are the ones you'll directly use in duels. They can include attacks, defenses, special moves, and more. Using them wisely is key to defeating your opponents.Passive Cards: These cards add special abilities and bonuses to your character. They can improve your stats, grant new passive abilities, or even modify the game rules in your favor.Obtain your cards by winning duels, purchasing them from the shop, or discovering loot scenes scattered throughout the map for unexpected rewards.Every duel immerses you in a unique encounter against random enemies, providing a dynamic and thrilling gaming experience.Prepare to challenge bosses of incredible strength and cunning, who lead formidable and strategically crafted decks of cards. These battles will test your tactical skill and prowess in every move.Showcase your bravery and skill! Only the most cunning, daring, and well-prepared duelists can overcome the challenges of Duelite's Wild West.Select your character and play with an initial deck.Experience a new world in each game with unique maps, enemies, cards, and scenes.Adapt your active and passive cards according to each game's needs, where strategy and decision-making are crucial to capturing the most wanted.Discover collection albums that you can complete to unlock special rewards and expand your gaming experience.Each time you play an active or passive card, it will be added to its corresponding album as a collectible. Collectors can complete these albums while progressing through the game!Of course, we also have an album for enemies and bosses. Defeat them all and complete it!
Short Description: Help the Coust brothers fulfill their fantasy of becoming sheriffs like their father. Defeat countless rivals of all kinds on different routes in this roguelite card dueling game set in the Wild West. Do you have what it takes to defeat the most wanted? Find out in Duelite!

Detailed Description:
(Translate by machine)《Small Hero Survive》 is a single player game of monster building and survival. Here, you will choose characters and weapons, build your own village, manufacture various equipment, eliminate many enemies, and learn skills to strengthen your character. Use different weapons to unlock character skills and defeat more enemies.

Level:
There are a total of 25 waves of monster spawning. After defeating the boss in level 25, you can win. After victory, you can choose to continue fighting and enter infinite wave mode, where you can continue to spawn monsters. The game failed when the base was destroyed. After victory, you can unlock the skills to use weapons and earn points by killing (points are currently not effective, plan to open the points store in the future to unlock external technologies and modules)

Buff:
The various combinations between the 11 buffs will provide more assistance for battles.

Role:
Currently, 6 characters can be selected.

Weapons:
There are a total of 34 initial weapon options, and using the weapon to clear the level can unlock the skills carried by the weapon.

Construction:
Buildings are designed to provide assistance in battles, increasing experience points and temporary gains for characters during production and consumption. They can also be used to build barracks and temporary defense walls to resist enemies. (Planning to make defense towers and more enhancement buildings)

Skills:
All characters have a total of 100+skills accumulated. Before battle, select at least 20 skills. After upgrading, randomly select 3 skills based on their rarity for players to choose from. If there are no desired skills, players can also choose to increase their character attributes.

Module:
Each Module has its own rating, and the rating must be balanced (similar to the initial talent selection of the stars), with the aim of providing more talents to play.

Detailed Description: Fears to Fathom is an episodic psychological horror game where each episode unveils a short story narrated by the ones who survived.You're browsing the fifth installment of the Fears to Fathom anthology.Fears to Fathom : Woodbury GetawayIn the fifth episode of Fears to Fathom you play as Sydney Harper, a 23-year-old working at a consulting firm plans a weekend getaway to a rental in Woodbury with her college friends. Little did they know what was about to unfold during their stay. Sydney survived as she made the right choices.The GameplayThis game is primarily a first-person narrative walking simulator with exploration, driving, fishing and conversation mechanics.Key FeaturesAtmospheric environment and photo-realistic graphics.VHS film aesthetic.Fishing mechanic.Receive texts from NPCs.Player voice activity.

Detailed Description: Description:Step into the gritty, unforgiving world of "Gangbanged by Orcs and Goblins!" A visually stunning visual novel that immerses you in a post-apocalyptic wasteland, where survival is a constant struggle against ruthless foes and harsh conditions.In this narrative-driven adventure, you take on the role of Alyssa, one of the few remaining survivors in a world overrun by marauding goblins and orcs. Your journey will test not only your physical prowess but also your moral compass as you navigate through a world where the line between right and wrong is blurred.Forge alliances, make difficult choices, and fight tooth and nail to protect what little you have left. But be warned, danger lurks around every corner, and the path to survival is fraught with peril.Prepare to be swept away by a tale of courage, sacrifice, and the indomitable human spirit. Will you emerge victorious, or will you succumb to the merciless forces that seek to destroy you?FeaturesStunning HD renders bring the post-apocalyptic world to vivid life, with breathtaking attention to detail.Immerse yourself in an intricate storyline filled with twists, turns, and morally ambiguous decisions that shape the outcome of your journey.Explore a diverse cast of characters, each with their own motivations and agendas, as you navigate through a world on the brink of collapse.Experience intense, explicit scenes that add depth and realism to the narrative, pushing the boundaries of storytelling in the visual novel genre.Enjoy the convenience of single-handed gameplay, allowing you to immerse yourself fully in the experience without any distractions.
Short Description: Dive into "Gangbanged by Orcs and Goblins!" and experience an unforgettable journey in a world where survival is paramount.

Detailed Description: Description:Step into the futuristic world of "LustRunner 3069: Tokyo Crisis," where the bustling streets of Tokyo serve as the backdrop for an electrifying adventure. As players assume the role of Akira, The Bounty Hunter, they'll embark on a perilous mission to apprehend the leader of a human trafficking gang.Set in the year 3069, this visual novel plunges players into a cyberpunk dystopia, where neon lights and towering skyscrapers cast shadows over the city's secrets. Akira's journey unfolds amidst a web of intrigue, danger, and unexpected alliances, as she navigates through the underbelly of Tokyo's criminal underworld.But Akira soon discovers that she's facing more than just ordinary thugs – her adversaries possess dark powers and hidden agendas. As the narrative unfolds, players will delve deeper into the mysteries of Tokyo, uncovering shocking truths and confronting moral dilemmas along the way."LustRunner 3069: Tokyo Crisis" offers a captivating blend of action, suspense, and character-driven storytelling, inviting players to immerse themselves in a world where every choice matters. Will you help Akira unravel the secrets of Tokyo and bring justice to the streets, or will you succumb to the temptations and dangers lurking in the shadows?FeaturesIntriguing Storyline with Unexpected Twists: Experience a captivating narrative filled with suspense and surprise.Cyberpunk Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in a richly detailed, neon-lit world of futuristic Tokyo.Stunning Visuals: Enjoy high-quality artwork and beautifully rendered scenes that bring the story to life.Cool Soundtracks: Get lost in an immersive audio experience with a carefully curated soundtrack that complements the cyberpunk setting.Incredible Group Sex Scenes: Engage in steamy, explicit content designed for mature audiences.One-Handed Play: Designed for convenience, allowing you to enjoy the game with just one hand.
