Detailed Description: Return to the Summer of 2007...Once somewhat of a local legend in their hometown, Mallory turned down a record deal in favour of a scholarship a decade ago. To say that they felt a bit of regret would be an understatement; they spent the bulk of their university years watching their former band mates sell out shows and records, stewing in bitterness the whole time.After several years of rejection and struggling, they've finally gotten a second chance in their grasp —  only to question whether it's something they even want anymore.After years of hard work, Mal has finally gotten everything they've always dreamed of: their band, No Prospects, landed a coveted spot on the 2007 Friends and Foes summer tour, and their latest single has been picked up by some big radio stations. So they should be happy, right?The bassist of The Fractured —  the current band that's on the playlist of everyone who's in-the-know. Most would consider Emerson's quiet and withdrawn nature ill-suited for the spotlight, so it's fortunate that he seems to get overshadowed by the rest of his group.Mallory’s best friend from university who was dragged into No Prospects largely against her will. Despite her initial reluctance, ever-critical Di has since given her all in every single performance – and won’t hesitate to point out anyone she believes to be dead weight.An old friend of Mallory's from their teenage basement show years. Having spent the past decade turning down permanent positions in favour of juggling odd jobs with occasional freelance session work, Beckett surprised everyone when he joined No Prospects.A last minute addition to No Prospects after the abrupt departure of their previous guitarist, Lucas struggles to keep his head above water in a sea full of industry veterans. What he lacks in technical skill, he more than makes up for in pure enthusiasm. Jump into the past: Go on a cross-country tour during the summer of 2007, set to an original soundtrack that draws inspiration from 90s and 00s emo/indie rock.Customise your character: While summer haze/glory days has a protagonist with a defined history, you'll be able to customise parts of their identity, like their name, pronouns, appearance, and voice.Make meaningful choices: Shape your character's personality, relationships, and goals through the choices you make.Experience it all over again in New Game+: Completing your first playthrough will unlock a New Game+ mode that adds new story content and epilogues — almost doubling the amount of content in the playthrough.
Short Description: Go on a cross-country tour with your band in pursuit of fame, success, and happiness in this drama visual novel set during the summer of 2007.

What he lacks in technical skill, he more than makes up for in pure enthusiasm. Jump into the past: Go on a cross-country tour during the summer of 2007, set to an original soundtrack that draws inspiration from 90s and 00s emo/indie rock.Customise your character: While summer haze/glory days has a protagonist with a defined history, you'll be able to customise parts of their identity, like their name, pronouns, appearance, and voice.Make meaningful choices: Shape your character's personality, relationships, and goals through the choices you make.Experience it all over again in New Game+: Completing your first playthrough will unlock a New Game+ mode that adds new story content and epilogues — almost doubling the amount of content in the playthrough.

Recommended Requirements: No information

Detailed Description:
Embark on a captivating survival adventure across a vast and treacherous land of floating islands filled with all sorts of deadly threats and sparkling treasures for you to encounter. Take full control of an airship with full physics-based movement and interaction and sail between islands to collect loot to defend yourself, upgrade your airship, keep yourself fed or customize your airship however you want. Your airship is your vessel for you to command!

But most importantly you’ll be uncovering the mystery of where your brother went and following his trail to discover the reason that he’s trying to get off this planet. On your journey, you’ll meet interesting and memorable characters who’ll help you to survive the rest of your voyage as well as those who’ll try to kill you. You’ll encounter threats like missile turrets that you’ll have to evade, exploding spider critters that infest entire islands and gigantic snapping plants that’ll try to snare you in their maw.

A multitude of different biomes, structures, puzzles, characters, dangers and stories await you in Across the Distant Skies. So yank those levers into overdrive and set sail into the clouds!

Across the Distant Skies is a first-person physics-based survival game about travelling a vast distance across a planet in your trusty airship. A combination of survival mechanics, first-person combat, resource management, story/lore and exploration.

Detailed Description: Wobbler is a racing game where you accelerate while turning, and decelerate while going forward. These unique physics are designed to be simple & forgiving for more casual players, yet hard to master for those looking for a serious challenge. Wobble your way to first place as you find the optimal routes through a series of unique levels*, and challenge your friends or other players for the best times! Alternatively, cook up a level only you can beat!When it comes to racing in Wobbler, there are only two controls: turning left, or turning right. Despite such simplicity, you may be surprised just how in-depth these two controls can get!In this minimalistic world made up of basic shapes & vibrant colors, you can get up to speeds of 2,000 km/h! There are levels ranging from Easy to Very Hard difficulty. Some are slower paced with a stronger focus on parkour, routing, and precision, while others are extremely fast paced and will require optimal planning & reaction times to succeed. Level completion should be achievable for most players, but competing for the top may not be for everyone!Wobbler has a heavy focus on "speedrunning" and includes a few handy technical features such as:Accurate and consistent built-in timers (tied to physics, with 0.01s precision).Race replay files: autosaves your last 25, your personal bests for every level, and you can manually save any race you want. They can be viewed at any time, and slowed down or sped up.File tampering detection: if you manually edit a replay or level file outside of the game, it will say it's been tampered with when you load this file in-game, and prevent you from creating replays with tampered levels.Statistics tracking: Lifetime stats, as well as 3 sets of resettable stats which can be used to track various types of challenges or accurately time multi-level races.Ease of file sharing and usage: all generated files are organized within the game's folder, and you can load from any folder.Wobbler comes with a built-in level editor which is simple enough for anyone to create a level, while also including advanced features for more complex levels:Grid-based placement: Simpler to use, allows for faster level prototyping, and encourages consistent designs.Full control over node properties: Despite the grid-based placement, you have full control over scaling, rotation, alignment, and position offset, allowing fine control over level nodes regardless of their grid position.Access to advanced behaviors: You may place lights, speedboosts, and triggers, visible or invisible, which can teleport the player to other locations, hide/show other level nodes, and more. These behaviors allow you to create complex levels which teleport the player to new areas, unlock/create new areas as the player reaches other areas, or even things like puzzle/maze levels.Built-in thumbnail generator: When saving a level, a thumbnail is automatically generated, and the camera placement for this can be customized. Alternatively, you can also manually create a thumbnail before uploading your level to the workshop.Two camera styles: There is the primary top-down "2D" isometric view, allowing for a quick overview & an intuitive linear level building experience, as well as a 3D camera preview to help with adjusting complex structures or levels involving height.Impossible level prevention: Level creators must beat their own level and include their replay with it before it can be uploaded to the Workshop. Level files may still be shared and loaded privately before being uploaded to the Workshop, so it is possible to have a friend or team collaborate on beating a near-impossible level before its upload.The built-in level editor is somewhat primitive compared to others out there, but it has everything you need for both simple or complex levels, while remaining simple enough to be accessible for everyone. We're looking forward to seeing what the community can create with it! Note: The level editor currently does NOT allow importing new models or textures, only using the built-in ones.*Early access disclaimer: There are currently a lot less native levels in place than there will be in the future. We're hoping to create up to 36-40 total native levels. It's also worth noting, the Level Editor and Steam Workshop are entirely functional, allowing all players to create their own!

Detailed Description: INCEL SIMULATOR is a card game in which you make decisions that determine the future of the protagonist. To do this, simply swipe the card left or right.You are Alex Dysfuctional and you have never had a girlfriend. Despite your best efforts. It seems that the world itself is designed to cause unbearable pain. However, maybe it's not too late to change everything? The only question is what is closer to you - to try again and again to pump up your body and spirit or to become the king of incels?Heavy drama about the fate of one man.You'll follow a difficult story of Alexei at the turning point of life. Together with Alexei find again the meaning in this cruel and ruthless world. Find the true purpose of your existence.Cards, cards, cardsGameplay is designed in card style, which gives it a special dynamics.Choices and consequencesMake a lot of fateful decisions that will greatly change Alexei's life. It depends only on you how the protagonist will change - whether he will go to the gym, go on dates or finally forget about everything and lock himself in his apartment. Your choices will lead you to one of three endings.Key features:1. Non-linear story with multiple choices.2. Simple and intuitive controls. In order to make a choice in the game you just need to swipe the card left or right.3. Depending on your choices, the story can end with three different endings.4. Tragicomedy about the hard life of one incel.

The only question is what is closer to you - to try again and again to pump up your body and spirit or to become the king of the incels? Make life-changing decisions and change Alex's life.

Game Name: There's Always a Madman: Do Your Worst
Detailed Description: Play as the vengeful secret agent Virginia West as she takes on a silver-obsessed madman known as The Silver Fox in this single-player interactive spy novel. Surveil your enemy, get revenge for your partner's demise, and maybe - just maybe - save the world while you're at it. Sometimes it's best ... to do your worst! Your MissionYour target is a madman known as The Silver Fox. You may be familiar with villains who lust after gold, but not so with this guy. He loves silver and despises gold - so much so that he plans to destroy the Golden Gate Bridge!  Even though it's not gold at all! We previously sent in your partner, Franklin Benjamin, to deal with the situation and protect the bridge. But unfortunately, he's been lost in the line of duty, so this mission now falls to you, Virginia West. Get close to this madman, unravel his scheme, and stop him in his tracks. The fate of a national landmark rests on your shoulders and your shoulders alone. This is a single-player game, after all There's Always a Madman: Do Your Worst can be played with just a mouse. Gameplay consists of selecting the action or dialog you wish to take given the situation you’re facing. Although the life of a secret agent is complicated, playing There's Always a Madman: Do Your Worst is simple Sequel or StandaloneThere's Always a Madman: Do Your Worst is the second entry in the There's Always a Madman series, but it tells a standalone story.  Like a classic James Bond novel or film where you can pick any one up independent of the rest, you can pick this story up without having experienced any prior stories in the There's Always a Madman franchise.  However, I would recommend playing the first game There's Always a Madman: Fight or Flight before this game if you care to experience the series in its intended order Cat and MouseAs a secret agent, it's not about who has the fastest trigger finger. Put your mind to good use and make intelligent in-the-moment decisions on how best to handle your current predicament. Only by out-thinking your opponents can you survive to tell the tale I Expect You to DieThis madman has killed one of our own, but revenge is a dish best served cold. Get close to him and make sure the bridge is out of danger before you put this guy six feet under Sounds Like a WinnerAlthough the game is text-based like a novel, an emphasis is placed on visuals and music to set the appropriate mood for each scene, changing based on whether you're in a safe location or you're exposed to danger. It also features a theme song (with lyrics) written specifically for this game Short and Not So SweetThere's Always A Madman: Do Your Worst aims to be about the length of a movie for a single playthrough (roughly two hours). During that time, you may very well have to do some not-so-nice things to succeed. But that's okay - as they say, well behaved women seldom make history For reference, here are some similar games outside the There's Always a Madman series to help you get a further sense for what the There's Always A Madman games are like: Perfect Dark (and James Bond games like GoldenEye), No One Lives Forever, Alpha Protocol, Mission: Impossible N64, Splinter Cell games, Henchman Story, Agent A: A Puzzle in Disguise, Framed, I Expect You To Die, Batman Telltale Series, The Wolf Among Us Q: Why make this game text-based? Why not use visuals?A: James Bond, Jason Bourne, Jack Reacher, and Jack Ryan all started off in text format with novels.  I believe this is the right move for the project - as they say, the book is always better, so I think a more book-like experience works here.  The game's text will of course be supplemented with music to set the appropriate mood, such as whether you're in danger or in a safe spot Go ahead, agent. Do your worst! Each game in the There's Always a Madman series is designed as a standalone adventure, but if you wish to play the games in order (which is recommended), this is the order of release: 1. There's Always a Madman: Fight or Flight 2. There's Always a Madman: Do Your Worst And don't forget to check out my debut game, the cozy RPG A Weekend in Puzzleburg. There's Always a Madman is technically a spin-off of A Weekend in Puzzleburg since There's Always a Madman is based on the Franklin Benjamin character first seen on a channel from the Puzzleburg hotel room TV

Detailed Description:
Embark on a meaningful journey in "Shadow of Eldham," a captivating RPG Maker walking simulator where choices shape destinies. Join Cyneheard and Wystan on their solemn quest to rescue the children of a despised former king in a world haunted by its past.

Set against the backdrop of Eldham, once ruled by a monarch whose legacy is tainted by hatred, players navigate through a world where shadows of the past linger. Cyneheard and Wystan, two unlikely heroes, traverse landscapes where whispers of discontent echo, seeking to redeem their land by attempting to save the innocent offspring of the fallen ruler.

Every choice made reverberates through the lives of NPCs. Will you extend compassion or take a firmer stance? The fate of Eldham's children remains uncertain.

In "Shadow of Eldham," the story lies not in grand battles, but in intimate moments and decisions. Through interactions and choices, players uncover character struggles and forge connections.

Can Cyneheard and Wystan navigate to redemption amidst the echoes of Eldham's troubled past?
Short Description: "Shadow of Eldham" is an atmospheric narrative walking simulator where players encounter the kingdom's lost children. Explore towns, cities, interact with diverse NPCs, and face moral dilemmas in this captivating journey of redemption, where each step reveals more about the world’s hidden past.

Detailed Description: Trilingual is a single player puzzle experience in space. After crash landing on the planet Triangulus, you must decode the native language of the Trilings to escape. Travel across unique islands to reach the center and board a spaceship to safety. Alter your environment, save Trilings, and find hidden secrets with this new alien language.
Short Description: Welcome to the planet, Triangulus. Can you solve the hidden mysteries of each island and escape with your brain intact? Scan these ancient runes to decode a new alien language. Use this alien language to grow plants, move trains, and even save the Trilings of the planet.
About the Game: Trilingual is a single player puzzle experience in space. After crash landing on the planet Triangulus, you must decode the native language of the Trilings to escape. Travel across unique islands to reach the center and board a spaceship to safety. Alter your environment, save Trilings, and find hidden secrets with this new alien language.

Detailed Description: In this first-person slasher you use your magic laser sword to chop up animals and people. It is based on a shocking Bible passage where God says to kill everything that breathes in the cities of the promised land. Your sword kills the victims when they are chopped causing blood to spray and stain their surroundings.The game allows you to read the relevant Bible quote which is briefly interrupted by two boys having a chat. The boys are involved in the rest of the game including playing the player's voice and the voice of a soldier.The game is a sandbox which gives you some different options such as killing everything yourself or ordering soldiers to help you. In a level you can explore a temple containing things God hates like child sacrifice and sexual worship assistants. You can worship the goddess idol in the temple but this will cause the soldiers to target you as well.Some levels contain a spinning mystery box that lets you activate a quest where you have to chop specific victims in specified ways. After this you need to return to the box.Generally the people and animals just wander around or stand still but in one level the people are hiding behind houses and you have to chase after them in order to kill them.The Bible passage also says to not chop fruit trees and if you do the soldiers get annoyed. You can eat the fruit of the fruit trees but you will end up regretting it.The game also includes a tutorial which introduces the game and demonstrates how to use the magic laser sword.Key features:Cleanse the cities of the promised landBased on Deuteronomy 20:16-18 from the Bible, you have to kill everything that breathes and you can order soldiers to help you. Your victims include animals, children, babies, and sexual worship assistants.Precision chopping questAn optional quest gets you to chop people and animals in specific ways such as chopping their leg, arm, or tail. When finished you can return to the box to see how obedient you were.Tidy up the bodiesA level has you tidying up the clutter in the promised land after cleansing by pushing chopped up bodies into a pit.Chase hiding adults and childrenIn a level you have to chop people who are hiding and running for their lives and try to get a low enough cleansing time.

You can eat the fruit of the fruit trees but you will end up regretting it.The game also includes a tutorial which introduces the game and demonstrates how to use the magic laser sword.Key features:Cleanse the cities of the promised landBased on Deuteronomy 20:16-18 from the Bible, you have to kill everything that breathes and you can order soldiers to help you. Your victims include animals, children, babies, and sexual worship assistants.Precision chopping questAn optional quest gets you to chop people and animals in specific ways such as chopping their leg, arm, or tail. When finished you can return to the box to see how obedient you were.Tidy up the bodiesA level has you tidying up the clutter in the promised land after cleansing by pushing chopped up bodies into a pit.Chase hiding adults and childrenIn a level you have to chop people who are hiding and running for their lives and try to get a low enough cleansing time.

Detailed Description: EnvironmentThe game is set in a Victorian mansion where the player is trapped inside the library. Uncover the mysteries that lie within as you scrounge the area looking for clues on who you are and why you are here. Piece together the lives that once inhabited this place and explore the secrets of this library that is hiding some dark truths. StorylineWaking up with no memory of who you are and what you are doing in this place you must solve the mystery of the mansion. 20 years ago the Langley estate was bustling with life and people could not but sing the praises of the family who inhabited the place. This all changed after one terrible night that a fire broke out and all who lived within perished. Today the mansion has still not recovered and lies abandoned until now.GameplayIn Hour of the Witch you are defenseless against the terrors that were once asleep but now have awoken due to your presence. You will be solving puzzles and picking up key items to advance your way to the end. In the process you will find valuable information that helps you remember who you are and what you are doing here. But doing all of this may not be so easy as you must be weary of the entity that stalks your every move.
Short Description: Waking up alone in a decrepit library with no memory of who you are or what you are doing here you must escape this place before the hour grows too late. Solve puzzles and uncover hidden secrets as you solve the mystery of who you are and why you are here in this top-down survival horror game.

Detailed Description:
SUSHI Race is a simple and fun game that anyone can enjoy!

Each sushi machine has its own appeal!
Battle and win with your favorites!

Drift around curves with flair!
Utilize items like soy-sauce missiles and blockers to outspeed your rivals!

【Time Attack】
Choose a course and record your best time!
Compete with players from around the world in online rankings!

【Free Race】
Choose a course to challenge with friends and CPUs!
Excitement will climb as items appear throughout the course!

【Grand Prix】
Run through several courses of your choice in order!
Accumulate wins and become the grand champion!

Enjoy playing with up to 4 players!
Challenge friends and family for 1st place and have fun!

Detailed Description: Readme.txt"01010011 01100101 01100101 01101011" Shop Crush is a shop simulator and hacker horror based on Negative Space. As you are looking for clients, strange things are happening. Be it shady or fair, deal with client tastes and preferences in a choice-based game. However, each client has seek rates too high.Discover the Illusions based on the Negative Space.All clients have unique Negative Space-based illusions to discover. Whether leisurely or complex, each story requires your patience and attention to reveal its true meaning. Collect all illusions to find the inner story of Shop Crush.Change Character Skins with precisionBe it alien or human, select the clients' identities that best suit your narrative! Identity changes make you feel more connected to the character and unlock new illusions. All clients share gender-neutral names.Control the Shop's Income and ReputationYou must make a profit to survive the business! Buy diverse and exotic products and sell them with a crazy margin. But beware: Dealing with suspicious clients might increase your sales, but it will also lower the shop's reputation. If either Income or Reputation is zero, the shop will be closed...Key Features and Contents Illusion-based story powered by the Negative Space Choice-based gameplay with tense and unpredictable sessions Atmospheric story about insanity, sense of doubt, and reality check 10 Unique Clients, each with their tastes and shopping styles 5 Selected locations with carefully crafted storyline 70+ Products to buy - from weird ones to essentials!

Detailed Description: On no, the local heroes have kidnapped the goblin princess! It's up to Braker and Booster to save the day with their trusty karts!Buckle up and race through exciting obstacle courses to free all the princesses in Goblin Kart Rescue!Goblin Kart Rescue is a top-down racing game, with 24 short but challenging tracks against a CPU opponent. After saving all the princesses by winning in story mode, try beating your own time in Time Attack, or see how many races you can clear in the difficult Endless mode!

Detailed Description: This game is an anomaly finding (difference finding) walking simulator.Game description:Get out of the building via the stairway. Observe the levels carefully for a successful exit.If everything is consistent in the level with the baseline state, proceed.If you observe any anomalies, turn back!Once you're out of the building, you can start the game all over again to experience all the anomalies!---Attention!This game is a result of learning Unreal Engine. All sound files, 3D models, and textures are sets of free resources downloaded with some modifications.Have fun!

Detailed Description: UNDER THE CONCRETE WAVE is a 3rd person platformer where ypu control robots designed to escape their underground BRUTALISM/CONCRETE habitat and explore the unknown world above ground. What challenges await you as you embark on your journey?Rise above the structures that confine you. Look for the hidden paths and ladders that will lead you to higher ground. Do not be afraid to climb and push yourself upward, for the view from the top will be worth the effort. You can make friends with them in different ways — some might be odd, others cool, some could offer support, while others might need your help. How would you build relationships with them?You'll encounter odd contraptions powered by electricity and various puzzles to solve. You can approach them with wisdom and potentially reap rewards, or simply find your way through without guidance. I won't be the one dictating how you tackle these challenges.Play with your friends, parents, lovers, children — joy of discover is brither when shared. Connect via multiplayer for up to 16 players at the time or a splitscreen experience for up to 4 playersGet a chance to build a relationship with someone new joining the game via session browser
Short Description: UNDER THE CONCRETE WAVE is a 3rd-person cooperative platformer where you alone or with friends take control of robots who have decided to leave the pit of monstrous brutalism. Jump, fall, throw objects, throw friends, solve puzzles (or not) on your way up.

Detailed Description: Step into the shoes of a determined reporter who arrives at the notorious Hotel 77 in Arkham, Massachusetts, on the fateful night of Monday, July 7th, 1997. You're here to document the 120th anniversary celebration of the hotel, but what you encounter is far from festive.As midnight strikes, you begin your recording, only to find the hotel eerily deserted. The once bustling corridors now stretch into an endless maze, trapping you in a sinister loop where time stands still. Each passageway seems familiar, yet subtly different, as you navigate the hotel’s repeating corridors, fighting to maintain your sanity.Amidst the disorienting labyrinth, you stumble upon a cryptic message left at the reception. This mysterious note hints at a way to break free from the hotel’s eldritch grip:"There are eldritch anomalies in the hotel corridor. If you find an anomaly, turn back and advance in the opposite direction. If there are no anomalies, keep moving forward. The reception is devoid of anomalies. Every successful pass through the reception advances time by one hour. Reach the seventh hour to escape the loop!"Can you decipher the clues, overcome the anomalies, and survive the nightmarish reality of Hotel 77? Test your wits and bravery in this chilling horror experience.Play Time15-60 minutesAbout Video Distribution・Distribution is available to both individuals and corporations without permission.・Monetization is only possible when using the functions provided by the video distribution site.・We would appreciate it if you include the name of the game in the title of your video or live broadcast, or include a link to the Steam page in the summary section.We will not be liable for any damages caused by the distribution of videos of this game.The contents of these guidelines are subject to change without notice.
Short Description: You are trapped in an endless lovecraftian hotel. Observe your surroundings and avoid eldritch anomalies in order to reach the exit.

Detailed Description: Humanity has finally left its cradle in the 23rd century - in pursuit of profit. Megacorporations carve out spheres of influence and claim new worlds to develop. They’re only prevented from wiping each other out by the Charter: contracts between each other meant to contain their worst impulses… and keep their promises.Workers and borrowers get what they bargained for: nothing more or less. Corporate raids and wars visit untold horrors on millions. Mercenaries, pirates and rebels flocked to the unregulated stars, looking for money and freedom from Earth’s stultifying Unity Government, but it’s a harsh place.Your family survived the Third Corporate War, fleeing to the fringes of human settlement to find peace as terraformers and farmers. However, a tragedy forces them back into wet-work for one of the megacorps, to pay off their debt and survive an uncertain future.Star Ronin is a top-down action-adventure mixing tactical combat, exo-suits, and challenging mechanics. Realistic fields of view, sophisticated lighting systems, intelligent enemies, with a robust catalog of weapons and upgrades for your exos; you are free to approach each mission as you see fit. All that matters is completing the objective and securing a payout to bring your family closer to freedom.  Fast-paced top-down tactical action: approach each mission the way you like. Use your suit's thermoptic camouflage systems to sneak past enemies; deploy jetpacks to rush through rooms full of enemies or dodge incoming fire; deploy drones to gain an edge; or just go loud with the largest gun you have, shoot everything you see, and hope you can survive. Dynamic lighting system: The engine is built around a sophisticated, realistic lighting system. Lights and darkness are more than just decoration: Destroy light sources to gain the advantage and disorient your foes, use the suit's flashlight to navigate dark spaces for alternate routes, and immerse yourself in the atmosphere of a dark, megacorporate future. Unpredictable challenges and opportunities: Every mission and map is procedurally generated, from objectives and maps down to enemies, traps, and boss encounters. Fight from corporate offices to space stations, in dynamic environments where everything can be blown up, set on fire, or used in creative ways to gain an advantage. No two jobs are the same: one might make you rich fast, the other kill you just as swiftly.  Vast catalog of foes: In the 23rd century it's not just corporate goons with guns. Expect swarms of kamikaze bombs, robot dogs with flamethrower heads, and bosses with vicious abilities. Think on your feet, adjust your tactics, use the environment against them, and learn from each encounter to master Star Ronin's systems.  Deep crafting system: You can buy tons of gear on the market - or put that money towards paying off the family's debt and focus on crafting new weapons, exos, and upgrades. Craft to tailor each family member to your preferred style of gaming. Upgrade armor to make a tank, increase speed to gain an edge, or set up a generous power pool for the powerful, energy-hungry weapons. Multiple playable characters: Digging your family out of corporate debt is not a one-person job. Other family members do their part, each offering a unique playstyle, opportunities, and challenges - further customizable with weapons, armor, helpers, and other upgrades from a massive catalog of gear. Dynamic campaign with impossible choices: Each run is unique, with endless possibilities for working off the family's debt to the megacorp. Yes, the debt must be paid in full. The question is, how far are you willing to go? How low will you sink? How much of you will remain by the time you’ve fulfilled your contract? Customizable experience: Pick from four different difficulty levels, allowing you to focus on the story - or face a true test of your roguelike skills. Want to experiment? Star Ronin features a detailed tutorial and Arena mode to master the mechanics and test out different builds without risking your family's fate.

Detailed Description: Official versionAbout the Game"Esport Godfather" is a management simulation card game that revolves around the theme of MOBA esports. In this game, you will play a role of a coach in an esports club and personally build your own team! Starting from scratch, what kind of playstyle will you devise for your team? In a constantly evolving meta, can you derive a unique understanding of what it takes to win? What style of play will you devise for the team? Trident or 1-carry?Is the main focus on the top lane 1v1 battle, or the ultimate coordination between Mid laner and Jungler? In the ever-changing version environment, can you come up with a unique understanding of victory and lead the team to success? How will you inspire those outstanding athletes you carefully selected and mold them into superstars? And finally, can you overcome countless obstacles, lift the championship trophy, and write your own esports legend?Create your team logo You can not only customize your team's name but also create a unique team logo using the tools provided in the game (you can also import local images). Then you can see the flag with your logo waving on the battlefield, in the community, and in the most liked team vote each month!Build your hero draft The match has already begun before 00:00! Engage in a BP game with your opponents, picking your draft from over 50 heroes. Based on the version and your players' proficiency, choose a lineup that crushes your opponents and makes victory inevitable!CardCommand your players through cards: your jungler is ready to initiate a team fight, send him to the bottom lane to ambush the opponents. Or if the enemy heroes are supporting elsewhere, take advantage and push... Command your players towards victory based on your hand and the situation on the field.Player DevelopmentAs a coach, you need to create training plans for players based on their traits, arrange hero pools reasonably, and build tactic card decks to guide them to become superstars!Version Rules ChangeYou can't be invincible with just one strategy because the version is always changing. Each version change will replace available equipment, alter the pace, and change various aspects of gameplay. Learning the version and adapting is the key to being a perpetual winner!Pre-match and Post-match A highly popular match hasn't started yet, but all enthusiastic viewers have already gathered for lively discussions. After a match, they will cheer for the MVP based on the player's excellent performance! Every week, every month, every season, outstanding players and teams will appear on the leader board and gain their fans! Enjoy your own flowers and applause!Journey of the King Ultimately Leads to... Starting from an unknown semi-professional team, through various leagues, ultimately entering the forefront of the world. But is this the last stop of the conquering journey? Your goal is believed to be the champion of The Worlds!
Short Description: E-sports Godfather is a Deck-building game simulating MOBA e-sports. You will play a role as team coach and build your team. You need to train players and make strategies in various game versions, beat other teams and finally, take the Champion of the World. Be nobody, or lead your team to dominate!

Detailed Description: Experiment with ingredients and discover new ways to make potions, since each potion is the result of specific combinations of elements, what you will need is to mix herbs in the correct way and not necessarily a recipe.Rediscover potions forgotten in time through an old map showing where the knowledge of each forgotten potion is kept.There is a problem, the valley has changed and the map is no longer very reliable, so use the libraries in each town to find information about this forgotten civilization and tales of local mysteries, to reach such places deep in the forest and recover the knowledge lost from them.Use mushrooms, flowers, roots and herbs gathered in the woods to make magic potions.Learn the art of potion making with the cauldron and use the two other tools you will unlock during your adventure, to make increasingly advanced potions.To explore the valley you need to fund your travels, and what better way to get that than to sell the potions you make to potion stores.
Short Description: Creates potions with plants gathered in the woods, discover new ways to make potions and sell those potions to stores

Detailed Description: Spaceflight Simulator 2 is a realistic aerospace simulation game. Building on the heritage of the first game, SFS2 is an immersive and rewarding sandbox for the hardcore spaceflight enthusiast and the casual space fan alike.Rocket science is hard, but it's never been so much fun! As you iterate on your designs and practice your flying skills, you'll learn real-world concepts like staging, orbital mechanics, specific impulse, and more.Key Features Design and build your own rockets, spaceships and more. Fly your vehicles around the Solar System with realistic orbital and aerodynamic physics. 120+ unique parts to build your spacecraft with, from engines and boosters and fuel tanks, to crew capsules and heatshields and space station modules, to landing legs and parachutes and rover wheels. A detailed, beautiful, and fully 3D recreation of our Solar System to explore. Astronauts that can fly your ships, live in your space stations, drive your rovers, perform spacewalks, and plant flags on the alien worlds they visit.
Short Description: Build rockets and fly them around the Solar System in this realistic aerospace sandbox. Attempt landings, build space stations, drive rovers, perform spacewalks, explore alien worlds, and get your crew home safe.

As you iterate on your designs and practice your flying skills, you'll learn real-world concepts like staging, orbital mechanics, specific impulse, and more.Key Features Design and build your own rockets, spaceships and more. Fly your vehicles around the Solar System with realistic orbital and aerodynamic physics. 120+ unique parts to build your spacecraft with, from engines and boosters and fuel tanks, to crew capsules and heatshields and space station modules, to landing legs and parachutes and rover wheels. A detailed, beautiful, and fully 3D recreation of our Solar System to explore. Astronauts that can fly your ships, live in your space stations, drive your rovers, perform spacewalks, and plant flags on the alien worlds they visit.

Detailed Description:
Itsy is a heart tug the length of a bus ride.  A narrative endless climber Inspired by the struggles with & healing from Autism-burnout.  Itsy is a "Micro-A" title, you can play for story (progress autosaves), or endlessly & conquer the leaderboard.   Story can be toggled on and off. Dual leaderboards means you can try to top the scoreboards in distance or Sky-Raisins. Or can you do both?

You ever feel down?  By something that seemed to go on forever?  No end in sight?   That's how the Itsy Bitsy Spider feels, endlessly making his way up the waterspout against all the rain water that washes him away.   When it's the 876,240 time to try again - how does he keep going?   How do YOU keep going?

Features:
- Autosave- Can be toggled on and off.

- 2 Play Modes! -
    --Story Mode-- Play for story!  (Can Autosave and both Dialogue & Visibility Progress!)
                         OR
    --Endless Mode-- Play Classic Endless Mode! (No Autosave, No Dialogue, No Visibility Progression)

- Accessibility -
    -- Red-Green colour blindness mode --
    -- "hold-down-click" instead of "rapid-clicking" when swimming --

- Leaderboards -
    -- Distance Score Board
    -- Sky-Raisin Point Score Board
Short Description: Itsy is a heart tug the length of a bus ride. A narrative climb Inspired by healing from Autism-burnout. Play for story (progress saves), or endlessly & conquer the leaderboard. You ever felt endlessly stuck? So has the Itsy Bitsy Spider. Together, can you both help him out of it?

Detailed Description: Sparedevil is an arcade FPS with the graphic charm of classic '90s bowling alley animations. This single-player skirmish is all about skill, strategy, and speed as you aim to dominate the leaderboard and earn the crown as the Kingpin of Hell’s Alley. Launch into action, strike down the mischievous pins, amplify your score, and chain to gather impressive combos to become the ultimate bowling gladiator.SHOOT TO SCOREEach pin you obliterate racks up points to your scorecard. Send all ten pins in a formation flying and that's a Strike! A pin or two short on your first shot? Follow it up with another roll to take down the stragglers and land a Spare!Rank Up Combos: start out at a lowly “D” then hit those strikes and spares consistently and you’ll rapidly ascend the ranks. “S” rank bowlers will be rewarded with a hefty 5x multiplier on their score but only the fastest will have the tempo to keep it.CHALLENGE THE LEADERBOARDGet competitive and Submit your scorecard to the Global leaderboard and face off against other bowlers of Hell’s Alley worldwide. Watch your name fly up the ranks as you best your previous score with your new found skills.Or perhaps some friendly competition on the Friends leaderboard. Challenge your friends and rivals top score and claim the throne of the KingPin!USE STRIKES TO UNLEASH POWERFUL ATTACKSDemonstrate your mastery by utilizing 4 powerful ball powers! No one likes a gently rolled ball, fully charge and release at the perfect moment for maximum pin smashing satisfaction! More of a fly guy? Leap into the air and slam a fully charged plate of ball-splosion onto unsuspecting adversaries! and for the more precise ballers among you aim upwards and throw your ball to dispatch air borne targets.FACE A MISCHIEF OF PINSPut your balls on the line against a roster of 8 uniquely villainous pins! Each designed with individual behaviors and abilities with their soul purpose bent on ruining your score! Some of the fiends you will be facing include...Flying rocket pins that will chase you down!Mortar pins that will relentlessly barrage your location!Joker pins that when struck down destroy your precious combos!With many more to discover as you climb the leaderboard!

Detailed Description: WISHLIST THE FULL GAMEAbout the GameIs this just the beginning or the end? The boundary blurs and the tale unfolds like an old map, its edges worn by time. But what is happening? The question echoes through the caverns of forgotten lore.In the basement’s darkness, where cobwebs cling to to wooden beams like the memory of a lost loved one, dreams and truths entwine. The world lies far, far away — its secrets veiled. What has happened to it? Or perhaps, what would have happened? This dream, a fragile tapestry, unravels against the cosmic loom of life.All is weirdThe Master’s will, an iron decree, governs the broken kingdom of Gnomes.A dark mission, veiled in shadows, beckons only in the Prologue’s hallowed pages. The ink smells of ancient forests, and the parchment cradles forgotten oaths. See what the Kingdom will become, should you falter. The Gnomes’ destiny rests upon your trembling hands — their hopes, sorrows, their whispered lullabies. And there, amidst the gnarled roots, a voice in your head murmurs cryptic riddles. Is it memory or prophecy? Listen closely.Escape from the nightmare, dear wanderer. Traverse the labyrinth of ink, blood, and imagination. Finish the prologue, and perhaps — just perhaps — you’ll glimpse something else: a door ajar, a glimmer of forgotten magic, a path diverging into the unknown.
Short Description: The Prologue of the Union of Gnomes awaits your daring and brave gaze. Twisted and broken, it stands — a reflection of what was never meant to be. The threads of destiny fray, and reality splinters like a shattered mirror.

Detailed Description: Unveiling the Unknown is a visual novel adaptation of mdf-an's fan-dubbed work "Futanari-Sama and Her Maids", where you play the titular 'Futanari-Sama'. You recently moved into a manor, and it's full of maids ready to cater to your every need with plenty of sexual content! But the maids are also serving your unlikable twin brother... Can you steal his harem from under his nose? The daily loop consists of choosing to spend your morning getting to know one of the characters in the manor, with frequent sexual fun. During the night, you can go dungeon diving to collect a variety of resources to level the maids and upgrade the manor. 52+ Sex Scenes and 100+ Sex CG with a variety of girls and kinks. 5 Maids, a Nun, and one very sassy Demon Queen to conquer! All the girls have their own unique stories and developments. 11 more ladies waiting to be discovered around the world. Play as a futanari, femboy, intersex or transgender protagonist. 100+ Upgrades for the Turn-Based Dungeon Crawling game. 15+ Hours of Playtime. Easy to replay any sex scene or event, and a comprehensive cheat menu. Art by mdf-an and TwistedScarlett60Meet the Maids:Seraphina - The Head Maid:Diligent and loyal maid to a fault. When asked to perform a sexual service, she would do so without question. She loves service, cock worship and desires nothing more than to have a loving family.Mirabelle - The Grand Paladin:Timid and shy maid. She struggles to reach out to others and make friends, but together, you can help her open up. She has taken a vow of chasity, but I have a feeling it won't last long.Hazel - The Crimson WitchBrazen and confident, Hazel knows what she wants and how to get it. Odds are, she'll be seducing you, not the other way around.Emi - The NinjaThe ninja from a faraway land turned maid. She has an obsession with the legendary hero... How can we win her over and cuck the hero?Ophelia - The DragoonThe tsundere maid that's hiding more than a few secrets. It might take her a little longer to open up than the others, but you might get more than you bargained for!Beatrice - The NunA new addition to the manor... Just what might happen if you push the buttons of a sexually suppressed celibate?
Short Description: Welcome to Balethorn Manor, where five maids are waiting to serve your every need and desire. By the day, talk to your maids, fall in love, and make love. By night, dive into an expansive dungeon system and collect untold riches to level your maids and upgrade the manor!

Detailed Description: In the game “Sparky: Hills of Death” recently deVeloped by Hito Corporation, players are Immersed in a dark universe designed by Sam Wills. The protagonist Sparky, Comes to life in a sinisTer way transcending the bOundaries between Reality and the game.Zac a virtual security expert, finds himself immersed in this nightmare, while Marina his girlfriend, observes peculiar events in the real world related to the game.The distinction between the virtual and the real disappears, leading players to a startling experience in which they must unravel enigmas, confront their fears and uncover the mysteries hidden in the Hills of Death. The horror tangibly materializes in 2024. Control the Character with the WASD keys on your keyboard and using the Mouse to move the camera, you must escape the location while there are enemies behind you, as the game progresses, look for items to survive, such as flashlights with batteries, places to stay hidden and much more!CHAPTER 1 - Virus awakenedIn this first part of the story, Zac tests a mysterious game developed by Hito Corporation. The game, apparently defective, is gradually taken over by a virus that corrupts the entire system! Sparky the monster escapes his digital prison once again. Zac then finds himself trapped in illusions controlled by Sparky and must find a way to escape this dark trap! Explore the offices where Spaky rulesRun to survive Use scene items to defend yourself or hide  Sparky is waiting for you...
Short Description: Hito Corporation immerses players in a dark universe where the monster, Sparky, comes to life in a sinister way, blurring the boundaries between reality and game. While cyber security expert Zac and his girlfriend Marina face strange events both in the game and in real life.

Detailed Description:
Join me on this little exploration of the Barroso family's house. The story goes that the family disappeared without any explanation. Apparently, very few people dare to investigate. Will you join me?
Venture into the exploration of the Barroso family's house, find clues about what happened to them (if you can). Don't be afraid, nothing will happen to you.

Exploraciòn: Casa Barroso" is an investigation and puzzle game with psychological horror, inspired by typical explorations of abandoned places and the mysteries they may hold. Each advancement and mystery will aid in the final investigation.

Detailed Description: Tankbot Battle is a fast paced top-down-shooter, featuring procedurally generated levels, fun enemies, and engaging combat! Inspired by old flash games, Tankbot Battle aims to provide a modern twist on the genre, with an extra dose of explosions and chaos!FeaturesExiting combatEngage in fast paced combat with enemy tanks! Procedurally generated levelsExplore randomly generating levels; no two playthroughs will be the same!Chaotic upgrades and abilitiesAt the end of each level, pick between one of 3 different upgrades! Build epic combinations and synergies to become unstoppable!Stylized graphicsCartoony and clean graphics reminiscent of old flash games!Awesome BossesFight against 4 different bosses with fun and unique attack patterns! 3 unique weapons to masterEach weapon has its own use case, and knowing the right time to switch between them is key to victory! Fun enemiesStay agile and avoid the onslaught of enemy attacks! Dodge explosive missiles, avoid snipers, and destroy enemies with explosive barrels!

Detailed Description: Join Sofia on her exciting journey into engineering!3 Girls in Tech is a Metroidvania-style puzzle-platformer where you will have to help three of the world's most renowned female engineers: Ada Lovelace, Katherine Johnson and Angela Ruiz Robles. Play as Sophia, a brave 11-year-old girl visiting the Center for Women Engineers, and help her through challenging puzzles and platforming on her way!Complete the most incredible inventionsAs you move through the levels, you'll be able to pick up and drop items. But be careful! You'll only be able to take two, so choose wisely. You'll have to activate levels and jump platforms to access new areas and rooms, and you'll also have to do so while dodging dangerous areas and surveillance cameras.As you complete the levels, you will help the three engineers Ada, Katherine and Angela to build their inventions. But it won't be easy, as Sofia will find all kinds of obstacles in her way, and you'll have to help her overcome them to fulfill her dreams!Women Engineers in PowerIn 3 Girls in Tech, in addition to celebrating a passion for engineering, you can also celebrate diversity in STEM - contribute to a brighter and more equitable future in technology and engineering! As you help Sofia on her challenging adventure, you can discover the fascinating lives and achievements of pioneering women in STEM. With 3 Girls in Tech, we want to inspire the next generation of women to follow their dreams in the field of engineering, reminding them that there are no limits to what they can achieve.
Short Description: Enjoy a metroidvania puzzle-platformer in which you will have to solve puzzles, cross platform areas and help the engineers Ada, Katherine and Angela to build their inventions.

Detailed Description: The middle of the 23rd Century. A space probe detects unusual energy readings from the asteroid 2060 Chiron. A crewed follow-up mission detects a million-year-old artefact buried beneath the asteroid's surface. A ring of exotic matter that bends space and gravity. A Gate, which when activated could lead anywhere in the galaxy...EXPLORE BEYOND THE GATEBeyond the Chiron Gate is a text-based space exploration roguelike. Explore an endless universe filled with exotic planets, strange life forms, and ancient civilisations. Manage a crew of space explorers and upgrade their ship with new technology. Brave dangerous worlds to gather the data you need to reach the home system of the mysterious Gatebuilders.FEATURESRandomly-generated universe where no two games are the same.Over a hundred random events including perils on strange worlds, encounters with life and civilisations, and your explorers' emotional journeys.Multi-layered exploration where discoveries reveal more things to explore.Dozens of ship upgrades including scanners, defences, crew capacity increases, and new abilities.Six explorer classes that unlock new options in events. Explorers level up, can be injured or die, and can become inspired or depressed.Death is permanent. Take too many risks and the mission is over - start again in a new universe.Post-victory endless mode.Over an hour of atmospheric space music.FROM THE CREATOR OF SEEDSHIPBeyond the Chiron Gate is the spiritual successor to the viral hit web/mobile game Seedship. Go beyond the Seedship's mission and explore a larger, more detailed universe.

Detailed Description: Your village has struck gold, but riches attract danger.The creatures of the forest have caught wind of your fortune, and their greed knows no bounds. Now, it's up to you to protect what's yours or be overrun by the relentless hordes.KEY FEATURESCHOOSE YOUR CLASSEach class comes with its own strengths and weaknesses, offering a unique approach to defending your village.CREATE A MAZEPlace towers and buildings wherever you like to shape the battlefield and guide enemies into your defenses.STRATEGIZEIt's not just about defending—managing your economy is key. Balance mining for gold, upgrading technology, and building defenses to survive the onslaught.SHOOT THEM YOURSELFTake matters into your own hands! Jump into any tower and personally take aim at the incoming enemies.
Short Description: Strategic 3D tower defense where you shape the battlefield and economy. Freely place towers to create evolving mazes. Invest in technology and economy to strengthen your defenses against escalating threats. Inspired by classic RTS games, this TD combines strategic depth with dynamic tower placement.

Detailed Description: Prepare to unravel the mysteries of The Anomaly Project!  CAN YOU AND YOUR TEAM FIGURE OUT WHATS OUT OF THE ORDINARY?In The Anomaly Project you and co-players have to try and escape by noticing Anomalies and making the decision to go in either the Red tube or the Green tube. If you have decided correctly you progress to the next level. Otherwise you are reset to the first level. Will you ever escape...?  1-8 player online co-opExplore a multiplayer experience with up to 8 players. Communicate and help each other through text chat or proximity voice chat Get to the exit Navigating through the levels, some more mysterious than others, you'll encounter anomalies that defy logic and reason. Keep your senses sharp as you search for hidden clues and spot anomalies to get closer towards escaping at Level 10 1-8 player online co-op Replayability Socialize with friends or strangers Chat & Voicechat Immerse yourself in a liminal space atmospheres Puzzles Get frightened, jumpscares Finding anomalies 3 Maps and one added each monthEXPLORE MULTIPLE MAPS, WITH EACH THEIR OWN THEMES AND CHALLENGING ANOMALIESSOME ANOMALIES ARE CRAZIER THAN OTHERS... OH YEAH, BE CAREFULL OF JUMPSCARESMAKE THE CORRECT CHOICES BY GOING EITHER IN THE RED OR GREEN PIPEEXPERIENCE THE CRAZINESS OF OUR NEW MAP 'STAIRS'GET A GOOD FRIGHT WITH YOUR FRIENDS, WITH THE NEW DARK MODEPrepare to unravel the mysteries of The Anomaly Project. Can you escape, or will you become lost forever? It's up to you, but remember, not everything is as it seems...

Detailed Description: Overview:Step into "The Cursed Land," an immersive MMORPG where epic battles meet enchanting lore. Choose from five distinct classes—Warrior, Assassin, Hunter, Shaman, and Wizard—and carve your path through a mystical world brimming with ancient secrets and formidable foes. Each choice you make influences your journey across diverse and dynamic environments.Key Features:Varied Classes: Experience unique gameplay with five classes, each offering specific skills and customization options:Warrior: Master of melee combat, excelling in strength and resilience.Assassin: Stealthy and deadly, perfect for high-damage sneak attacks.Hunter: Expert in long-range combat, specializing in precision and agility.Shaman: Adept in support, crucial for team survival.Wizard: Powerful in spellcasting, manipulating elements to devastate enemies or protect allies.Expansive Open World: Venture into a vast world, from dark dungeons to sprawling cities, each filled with quests, enemies, and treasures.Strategic Combat: Engage in intense tactical battles that require quick thinking and smart cooperation.Deep Storytelling: Navigate a complex narrative where your decisions shape the world and affect the characters within it.Community and Collaboration: Join or create guilds, participate in massive PvP clashes, and experience community-driven events.Frequent Updates: Regular content updates ensure there is always a new challenge awaiting.Design:Utilize this section to display gameplay images and animated gifs that emphasize critical mechanics of each class. Focus on action scenes that demonstrate the unique abilities of the Warrior's combat, the stealth attacks of the Assassin, the precise shots of the Hunter, the magical support of the Shaman, and the elemental powers of the Wizard.Localization:"The Cursed Land" is reaching out to a global audience with support for the following languages: German (Deutsch), English, Spanish (Español), French (Français), Italian (Italiano), Polish (Polski), Portuguese (Português), Romanian (Română), and Turkish (Türkçe). More languages are on the horizon as we continue to expand and embrace our diverse community of players.

Detailed Description: Sausage Legend is a 3D physics-based fighting game where over 3 million players have clashed their sausages in battle.The PC version has significantly enhanced graphics and a more immersive world. Enjoy this crazy world with 3D cutscenes.As a medieval prisoner, you will fight for your life in the "Sausage Duel," a pastime of the nobility.To gain your freedom, you must emerge victorious in this insane duel.Play 2v2 mode with your friendsGame FeaturesPhysics-based Sausage Battles: Experience realistic physics as you engage in sausage combat.Over 50 Types of Sausages: Includes a variety of other food items, each with unique characteristics.Captivating 3D Cutscenes: Immerse yourself in the game's eccentric world.Strategic Deck Building: Build a deck with three sausages and plan your strategy.Friend and Online Battles: Challenge your friends or compete against players worldwide.

Little does she know, her homecoming takes an unexpected turn when the mayor confronts her with an outrageous debt that must be paid.To progress in the game, Akemi must find a way to pay off her debt, leading her to take up part-time jobs. Detailed Description: Take command of a squad of mercenaries to defeat monstrous foes in this thrilling Steam game. Begin your adventure with a small team, facing off against waves of increasingly challenging monsters. Strategically deploy your mercenaries in battle to exploit enemy weaknesses and turn the tide in your favor. As you progress, earn resources to upgrade and expand your team into an unstoppable force. Spanning five diverse stages, each with unique environments and deadly creatures, your tactical skills will be put to the test. Survive the relentless onslaught and emerge victorious, proving your prowess in managing and upgrading a powerful mercenary army.

Detailed Description: In a post-apocalyptic world overrun by monsters due to an unknown virus, some people have managed to survive. During these times, an organization formed by elite members of society emerged, fighting against the monsters and aiming to restore the world to its original state. However, this organization is not as benevolent as it seems and employs any means necessary to achieve its goals. For instance, they send ordinary people into monster habitats to retrieve valuable items. If these individuals fail to do so within the allotted time, they are killed.Limbo Inc was founded by influential leaders who, under the guise of restoring order and humanity, assert their power through ruthless methods and the exploitation of survivors. At the heart of the organization is a hidden cult that believes in extracting a mysterious power from the monsters, potentially even curing the infection using this power.Your goal is to survive by any means necessary!A New ExperienceThe game offers a high level of realism, utilizing a minimalist user interface and a dark atmosphere to create a unique sense of immersion.Cooperative PlayNavigate abandoned spaces with a team of up to four people. Be cautious: your partners can end up in remote corners of the map, and it's up to each of you to find a way to safety.Unique LevelsExplore unique levels, with a promise of regular content updates. Each level offers new escape routes and its own unique dangers.DangerBeware: you will be the leader against one of several unique enemies.

Detailed Description: Explore endless mazes, unlock mysterious treasures!"Maze Endless" is a challenging adventure casual game that tests your wit and luck. In this endless maze journey, players will experience an unprecedented adventure. Starting from the simplest maze, gradually challenge more complex levels, unravel their mysteries, and find the exit.Features:1. Endless maze challenges: The mazes generated by advanced algorithms ensure that every game is a brand new experience. From simple starting points to complex structures, challenge your intelligence and patience.2. Mysterious treasures: Starting from the sixth level, players will have the chance to discover mysterious treasure chests in the maze. Unlock the chests to obtain various auxiliary props to help you pass through the levels more easily.3. Clean visual effects: The game adopts exquisite pixel art style, combined with dynamic lighting effects, creating a unique and charming maze world.Upcoming features:1. Leaderboard function: Compete with other players and vie for the highest score!2. More items and rewards: In addition to the items in the chests, we will introduce more rewards and items to enrich your adventure experience.Explore the unknown, unlock treasures, and become a true maze explorer!

Detailed Description:
Hello, I hope you enjoy the game... First of all, the game is in Pegi 7 category. In the game, some zombies are not easy to kill, and each weapon has its own unique characteristics. Game has also a leaderboard that you can show your zombie killing skills worldwide. To list the features in general; You can add any picture you want (as a portrait, if possible) to a zombie in the game. You can do this from the Options menu. I thought this would be a fun feature. By the way, responsibility for snapshots resulting from uploading inappropriate images and improper use of them in the electronic environment belongs to the user. Some of the voice acting has also been tweaked to be entertaining. You can find zombies with a radar also. You have basically two types of weapon, one is an automatic assault rifle, and the other one is a gun. Rifle has a wide range however gun is more accurate. You can control the character with the right, left, forward and back keys. You can change your perspective and shoot with the mouse. As you get points, zombies get faster and sometimes they can appear behind you off the radar! Meanwhile, sometimes you may hear sounds, you can ignore them, but sometimes they may actually belong to a zombie coming behind you.
Since this is the first version, I kindly request that you not be too harsh in your criticism :) I tried to create it on my own with limited resources available to me. I have started gathering requests for the second version. I greatly need your valuable support...  I hope you like it.  Thank you very, very much. Barış Alagöz

Note: even if the voices resemble the voices of some celebrities, none of the voices used in the game are their actual voices
Short Description: Zombie Survival FPS Game
About the Game:
Hello, I hope you enjoy the game... First of all, the game is in Pegi 7 category. In the game, some zombies are not easy to kill, and each weapon has its own unique characteristics. Game has also a leaderboard that you can show your zombie killing skills worldwide. To list the features in general; You can add any picture you want (as a portrait, if possible) to a zombie in the game. You can do this from the Options menu. I thought this would be a fun feature. By the way, responsibility for snapshots resulting from uploading inappropriate images and improper use of them in the electronic environment belongs to the user. Some of the voice acting has also been tweaked to be entertaining. You can find zombies with a radar also. You have basically two types of weapon, one is an automatic assault rifle, and the other one is a gun. Rifle has a wide range however gun is more accurate. You can control the character with the right, left, forward and back keys. You can change your perspective and shoot with the mouse. As you get points, zombies get faster and sometimes they can appear behind you off the radar! Meanwhile, sometimes you may hear sounds, you can ignore them, but sometimes they may actually belong to a zombie coming behind you.
Since this is the first version, I kindly request that you not be too harsh in your criticism :) I tried to create it on my own with limited resources available to me. I have started gathering requests for the second version. I greatly need your valuable support...  I hope you like it.  Thank you very, very much. Barış Alagöz

Note: even if the voices resemble the voices of some celebrities, none of the voices used in the game are their actual voices

Detailed Description:
Game Description:
3D vertical plate fixed perspective of the casual game, easy to operate.Eat small fish to accumulate points and continue to grow, pay attention to avoid red things!

How it works:
Move: A/D
Suspension: ESC
Toggle Full Screen/Window: F11

Conditions for clearing the game:
1. Eat the whale after reaching 500 points.

Game End Conditions:
1. Collision: Pufferfish/Inkjet Octopus/Shark/Torpedo.
2. Close the game.

PS: There is only one level, you can't save your progress, happy game!

Detailed Description: The Night Games Collection invites you to experience a series of short, mystery-filled games set during the dark hours of the night. Each game unravels the secrets behind seemingly ordinary tasks, from isolated hotels to quiet doner shops. Players will uncover dark truths and face eerie events as they navigate through environments where every choice shapes the story’s outcome. Step into the shadows of the night and discover what lies beneath the surface.Engaging Stories: Each game offers multiple endings shaped by your decisions.Tension and Mystery: Uncover strange events hidden behind ordinary night shifts.Short and Intense: Perfect for quick, thrilling experiences.Multiple Endings: Encourages replayability with distinct story paths.This collection is perfect for players who enjoy suspenseful night-time adventures.Feel free to let me know if you’d like to adjust or add anything!

Detailed Description: PLEASESynopsis:In a secret facility located deep within a remote island, scientists experiment with a rare substance capable of manipulating the boundaries of space and time: dark matter. The goal is to create revolutionary technological advancements, but the tests begin to produce anomalies, such as the appearance of prehistoric flora and the disappearance of objects, revealing the unpredictable dangers of time manipulation.The team leader is a physicist who lost everything he loved when his wife and daughter died in a tragic accident. He sees time manipulation as an opportunity to correct the past and bring his family back. However, when he uses the technology for his own purposes, the experiment fails, and the temporal continuum ruptures, transporting him to a distorted world where time is unstable, and prehistoric predators roam freely.Now, with the timeline on the brink of collapse, the scientist must face his choices and the monstrous creatures lurking around, while desperately seeking a way to restore the balance of the universe — and his own redemption.Features:Realistic and optimized graphics for full immersion.First-person action for an engaging experience.Discreet HUD to maintain total immersion.Enemies with intelligent AI.Microphone detection.Jumpscares.______________________________________________________________________This game was developed by one person. If you wish to participate in the development or support the developer, you can find everything on Discord. Thank you!

Detailed Description: Welcome to Undercover Animals!Are you ready to dive into a party game filled with strategy and suspense? In Undercover Animals, you will take on the role of a mysterious animal, hiding among other players. Through clever communication and precise judgment, you’ll uncover the identities of your opponents and achieve your unique objectives. Whether you excel at deception, deduction, or teamwork, this game promises thrilling showdowns and endless fun.Game FeaturesUp to 12 Players: Supports 5 to 12 players, offering endless fun for both small gatherings and large parties.Survival in the Shrinking Zone: As the game progresses, the map’s shrinking zone will force players into increasingly confined spaces for a life-and-death struggle. You must adapt quickly, keep moving, and find the perfect moment to strike down your enemies.Keyword Mechanism: Each game randomly selects a keyword type. The keyword type consists of related and unique words. Players need to cleverly describe these words to convey information, identify teammates, and defeat opponents without revealing their identities. The choice of keyword types and words ensures that every game is full of variety and challenge.Factions and Victory Goals: In the game, players are divided into multiple opposing factions. Each faction’s goal is to work together to defeat other factions. Players need to identify their teammates by acquiring the same keyword and work with them to fight against their enemies. In addition to these opposing factions, there are also Neutral players who do not belong to any fixed faction and aim to be the last survivor. Whether you are a member of a faction or a Neutral player, clever strategies and accurate judgment are key to winning the game.Diverse Gameplay Rules: Besides the default faction-based rules, you can choose from several rule sets such as All Neutral or All Unique Keywords, ensuring that each game offers a fresh experience.Varied Map Selection: Explore a variety of environments, from dense forests to mysterious swamps. Each map offers different challenges and strategies.Customizable Game Options: Freely adjust game settings, including team configurations, keyword types, and gameplay rule weights, allowing every game to suit your and your friends’ preferences.A Blend of Social Deduction and Survival StrategyUndercover Animals is more than just a survival game—it’s a test of social deduction. Players must use subtle descriptions, sharp judgment, and timely betrayals to hide their true identities while uncovering others' intentions. Each game presents a new challenge, with different opponents and keywords. Experience dynamic strategy battles with friends and see if you can successfully achieve your goals and emerge as the ultimate winner.Create Your Unique ExperienceWhether you’re new to social deduction games or looking to test your survival skills, Undercover Animals offers a one-of-a-kind experience. With customizable keywords and game settings, you can create a gameplay style that’s uniquely yours. Every match is an exciting journey filled with the unknown and the unexpected.Join Undercover Animals and discover your path to victory in this battle of wits and strategy!
Short Description: This is a party game where each player has a secret identity. Use descriptions to hide your team and guess others' identities. As the danger zone shrinks, collect items, defeat enemies, and avoid harming teammates! Neutral players aim to eliminate everyone. Use strategy to win!

Detailed Description: Gorilla Adventure welcomes players to a journey in the world of current science that will challenge their ultimate endurance. Ready? Because you are about to embark on a stunning and difficult adventure in the promising world of modern science. At the same time, this engaging platform game will also test players' tactical navigation abilities.In Gorilla Adventure, players will be accompanied by the strong and determined Gorilla. Unfortunately, your character's movements are limited by an iron box that cannot be removed. This poses a great challenge but also an opportunity to express your primal instincts. Your goal is to guide a gorilla to climb massive and complex structures with... a hammer. Using your skillful control and the power of your hammer, you will need to overcome all challenges to progress further in this journey.With sophisticated graphics down to every detail, Gorilla Adventure will surely captivate any player. Each step will immerse you in an unparalleled thrill of adventure, presenting a dramatic new challenge.Regardless of the severity of the challenge, your efforts will yield rewards. And with Gorilla's support and patience, you will overcome all difficulties and find the ultimate mystery of this cutting-edge city!
Short Description: Climb, slip, and soar through the neon-drenched cityscape in Gorilla Adventure! Unleash your inner ape and enjoy the freedom of parkour with primal instincts!

Detailed Description: You're Stephen (the Male Protagonist's default name), head of the private security firm Dragonspire Security Force (The DSF). It is set in a Dark modern world with a massive surprise to Fantasy, including Corruption, Death, Tough Choices, and entire Character Progression while the shape of the world around you changes based on your choices and actions.Full progress tracking via the phone in-game (accessible anytime where no choices are required.) Vault unlockables (Images, videos, new and replay scenes.)Profiles of important people with Relationship Points (RP), Affinity, and Corruption percent, and filled with information you know about them along with key moments you've done. There are a lot of sex scenes to experience, and it often may lead to many partners at once if you prefer to share them. Do you fight or succumb to it? Choices matter, and so does your alignment. Are you someone people can trust or just another tyrant? Do you care for those you meet or change them?We start off looking like an average city, doing average things... You start to discover the world for what it truly is... Full of mystery, mythology, creatures, powers, abilities...The romance you will experience along the way will be rewarding and have an in-depth storyline. It is up to you if you settle down or check all your options. There are a lot of women in Dragonspire. Some you've known your entire life, some you just met, even some you should never meet. Not everyone will be willing to settle down for a relationship. Make sure you're making the right choices you desire.

Detailed Description: Horrible Dream is a psychological thriller from the first person. After walking through the dark alleys of an abandoned city, the main character feels that forgotten horrors are beginning to awaken from the depths. While exploring abandoned buildings, he unexpectedly encounters unexplained events and strange phenomena that make him wonder about the nature of reality. In this world of mysterious past and unexplored mysteries, the main character finds himself caught up in a whirlwind of events that go beyond his understanding. His search for the truth leads to the discovery of amazing facts, but also causes incomprehensible reactions from others. It soon becomes obvious that there is something unimaginable lurking around every corner of the city, and the main character realizes that his life will change forever after this journey in a world of riddles and mysteries
Short Description: You find yourself in an abandoned military town, from which all its inhabitants have disappeared due to unexplained circumstances. You will need to find out what happened, but unexplained phenomena will occur during the investigation. This journey will change the main character forever.
