Detailed Description: In Echoes Afterfall, you take on the role of a Reclaimer, venturing into the Echoes—mysterious and perilous zones that emerged after the fall of civilization. Your mission is to recover resources and relics crucial for society’s rebirth. Each foray offers random loot opportunities and unexpected dangers, and you must return to the outpost to sell what you find. Failure to meet the requested quota results in reassessment by the Governor’s regime.Your bunker serves as your operational headquarters, a hub where you can manage your resources and prepare for upcoming expeditions. Use the loot you gather to unlock upgrades and purchase better equipment, customizing your bunker to support your missions more effectively.Echoes Afterfall is a cooperative horror survival game where you team up with up to three other players. Share resources, strategize your expeditions, and manage the unpredictable dangers that lie ahead. Effective teamwork, resource management, and maintaining your sanity are key to completing your missions and progressing in this harsh new world.In the Echoes, you’ll encounter diverse enemies and challenges. Navigate procedurally generated dungeons to find treasures, uncover secrets, and manage your sanity as you delve deeper into these twisted zones. Your success hinges on balancing risk and reward, collecting loot, and returning to the bunker before it runs out of energy.Are you ready to take the plunge into the Echoes? Equip yourself, loot, sell, survive.Serve the Governor’s vision, ensure your survival, and help reshape this broken world.
Short Description: Team up in a chilling co-op experience, delving into procedurally generated backroom style buildings. Survive together or succumb into the Echoes.

Detailed Description: Welcome to Cabin Crew Life Simulator, the pioneering flight attendant simulator by SOGA Std. Dive into the glamorous world of aviation and kickstart your career by ensuring passenger satisfaction and safety. Navigate through exciting tasks on each flight, from serving gourmet meals to managing in-flight emergencies, providing an unparalleled passenger experience. Role-playing as a beautiful flight attendant, you need to perform the duties of a professional cabin crew member, serving a variety of passengers from cheap airlines to five-star airlines. FEATURES  Flight management:As a cabin crew member, you will be responsible for ensuring the safety and satisfaction of passengers throughout the flight. Remember to keep the cabin clean and serve food and drinks to all passengers. Emergency situations: Handling emergency situations such as providing first aid to sick passengers, dealing with fires or explosions, or situations requiring emergency evacuation. Engaging gameplay: Watch as passengers embark on your plane, tucking away their luggage for the journey ahead. Once everyone's settled, take the helm at your aircraft's control panel, located at the forefront of the cabin, where you can survey your upcoming tasks.  Earn and Upgrade: Use your money or tip after each flight to purchase uniforms, beauty care cosmetics. It will help you increase attractiveness to the tycoons. You can also sell additional items on the flight to earn a living. Advancing in your career: The more flights you perform, the more experience you gain. When you reach a high level, you can recruit and train other flight attendants. Team up with them or remove them from the team if they do not meet the requirements.  Getting Started is Easy!: Don't forget to wear your uniform, receive the flight information on your tablet, navigate through security to your gate, tidy up the cabin before boarding passengers onto the aircraft, and prepare for takeoff!Your Objective? Perform your duties well on every flight, resist the temptations of money, become the world's number one flight attendant.Embark on your flight attendant journey today and soar to new heights with Cabin Crew Life Simulator on Steam!

Detailed Description: Wanna try before you buy?About the GameSomeone has taken Caleb's (The Protagonist's) girl. Help him reach the abductor's house and save her. But remember, everything is not as it seems.In this platformer, you need to Run, Jump and Dash to navigate through the levels while avoiding enemies and bosses.Be wary of your lives as if you lose them all, you need to start your run again. It's not as easy as it looks.Start this adventure and collect some news excerpts on the way to learn more about Caleb's story.NOTE : THE GAME HAS PERMA-DEATH. IF YOU LOOSE ALL YOUR LIVES, YOUR PROGRESS IS LOST AND YOU START AGAIN.
Short Description: NOT AS EASY AS IT LOOKS!!! Help Caleb get his girl back. To save her, Caleb needs to brave various locations. Run, Jump and Dash to avoid different type of enemies and make it to your destination.
About the Game:
Someone has taken Caleb's (The Protagonist's) girl. Help him reach the abductor's house and save her. But remember, everything is not as it seems.

In this platformer, you need to Run, Jump and Dash to navigate through the levels while avoiding enemies and bosses.
Be wary of your lives as if you lose them all, you need to start your run again. It's not as easy as it looks.

Start this adventure and collect some news excerpts on the way to learn more about Caleb's story.

NOTE : THE GAME HAS PERMA-DEATH. IF YOU LOOSE ALL YOUR LIVES, YOUR PROGRESS IS LOST AND YOU START AGAIN.

Detailed Description: About This GameFaint Call is a psychological horror game about a police officer investigating a distress call from someone at a notoriously cursed house.StoryIn 2010, a family moved into a suburban house. Their joy turned to terror on the first night when they were brutally murdered by an unknown assailant. The police investigated, but each victim was found hanging in the bathroom with a mysterious symbol carved into their chests. Frustrated, the police closed the case, declaring the house off-limits. Years later, a daring vlogger heard of the cursed house. Seeking content, he decided to stay there. As he did, strange occurrences unfolded, revealing the house’s dark secrets.Key FeatureVHS gameplay styleVHS style gameplay, with graphics that look like they were recorded on an old cassette tape. The typical VHS visual effects, such as noise, glitches, and dull colors, will provide a unique and terrifying experience.Mechanic gameplayOffers challenging and diverse gameplay mechanics. Players must solve puzzles, collect objects, and avoid the dangers in every corner, walking in circle.immersive sound designSound effects that suit the situation, such as the rumble of lightning, the swish of a door, and the sound of different footsteps depending on the surface being travelled on.Made with Unreal Engine 5Use UE5 features, such as Nanite for high-quality geometry and Lumen for realistic global illumination, to deliver a visually stunning experience.Game genre: Horror, Walking simulator.Average time to complete the game: 40 - 60 min

Detailed Description: Trapped in the Great Abyss!You are an old dreamer who, through unforeseen circumstances, has found himself trapped in the Great Abyss, the vast underworld beneath the Dreamlands.  Use the resources at your disposal, weapons, armor, supplies, and any alliances you have with the locals, to explore and learn the secrets of the underworld, in order to make your way back to the upper Dreamlands, or back to the Waking World.  DEMO The current demo is a kind of Early Access version of the game with limited gameplay.  Not all the dungeons are available in the demo, and your character will not be able to progress beyond the third level.  However, the current plan is to allow games that started with the demo to be smoothly transitioned into the full game once it is ready. Old School CRPGCyclopean follows the tradition of early CRPGs like Ultima, Questron, and Legacy of the Ancients (among others) in that it presents two differing views of the game world.  Outside of dungeons, you see your character from the top down in a 2D display of the map.  Whereas, in dungeons, the view changes to a 3D, first person perspective.  Choose Your Dreamer CarefullyWhen you start the game you will be presented with a random dreamer, with basic abilities and equipment, and any alliances they have.  You can choose to play as that person, or "reroll" to see if you can find a better option.  Cyclopean gives you the freedom to choose from a wide variety of stodgy sounding English and/or American upper class gentlemen to play as. Turn Based Gameplay The gameplay and combat is all turn based, allowing you to make strategic decisions. Enemies are dangerous, but polite, and will wait their turn. AlliancesSome characters will start the game with an alliance in place.  This can be very helpful in the early stages, especially for new players.  Alliances allow you to have some of the various denizens of the Great Abyss join your party, and help to fight other enemies.   New alliances can be formed during the game by finding and reading the right books. Game Manual There are many other game mechanics and other things that are described in the game manual.  The manual has been fully integrated with the game, so you can bring it up at any time, to learn about the various game mechanics available.  Use the options menu to change game settings including the color...

Detailed Description:
Whatnever is an interactive comic about perseverance and acceptance, about our normal world and the mystical forest, about souls of different natures and their intentions. But most importantly, it’s about the path you take.

A lost creature finds themselves in a mysterious place with no memories of their life. To escape this predicament, a creature must navigate through an unfriendly forest. But this will only be possible if you help the creature to discover the secret of this place and its inhabitants. Good luck and remember: every secret has its keeper.
Short Description: An interactive comic about depression, creativity, a Deer mask and eyes-guys.

Detailed Description: AwardsAbout the GameBlink and Die is a musical bullet hell with arcade aesthetics, in first-person, where you must move 360 degrees to dodge bars that moves to the song's rhythm and comes from all angles. Get to know the world of Blinky, an AI that will do everything possible to ensure you have fun. Unlock and choose levels in an arcade environment. Each level has its own visual and musical style; Blinky will dress up for each occasion to watch you.10 Levels with Original Aesthetics and Music: Each level has its own personality as well as its own Blinky. From Matrix-style hacker cities to neon cyberspaces.Soundtrack: The tracks of Blink and Die will resonate in your mind for a long time. Mixing synthesizers and dance music, rock, metal, and orchestrations.Simple Controls: Use your mouse. You will need to refine your precision and reflexes.3 Difficulties: Relax, Move or Lose, Blink and Die.Interactive Levels: Each level follows the song aesthethic, both in its visuals and in the difficulty of the bars you must dodge, which will become more challenging based on the emotion of the track.

Game Name: Lukewarm Massacre: The Spirit of Light
Detailed Description: A killer (who may or may not be a moron) has kidnapped Ceün, a spirit of light! Help the three forest spirits in finding their lost friend!Lukewarm Massacre: The Spirit of Light is a comedy-horror adventure video game that tells the story of three forest spirits — Rien, Kao and Erinog — in their misadventures to find their kidnapped friend—an adventure filled with horrifying yet funny moments. Explore a haunted mansion, a hotel, an alternate dimension, a frightening forest and caves. Solve the killer's puzzles and trials. Do you have what it takes to find your missing friend?

Detailed Description: Build and develop your army, expand your territory, and fight those other guys at the other side of the map in this fantasy grid-based tactics game - all played in real-time! Harvest Spirit Amber in order to forge powerful artifacts and abilities. AmberForge is a fantasy real-time tactics wargame that borrows mechanics from RTS games as well as grid-based tactics games - StarCraft meets Fire Emblem! Features:  Real time online multiplayer PvP (1v1) Unique buildings, units, and upgrades Various resources throughout the map to harvest Different strategies and army compositions to employ Macro and micro techniques that are easy to learn and hard to master
Short Description: A fantasy real-time tactics wargame that borrows mechanics from RTS games and grid-based tactics games. Build and develop an army, expand your territory, and and fight your opponent who is doing the same. Harvest Spirit Amber in order to forge powerful artifacts and abilities.

Detailed Description: Welcome to Stumble and Fall, where chaos reigns and stumbling into victory is just as likely as falling flat on your face! Gather your friends and embark on a riotous multiplayer adventure that will have you laughing and cheering your way to victory.Gameplay:Stumble and Fall is a party style beat 'em up. Embrace the madness as you stumble, trip, and flail your way through wild battles in a variety of unique arenas.Features:Dynamic Arenas: Battle across dynamic arenas filled with obstacles, hazards, and interactive elements. From slippery ice to chaotic collapsing caves, every location is a playground for hilarious moments.Local Multiplayer Madness: Round up your friends and dive into the chaos with local multiplayer support for up to 3 players. Whether you're engaging in fierce one-on-one duels or chaotic free-for-alls, Stumble and Fall promises laughter-filled fun.Customization Options: Personalize your warriors with a small amount of costumes and accessories (Lots more will be added in near updates!). Mix and match to assert your dominance in style.

Detailed Description: About the Game"Shining Hero" is a single-player roguelike game featuring pixel art that blends deck-building with grid-based turn-based strategy. The Dark Lord has resurrected, and the chosen Shining Hero embarks on a journey to defeat him. Along the way, the hero encounters various battles, where you'll need to use both your cards and strategic positioning on the battlefield to overcome enemies. As you progress, you'll acquire new cards and refine your deck, growing stronger with each challenge.Key Features Choice in Card Usage. Players can see which card will be drawn next and have a limited number of chances each turn to discard their current hand and draw a new one. You'll need to carefully decide which cards to keep and which to play in the heat of battle. Cards Carry Over Between Turns Sometimes the key to your strategy lies in saving a card for the next turn. Automatic Card ReplenishmentNo need to worry about drawing cards—your hand automatically replenishes after playing cards, allowing you to focus more on the battlefield.[/list]Discover: SHINING HERO

Detailed Description: Sir Solomon and the saviors of light depart Castle Cornelius to free Princess Tsuna from the grasp of the evil Devil Lord!But the knight is worried... what if after being freed, the princess falls in love with one of his friends instead of with him?So he does what anyone would do when blinded by love, and ditches his friends! Solomon ventures into the Devil Lord's castle alone, vowing to make the princess his. LABS and Matt Kap present Lovish, an outrageous 8-bit-styled action-adventure game! Venture through a series of bite-sized rooms, slicing up monsters, collecting items and getting to the exit! After exiting each room, enjoy a short event scene, in which anything could happen! Will you find an item? A random encounter RPG fight? Will the world get destroyed? Find out by conquering each room of the Devil Lord's castle, one challenge at a time! Features: 50+ fun levels to play through, each with multiple objectives! Fun randomized event scenes between levels with hundreds of outcomes! You never know what you're gonna see next! Collect a variety of items to upgrade Solomon's abilities, or expand the game in meaningful (and unmeaningful) ways! Spend your pennies (in-game currency to be clear, no microtransactions here) in the in-game shop! 100+ characters, some of which were designed by world-famous manga artist Ryusuke Mita (Dragon Half) An exciting, 20+ tune soundtrack by Matt Kap (Castle In The Darkness, Astalon: Tears of the Earth) Beautiful human-artist-made pixel art! Even the in-game AI art is drawn by a human person! More secrets than ever before! (But this is the first game in this series, so that doesn't mean much, I guess.) Unexpected guest characters And lots more!So please, be a good friend, and help Solomon rescue the princess!
Short Description: Lovish is an outrageous 8-bit action-adventure game! Quest with Sir Solomon through a series of bite-sized rooms, as he attempts to free Princess Tsuna, the woman he loves, from the Devil Lord's clutches!
About the Game: Sir Solomon and the saviors of light depart Castle Cornelius to free Princess Tsuna from the grasp of the evil Devil Lord!But the knight is worried... what if after being freed, the princess falls in love with one of his friends instead of with him?So he does what anyone would do when blinded by love, and ditches his friends! Solomon ventures into the Devil Lord's castle alone, vowing to make the princess his. LABS and Matt Kap present Lovish, an outrageous 8-bit-styled action-adventure game! Venture through a series of bite-sized rooms, slicing up monsters, collecting items and getting to the exit! After exiting each room, enjoy a short event scene, in which anything could happen! Will you find an item? A random encounter RPG fight? Will the world get destroyed? Find out by conquering each room of the Devil Lord's castle, one challenge at a time! Features: 50+ fun levels to play through, each with multiple objectives! Fun randomized event scenes between levels with hundreds of outcomes! You never know what you're gonna see next! Collect a variety of items to upgrade Solomon's abilities, or expand the game in meaningful (and unmeaningful) ways! Spend your pennies (in-game currency to be clear, no microtransactions here) in the in-game shop! 100+ characters, some of which were designed by world-famous manga artist Ryusuke Mita (Dragon Half) An exciting, 20+ tune soundtrack by Matt Kap (Castle In The Darkness, Astalon: Tears of the Earth) Beautiful human-artist-made pixel art! Even the in-game AI art is drawn by a human person! More secrets than ever before! (But this is the first game in this series, so that doesn't mean much, I guess.) Unexpected guest characters And lots more!So please, be a good friend, and help Solomon rescue the princess!

Detailed Description: Jump on your hoverbike for ninja bullet action!Get ready for retro vertical shoot’em up action where you’ll face off against swarms of mythical insect baddies using shuriken, bombs and more in the ultimate fight for survival! Switch between spread and focus shot types, unlock 4 unique hoverbikes, pick up coins and permanently upgrade weapons to stack the deck in your favor for the next exciting run.The more you play, the stronger you get! Stage elements are randomized to keep you on your toes across uniquely themed levels, each with dedicated original background music! Take down 6 unique boss types and challenge online leaderboards. Can you become a true ninpo master?Tiny Pixels Vol. 1 - Ninpo Blast is the first in a line of pixel art titles inspired by arcade and console classics!Features:Master bullet hell stages against swarms of insect baddies!Easily switch between focus or spread shot types.Collect coins to buy permanent upgrades, making you more powerful for future runs.Unlock new hoverbike skins to customize the experience!Face off against 6 big boss types and challenge online leaderboards.Enjoy unique background music and graphical themes across multiple stages!

Detailed Description: 公主与观众是一款live2d美少女游戏，玩家需要扮演一位记者，通过问答的方式揣摩公主的想法，以获得公主的信息从而完成一篇成功的报道。神秘的公主殿下 上下逆转的采访终年冰雪的国家——霍米托，那里气候恶劣，人民却生活的欣欣向荣，而带领他们的是一位神秘而又强势的公主殿下，包括国民在内，所有人都对她充满了好奇……“她是一位强大而又美丽的女性”“她是一位铁血而又无情的铁狼”“她天天与企鹅为伴（？）”“惹怒她的人都没能活着回来！”……无数的流言在坊间传播，而你——一位名不见经传的无名记者却在偶然之间获得了一次独家专访的机会！你将有机会亲自面对公主殿下并向她发出提问。你必须得好好把握，这不但是一次难得可贵的机会，也肯定是一次重要的人生转折点……你精心准备了很多个问题，一步步走向了觐见的房间，公主就在你的面前！正当你打算提问，公主却开口了：“老是你问我可太无聊了！你来回答我的问题吧！”阴晴不定的情绪 原来真实的她是……在游戏过程中，玩家会与公主开展对话进行采访，采访的过程中公主会不断的向玩家进行提问并坦率的说出真实的想法，如果能够顺利通过公主的提问，这次的采访一定会大获成功，但如果公主不能获得满意的答案，玩家则会步入不可想象的深渊！答错就有可能立即进入结局！紧张刺激的访谈游戏开始！丰富的结局 精美的插画本作收录有十个不同的结局，每一种都会有单独绘制的CG插图！你是打算顺利完成采访？还是试着收集所有的惩罚？如果能够在不冒犯公主的情况下，一口气完成所有的提问，可能会有意想不到的收获哦！紧张刺激的问答游戏，一起了解公主的真实面目吧！

Detailed Description:
A shooting game in which the player defends the city while defeating ghosts summoned by a ritual performed by children as a test of courage, using a gun that can purify ghosts.
The player becomes a girl (Ghost Shooter) with a gun that can purify ghosts, and fights to the death against ghosts and monsters that are approaching the city.
Players will challenge three modes: Story, Endless, and Defense Mode to discover the hidden secrets of the ghosts.
The fate of the city is in the hands of one girl. ......What is the ending that awaits you in the end?

Detailed Description: This game is still in early development stage, only core gameplay are not likely to change a lot but other aspect will subject to changeCyclics is a 4-Keys Rhythm Game mixed with Catch The Beat in a circular playing field.Test your left right hand coordination and your rhythmic sense.Currently only have a few original maps available, but i'm working on it!You can join the my Discord Server () to download some of my non-original song's maps to play around :DGameplayPress the right button at the beat! Move the [Light Shield] to block the incoming [Circle Note] !Basic InputW/A/S/D or Arrow keys for [Tap/Hold/Release Note]Spacebar for [Star Note][Light Shield] will follow mouse movement to block the [Circle Note]Map MakerCreate you own map with music of your choice using build-in map maker, and you can share to other players to enjoy it!Join my Discord Server () to share your maps and download other players maps :DImport Custom Map1. Create folder "custom-maps" within the folder that contain the game executable.2. Unzip the custom map to "custom-maps" folder.3. One folder = one map.4. Make sure that custom map folder at least has "mapinfo.json" and ".mp3" inside.5. Enjoy!Create New Map Instruction1. Create folder "custom-maps" within the folder that contain the game executable.2. Create a folder inside "custom-maps" and rename to the song of the map.3. Put the song of your choice (.mp3/.ogg) inside the folder that just created.4. Launch Cyclics and it will auto generate "mapinfo.json" inside that folder.5. Click "Map Edit" button on the main menu.6. Choose your song and press "Edit".7. You can press "Save Map" button to fill up all the information about that map.8. Make sure to type in the correct BPM in the info box

Detailed Description:
Marudachi is an action puzzle game. In the game, you help different Maru to get the star and go to the goal. Every Maru has its abilities. With those abilities, Maru help each other to get into the place they can't go on their own.

Normal Play:
On every level, there is a normal star. Get the normal star and let all Maru stay on the yellow platform is what all you need to do. With different Maru's abilities, some levels may have multiple ways to get to the goal. 
Tips: U and O are very useful. Try to find more ways to clear easier levels, it will help you understand what Marus can do.

Secret Star:
On every level, there is a secret star. The secret stars need a Maru to stay in a specific place for two seconds to get them. The secret stars are hidden in the place Maru don't usually stay or get into. Some secret stars are required to get with specific Maru only too. It is recommended that you start finding the secret stars after you have completed the normal play.

Features:
~ 50 Levels
~ Secret Stars
~ 7 Maru
~ Achievements
~ Simple Graphic

Detailed Description:
JumpHigher showcases unique gameplay features:

Mouse Aim Control: Direct your character's orientation simply by pointing the mouse.
Dynamic Jumping: Hold spacebar to leap; the longer you hold, the farther you jump.
Fart Boost: Upon landing, emit a fart that blasts zombies away!
Zombie Variety: Encounter diverse zombies intent on halting your ascent.
Day-Night Cycle: Face intensified zombie threats during nightfall.


Embark on your thrilling, skyward adventure today!
Short Description: "JumpHigher" is a 3D game combining jumping and survival elements. Players control a character focused on ascending by jumping, while fending off zombie assaults and strategically choosing supplies to aid their climb towards the peak.

Detailed Description: Welcome to Fantasmigon, an exciting journey into the heart of fantasy and strategy. Assemble your own band by choosing from a variety of factions, each with unique abilities and gameplay styles. Engage in thrilling turn-based battles with players from around the world, where every decision determines the fate of your group.Game FeaturesCreate Your Band: Choose a faction and customize your band to suit your strategic preferences. Each character has unique abilities and specializations, allowing for diverse combinations and tactics.Hardcore Battles: Every battle could be your band's last. Players who lose or retreat risk losing their entire band, which can be especially painful due to the loss of developed or unlocked unique heroes.Strategic Depth:Immerse yourself in the tactical nuances of Fantasmigon, where every action matters and every decision influences the outcome of battles. Manage your group's resources, adapt to changing conditions, and anticipate your opponent's next move to emerge victorious.Compete Online:Test your skills against players from around the world in intense 1v1 or 2v2 battles. Evaluate your strategies and tactics in dynamic clashes with other players.Embark on an Epic Adventure: Whether you're an experienced strategist or a newcomer to turn-based games, Fantasmigon offers an exhilarating experience that will keep you coming back for more. Forge your destiny, gather allies, and prepare for battle - the world of Fantasmigon awaits!Join us in Fantasmigon and become the hero of your own epic story!

Detailed Description: Check out our other game!About the GameStrategic Block Placement - Design Your Path :In this 3-act game, build a strategic path that earns you various bonuses until you defeat the Act 3 boss and complete your defense successfully. After each Act, carry forward the bonuses you earned into the next stage. Along with the structures provided by blocks, don’t forget to use Totem cards to construct beneficial buildings.Forge Your Deckforts  :Construct deckforts using Element cards to build your defense line. Don’t forget to stack your Element cards with Upgrade cards and possible combo synergies. As you stack your cards, your deckforts will grow stronger.Build Your Deck, Shape Your Strategy  :As you defend successfully throughout the game, earn treasures and encounter Merchants to strengthen your deck and shape your fate. The right cards will be crucial to your victory.Customize Your Deckforts  :Before or during enemy invasions, assign strategic priorities to your deckforts. If needed, pull back cards from your deckfort into your deck to prepare for future challenges.Master Alchemy – Unleash Powerful Spells  :Use spell cards equipped with alchemical power to change the course of battle. Sacrifice your gold for energy, or summon tornadoes to send enemies flying. A wide array of game-changing cards awaits you to shift the tide in your favor.Come and join us on Discord! :

Detailed Description:
This Triple A Visual Novel has mystery, comedy, journalism, and asmr rolled up into an adventure for those who really want to figure out a bizarre conflict and stop the panic gripping a city. From the minds of Troma, comes a sequel to the breaded, battered, and fun-fried Troma Classic "Poultrygeist: Night of the Living Chicken" The story follows the murder of a chicken and destruction of a lawn mower that teeters the city closer to a riot and an even more powerful looming magical threat. This is for gamers who really want to live through a kick ass comic book with brutal anime style action, rich horror lore, and TRULY think the can crack any case.

Chicken death strikes the Previous City! A lawn mower destroys a chicken. As the suburban chicken owners clash with the Lawnmowers, a riot threatens to ensue. It is only the promise of the Mayor intervening that temporarily calms this riot. However in the midst of this conflict of lawns a magical power grows and seems to be linked to the chicken massacre.

The gameplay involves exploring the city for info about the Mayor's location. The player chooses paths from odd, cool, funny and bizarre scenes from potential leads. As the game progresses on the path the player chooses you will try to gather as much info as possible to solve calming down the riot and what is causing the magical disturbance.
Short Description: Crack the case of a chicken massacre and prevent a town of lawn mower lovers and suburban chicken farmers from destroying each other while managing a looming magical threat.
About the Game:
This Triple A Visual Novel has mystery, comedy, journalism, and asmr rolled up into an adventure for those who really want to figure out a bizarre conflict and stop the panic gripping a city. From the minds of Troma, comes a sequel to the breaded, battered, and fun-fried Troma Classic "Poultrygeist: Night of the Living Chicken" The story follows the murder of a chicken and destruction of a lawn mower that teeters the city closer to a riot and an even more powerful looming magical threat. This is for gamers who really want to live through a kick ass comic book with brutal anime style action, rich horror lore, and TRULY think the can crack any case.

Chicken death strikes the Previous City! A lawn mower destroys a chicken. As the suburban chicken owners clash with the Lawnmowers, a riot threatens to ensue. It is only the promise of the Mayor intervening that temporarily calms this riot. However in the midst of this conflict of lawns a magical power grows and seems to be linked to the chicken massacre.

The gameplay involves exploring the city for info about the Mayor's location. The player chooses paths from odd, cool, funny and bizarre scenes from potential leads. As the game progresses on the path the player chooses you will try to gather as much info as possible to solve calming down the riot and what is causing the magical disturbance.

Characters all have their own unique fighting styles and skills.

Even if time passes, it can still evoke passion and memories in people's hearts.

Come join us and experience the passionate world of side-to-side fighting, making every punch full of power and every dodge accurate. This is not just a game, this is an adventure in life, a battle of the brave.

Detailed Description: In the Worlds of "Rubber Sharks," plunge into the tranquil existence of the sweet Poolside life. This adventure invites you to revel in the bliss of your cherished poolside sanctuary.  A relaxing Rubber Sharks Simulator where you just Observe and lay back. The Rubbersharks will float on the Poolwater and you have not to worry about anything anymore... Fintastic, isnt it?Various Rubber Sharks will join you happily, each with its very own appearance, charm, and sometimes even secrets to uncover.They Drift lazily on the water's surface, soak up the sun, taking a leisurely dip, or gleefully glide down the slide. A nostalgic melody serenades from the radio.As night falls, gaze upon the starlit sky. Silence the radio and let the soothing sounds of waves in the darkness lull you into dreams.With the break of dawn, welcome the azure sky and plunge into the second pool. There's no rush for you.For in this moment, there's nothing to do but savor the simple joys of life.Yet, who's to say there aren't more secrets waiting to be discovered? Embrace the unknown, and remember: Everything is just fine.Here's some cool facts about "Rubber Sharks":- First off, we're talking cutting-edge Unreal Engine stuff, so hold onto your swim trunks for those sweet graphics.- Unlock a whole bunch of shark variations, each with its own quirky flair.- Some of these sharks? Oh, they're cooler than a polar bear in sunglasses. They've got tricks up their fins!- Psst, there might be something sneaky hidden in there, but hey, it's up to you if you wanna go on a mistery investigation.- You can kick back and let the action unfold or dive in headfirst to uncover the secrets.- And get this – the sharks? They make the most adorable squeaky sounds. Like, seriously, it's cute!- Unlock over 40 variations (and we're cooking up more as we speak).- Snap away with the picture mode for your very own album – Instagram, eat your heart out!- Yep, we totally took inspo from the nice rubber duck game, but with a fin-tastic twist.- Oh, and there's a whole treasure trove of surprises waiting to be discovered. So, what are you waiting for? Dive in and let the adventure begin! 🦈🌊

Detailed Description: Guards II is a straightforward turn-based tactic game with extremely simple rules, but very deep mechanics. The player needs to swap two heroes to make a move. It may sound easy, but in reality, it requires a lot of thinking and planning ahead.Features	An original turn-based Battle System.Eight heroes with unique abilities and battle techniques.A skills system with a variety of options.A complex upgrade tree for each hero.A reworked item system with many additions.Five different underworlds with a unique bestiary, divided into a total of 80 levels.Hell mode with an additional 80 missions, higher difficulty, new enemies, and other additions.Special in-game challenges for each mission to test the player's skills.GameplayThe main feature of the game is a unique turn-based battle system. You command a team of four heroes, with three of them fighting on the front line, while the fourth recovers health at the back. To make a move, you need to change the positions of any two heroes. When a hero moves from the back line to the front, they unleash a super attack. For example, the Monster Hunter fires an arrow storm that damages all enemies on the line and reduces their resistances, while the Alchemist heals an ally with a restoration potion.New features in the sequel	Guards II is a sequel that introduces entirely new features to the game. Firstly, all heroes and enemies possess one of four attack types: Physical, Fire, Magic, and Death. Each unit has resistances against specific attack types, while also having vulnerabilities to others. Mastering the art of discovering the most effective attack type combination and exploiting enemy defenses constitutes one of the core strategic elements of the game.Another great addition to the game is the introduction of hero stances. Now, every hero has two stances that can be changed following certain rules. Each stance features a different attack type, resistances, way of performing a regular attack, and effects of the ultimate ability. For example, the Wizard in the first stance is just an ordinary spellcaster, hurling magic balls for regular attacks and more potent magic balls for the ultimate ability. However, when changed to the Fire Wizard form, it can attack any enemy on the battlefield with a regular fire attack, while the ultimate ability sends three meteors to an enemy in each line. All heroes have two stances, each offering diverse gameplay styles and strategic possibilities.Skills & Upgrades	In the original game, each hero had only 9 upgrades. However, in the sequel, every hero now has a unique tech tree with over 30 upgrades, each comprising 2 to 3 levels. The player gets to choose which upgrades to learn first. Furthermore, the item system has been completely reworked. Items are no longer single-use. Instead, players accumulate a new resource that determines how many items they can bring into battle. The higher the value a player has, the more potent the items they can wield. Lastly, the number of skills has been increased from 5 to 7. These additional skills bring a lot of new strategic elements to the game. You can discover and learn about them in the game! Players can even bring a 5th hero into battle!Story and Challenge modesOn top of that, Guards II offers 160 missions thoughtfully divided into five completely different underworlds, each featuring unique monsters with their own abilities, as well as challenging end-world bosses. The game also includes a punishing Challenge mode designed for true strategy fans, which is exceptionally tough to beat. Furthermore, all missions in the game come with special in-game achievements that test the tactical skills of hardcore players.All of these features make Guards II one of the most captivating strategy games that all strategy fans should definitely give a try!

Detailed Description: Venture into the treacherous regions of Aetherdale - a kingdom ablaze with magic and warfare. Assemble an arsenal of weapons and artifacts, to become an unstoppable force of destruction. Take control of powerful combat forms that defy the limits of natural magic.A UNIQUE FANTASY WORLDYou are a Wraith - a creature constructed to perform menial tasks. While not impressive in their own right, Wraiths possess a hidden power that will be key to saving Aetherdale from otherwise certain doom - their ability to transform into Idol forms.IDOL FORMSIdols are pure manifestations of one of the six forms of magic that course through Aetherdale. They possess varied and unique abilities, ranging between offensive, defensive, restorative, and other types altogether.FORM AN ARSENALAwaiting your discovery are various weapons and magical trinkets, each with their own unique effects and use cases. Equipped with a weapon, Idol, and a trinket, you will be ready to brave the wilds, face your foes, and discover the secrets of the world you find yourself in.THE MISSIONBeyond the most perilous areas of Aetherdale waits an ancient - and deadly - enemy. Only a Wraith, well equipped and well trained, stands a chance of getting close enough to it to strike, before it heralds the end of all life in Aetherdale.REGIONSThe regions of Aetherdale are as much an ally as your actual allies are - and as much an enemy as your enemies are. Understanding how to navigate each one is key to success in your journey.
Short Description: Fight your way through the magical kingdom of Aetherdale in this roguelite, collecting powerful weapons and artifacts along the way.

Detailed Description:
In "Echo in Capistrano," players immerse themselves in a heart-pounding survival horror experience set in the treacherous depths of the Capistrano mountain range. Assume the role of an elite cave rescuer, a specialist in navigating subterranean dangers, as you embark on a perilous mission to locate and save missing survivors lost within a vast and intricate cave system.

This game challenges players to master the art of survival in an environment where the slightest misstep can be fatal. The caves are a maze of dark, narrow passages, creating a claustrophobic atmosphere that tests your ability to stay calm under pressure. With limited visibility and disorienting tunnel networks, every decision you make could mean the difference between life and death.

Your primary tool in this treacherous environment is your unique echo-location ability. Use it to navigate the labyrinthine caves, locate the missing survivors, and chart a safe path to escape. However, be warned: the echoing sound can attract something sinister lurking in the shadows. A primal entity resides within the cave, a terrifying presence that you hoped never to encounter.

"Echo in Capistrano" is not just a test of physical endurance but a psychological thriller that pushes your fears to the limit. Run, hide, and use your wits to outsmart the dangers that lie in wait. Find the survivors and lead them to safety before it's too late.

Will you emerge as the savior of the lost, or will the echoes of the cave become your final resting place? The darkness awaits in "Echo in Capistrano"
Short Description: Echo in Capistrano is an atmospheric horror game with a simple goal - rescue the survivors, escape, and most importantly survive. Use your unique echo ability to find a path through the dizzying cave system of Capistrano, but be careful, there are things that lie in wait and they are hungry...

Detailed Description:
This is a 2D top-down shooter with a flair of parody.
You need to clutch 16 rounds in a row to win the map.
There are 10 different maps in the base game.

After playing countless hours of Counter-Strike we at Gammis Games decided to make our own game from the most prominent and exiting parts of CS: the clutch. What if you only have clutch situations all the time? What if the terrorists cheat? What if they use robots against you? What if there are aliens on the map? Well, this game is nothing like the clutches in CS. The question is, is it better?

We hope you'll enjoy our little game. Maybe we'll see you on the online leaderboards!?

Game Name: 相亲攻略之宝贝别再选我了
Detailed Description: 产品介绍《相亲攻略：宝贝别再选了我》是一款恋爱模拟的真人互动剧，讲述关于“你”的相亲故事。从接到母亲电话开始，你踏上相亲之旅，和你预想的不一样，苦恼的事情并不是如何找到一个对象，而是……这么多对象该带哪一个回家。①号女嘉宾：冷面女总裁 陈映“我也就在你面前装装贤良淑德。”②号女嘉宾：古灵精少女 江彤彤“你不是癞蛤蟆吃天鹅肉，咱是俩癞蛤蟆抱着互啃。”③号女嘉宾：风情美妇 叶小曼“你知道的，我永远都不会拒绝你的。”④号女嘉宾：贤良佳人 林静婉“你饿不饿，我做碗面给你吃。”⑤号女嘉宾：呆萌女教授 柳舒月“我还有课题没有做，所以请跟我结婚吧。”⑥号女嘉宾：病娇小护士 李心怡“只要是你的东西，哪怕是你的影子，我都要留住。”相亲相关相亲是平等的灵魂相互沟通，寻找爱的可能，可由于现实的种种原因，很大程度变成了单方面的筛选。《相亲攻略》希望能让玩家能在其中收获尊重和爱，体验一段美好的相亲之旅。今年过年记得带对象回家……如果没有，也要好好的。特别说明没有一场相亲是在准备周全以后开始的，《相亲攻略》同样也是，若有错误或缺漏之处还请包涵，等待后续的修复与版本迭代。
Short Description: 《相亲攻略：宝贝别再选我了》是一款恋爱模拟的真人互动影像游戏，讲述关于“你”的相亲故事。 从接到母亲电话开始，你踏上相亲之旅，和你预想的不一样，苦恼的事情并不是如何找到一个对象，而是……这么多对象该带哪一个回家。

Detailed Description:
Play as Arya: junker, ship jockey, and fighter. Lacking working thrusters, her ship is equipped with her latest contraption, the Rope Tool — a grappling hook and an industrial stapler bolted together.

Hijinks ensue.

Swing through the corpse of an asteroid mining gold rush. Gather rockets from the rubble of all-consuming corporate rivalry to propel yourself to blinding speeds. Launch those rockets to take down abandoned drones or set off the industrial explosives left lying around. Everything in this physics-led zero-gravity world is an opportunity for chaos and speed.

The forces you're up against are stronger than you, more advanced than you, richer than you. They will knock you down, knock everything you've scraped together right off of your ship. But they can't keep you down. You always come back.

Detailed Description: Graphic Settings UpdateFollowing a user's feedback, we decided to add few in-game options, even if very basic, to allow changing the graphical settings in case you're experiencing sub-optimal performance.Localization UpdateLooking at our playerbase, we decided to add localization for the in-game UI and the store page.The Russian localization was tool-assisted, so we are sorry for any mistaken translation or adaptation.About the GameMec Me Loffa is an FPS experience in which the player will have to face a series of waves consisting of enemies of different kinds, including a boss. The player must navigate through the challenges using their weapons to defeat the cursed spirits that aim to undermine their career as a comedian.
Short Description: Choose the right weapon for the right enemy and defeat Mec, the Final Boss... entra?

Detailed Description: 🛠️ Fine Body Needs Fine-Tuning!After the relentless and violent battles with Tentamon, Kajun-chan needs some maintenance. Dive into the role of an engineer and help perfect her body's mechanisms!🚿 Wash & Scrub Off All the Dirt!Join in on the fun of Kajun-chan's bath time, but be prepared to do the scrubbing! The better your scrubbing skills, the more of Kajun you'll get to wash.Customize Kajun-chan costumes!Select from a wide range of Kajun-chan 's costume from her unlockable wardrobe! or just in the mood of wear nothing at all !💥And More to Come in Future Updates!🌟Earn G-points to Unlock Rewards!Redeem the G-points earned from mini-games to access your rewards! Explore different areas where you can enjoy your winnings.🎁 Model Viewer!Unlock and deploy holograms of both your enemies and characters from Shred & Tear for a closer and dynamic look!🎁 Music Box!Taste the intense blend of blood and metal in the adrenaline-fueled beats of Shred & Tear, a collection of songs uniquely composed for Kajun.🎁 Reward Picture Shelf!Dive into the diverse Shred & Tear Omake Comic series, where you'll discover insights into the game's lore, enjoy fascinating tidbits, and access exclusive illustrations and wallpapers.🎁 New Photo Mode!Enhancing the photo mode from the prototype demo, you can now set Kajun in various animated poses. Expect more options for clothing and animations in future updates!
Short Description: A little collection of mini-games with Kajun-chan. You get an up-close and personal look at Kajun-chan's daily routine in this unique sandbox module from changing clothes, photo shooting with custom posing & dancing and even help Kajun-chan shower !

Game Name: The Last Whale Singer: Rise of the Leviathan
Detailed Description: Become A WhalePlay as a magical humpback whale swimming through open oceans, breaching out of water and diving into the deep.Sing To Save The OceanUse your Whale Song to bring ocean flora and fauna back to life, clean the Leviathan's toxic ink and heal broken places.Discover Your Ancestors' SongBecome stronger by learning the songs of your ancestors, unlock new interactions, overcome environmental challenges and solve progression puzzles. Defeat the LeviathanFight for the soul of the ocean against pure evil rising from the ocean depths.Embark on a Journey of DiscoveryExplore more than five unique biomes, wonder at breathtaking underwater landscapes, discover deep secrets, gather unique collectables and follow the story of your ancestry to save the future of the ocean in this unique chapter of The Last Whale Singer’s story universe!
Short Description: Dive into a musical adventure where singing is the key to defeating an ominous creature destroying the oceans. Follow the song of your ancestors, explore breathtaking environments, forge new connections, and discover the magic in the depths of the sea... and the magic within.

Game Name: 恋色ぱれっと - Love Palette -
Detailed Description:
"Love Palette - 恋色ぱれっと -" is a visual novel game where the protagonist Takumi, who leads a fairly fulfilling school life, repeatedly goes on dates with the beautiful girls of the school to deepen his relationships and find a cute girlfriend.
A Bishojo Game released in 2015 under the "Yuki Ichigo Chocolat" brand has been reworked for the "PandaShojo" platform for players around the world to enjoy.


◆Synopsis
The protagonist, Takumi Jino, is a second-year student who enjoys his school life to the fullest.

After school, he chats and plays cards with his junior, Anzu, 
and then meets up with Nao and Akeno-senpai after their club activities; the three take a detour before heading home together.
Although this only happens once a week, he still lives a fulfilling life. 

However, Takumi is also a boy reaching "that" age.
Naturally, he begins to be aware of the girls who are always with him.
If I could have a girlfriend, if I could go out with one of the three...

What does Takumi want to do with these cute girls?
What kind of relationship does he want to have if he dates them?

Takumi invites them on a date to get to know them, 
and in the process, he also learns about himself.
The blank palettes of these 4 people will be dyed the color of love.


◆Characters
・Nao Hayami
"I'm heading to club activities. See you tomorrow!"
A cheerful and caring childhood friend who makes homemade lunches.
She's always had affection for Takumi, something that hasn't changed.
Due to her caring nature, sometimes she can be a little nagging. 

・Akeno Tachibana
"What's wrong?! Finished already? Next!"
A cool, attractive upperclassman who is in the kendo club.
They tease Takumi endlessly, but they're close enough that Takumi sometimes teases them too.
Although she seems like a dependable older sister, she has a childish side that likes mischief.

・Anzu Kurahashi
"Are you free after school? Yes, you do. You look like you don't have anything going on."
A friendly underclassman with a slightly disappointing physique, but still cute like a little sister.
Ever since Takumi showed her around the school building when she entered the school, she has taken a strange fascination with him. 
Althoughs he has a unique, languid personality and a bit of a harsh tongue, she is also popular at school.

・Takumi Jino
A realistic protagonist who is friends with three beautiful girls.
He is a gentleman towards women and is popular among some students.
Wanting a girlfriend, he starts asking girls out on dates.
Short Description: Classmates, childhood friends... In the quest for a girlfriend, Takumi asks her out once again!

Game Name: ハーレムなんか望んでない！ - Undesired Harem -
Detailed Description:
"Undesired Harem - ハーレムなんか望んでない！ -" is a novel game in which the indecisive protagonist, Shu Inami, is surrounded by four beautiful girls he is close to, and has to seriously consider who he wants to date.
A Bishojo Game released in 2014 under the "SWAN EYE" brand has been reworked for the "PandaShojo" platform for players around the world to enjoy.


◆Introduction
To choose someone means there is someone not chosen.
The one who was rejected will be in pain, but the one who has to reject another's love will also suffer.
But it can't be helped. Right now, there are more serious matters... that are troubling me.



◆Synopsis
"Um...with me...um...please go out with me!!!"
"I'm sorry..." said the protagonist, Shu Inami, as he turned down his classmate's heartfelt confession.

As a result of thinking about his girlfriend, Renge Kuriyama, and keeping quiet about it,
 he ends up feeling dissatisfied, saying, "It's unecessary to lie''.
Things haven't been going well recently, and the two of them drift apart.

During this time, his step-sisters, Kaede and Maho,
and Renge's older sister Kaori expressed romantic interest in him, resulting in an unexpected harem situation.

Knowing that both the one rejecting and the one being rejected will suffer, so Shu responds vaguely out of kindness.
It's impossible to date everyone, you know?

Shu ponders what defines a lover, what it means to be in love, and when he arrives at an answer he shares it with them. 
I wanna flirt! I want to be with my ideal lover.

Will Shu repair his relationship with Renge, or will he find a new romance?
The relationship with these four get deeper as they intertwine!


◆Characters
・Renge Kuriyama 
"Be prepared! I'll definitely make you say yes!"
The younger sister of the Kuriyama family, a devoted and selfless childhood friend of the same age.
She's actually Shu's girlfriend, but recently they have been drifting apart. 
She isn't the most confident person, but she works harder than anyone and her true potential shines when she's motivated.

・Maho Inami
"Waaah, oh no! I'm going to be late!"
The bright and energetic younger sister of the Inami family.
Shu's step-sister, and close childhood friend.
She's so popular that other students all over the school say, ``I want her to be my little sister''.

・Kaori Kuriyama
"It's hard to open love letters like this every day..."
Renge's cool and sexy older sister, who is highly popular at the top level of the school.
She likes to tease her childhood friend, Shu.
Secretly she has deep feelings for him...

・Kaede Inami
"Shu-chan, I'll give you a backrub ♪"
She has a short stature, but she's the older sister of the Inami family; she has a gentle smile and a calm motherly aura.
As Shu's step-sister, she has supported him and Maho over the years.
She suddenly transferred to the same school as Shu and the others, showing a competitive side. 

・Shu Inami
The protagonist. He lost his parents when he was young, and grew up in the care of the close Inami family. 
Although he is dating Renge, they don't do anything that typical lovers do, and they have started to drift apart.
His kind nature restricts him from speaking his mind.
Short Description: A sudden harem situation?! His heart must decide between 4 beautiful girls!

Detailed Description: This is a walking simulator designed for an approximate passage of 30 minutesYou suddenly find yourself at home, but suddenly you notice that before that you were in another place.All the action takes place in the post-Soviet period, so the horrors in this apartment will seem even scarier.You will walk around the apartment, yell at the neighbors, solve various riddles, swear, shit, and much more                                                                                                        Are you alive? Or it's a deathbed dream...You understand what is happening to you, but you can't fix anything anymore.                                                                                                              Or maybe you're already dead...
Short Description: This is a short psychological horror film set in the USSR. You went out in a car with a friend, and then suddenly found yourself at home.. The game has screamers and puzzles, which is why the game is addictive for the entire duration of the passage.

Detailed Description:
So many zombies and so few bullets! Bring on the next wave! What's coming next?

In this virtual reality shooting game, the one with the best aim is the one who'll live the longest. If you want to win, just follow these rules:

- Survive waves of zombies and strange creatures, each more powerful... and larger!
- Remember, aim for the head.
- Whenever you can, get on top of your car, into a container... even a tomb... stay out of their reach!
- And above all, don't run out of bullets! You'll have to move to find ammo... if they let you.

VRSUS DEAD is a casual virtual reality game where you can try to defeat all waves of zombies and monsters in different scenarios, earn a few achievements, or simply spend some time blasting away virtual shots. The choice is yours!

Detailed Description:
You are a robot owned by Neuro Solutions corporation.

Your task is to descent into Luminal Levels, collect loot and bring it back. You need to fulfil a quota every 3 days or you’ll be disposed of. As you descent deeper, the more dangerous it gets but the more valuable loot you’ll find.

Each level is a procedurally generated labyrinth with randomly spawned loot and monsters on them, that behave on their and try to kill or mess with the player. When you fulfill your quota, it goes up so you'll have to take bigger risks if you don't want to get disposed of.

You can gather up to 3 of your friends to go with you. You can talk on far away distances using special devices found on the levels, or with a headlamp that synchronizes between all players, allowing for simple or complex communications.

Sometimes, on the levels you will encounter mysterious devices that will force you to make tough choices...

On your base, you’ll be able to buy and open gifts from the company that will contain useful items - i.e. flashlights or item scanners.
Short Description: A co-op horror looting game about exploring luminal spaces, evading monsters, gathering valuable loot and selling it to meet the quota

Detailed Description: Our best gamesAbout the GameSwitch Range is a dynamic game that will transport you to a world of intense clashes, where you will become a fearless defender of the base against the relentless onslaught of robots. The player's task is to effectively repel waves of enemy robots, utilizing tactics and marksmanship skills. The game requires the player to adapt to the changing situation on the battlefield. The realistic behavior of projectiles adds an additional challenge, allowing the player to carefully plan shots and aim precisely. These are key elements for success in defending the base against increasingly advanced and numerous waves of robots. Will you be able to maintain the base in the face of endless attacks? Discover the secrets of this dynamic game and find out if you have what it takes to become an unbeatable defender in Switch Range!

Game Name: Connie and the Essence of Chaos
Detailed Description: Connie and the Essence of Chaos is an upcoming indie 2D platformer made by a single person.In this game you control our limbless hero Connie and her spirit friend Plum on their quest to defeat Lucilate, an evil overlord who has taken over the island of Cuisinia. Explore a whimsical world, free every imprisoned essence fairy, unlock new powers and beat a bunch of terrifying foes!I'm still working on the game and there is no set release date yet, but you can add it to your WISHLIST and follow UPDATES I will be posting here, on my website and on Youtube.You can also find the link to my website on the side of the store page.
Short Description: Connie and the Essence of Chaos is a cute 2D adventure inspired by past platforming classics. JUMP and PUNCH your way through 6 distinct and colorful worlds on your quest to defeat the evil overlord Lucilate and free the island of Cuisinia from his reign of terror!

Detailed Description:
Lil Johnny finally made it home. Version one of their game, “Lil Johnny Goes Home,” had just been released, and the sun dipped below the horizon, casting a warm glow on the quiet suburban street. His worn-out backpack slung over one shoulder, Lil Johnny trudged up the driveway, eager to unwind.
But Lil Johnny’s peace and quiet was short-lived. Somehow, the evil dragon named “Steve” had found its way into Lil Johnny’s world—a world that had been blissfully calm until now. Steve’s scales shimmered with malevolence, and his eyes glowed like smoldering embers. The once-tranquil neighborhood now echoed with the dragon’s roars.
Lil Johnny armed with determination and a watermelon gun (yes, Lil Johnny had a watermelon garden and an endless supply of watermelons!), he set out to protect his home.
The dragon’s lair lay hidden in a faraway land within Lil Johnny’s world. To reach Steve, Lil Johnny would have to fight through nineteen rounds of timed levels. Each level required him to shoot targets, beating the ticking clock to advance. All this target practice would prepare him for the ultimate faceoff against Steve.
As the sun dipped lower, Lil Johnny stepped into the forest. The dragon’s roars echoed through the trees, shaking leaves loose from their branches. His heart pounded, but he remembered the countless hours spent coding, designing, and playtesting. This was his moment—the culmination of creativity and hard work.
In the end, it wasn’t about pixels or high scores. It was about courage, watermelons (lots of them), and relentless target practice. Lil Johnny’s legacy would be etched in watermelon juice and code—a testament to imagination, teamwork, and the magic that happens when a small group of students believes in the power of both.
Play your cards right, and Lil Johnny would face the evil dragon Steve, sending him packing for good. And so, in the heart of Ottawa, Canada, Lil Johnny’s Watermelon Smash became more than just a game—it became a legend.
Panther Game Design Studio, a small high school class from Ottawa, poured their hearts into creating this Lowpoly world, a year long project run in their game design program.
Short Description: Lil Johnny, armed with a watermelon gun, defends his tranquil world from the malevolent dragon Steve. To reach Steve’s lair, he faces nineteen timed levels, honing his skills through target practice. Panther Game Design Studio’s legacy is a high school class from Ottawa Canada.

Detailed Description: Fight off your body's invaders using the combined strengths of your immune system's defenders! Immunity Wars is a turn-based tactics, classic hex grid, strategy game. Wield your units together effectively to fight off all kinds of bacteria, viruses, and even your own corrupted cells.Classic Hex Grid TacticsImmunity Wars is a classic hex grid tactical experience. You'll use each battlefield's terrain to your advantage, play against your enemy's weaknesses, and take all the time you need to plan your every move. With each passing level, your foes will truly put your tactical skills to the test, with likely multiple plays needed to defeat the toughest of enemies.Combine the Strengths of Your Immune SystemThroughout the game, you'll unlock access to more of your immune system's defenders. Its up to you to understand each unit's strengths and determine how to best put them into action, working them in tandem to achieve victory on every level. By nature, the immune system's components must work together to survive, or die trying.Battle Against Real DiseasesThis game uses real research to determine how your immunity units and the enemy pathogen units will act. This means you must use the real processes that your immune system goes through to stamp out a variety of invaders, with every new enemy encounter throwing a wrench in the carefully balanced system.

Detailed Description: You travel to a cabin to try and find your sister who has been missing for a few days. Once arriving in the woods you get trapped and are forced to stay at the cabin while you look for her. The wildlife around the cabin seems a little bit too supernatural for your liking. Spend the days looking for your sister and collecting resources. Spend the night struggling to hide and survive against the creatures of the night.• Look for your sister• Explore the forest• Collect Resources for the night• Keep an eye out for creatures• Peer out the cabin to keep an eye on the creatures• Figure out how to survive the night• Keep your fire stoked• Keep the door lockedHey there, I'm Raven Clancey, a solo game dev with a real passion for stirring up emotions in players. I'm all about creating games that pull you in and make you feel something real, whether it's heart-pounding excitement or a wave of nostalgia. I pour my heart and soul into every pixel, line of code, and killer soundtrack to create experiences that stick with you long after you've stopped playing. In my games, you're not just playing—you're living through a rollercoaster of emotions, all carefully crafted by yours truly.

Detailed Description: Dive into this neon-lit, dystopian world as an Inquisitor detective unravelling the mystery behind a series of murders. This game is the first of its kind: a thrilling fusion of rogue-lite randomization and a traditional point-and-click adventure!Every case is set in a sprawling high-density Megabuilding, where you will meet and question various Citizens in order to uncover the truth. Explore each floor of the Megabuilding, from grimy bars to lavish penthouses, in search of clues and suspects. With each playthrough, face new challenges and unpredictable twists, ensuring no two investigations are alike.Utilize your wits and gather evidence to crack the case before time runs out and corruption consumes the city. Can you navigate this unpredictable, treacherous world and bring some justice to its oppressed Citizens?
Short Description: The world's first rogue-lite point-and-click adventure! As an Inquisitor in a dystopian cyberpunk world, enter a Megabuilding and solve the immersive, procedurally-generated murders within. Talk to witnesses, collect evidence, identify the culprit and unmask the truth!

Detailed Description: The year is 2036. Humanity has declined. Misha is a Public Safety Operator: a contractor for the Provisional Government tasked with hunting Youkai, and protecting the Quarantine City of Shin-Chiba. Within the haunted ruins of Tokyo, she unearths a mystery that could unmake what remains of civilization.NIGHTMARE OPERATOR is an action-horror shooter about hunting Youkai in the haunted ruins of Tokyo. Combat fuses the tense shooting gameplay of classic survival horror, with the skill-based mechanics and execution of fighting games.FeaturesClutch System - Misha's Modular Gun allows her to rapidly switch between Weapon Modules using command inputs inspired by fighting games. Efficiently dispatching Youkai requires maintaining a cool head and skillful execution, even as the horrifying creatures close in.Legends Brought to Life - The Youkai that Misha encounters are drawn from urban legends, and Japanese folklore. However, they don’t appear exactly as depicted in the well-known stories. These are the monsters the stories are based on.Powerful Status Effects - Weapon Modules are imbued with various elemental damage types that allow Misha to inflict statuses such as “freeze”, “stun”, or “bleed” upon Youkai. Learning when your next shot is going to send a Youkai reeling or freeze them solid is key to survival.Build Your Own Combos - While exploring the ruins of Tokyo, Misha will discover and build up an impressive arsenal of Weapon Modules. Weapon Modules can be slotted into different "Command Slots" in Misha's Modular Gun, allowing players to choose which command inputs to assign to what modules.Lo-Rez Tokyo - The locations Misha explores in NIGHTMARE OPERATOR are all based on the real-world districts and neighborhoods of Tokyo. Famous landmarks and beloved streets are realized in a beautiful low-poly aesthetic that is inspired by the early days of 3D video games.Kanpai! - Between missions, Misha and her team have nomikai at a local izakaya in the Quarantine City. These sections will allow players to explore archives from the broken world of NIGHTMARE OPERATOR, interact with the inhabitants of the Quarantine City, and drool over low-poly izakaya fare.

Detailed Description: Strange, colorful and unusual; Escaping DandyLand is unlike any else preceding in the genre of frustration platformers. Can you traverse the central spire and escape? Can you discover the secret of its true nature? Experience the challenge that is its platforming! See vistas of its strange land! Meet bizarre, peculiar and perhaps to some unhinged characters! Defy the lands strange and unsettling proprietor!Equipped with magic boots, lunge through the air to achieve both high and long jumps, if you can master them! Use them to achieve “Coyote Time” to re-direct your movement mid-air!  Escaping DandyLand is a game experience unique amongst its contemporaries in the “Up-like” genre with its surreal aesthetic. Can you reach the peak and discover what lies beyond?Features : Gameplay : Yes !Characters : Bizarre and forgettable no matter how hard you try ! Unhinged dialogue with bouts of bawdy & bodily humor.  Music : Its there somewhere !Aesthetic : A strange and surreal environment, where else can you find the alien and abstract along side jesters and fairies ?  Story : Obtuse !Photosensitivity Warning.

Project V is an ambitious post-apocalyptic adventure game developed by Phantom Cave Studio. It offers a unique blend of emotional storytelling and intense action-adventure gameplay, set in a world on the brink of collapse.
 
Key Features of Project V:
 
Gripping narrative-driven experience that challenges players to make difficult choices.
Innovative gameplay mechanics that immerse players in a richly detailed post-apocalyptic world.
Captivating storyline that unfolds as players explore the depths of the game's narrative.
Stunning visuals and an immersive atmosphere enhance the overall gaming experience.

Detailed Description: DisplaceMen is a magic realist ADV that depicts a seven-day mystery story with multiple scenarios and endings. In the coastal town of Huanmen, everyone knows how to 'displace'—to turn any item or even living being they own into another, as long as the two have equivalent psychological value. Displaced things will vanish and be forgotten. You are a broke painter who wanders around the town, collecting the strangest things to make art. While chatting with your commissioners, with a painter’s eye to observe and imagine, you will unveil the true faces of these people - the motivational speaker, the trace scholar with a day job as a tattoo artist, the hardcore cosplayer teenager, the wanted pseudoscientist, etc. Working to redeem the vanished “mermaid,” you will accumulate properties until you realize you can displace people. Deciding what to let go of is a painter’s practice. Stay sensitive. Stay gold. This game will provide a unique visual novel experience featuring multiple gameplay mechanics -Magic-Realist NarrativeExperience the mainstage “mermaid” mystery by making seamless decisions for multiple endings. Enjoy the satellite stories while exploring various locations in a town operating with the rules of displacement. Painterly Choice Branching Imagine the most impossible found objects as art material. Observe your subjects and chat with your clients to uncover their secrets. Make artistic decisions to enable story branching. Balance special personal values for characters to activate unique painting results. Displaceable CollectionCollect items and tokens of human ownership within the main story and sidequest. *Bonus: Displace your item or token at the right moment for the best value by watching your psychological values change triggered by events. Visceral Dream Sequence Solve small drag-and-drop puzzles while immersed in visceral dream sequences of the vanished “mermaid.” Witness the forgotten story emerging from beautifully intangible streams of consciousness. _*Love is an investment. This is a story for those who have the deepest love for things that are not present. We miss the things that are not here, and this drives us insane. We have different mechanisms to process this, and this game proposes two of them: 1, Keep talking to people, and 2, Keep making paintings.*By the way, the game can make you laugh a lot, especially at inappropriate moments.
Short Description: Survive as a broke painter in a magic-realist coastal town. To redeem the vanished “mermaid” within a 7-day mystery story with multiple endings, you will gradually reveal the truth of people by making paintings…with weird-ass found objects.
About the Game: DisplaceMen is a magic realist ADV that depicts a seven-day mystery story with multiple scenarios and endings. In the coastal town of Huanmen, everyone knows how to 'displace'—to turn any item or even living being they own into another, as long as the two have equivalent psychological value. Displaced things will vanish and be forgotten. You are a broke painter who wanders around the town, collecting the strangest things to make art. While chatting with your commissioners, with a painter’s eye to observe and imagine, you will unveil the true faces of these people - the motivational speaker, the trace scholar with a day job as a tattoo artist, the hardcore cosplayer teenager, the wanted pseudoscientist, etc. Working to redeem the vanished “mermaid,” you will accumulate properties until you realize you can displace people. Deciding what to let go of is a painter’s practice. Stay sensitive. Stay gold. Detailed Description:
On the morning of your 14th birthday, you receive a party invitation from your missing mom. But when you arrive, you find yourself in a cult village. This game is a point-and-click puzzle adventure starring Nero, a black cat. As Nero, you will search for your missing mom and explore the cult village. The villagers seem welcoming, but beneath the surface, secrets are hidden among the fluttering butterflies and lush greenery. Can you escape from this beautiful yet mysterious village?

How to Play
Click on points of interest: If something seems suspicious, click to investigate.
Collect items: Click on items to add them to your item box.
Use items: Click on items in your item box, then click where you want to use them.
Move around: Click arrows to move to different locations.

Playtime: 1 hour

Detailed Description:
Waves after waves of zombies are attacking a remote Elderly House. No help is coming any time soon. Defend the Elderly House as long as you can using the money earned by killing the zombies. And the money is needed to deploy defending units, which are not directly controlled by the player. You can also spend money to build new houses, enabling new unit types.

This is intentionally not a horror game and it contains just a trace amount of dark humor. It's a side view tower defense genre with AI-controlled units. The player only decides when to spawn what types of units and how many by clicking corresponding buttons in the bottom of the screen. The creators of this game over the years have developed many titles designed for the elderly people and the theme selected for the first Steam-released game is to encourage people of all ages never to give up and keep positive attitude and sense of humor no matter what. Best of luck and have lots of fun!

Detailed Description:
Embark on a delightful caffeine-fueled adventure in Java Journey! As a brave coffee cup on a mission to recover stolen treasures, you'll plunge into a whimsical world where tea slimes have absconded with your precious sugar gems. Traverse through charming landscapes, as you jump, dash, and slide your way to victory!

In this casual platformer, players will enjoy a blend of challenging obstacles, clever puzzles, and adorable enemies. Take on the role of the courageous coffee cup, using your agility and wit to outmaneuver the mischievous tea slimes and reclaim every last sugar gem.

With its intuitive controls and vibrant visuals, Java Journey offers an accessible and engaging experience for players of all ages. Whether you're a platforming pro or a casual gamer looking for a pick-me-up, join the adventure and savor the sweet taste of victory in Java Journey!

Detailed Description:
Miss the classic RPG's on the old NES or SNES... Look no further! This original concept Turn-based RPG feels like the games we grew up playing! 

You play as Victor the Vampire Lord of Darkness, humans have overtaken your realm and it's up to you to take it back! Fight creatures and humans across the world map while exploring towers, dungeons, and clearing out towns! Defeat your enemies to collect experience and gold to buy new gear, potions, and artifacts that will help you eradicate the filthy humans who've claimed your lands!

Grind to level up and upgrade your gear at shops if the monsters seem to strong, and don't forget to SAVE your game file when visiting Towns!

No internet required, so download and play anywhere!!!

CONTROLS:

MOVING AROUND: Move around using either your mouse to click and move... or use the arrow keys to move around the map.
MOUSE: Left click to select, talk, equip, and all your other basic actions... Right click to go back, open your menu, or skip dialogue.
KEYBOARD: Z/Enter and X/Esc work as your A and B NES style controls, so use Z/Enter to select, talk, equip, and all your other basic actions... And use X/Esc to go back, open your menu, or skip dialogue.

That's it!!! Enjoy!!!

Having issues, or have questions, fire me the creator and developer an e-mail and I'll get back to you ASAP! victorthevampirelord@gmail.com

Detailed Description:
「俺の何が間違っているというのだ！！」
邪教とされるニスフォル教を狩る立場でありながら、その未来を背負い運命に翻弄される青年エルドレッド。
そんなエルドレッドを親友として追い続けるハンターのイグナーツ。
すれ違う互いの想いを理解しあえる日は来るのだろうか？
ニスフォル教を中心とした壮大な物語が今Steamで再び！

■魅力的なストーリー
主人公であるハンターのイグナーツ。
ニスフォル教の両親を持つ司書のマリー。
謎が多く無口なミーニャ。
世界で最高の権力を有する学者のレスター。
マリーの上司として首都中央図書館に勤務するリサ。
首都中央で王に仕える特権階級のエルドレッド。
それぞれの想いを胸に抱えながらも女神ニスフォルを求める彼らの旅。
信頼や疑心、現実と妄執、幾度もの衝突の末に辿り着いた地での結末とは？

■ターン制コマンドバトル
難しいアクションはなく、じっくりと考えながら戦闘を進めていけるターン制のバトル！
装備やスキルなどで戦略を立てて強敵に立ち向かおう！

■２０時間以上も遊べるボリューム
クリアまでの時間はおよそ２０時間前後でたっぷりと遊べます！

■クリア後もまだまだ続くストーリー
本編から話はそれてサブストーリーへと移行しクリア後も長く遊ぶことができます！

■キーボードとマウスで遊べます
コントローラーもご利用できますがキーボードで遊ぶ事をお勧めいたします。

**ゲーム自体を閉じるには？
Esc + Return キーを押してください。
どの画面からでも終了させることができます。
オートセーブ機能はないので必ず終了前にセーブを行ってください。

*本作はモバイル版と同様の内容です。

Detailed Description:
When you start the game, you become a girl who wanders around the field to find the exit.
You may encounter many obstacles in various terrains as you pass through the city. Among them, there are dangerous traps where you can be sent back if touched just once.
At the end, you may meet the girl's friend or learn the truth about this world.
There may be challenging sections in each terrain. However, the save points can always bring you back.
As long as you don't give up the game, there is no 'game over.'

Please help them in their 'The Great Escape.'
Short Description: "The Great Escape" is a 2D platformer game where you explore each stage, collect keys, and find the exit. Dangerous obstacles and challenging terrain may block your path, but if you keep going, you can reach the portal to escape. Help them make their escape!

Detailed Description: This is an absurd yet logical element synthesis game.How absurd is it exactly?Consider this synthesis formula: 'Man' + 'Knife' = 'Chicken'.The gameplay is quite simple: select an element from both the upper and lower categories, then think outside the box to synthesize all the elements!For instance, if you choose 'Earth' from the Earth category and 'Water' from the Water category, you can create the element 'Human'.And if you go for 'Air' from the Air category and 'Water' from the Water category, you can synthesize the element 'Ice'.The game boasts a total of 11 major categories including Earth, Air, Water, Fire, Human, Tools, Creatures, Entertainment, Miscellaneous, Three Dimensions, and Magic. With a total of 325 elements up for creation, it's a fun challenge to see what you can come up with!
