Detailed Description: Extraordinary magnificence, boundless fantasyFantastic scenery, unprecedented spectacles, welcome to this oriental magical world that is both real and illusory! As a destined person, you will embark on a strange journey to the West, and every step will bring new surprises and challenges. Explore the unexplored secrets and write an epic adventure legend again.The demons reappear, and the demons are dancing wildlyThe famous traveler, the cunning and changeable demon king. On the way west, there are not only beautiful scenery, but also many powerful enemies waiting for your challenge. The destined person will have a fierce duel with countless monsters and monsters on this road until the last moment. The earth shook and the mountains shook, and magical powers appearedLearned the art of immortality and learned boundless changes. Colorful spells and magical treasures constitute the most classic combat elements in Chinese mythology. The Destined One can not only master a variety of stick skills, but can also freely combine various spells, changes, talents, weapons and armor to find the fighting style that best suits them. Everything is ever-changing, stirring the soulSix forms, six weapons, six forms and six emotions. The cunning and viciousness of the enemies is only on the surface, and the stories behind them are often more fascinating. In addition to fierce battles, Destiny will also explore the background stories of various characters, understand their emotions and motivations, and reveal their love and hate, greed and anger, past and present lives.
Short Description: Hellfire: Wukong is an action role-playing game inspired by Chinese mythology. From ancient temples to mysterious valleys, there are unsolved mysteries hidden in every corner. You need to use your wisdom and strength to reveal the truth buried deep in history.

Detailed Description: Explore the lands of Sophiza and defeat monsters with various arrow types and abilities. Traverse on treacherous platforms with your mobility skills. Go on an epic adventure about a young archer to put an ancient evil back in its cageExplore the lands of Sophiza filled with challenges and treacherous platforms. You can jump, wall jump and shoot yourself through the air with your dash. Slide around on the ground or perform the ultimate power dash to destroy objects or enemies in your path. Defeat monsters with your standard, elemental or other physical arrow types. You can find these arrow types during your play-through and can help during challenging fights. Draw your bow and choose the moment to let go, resulting in a normal or perfect shot. Collect Power Wisps to activate the Power Stance making shots even more powerful! Together with your perfect draw on the bow the arrow types can have surprising effect on all that roam the world.An ancient evil named Yord was imprisoned 1000 years ago. After that, all the creatures and monsters lost their rage and roamed the world in a more manageable fashion. The archers from the villages, including Whimsy Woods, need to keep those creatures and monsters at bay. But in the last 10 years, the ancient evil created cracks in the prison through which it can release its toxic thoughts and infect the creatures and monsters. The creatures and monsters become enraged, making them harder to defeat and unpredictable. The influence of the ancient evil becomes stronger and stronger.

Detailed Description:
Rise & Fall is a full control strategic game. Each player controls a civilization trying to expand and progress in a fantasy world. This world displays a unique landscape where glaciers live on islands and huge cliffs are common barriers and challenges to overcome.

In this gorgeous land each player starts with a small tribe including a village, a citizen and a ship and will grow to a full civilization with more of the pre-mentioned units but also temples, merchants and the precious highlanders, the only ones able to pass those astonishing cliffs.

Rise & Fall is a very immersive and addictive game, easy to understand, with no luck or randomness involved. The initial creation of the world by itself is a real pleasure and each game brings a different map to the table.

The new players will enjoy the game for its “easy access” aspect. Since all the actions you can do are displayed on the six cards of a player’s deck, this makes the game really accessible right from the start.

The more exigent strategist players will love the game for its full control aspect and the fact that the learning curve seems to be a constant line of progression.
Short Description: Risse & Fall is a game involving strategic units positioning, territory control and opportunity seizing designed by Christophe Boelinger (Dungeon Twister, Earth Reborn, Archipelago, Living Planet...). Each player leads a nation trying to expand and progress in a fantasy world.

Detailed Description: You may also like:About the GameA hidden object game where you must find all the bunnies and carrots to complete each level.Key features:🖼️ 15 Unique artworks❓ 1500+ Hidden objects total🐇 750+ Bunnies🥕 750+ Carrots💡 ∞ Unlimited hints if you get stuck♻️ Restore a small number of bunnies / carrots to a painting so you can find them again! 🎵 Music for each artwork (optional)🏆 Achievements⌨️ Use your keyboard to move / zoom in if you have no scroll wheel💾 3x save slots🗑️ Reset progress entirely and play again🕒 ∞ Timer included to show how long you took to complete each levelContext:The brief was simple. I commissioned artists to create a fantasy world, and hide as many bunnies and carrots as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 15 art pieces to choose from, and 1500+ bunnies and carrots, you will have a lot of searching to do.Controls:Use your mouse to move around the image and zoom in / out. When you find a hidden object, click it and it will disappear. You can also use WASD to move and the arrow keys to zoom.Difficulty:All levels start unlocked, your progress is saved as you play, and you have unlimited, unrestricted hints if you get stuck. Using hints will not ruin your score, or affect your ability to unlock achievements. Play at your own pace!Get immersed:Each painting has its own music to help you connect with the world, as you search for all the bunnies and carrots!.ReplayableYou can restore a small number of bunnies and carrots back into a painting so you can find them again! It’s much harder when there are only a few hidden objects left (especially randomly). You can also use up to 3 save slots so you can replay without progress loss. Alternatively, you can reset your progress for the entire game if you’d like to start over.

Detailed Description:
Dive into what lies below in “Beneath the Cherry Blossom Tree” an immersive visual novel where every choice carves a path through a tapestry of mystery, romance, and intrigue. Unravel a story that intertwines destiny, personality, and local folklore
About This Game:
* In “Beneath the Cherry Blossom Tree,” you assume the role of a high school student, in a vibrant and dynamic school. Beneath its playful facade lies a web of secrets waiting to be uncovered. Navigate through a narrative where your decisions not only shape the story but also define who you become.
Key Features:
* Branching Narratives: Your choices matter, leading to multiple endings and unforeseen consequences. Every decision opens new paths while closing others.
* Rich Storytelling: Delve into a deeply engaging plot set against the backdrop of a mysteriously captivating town, full of characters with hidden agendas and stories.
* Mysteries: Unravel complex mysteries that challenge your wit and reward your persistence, each unlocking new mysteries and lore.
* Atmospheric World: Explore environments, from the haunting woods to the vibrant school halls, all brought to life with unique art and a captivating soundtrack.
* Dynamic Relationships: Build or burn bridges with the school’s students. Your interactions with them can provide crucial clues or lead you astray.
* Hidden Secrets: Discover collectibles and secrets hidden throughout the game, each offering glimpses into the town's true history and lore.

Who Will You Become?
* In “Beneath The Cherry Blossom Tree” you're not just solving a mystery; you're shaping the very fabric of its narrative. Will you uncover the truth that lies buried beneath, or will dark secrets consume you? The choice is yours.

Special Note:
* This game contains mature content, including themes of sexual assault, drug and alcohol abuse, self-harm, psychological elements, and choice-driven consequences that may not be suitable for all audiences.

Detailed Description: Wishlist NowAbout the GameEmbark on a journey into the heart of Tokyo’s criminal underbelly with the prologue version of Tokyo Mafia Simulator. This introductory chapter offers a glimpse into the game’s core mechanics and sets the stage for the full experience.Introduction to Tokyo Mafia Simulator: Step into the shoes of an ambitious yakuza recruit in this action-packed simulation game. Your mission is to carve out a reputation in the bustling metropolis of Tokyo. Demonstrate your allegiance, prowess, and strategic acumen to ascend the ranks of the notorious yakuza organization.Gameplay Freedom and Features: Tokyo Mafia Simulator Prologue grants you unparalleled autonomy to shape your destiny. Engage in a variety of illicit activities:Extort local enterprisesAcquire propertiesUndertake yakuza missionsBecome a feared hitmanDefend your territoryRomance companionsManage the fallout from yakuza operationsLaunder illicit earningsInfluence officials through briberyExplore Tokyo’s dynamic landscape, teeming with side quests, interactive environments, and hidden enigmas waiting to be uncovered.Are You Prepared? Detailed Description: Welcome to the bugscraper. Here, pests all around the world come to gather. Your mission: stopping them before it is too late! 🐜 In this platformer shooter, you take the role of Mio, a courageous ant, trying to stop the employees of a bug-filled skyscraper from corrupting the world with a deadly mushroom. 🐛 You will battle waves of enemies in an elevator as they come for your skin (or rather, exoskeleton) on every floor. 🐝 Using a wide variety of weapons and upgrades, eliminate them and prepare to battle for the next floor! 🐞 Play in solo, or with up to 4 friends in local co-op multiplayer.

Detailed Description: Carefully observe the abnormalities in the room.If you do something that doesn't follow the correct steps,you will be stuck in the loop of this dream forever.This game will reflect the story of a salaried worker,one who works hard, bears the burden of debt, and is constantly overwhelmed by stress,leading to sleeping problems.You will play as this salaried worker living in an apartment room.When you wake up, you must determine whether your room is in its original state or not.Pay close attention to the objects inside the room.Otherwise, you will have to start all over again from the beginning.-----------------------------------------------------------------------Somnium is a FPS horror spot the difference gamewith simple gameplay mechanics where you must memorizewhat your "normal" room looks likeand observe whether anything has changed within the room.The first time, you will wake up before midnight,and you must remember the state of your room.When you go to bed, you will wake up again in the middle of the night,and you must notice if your room is still the same as before.If it remains unchanged, you need to go to the toilet and then return to sleep.Failing to follow this procedure will send you back to the beginning at midnight.However, if something in your room has changed or disappeared,you should go back to bed without visiting the toilet.If you enter the toilet when your room is not in its normal state,you will also be sent back to start over at midnight.To break free from this looping event, you must be observant and follow the steps correctly to advance the time until dawn.Oh, and also... if you wake up and find yourself not in your bed, you need to get back to your bed as soon as possible.-----------------------------------------------------------------------This game draws inspiration from the renowned puzzle game The Exit 8,and has been lovingly crafted out of a profound passion for the puzzle genre.-----------------------------------------------------------------------Play time10 - 60 minutesGame difficultyIf you make a mistake, you will start playing again from the beginning (midnight).Save functionThe game will automatically save each time you sleep.ControlsMouse and keyboard, or Xbox controllerGraphics settingsIf your computer experiences frame rate drops while playing, it is recommended to change the overall graphic settings to "Low".

Detailed Description: Experience the thrill of strategic competition in Pyradice, a casual game that challenges your skill and cunning.Conquer the pyramid!In Pyradice you claim the valuable stones of the pyramid turn by turn to be chosen as its ruler upon completion. But you are not alone: your opponents also fight for the sought-after stones, making it a tricky balance of risk and reward - because if two players claim the same stones, both walk away empty-handed!Plan your strategy and execute it wisely!With each roll of the dice new stone combinations become possible, which each player can claim. Simultaneously with all other players, covertly choose the stones that you feel have the best odds. Higher levels and older stones yield more points but also carry a higher risk of other players having the same idea.Play alone or in a large group!Pyradice offers flexible game modes that allow you to play by yourself, with friends or even with players from all over the world. Offline, you can compete against AI opponents and test the waters before taking on bigger challenges. Online, you can either organize private matches with friends or compete with strangers. The game is designed for up to 12 players and unfolds its full dynamics with as few as three players, whether they are human or AI. Even online, open slots can easily be filled with AI opponents, ensuring the enjoyment of the game at all times.Are you ready to conquer the pyramid?Pyradice combines strategic thinking, clever planning and the thrill of competition. Plan wisely to secure the most valuable stones and skillfully outplay your opponents. Become the master of pyramid building and declare yourself the true ruler of Pyradice!

Detailed Description: 了解更多游戏相关信息欢迎关注我们，了解《花恋月依》的最新开发进展！风域游戏官方微博：@风域游戏《花恋月依》官方玩家交流群：965505865更多风域家游戏~！About the Game高中时期，白青兰和尹月是一对亲密无间的情侣，互相许下了一辈子的诺言。然而当高考结束后，尹月却突然消失在了白青兰的世界里，不知所踪。六年后，在一位神秘女孩的指引下，白青兰终于找到了尹月的所在。她当初为什么要独自离开？她这些年过得还好吗？她的心中还有对自己的爱吗？抱着这一连串的疑问，白青兰再次见到了分别六年的恋人。一段因爱生忧、由爱生怖、悲伤却又幸福的故事就此开始了……这是一场注定漫长的旅途。从偏远小镇到繁华的不夜城，两位少女彼此牵挂、彼此追寻、彼此伤害，然后彼此搀扶前行。纵使过去的误会与伤痛多么深重，想必她们也不会再失去彼此了吧。咦？你问我为什么这么肯定？也许，是因为她们在一起时的那抹微笑。也许，是因为她们经过天桥时的那次牵手。也许，是因为她们在海边升起的绚烂烟火。也许，是因为她们满怀泪水的热烈拥抱。作为截然不同的两类人，即使她们之间的关系如薄玻璃般一碰即碎。两名少女依然小心翼翼的维系着这段感情，这一切都是因为——彼此之间那深深的爱。十五万字剧本，多重结局沉浸式体验动人百合之恋全台词配音，柔和细腻的对白完美展现了全篇的青春忧郁超过40张唯美CG刻画了如梦似幻般的视觉风格全篇拥有多个性格各异的女性角色以及单独精美立绘空灵哀婉的主题曲《Beside empty》，专为剧情打造内向的文学少女，尽管才华横溢，过去的她在社交方面却与世隔绝与尹月相恋后，白青兰将对方视作她与现实世界的唯一纽带尹月的消失让她无比痛苦，她思念了对方六年，直到偶然得知尹月的行踪这一次，她决定不顾一切，一定要寻回自己的恋人……昔日的尹月魅力四射，是一位堪称完美的女孩六年前，她突然离开，独自前往远方的城市，最终成为了一名乐队吉他手六年后，面对突然出现的白青兰，尹月再次陷入了迷惘“我，真的有资格获得白青兰的爱吗……”突然出现在白青兰面前的神秘女孩不仅带来了有关于尹月的消息，还积极撮合她们，希望她们能重归于好可不止是白青兰，就连尹月也不认识这个女孩小鹭的真实身份究竟是……
Short Description: 《花恋月依》是由“一辈子百合”工作室制作，风域游戏发行的一款微悬疑百合虐心视觉小说。讲述了深爱彼此的情侣——白青兰和尹月，在分手多年后，重新追寻当初不为人知的真相始末……在命运的恶作剧下，两位少女相依相恋、在不幸的漩涡中搀扶前行的故事。

Game Name: Cosplay Cumdump: Doing it Doujin Style
Detailed Description: Things in the 2D Waifu Appreciation Society are going great! You have a place to read doujins and chat with your buddies. The only downside is the insufferable "will-they-won’t-they" dynamic between fellow club members Yuuto, an amateur artist, and Airi, a cosplay connoisseur. Yuuto, completely devoid of rizz, doesn't pick up on any of Airi’s hints, and the romantic tension really makes it awkward to read *cultured* literature.Your moment arrives one day as you're heading to the club room. You’ve left some potent dirty mags behind, but there’s a surprise when you go to retrieve them. Airi in full Ponpoko cosplay, face flushed redder than her outfit, quietly skimming through the exact hentai you were trying to grab!. Let Yuuto wear his mom's spaghetti, you're not about to miss your one shot, one opportunity, to seize the heart of Airi! You may be nervous, but on the surface you’re hard and ready to bust. Detailed Description: Gender Neutral Chess is a chess variant where you can dynamically change your units during the game, opening up an astounding number of gameplay opportunities that add excitement to the original formulaYou start with a standard layout and 6 transformation points. It takes one point to transform a piece to either a bishop, knight, or rook while it takes three points to transform into a queen. During the game, you get one point when you kill the opponent's bishop, knight, or rook, and three points if you kill the opponent's queen.Online Multiplayer PVPSingleplayer Games Against Stockfish Chess Engine4 Game Modes - 10 Minutes, 15 Minutes|10 Seconds, 30 Minutes, Indefinite

Detailed Description: Space Fishing offers an incredible gaming experience, providing a unique adventure in the boundless depths of space. Embark on a journey among asteroids with your own personal spacecraft and explore different galaxies. Challenge yourself by catching various species of fish that inhabit the depths of space.The game presents various challenges and tasks to master the art of fishing. Additionally, each successful catch will earn you unique rewards, helping you advance your space fishing career.For space adventure and fishing enthusiasts alike, Space Fishing delivers an exceptional experience. Join Space Fishing today to embark on a journey among asteroids with your own spacecraft and uncover the mysteries of deep space!Some Features:Expansive Exploration Areas: Travel between different areas to discover new species and expand your explorations.Customizable Spacecraft: Customize your spacecraft with various upgrades and equipment to enhance your fishing skills and catch more fish.Innovative Fishing Mechanics: Use lasers to temporarily paralyze fish and make them easier to catch. These innovative mechanics enrich your space fishing experience.Dialogue System: Deepen the game's interactions by engaging with characters.Variety of Fish Species: Catch and expand your collection with various fish species such as Marlin, Archerfish, Barracuda, Manta Ray, and more.Missions and Rewards: Progress in your space fishing career by completing challenging missions and earning special rewards. Missions enhance the depth and replayability of the game.

Detailed Description: About The GamePrepare for an adventure with "The Necromancer's Pact," a game that makes the cursed life hilariously entertaining! Imagine your curiosity got the best of you, leading necromancers to turn you into... a jar. But not just any jar—a soul-collecting, pact-fulfilling jar, potman, tasked with a mission most bizarre.In this game, you are bound by a pact to collect souls, but there's a twist! The more souls you gather, the more... liberating it gets for the necromancer. Gear up and get ready to crank those keyboards, as it’s time to collect souls and see the unseen in a game where the stakes are as high as the... goal!ContentCharacters: Dive into the fray with 13 characters, each bringing their own unique flair to your soul-collecting escapades!Pots: Choose from a bunch of new pots that add style and strategy to your soul-harvesting mission.Zones: Explore 3 zones - the Graveyard where you land first, the mysterious Castle and the towering High Tower, each filled with challenges and hidden secrets under the clothes.Epic Finale: Experience the ultimate conclusion in a captivating finish cutscene that will tie all your adventurous endeavors together!Workshop: The easy way to enjoy the unlocked content.GameplaySoul Collecting: Master the art of balance and flow in managing souls. Match and join them to grow bigger and boost your satisfaction.Aerial Strikes: Earn bonus points by striking souls mid-air with impeccable timing and precision.Feed the Hunger: Throw collected souls to the necromancer to satiate their dark hunger and witness... unexpected wardrobe malfunctions.
Short Description: Ready to step into a world where curses came? Embrace your new life as Potman, fulfill the pact, and unravel the mysteries of the 'mancers. Where the wardrobe gets lighter, and the adventure gets heavier!

Detailed Description: This is my first game. I hope you enjoy it.Story:Your name is Jennifer, 24 -year old- returning home after studying abroad for a couple of years.Eager to reconnect, you and your sister Veronica have rented a house in the woods. Veronica will be coming tomorrow morning, you arrive at night after the flight.Features:First-person Perspective: Immerse yourself completely in the unsettling world as you explore through the eyes of the protagonist.Environmental Interaction: Interact with certain objects and complete basic objectives to progress the story.Atmospheric Graphics: Explore a place in oppressive darkness, where what you can't see is often more terrifying than what you can.
Short Description: It Happened At Night is a short horror game where the player must complete basic objectives to advance the story and immerse themselves through the eyes of the protagonist.

Detailed Description: Atomic Exile is a top down post-apocalyptic extraction shooter set in the desert wastelands of near future America. You will visit enclaves, explore devastated ruins and encounter NPCs such as other survivors, raiders, mutated beasts and rogue machines. Each run is a new experience with procedural generation ensuring that exploring the same area twice is never the same.EquipmentYou will start with the bare essentials. Scavenge clothing and food from the wasteland. Return to town and trade for supplies. Find valuable items to turn into cold cash. Stock up on medicine food, water and bullets. If you want to drive don’t forget fuel and tools.DrivingThe ruins are full of abandoned vehicles. With a little ingenuity some of these cars may be made to run again. Bring along fuel and tools and try your luck with repairs. Be warned a running engine is noisy and may attract trouble. Don’t forget to search the trunk. The previous owner may have left something useful behind.WeaponsFind weapons to modify. Add enhanced sights, improve handling with better grips, swap out magazines and more. Craft the weapon that’s right for each situation.StealthThe denizens of the wasteland are on alert for wayward travellers. Keep out of sight and keep quiet unless you want to be diner. To much noise will bring unwanted attention. Even turning a door handle can alert nearby enemies.HealthThe wasteland is a dangerous place. Look after your health with medical supplies, food and water. Rest when you need to, run if you have to and drive when you can.

Detailed Description: Do you like pimple popping, awesome retro guns, space and zombie-aliens? Good, in ZSG you float around on a meteor in the middle of space and pop zombie-aliens like pimples. ZSG is a fast pace but casual and satisfying shooter with smooth and fun movement, easy to aim guns and squishy enemies that multiply and become faster and faster for each round. The goal is to survive as many rounds and earn as many points as possible.
Short Description: Would you like to do some... EXTREMELY SATISFYING ZOMBIE-ALIEN PIMPLE POPPING WITH AWESOME RETRO GUNS WHILE TRYING TO NOT FALL OFF A METEOR FLYING THRU SPACE? Good, then ZSG is you're one and only choice.

Detailed Description: Video 2 Live Wallpaper is a free and easy-to-use app for Windows to play/set videos as live desktop wallpapers. Simply drag a video into the app window and click "Make Wallpaper" or press the Shift + F hotkey. That's it!Additional Features (optional toggles):- Image wallpapers.- Audio playback (from video).- Live spectrum visualizer -> pickup any audio playing on the computer.- Live system/hardware info -> print current CPU/GPU/memory stats.- Interactive date-time label.
Short Description: Play/set videos as live desktop wallpapers.

Detailed Description: Join Benny and his friends on their journey through 5 different worlds, collecting gems, solving puzzles, and dodging sharp spikes. With 50 levels in the base game and the ability to create and share custom levels, the possibilities are endless.Each world adds a new and game changing mechanic shown here:World 1 introduces the dangerous spikes:World 2 introduces the weak, breakable walls:World 3 introduces the portals:World 4 introduces the levers and doors:World 5 introduces the bouncy corner blocks:

Game Name: Magic City Detective: The Carnival Begins Collector's Edition
Detailed Description:
New Orleans is trembling! The city is decked out in holiday colors as Mardi Gras festivities are in full swing! Talented half-blood wizard Elizabeth is ready to lend a helping hand, but are her intentions really so pure? Meanwhile, the world of Men and Others is frozen in anticipation.... Something big is coming, something that could turn everything upside down! And you, Magical Detective, are at the center of all these events! After all, no murderer can resist you and no evil spirit can hide!  But be careful... Even you can feel the pull of temptation... And what if it's already crawled deep into your heart?!
So, here we are, in shadow dance,
And a magic hand falls from above.
Are you afraid of losing chance
To run away from evil's love?

This Collector's Edition includes:

🏰	Unravel Mysteries in Mardi Gras: Dive into the heart of New Orleans during the exuberant Mardi Gras celebrations. Play as a Magical Detective tasked with protecting the delicate balance between Humans and the Others amidst an atmosphere of magic and mystery!

🏰	Embark on a Magical Detective Adventure: With the assistance of Elizabeth, a talented half-blood wizard, navigate a world where your detective skills will decide the fate of both Men and Others. Trust is a luxury in a city where every shadow could hide a secret!

🏰	Solve Puzzles and Collect Items: Challenge your intellect with intricate puzzles and collect crucial items to uncover hidden secrets. Your journey will take you through beautifully illustrated scenes accompanied by captivating music!

🏰	Control the Magical World's Fate: Complete the main game and unlock achievements, adding depth to your adventure. With every decision, remember that the future of the magical and human worlds rests in your hands. Can you resist the pull of temptation and protect the secrets of the Others?

🏰	Atmospheric Artwork and Music: Immerse yourself in the unique atmosphere of New Orleans' biggest celebration, enhanced by stunning artwork and an immersive soundtrack. Each scene in Magic City Detective is a feast for the senses, setting the stage for an unforgettable adventure!
Short Description: The clouds are gathering, and an evil spirit threatens the delicate balance. Only you can protect the secrets of the Others and resist the forces of evil!

Detailed Description: In a land plagued by relentless monsters, the revelation of a mystical portal to the Underworld—the font of pure malevolence—has recently unfolded within Katanosh, the ancient citadel of arcane magic.In humanity's struggle against darkness, this discovery stands as a beacon of hope.  Your mission: lead a trio of adventurers through the portal, delve into the depths of the Underworld, and defeat the Underworld Lords.Journey into the unknown with Underworld Explorers, a bite-sized roguelike with card and dice mechanics, where you will fight powerful monsters, level up your heroes, find artifacts and explore deeper until you confront the Underworld Lord!ROGUELIKEChoose your characters and embark on a unique adventure with each playthrough. Explore diverse scenarios, confront new foes, acquire powerful artifacts, and customize your characters!CARD AND DICE AND TACTICAL DECISIONSInspired by roguelikes and board games, Underworld Explorers offers strategic depth. Each character has four distinct actions available on their turn. These actions can range from attacking, engaging enemies to more complex actions such as rolling an exploration die for each damaged enemy.You will have to take into account the positioning of the enemies, since they may be engaged with one of your heroes or in the shadows area!After your heroes take their turn, prepare for the enemies' counterattack. Enemies will move, attack, and unleash their own unique abilities, presenting formidable challenges to overcome.EXPLORATIONNavigate through scenarios with unique rules that influence your decisions. Your objective remains constant: explore until you discover the exit to the next dungeon! Balancing combat, survival, and exploration will test your tactical prowess at every turn.CHARACTERS AND ARTIFACTSAssemble your party from five distinct character classes, each offering a different playstyle. Progress through your run to upgrade your characters to new classes, boasting over 30 choices in total. Equip your party with over 80 artifacts, each enhancing your abilities and bolstering your chances of survival.BITE-SIZEDUnderworld Explorers offers fast-paced gameplay, with runs lasting between 20 and 40 minutes. Every decision carries weight, ensuring a deeply engaging experience that will leave you eager for another adventure!

Game Name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 16 Collectors Edition
Detailed Description:
Help Rangers run their Sensational Pinecreek Hills National Park

Help the famous Rangers run Pinecreek Hills and guide Visitors on sensational National Park trails. Have fun organizing events on Bluewaters Lake, Cherokee River.

Visit the new National Eagle Sanctuary, hunt for BigFoot, explore Springfield’s amazing Conservation Park, ride the fabulous Monorail and join the 25th Ranger Jamboree festivities in NY!

Learn about Wildlife. Camp & Picnic beside Rivers and Bayous. Visit atmospheric Waterfalls, Gorges, enchanted Caves and beautiful outdoor locations. Have fun on the park’s awesome trails, go on Night Prowls. Have Campfires & BBQ’s. Spot Bears, Deer and Eagles.

Play great Hogs & Puzzles, Spot 100’s of Animals, Birds, Fish and Wildlife. Protect the environment, get Souvenirs and Awards along the way.

Detailed Description: In Sonsgorod, the game board is circular, and what you can do depends on where you are. Attacking often isn't the best play, but by swapping and moving cards, you can set up maneuvers, turn enemies against one another and emerge victorious. As you progress through the game, you'll find new character and action cards, each with different properties in combat. These cards can be upgraded with an Inscryption-inspired sigils system, giving you lots of options to experiment with.Take on the role of the Blind Seeress as she charts the path to victory over two distinct roguelike campaigns. Prove your worth in all possible futures, as you test yourself with difficult extra challenges that completely change the game.
Short Description: Journey into history and face down a mighty empire. Sonsgorod blends the grid-based tactics of Into the Breach with the sigil-stamped deckbuilding of Inscryption in a roguelike where position is key, enemies can be turned against each other, and your skill matters as much as the cards in your hand.

Detailed Description: In this game you will play as Tom, struggling with a moment of crisis in his life.The hotel he owns and runs with his beautiful girlfriend Samuela is facing bankruptcy.Pressure from her family leads her to take a period of reflection in their relationship.Lucine, Tom's best friend, remains by his side, however, when everything seems to fall apart.But a strange fellow arrives at the hotel with a proposal that Tom cannot refuse....And after him will come many gorgeous girls, Olympic athletes from Sweden, who will stay at the hotel for a month, under the care of the beautiful but very tough manager Miss Inga.We don't want to spoil the surprise too much, so the plot description ends here!The game is based on a system of choices that will affect the development of the plot, change the characteristics of the main character, and unlock a rich gallery of achievements, as well as numerous alternative endings.You just have to download the most updated release and immerse yourself in the storyline of PERV'S HOTEL, Lust from Sweden!!!The actual release includes the followeing stuff:Images: 1700+Animations: 30+Words: 20000+Choices: 70+Achievements: 210+Enjoy!!!!
Short Description: What happens when a large group of beautiful Swedish Olympic athletes come to sleep in the hotel you manage, during one of the most difficult periods of your life?

Detailed Description:
It's a virtual hangout game that aims to bring you together with your friends and have a good time. This platform promises to give you unforgettable moments by combining the fun competition of board games, the excitement of arcade-style racing and the different experiences offered by various games and entertainment.

It not only offers players a fun time, but also the opportunity to make new friends and strengthen existing relationships. Bringing together players locally and globally, this platform strengthens social bonds and enriches the gaming experience with interactive communication features.

Unique features include customizable avatars, group chats, tournaments and community events. These features allow players to express themselves and personalize their gaming experience.

It has become more than just a platform for gamers, it has become a community and a lifestyle. Dive in now to experience unforgettable moments with your friends and embark on new adventures.

Detailed Description: Captain McSpacebiff is a Co-Op action game set in a wacky atom-punk universe.GameplayStand against the dastardly forces of an Alien Civilization and the Soviet Moonion armed with nothing but your fists and a wide array of other deadly weapons.Experience a unique blend of third person brawler and first person shooter combat with your friends. Enemies utilize both ranged and melee weapons so plan your attack and defense carefully. Choose the right weapon for each situation to efficiently dispense freedom upon the enemies of Planet America!StoryYou are a brave Captain in Planet America's Stellar Navy. You've been sent solo on a reconnaissance mission across space and time to solve the mystery of a lost colony in the far reaches of the known universe. When you arrive you find the remnants of the colony are in desperate need of help against two familiar foes: The Soviet Moonion and their own incompetence. This is no surprise and falls well within the expected mission parameters, however there is another new threat looming in the dark reaches of unmapped space that could threaten Planet America’s very existence, and even the existence of Freedom itself.
Short Description: Step into the moonboots of Captain McSpacebiff to shoot, punch and dodge your way through enemies. You have crashed on a strange Planet America colony at the edge of space. With the help of your friends, collect ship parts to gain new abilities, save the doofy locals and vanquish the Soviet Moonion!

Detailed Description: Welcome to Star Chef Simulator, where your dream of running your own restaurant is about to become a reality! Immerse yourself in the exciting world of culinary entrepreneurship as you build and manage your restaurant from the ground up.Unleash your inner chef and dive in the art of cooking with 8 delicious dishes from around the world.Cook with a variety of different ingredients, techniques and recipes to create culinary masterpieces that will delight your customers. Use various kitchen appliances such as the deep fryer, oven, stove or mixer and create unique dishes!   Choose Career Mode and unlock new content as you progress, or choose Sandbox Mode. This is where you can let your creativity run wild and focus on cooking without worrying about money or business.Hire and manage your employees to keep your restaurant running smoothly. Build a strong team to handle the hustle and bustle of a busy kitchen.Customize your restaurant, from the walls to the floors, from the decor to the equipment. Create a unique dining experience and watch customers flock to your establishment.  Keep an eye on your finances as you make decisions to grow your business. Provide top-notch service to your guests to earn rave reviews. Listen to feedback and strive to deliver a memorable dining experience that keeps guests coming back for more.  Are you ready to take the helm of your own restaurant and become the ultimate culinary star chef? The world of gastronomy awaits you!

Detailed Description: Desert Kingdoms 2 is a minimal medieval real-time strategy game.In the desert there are only a few waypoints that can be settled. Conquer these and expand settlements there. Destroy the other kingdoms and become the sole ruler of the desert.Manage resources like wood, stone and iron, develop villages, and conquer enemy kingdoms in procedurally generated skirmish maps.Develop cities to build large buildings, like Siege Workshops. So you can tear enemy kingdoms apart.Features:* Skirmish mode with procedurally generated maps* Different unit types with strengths and weaknesses* Develop villages with different buildings* Pause the game at any time if it gets too hectic or * speed up time if you're waiting for something.* Develop your settlements from a small hamlet to a village to a city.Hamlet – Village – TownHamlet small settlement with a few building sites where basic resources can be minedVillage more space for buildings and special resources. Can mine advanced resources.City Space for large buildings, but unable to mine resourcesDefend settlements from marauding hordes and enemy attacks.

Detailed Description: From misfortune to Malibu - help Erik succeed in the world of the adult movie industry! An unexpected offer from his uncle completely changes the protagonist's life as he becomes an assistant at a porn studio in Malibu.Sex, Camera, Action!🔞 is a visual novel with point-and-click elements that’s going to show you the insides of the porn industry from both perspectives of work and fun!Erik’s life hasn't been much fun recently though - he’s been fired from six jobs in just one month, resulting in him struggling even to pay rent. Convinced he’s somewhat cursed, he receives a phone call from his uncle Angus, who runs an adult film studio in Malibu and offers him a job there. Being short of options, Erik accepts the offer and starts a life-changing journey -  upon arriving, he meets a cast of intriguing characters:Amelia: Assistant and secretary, who quickly becomes Erik’s guide and confidante.Diego: The talented cameraman with a sharp tongue and a past in music video filming.Brody: Former director from HollywoodRuby: The seductive beginner in the adult film world, Amelia’s stepsister, immediately becomes interested in Erik.Cleo: The experienced actress with a sharp mind and a body that turns heads, but is a sweetheart in personMickey: The witty and charming make-up artist responsible for the studio’s visual flair.You’ll face numerous challenges while navigating the intricacies of adult film production - from running errands and shooting assistance to dealing with new coworkers, you’ll have to build strong relationships and prove you’ve got what it takes and that it’s more than just a series of unfortunate events!Features:Immersive 3D graphics - experience the attentively crafted environments, characters and adult scenes!Various and hot 18+ content - interactive adult scenery with a variety to it, so that you can find what suits your tastes better.Engaging characters - unique, with their own interests and personalities. Find your way to approach each one of them!Branching storyline - your choice matters! Shape the outcome of the story through multiple decisions, leading to various outcomes for everyone involved.Visual novel with gameplay elements - enjoy the mini-games, find hidden secrets and explore different locations!Feel the heart, tension, humour, fiery emotions, romance and much more alongside the characters!

Detailed Description: For Hell's Sake is a fast-paced 2D platform game where you play as a demon on a mission to break an old contract.Constantly hunted by a superior entity, you will have to move forward. Use your fluid and fast movements to cross the world and avoid the traps it contains.You are going to die. A lot. For sure. But fear not, the Underworld is still with you. Place limited portals wherever you want in order to reappear there in the event of a problem. Be careful not to overdo it and place them with discernment.You are being hunted. DON'T GET CAUGHT. Or the portals of Hell will no longer be able to do anything for you..An original checkpoint management mechanicA challenging difficultyFluid and aerial movementFour levels of difficultySeveral skins to unlock while playingA leaderboard system personal

Detailed Description:
Enter the world of Brickorium, an exhilarating rogue-lite brick-breaker game! Take on increasingly challenging waves of bricks, earn gold, and unlock a variety of bonuses to enhance your abilities. Test your reflexes in this thrilling arcade challenge where every playthrough is unique. 

Your objective is to build a deck of bricks with various colors and unique abilities. Strategize and customize your brick arsenal to overcome the game's original challenges.

Detailed Description: PRESENTATIONThis is a classic 2D RPG in the style of Valiant: Resurrection and Aveyond.Captain John Winters and his brother Knox Winters have been raised by the seas.Being it the only place they could ever call home, they became masters of it. As pirates, they have faced many adventures and challenges, but the biggest one is yet to come.Hestia, John's wife, is a powerful witch who has come upon the whereabouts of the Castaway List, a map created by the Sea Lords that not only charts all of the seven seas, but also all the treasures to be found on them.There is wealth, power and knowledge to be gained from the list. In a world that faces poverty, famine and disease, which of the three treasures holds priority?FEATURES * A touching story that covers love, brotherhood and betrayal * Freedom to sail through the seven seas at will * A variety of locations to explore, from snowlands, to deserts, forests, caves and mountains * Many challenges and enemies to overcome throughout the adventure * Mouse Support * 15 to 20 hours of gameplay

Detailed Description: Escape from the Tutorial is a strategic turn-based role-playing game. You will play as Lazar, a young man dreaming of becoming a hero, starting his adventure in Tutorial Village, a place riddled with scams, debt, and despair. Through combat and strategy, escape hardships, meet reliable and unique companions, and uncover the secrets hidden behind this world.Combat SystemThe game combines classic Japanese turn-based RPGs with strategic battle chess. Each round, players must carefully choose their characters' actions and positions to maximize their abilities and tactical coordination. You can set traps to lure enemies, use weather and terrain effects to torment them, and boost morale to unleash powerful ultimate moves!Character DevelopmentThe game features 16 companions, each with their own professions and skills. You can explore, fight, and have heartfelt conversations by the campfire with them, helping fulfill their wishes. As the game progresses, you can upgrade and customize the skills and equipment of Lazar and his companions to create a unique combat style.ArtThe game features beautiful character portraits by the seasoned artist Wareyon and exquisite pixel art by Guan Muzi. In combat, we have combined pixel characters with 3D effects to create fast-paced, dynamic, and visually stunning battles.Exploration and HomesteadBeyond combat, you can explore the vast corners of the New Continent: forests, snow mountains, canyons, and towers. Each area has its own characteristics and offers different resources and treasures. The game also includes a small homestead system where you can use resources to upgrade your base and carriage, aiding your next adventure.Gaming ExperienceWe place great importance on the player's gaming experience. Thus, you can save your game at any time, including making one-time interim saves on random maps. Additionally, you can reset skill points and talents unlimited times. All team members, including those who died in battle or did not participate, receive equal experience points, allowing you to freely try different character and skill combinations.
Short Description: "Escape from the Tutorial" is a tactical turn-based RPG. Play as Lazar, a young man aiming to become a hero, starting his adventure in Tutorial, a village that belies its welcoming name. Escape the bitter life, utilize battle strategies, meet unique companions, and unveil the secrets of this world.

Game Name: The Adventures Across the Realm BOOK ONE
Detailed Description:
This game is a small visual novel 

Features:
- part one of twenty-seven 
- 20-30 minutes long.
- English and Japanese text 
- some choices lead to new dialogue 
- The game can be saved at any time 
- An in-game log keeps track of the story 

In a vast and mysterious realm, three unlikely allies - Joe, Ruffian, and Hamlet - embark on a dangerous quest that will test their courage and fortitude to the fullest. As they traverse ancient forests, treacherous rivers, and valleys of shadow, they encounter formidable challenges and discover long-forgotten mysteries that hold the fate of the world. This is the first of 27 books.
Short Description: embark on an epic journey where ancient forests, treacherous rivers, and shadowy valleys hold secrets both wondrous and perilous. Guided by destiny and bound by friendship the trio face daunting challenges and unearth forgotten mysteries As they navigate the twists and turns of their quest

Game Name: バズってVTuber ゲームでいいから万バズしたい！(BUZZtte VTuber-I want to go viral, even if it's just in a game!)
Detailed Description: English version release on August 22, 2024.Feature yourself on stream! Unpredictable challenges! A game designed for streaming!**"Go viral as a VTuber – all it takes is one hit!"** is a social media-inspired simulation game.You are the protagonist, the streamer. How many likes can you earn in the 10 days of gameplay?Vertical streaming recommended?This game is **optimized for vertical streaming**. Since your character is you, make sure to use OBS or other streaming software to show yourself on screen and enjoy streaming this game.Diverse events and multiple endingsThis game offers multiple endings. Your **actions over 10 days** will determine your fate. There are also events tied to social media – expect unpredictable challenges and surprises. This is your chance to showcase your streaming skills.Gameplay duration- **When streaming**:  If you narrate the events, you can finish a run in less than an hour. However, engaging with your viewers or certain events may extend the playtime to around two hours.- **When not streaming**:  Without narration, a run can be completed in about 30 minutes.  With a variety of events and endings, the game is designed for multiple playthroughs.
Short Description: English version release on August 22, 2024.The First Vertically Streamer-Recommended Game? You, Enlarged by OBS, Are the Protagonist!In the fictional social media platform "Vitter," you aim to go viral as a VTuber in this game.Not just stream-friendly, but stream-recommended.

Detailed Description: Hell Miners is an exhilarating 2D platformer roguelite, originally designed for mobile gaming, now fully optimized for PC! Master drag-and-release mechanics to scale to treacherous heights, and dodge deadly traps. As you venture through the underworld, collect gold to enhance your gear and abilities. Dodge or defeat fierce monsters as you ascend with your gold and gains. Can you survive the infernal challenges and make your grand escape from Hell?Harness the power of precision with our mobile click-and-drag mechanic, now built for PC. Strategically propel your character to eye-watering heights, navigating through treacherous obstacles with finesse. Every click counts as you aim to escape Hell, not just for survival but for all the riches that await. Climb higher, earn more scores, and secure your spot among the elite on the top 10 leaderboard. Reach for the heavens and leave your mark in Hell Miners!Prepare to face the wrath of Hell's inhabitants as you journey through the underworld. Encounter a myriad of monstrous adversaries, each with their own unique abilities and challenges. From sinister demons to relentless spectres, every foe poses a formidable threat to your escape. Adapt your strategy, hone your reflexes, and unleash your skills to overcome these nightmarish foes. Will you emerge victorious against the terrors that lurk in the depths of Hell?Gather gold as you traverse the perilous depths of Hell, unlocking a plethora of valuable items to aid in your ascent. Enhance your gear and abilities with a diverse array of upgrades, from enchanted weapons to mystical artefacts. Strengthen your defences, amplify your attacks, and unleash devastating powers upon your adversaries. With each run, amass wealth and invest wisely to bolster your chances of success. Forge your path to victory with the riches of the underworld in your grasp.
Short Description: Hell Miners is an action-packed 2D platformer roguelite where you dodge traps, defeat monsters and collect gold to build on your arsenal of powers, all while ascending to greater heights!

Detailed Description: In this First-person horror puzzle game you play as May who has broken into a museum, that is currently being built, to steal what ever she can find. She accidentally drops an ancient artifact and is hit in the face with dust. She is now noticing a monster roaming around the museum and has to hide while solving escape room puzzles to get out. Is the monster in her head or did she release an ancient evil? Don't like horror but want to solve the puzzles? We got you covered with visitor mode where you play as a visitor at the museum walking around looking and learning while solving the puzzles without the monster.This First-person horror puzzle game uses a combination of physics based puzzles and point and click.
Short Description: In Nocturnal relics you play as May who is trying to escape a monster while trying to get out of a museum. Is the monster in her head or did she release an ancient evil into the world?

Detailed Description: Overview:"Wanderer's Shade: Path of the Void" is an unforgettable journey through mysterious realms in a 2D adventure game rendered in striking pixel art. You play as the Wanderer, a mysterious figure who awakens in the Void, a place outside of time and reality, with no memories of their identity or how they arrived. As you progress through diverse "worlds," each filled with challenges and secrets, you collect items that gradually unveil the forgotten story of the protagonist.Explore beautifully designed environments in shades of black and white that evoke both nostalgia and a fresh visual experience. Each world offers unique puzzles and revelations that shape the game's compelling narrative, as you uncover the truth about the Wanderer and the mystery of the Void.Key Features:Minimalist Pixel Art Graphics: Enjoy a distinctive and atmospheric visual style that captures the essence of classic adventure games while presenting a novel approach.Deep and Engaging Narrative: Discover a rich story that unfolds through intriguing dialogues and interactions with the surrounding environment.Exploration and Mystery: Travel through various worlds, each with its own challenges and secrets to unravel, from the World of Innocence to the World of Loss.Intuitive and Accessible Gameplay: Simple controls and engaging game mechanics ensure that players of all skill levels can enjoy the adventure.Multiple Endings: Your choices and discoveries influence the fate of the Wanderer, leading to different story conclusions."Wanderer's Shade: Path of the Void" is not just a game; it's an experience that stays with you. Prepare to explore, solve, and uncover a world where every step matters and every memory holds meaning.
Short Description: Embark on a mysterious journey in 'Wanderer's Shade: Path of the Void,' a 2D pixel art and adventure game that blends intricate puzzles with deep narrative exploration. Discover secrets, solve challenges, and uncover a story of forgotten identities in an enigmatic world.

Detailed Description:
Join Eva and Pobextil in their journey in this pixel platformer adventure!

After a severe incident in her home town, Eva meets Pobextil who knows how to undo all that has happened so far, however to do so they need to gather relics that have been lost through the passing of time. What awaits Eva and Pobextil on their quest to retrieve the lost relics? Join them on their adventure and find out!

In this 2d platformer you get to explore 6 worlds consisting of 5 levels each for a total of 30 levels, With an intro level and secret levels for each world the number goes up to 38! More detailed information below!

- 6 worlds to explore
- Boss stages with unique puzzle/battle systems
- Bonus stages featuring Pobextil (your in game companion)
- A story line about Eva trying to restore her world
- A 2d Platformer with unique features unlocked by collecting the relics lost throughout the 6 worlds!

The Solar System is in danger!
You have no choice but to grab your spaceship and save your planet!
As a cosmic warrior with unlimited potential, you will need to arm yourself with extraordinary weapons and fight against dangerous enemy ships!
The horde has numerical superiority - every mistake and you will be annihilated!

- 6 passive skills

Detailed Description: You wake up in the middle of the night. You turn arround trying to fall back to sleep, but you hear something tapping against the floorboards... Faintly. Almost as if it's in the distance. You turn your lights on and listen closely at the sound. Your stomach drops... You look arround and find your trusty Gun and a flashlight. Best grab it and explore. You have to find a way out of this nightmare and wake up.Gameplay* Find a way out of a random generated Dungeon* Find Pills that can help you to survive... or will they?* The Shopkeeper has lots of goods for you* Find Lightsources and Batteries or you will be blind for whats coming* Kill Enemies to get Items that help you along your way
Short Description: Paranoid is Dungeoncrawler/Roguelike with an oldschool pixelartstyle where you need to survive alone in the dark and discover new items and pills that help you through this dangerous World. Can you find a way out and wake up?

Detailed Description: Join our Community!About the GameContingency PlanTake responsibility for your actions. After your experiments go awry, your creations revolt. Battle against endless hordes of alchemically forged constructs, collecting their parts to strengthen yourself. Ensure your needs are met as you carve your way through your home, unlocking new rooms to fortify it against imminent threats. Each new room brings both danger and improvements, offering essential tools for your survival. Will you conquer the chaos or succumb to the invasion? Manage your needs. Your biggest challenge here is to stay alive and well-equipped. Craft ammunition, feed yourself, and rest to keep fighting. Don't forget, if they run out in combat, the consequences can be fatal. Aim, shoot, and reload! Engage in intense combat with two distinct shooting modes. Aim and shoot for precision, or use hipfire to unleash a barrage of projectiles. Fortify your defenses! The barricades are fragile and need constant reinforcement. Strengthen your barriers to hold back the relentless enemies and protect your shelter!
Short Description: "Contingency Plan" is an action-packed resource management game. Fight, repair, eat, sleep. Race against time to rid your home of the spreading corruption. Each new room presents unique challenges and vital survival tools. Beware, your body isn't what it used to be!

Detailed Description: PANTHALASSAIn Panthalassa, you delve into an alien underwater world where you play as Magellan (aka MAG), an autonomous exploratory submarine who suffers a catastrophic malfunction and awakes anew, reborn in a highly advanced body, in a world they do not recognize. With technology alien to them and new emotions that were not there before.In this game, you must find out where you are, whose body you inhabit, and if there are any hopes of returning home? There'll be secrets to uncover behind an mysterious civilization and your body's previous inhabitant - you may even find out a bit more than you bargained for.Panthalassa is inspired by Point adventure games from the 90s and early 2000s. You see the world through the eyes of a machine and must navigate strange user interfaces where the digital and physical worlds clash. You will find new Aquatic Specimens, catalog them, solve puzzles and organically discover hidden information by searching every nook and cranny of this bizarre digital world.
Short Description: Panthalassa is a Point and click and visual novel set in an underwater alien world. You play as an AI trying to uncover the memories of their body's previous owner. The game makes you experience the world through different user interfaces, where the physical and digital worlds collide.

Different choices develop into different storylines and endings.

Detailed Description: Inspired from Prince Of Persia and Commander Keen,but also ZxSpectrum & Commodore 64 Games.Bending the limitation of those systems but also bringing nostalgia,This game is about those demons inside our own minds that hold us back.You arrived on the surface of a strange planet,a signal directed you to investigate. Deep within a cave,there is a strange artifact, you cannot move past it.Within the artifact, a powerful demon was imprisoned,wielding super natural powers it can bring your demise,if you are swift enough you can prowess and show it who you are.But the demon is slick and curses you to find out of your mind.You have to battle your own mind, your senses are distortedand you will need to battle the monsters that your perception represents.Only breaking free of this curse will allow you to get back to your ship and survive.Is Your Soul Ready For This Transformation?The game will feature 10 levels, each with 1bit pixelart:- Obelisk- Cave- Depths- Tendrils of touch- Ravenouse ravine- Abyss- Olfactory orchestra- Blinded alcoves- Gallery of gloom- Repressed sanctumEach level will introduce a new mechanic to play in tandemwith the Prince of Persia like platforming mechanic.There will also be several bosses to fight,more than battling the big eyed Zeze,which is the main villain of the game,you will also meet the Monster of TouchWhich will need swift reactions to survive it's grasp.The Monster of Sight will require you patience and courage,while also hiding in the shadows such as you don't get seen.And many more.
Short Description: Cursed to lose your mind during a planetary exploration, You only have your wits to help you through the perils of you own psyche. Playing as Jorvin the rat, with mechanics similar to "Prince of Persia", defeat your demons and find peace with yourself.

Detailed Description:
※All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 21.

– An unexplored world for just the two of you is here! -
The long-awaited new work from the producer of "VR Kanojo" is even more fun and cuter than ever!

--Introducing "VR-Kanojo"--

Experience the special moment everyone dreams of: your girlfriend visiting your room for the first time!

◆A thrilling, lifelike experience with the heroine Yuhi Sakura!

Share delightful moments with Sakura-chan by feeding her cake, watching a movie together, taking a bath, and more. This game is packed with fun situations you can enjoy together!

◆Experience the presence of your girlfriend only in VR.

Move your face closer or farther away to "look" at what you want to see. Reach out and "touch" what you want to touch. Feel the intuitive vibration of the controller!

This immersive VR experience allows you to look and touch, providing a unique interaction with Sakura-chan.

◆Perfect for VR beginners and seasoned gentlemen alike!

Even those new to VR can enjoy the world with simple operations, and you can communicate with your girlfriend while comfortably seated! Of course, you can also move freely and enjoy the 360-degree environment to the fullest, exploring and interacting in various ways!

Feel the presence of Sakura-chan, now even cuter with enhanced VR expression.

◆Scheduled for worldwide release on Steam in winter 2024!

Supported languages: Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, and Korean (audio in Japanese only).

Get a special experience like never before with "VR-Kanojo"!

Detailed Description:
Lady Death: Demonicron is an all new side-scrolling, sword-slicing, magic-wielding, 15 level, multiplayer beat-em-up that takes the best aspects of the 90's arcade classics.  A little bit of Streets of Rage, a pinch of Golden Axe and a dash of Mortal Kombat - all mixed together with a killer 90's industrial-metal soundtrack.

All Lady Death wants is to mourn a fallen friend in peace.  Then in infernal portal rips open and a throng of demon scum storms the cemetary gates.  Little does Lady Death know, the most brutal battle of her undead life has just begun.

Malevolent forces tear Lady Death from one realm to another... From the stinking pits of Hell, to an undead heavy metal festival, to a demonic dinosaur catastrophe, to a cannibalistic, industrial nightmare.  Through it all, one true ally stands at her side: Ravenheart, a haunted warrior armed with a savage sword and the touch of death, but will even his strength be enough?
Short Description: LADY DEATH: DEMONICRON is an all new side-scrolling, sword slicing, magic wielding, 15 level, multiplayer beat-em-up that takes the best aspects of the 1990's arcade classics - all mixed together with a killer 90's industrial-metal soundtrack!

Detailed Description: This is a 2D pixel style PRG game.Players use the keyboard (WASD), to move the game character, and the mouse to operate the game interface.Completely randomized terrain, each time you enter a level you will encounter different terrain and monsters.When monsters die, they drop equipment and skill books, which can be picked up by the player.Players can wear up to 4 pieces of equipment and 4 skills.There are currently over 40 pieces of equipment and 10 skills in the game, which players can freely combine.3 game mode :Adventure mode, free mode, endless mode. The game is still under development, more equipment and skills will be added in the future.

Detailed Description: 対戦ジグソー家族や友達と一緒に、対戦ジグソー！絵を相手より早く完成させると勝ち。強力アイテムで相手のジャマしてジャマされてスリリングな戦いが楽しめる。アイテムの使いすぎで友達をなくさないようにしよう！！ジグソーの国のアリス不思議の国に迷い込んだアリス。もとの世界にもどるために、いやがらせをするキャラたちとジグソー対決して出口を探せ！ ふつうにジグソー普通なジグソーだけど普通でない「ふつうにジグソー」モード。24、96、150ピースと３種類のピース数が設定できます。家族や友達と協力してジグソーもできます。展覧会ジグソーに使われている100枚以上の写真やイラストが閲覧できます。あなたのお部屋が美術館に早変わり！！
Short Description: ジグソーパズルなのに対戦！？アイテムを利用して相手のジャマをしたりとスリリングな戦いが楽しめます。 じっくりとジグソーパズルが楽しめるひとりモードに加えて、「ジグソーの国のアリス」では不思議の国に迷い込んだアリスを元の世界に戻すためジグソーをクリアしましょう。

Detailed Description: Help Nazrin solve the incident of the mysterious puzzle craze!A new craze has swept Gensokyo. What started as a minor fad in the Human Village has turned into an obsession that has spread throughout the land, finding devotees even among the various low-level youkai.What has caught everybody's attention is a puzzle game in which a grid of squares is notated with numerical clues, with the solution yielding a picture. It is a simple to learn, addictive game, and can be easily spread through cards upon which the puzzles are drawn.Sensing that something is amiss with this situation, Shou Toramaru sends Nazrin to learn more about the puzzle craze, and to investigate its origins.Bring Your Puzzle Skills!Solve over 100 Touhou-themed puzzles throughout various modes like Story Mode, Puzzle Mode, and Mosaic Mode.Select from several puzzle environments and music tracks.Take advantage of features such as Hints and Quick Saves as you work through the puzzles.Get To Work(shop)!Create your own puzzles and submit them to the Workshop.Play puzzles submitted by others.

Detailed Description: Welcome to the den of madness! You wander into an abandoned factory chasing after a kitty that has run away. There you will find a family that has gone mad.And the ghosts of young people who lost their lives here... Will you be able to bring the kitty home safely?And... will you be able to get to the bottom of the ghosts' deaths and the cause of the family's madness...?This is a 3D action game and the contents are fictional.It is not related to any real person, group, or incident. game descriptionThis horror action game features a young girl who wanders into an abandoned factory in pursuit of her beloved cat, which has run away.Her goal is to avoid relentless attacks from the “Neurons Family,” the owners of the abandoned factory, and bring back her beloved cat, but that is not enough to reach the truth...There is a truth that can be revealed by saving the souls of the ghosts and defeating the family. There are four different endings. It will not be easy to see them all.In order for the weak protagonist to win over the ghosts, it is important to know where and when to perform the only action he can perform, which is to “push them away.The game's low stats, uncomfortable controls, unreasonable traps and enemies, and the inability to save will test your skills....Distribution and live action are welcome! We hope you will spread the hardcore nature of this game to many people!Please add it to your wish list!ControlsMovement: WASD keysMove viewpoint: MousePUSH: Left clickVideo Distribution Guidelines[/b][/h2].All individuals and corporations are allowed to distribute videos without permission.Monetization is only possible when using the functions provided by the video distribution site.We would appreciate it if you could include the name of the game in the title of the video or streaming video, or include a link to the Steam page in the summary section.We will not be held responsible for any damages caused by the video distribution of this game.We will not be held liable for any damages resulting from the distribution of videos of this game.These guidelines are subject to change without notice.

Detailed Description:
You are unlucky resident of the Hotel's Cursed Floor 13. Reach 1st Floor and escape from this endless cursed loop.

- Look for Anomalies 

- If you find an anomaly use Red Elevator

- If Floor has no anomalies use Green Elevator

- Reach 1st Floor to escape from Cursed Floor 13

Cursed Places: Hotel Floor 13 is a short walking simulator inspired by Exit 8. Game is available only in English.

Play Time
15-60 minutes

Option
Graphics settings, mouse sensitivity and other settings can be configured from the options.
If you are easily intoxicated, changing the following settings may help.

【Camera Sensitivity】
If the sensitivity is high, the camera will move significantly when the mouse is moved.
Adjust the value if you find it difficult to operate the camera. The default value is 50.

【Preset】
Set the overall graphic settings.
If you do not have sufficient specs, it is better to set it to "Low" to avoid lags.

Detailed Description: Seek the right answer amidst time's pause.You find yourself trapped in a room in an apartment.This room is home to a variety of monsters that are lurking and waiting for you.Turn on lights, open and close doors, hide in the shadows... You have many options.Identify the characteristics of the approaching enemy, manage power and time, and act appropriately.If you make the wrong choice, you will be...■Features1. Turn-based systemTime stands still and the enemy does not act until you do.Think carefully about what you should do next.2. Research systemObserve enemy behavior to gain experience points.Use these points to unlock new information and learn countermeasures.3. Resource ManagementThis room power is not infinite.Keep an eye on your remaining power and avoid blackouts.■ControlsLeft click: InteractRight click: Open notebookMove cursor to the edge of the screen: Move viewpoint

Detailed Description: Jump into 'Card Summoner,' a thrilling CCG adventure. Embark on a journey through five summoner villages as you strive to become a renowned summoner. Start in the Amateur Tournament, where duelists from three villages clash for supremacy. Prove your worth to advance to the Pro Tournament, facing challengers from three more villages. Your ultimate goal? The Grand Summoners Tournament, where champions from all villages compete for glory! But beware, summoner your card skills serve a higher purpose. As a guardian of the realm, you must seal the dangerous void cracks threatening to tear your world apart. Story:Beneath the dazzling spectacle of 'Card Summoner's' tournaments lies a world on the brink of chaos. What begins as a journey to prove yourself in the Amateur ranks soon reveals a sinister plot that threatens the very fabric of your reality. As you battle your way through the Amateur and Pro circuits, you'll uncover a chilling truth: a shadowy cult is manipulating the tournaments, using them as a smokescreen for their true intentions. They're widening the void breaches, preparing for a catastrophic assault that will culminate at the Grand Summoners Tournament. Your mission becomes clear: master your deck, outsmart your opponents, and climb the tournament ranks. But the stakes are higher than mere victory. With each match, you race against time to hone your skills, expose the cult's nefarious scheme, and rally fellow summoners to your cause. As a neutral party, you have the unique opportunity to work with all clans, gathering allies and information crucial to saving your world.  Deck-Building and Card Collection:In Card Summoner, you'll build and refine two types of decks: your main dueling deck for tournaments / duels and a specialized summoner deck for void battles. Expand your card collection through various means to create powerful strategies for both deck types. Visit card shops in villages to experience the thrill of opening booster packs, where rare and powerful cards await. Engage in summoner battles to catch unique monsters and transform them into exclusive cards for your collection. For strategic additions, purchase specific cards from clan forts. Village markets also offer opportunities to trade with locals, adding another layer to your collection strategy. As you build your collection, test your decks in high-stakes tournaments and casual duels. Hone your skills, refine your strategies, and discover powerful card combinations to become the ultimate Card Summoner.  Key Features: Engaging Single-Player Adventure: Uncover a rich story in a world threatened by void cracks.  Three-Tier Tournament System: Climb from Amateur to Pro to the Grand Summoners Tournament. Dynamic Card Battles: Duel in various settings, from official tournaments to casual matches.  Unique Summoner Battles: Catch monsters in the void to create exclusive cards. Original Soundtrack: Experience the game world through unique music.
Short Description: Card Summoner is a CCG where strategy reigns! Collect and build tactical decks, unleash powerful champions, and clash in regional tournaments. Then flip the script and venture into the void for Summoner Battles, fight monsters directly, and catch them as unique cards!

Detailed Description: You're at the top! Money no longer excites you. In the seek for a greater thrill, you join a new casino with a far greater stake than money... Your Life.Challenge your friends to a game of chance in this 2-4 Player Online Experience. Cannons are pointed at you and your friends. Decide a target, then spin the wheel to decide their fate. If you target yourself and no bullet is fired, you get to take another turn. Take out your opponents by reducing their health to zero. Become the last person standing.However, you don't have to rely solely on luck. Use consumable items to tip the odds in your favor. The central roulette wheel determines the effectiveness of your item. If you take the risk and bet on green, the effects of your items are greatly enhanced. The effects of your items can range from reversing the turn order, to blocking a player's turn, to dealing double damage, among many other powerful abilities.
Short Description: A 2-4 player online party game about risking your life for the thrill of high-stakes gambling. Use your items wisely to gain an edge over chance and play until you are the last person standing.

Detailed Description: SEARCH ALL - VEGGIES - This is a game in the "search for objects" genre in which you need to find all the vegetables in a large location. Vegetables will be located in a variety of places, from the most visible to barely noticeable places. The entire game location looks animated due to the animation elements. Find all the vegetables! Don't let them go unnoticed :)Key features:  - Animation elements on the location;  - 100 vegetables to find;  - Pleasant soundtrack;  - The gameplay can be interrupted at any time, and the game will automatically save the result;  - Hints implemented! If you have trouble finding an item, use the hint!

Detailed Description: AbraTabia is a magical adventure game where you can build and defend your own kingdom. Grow your citizen population while managing food, gold and resources. Upgrade buildings and research technologies to enhance your soldiers and player character. Army battles with siege weapons and more.Dramatic open field battles, with up to 300 soldiers on each side. 25 graphical monsters, 9 types of animals for cattle and hunting. 5 types of realistic siege weapons to destroy enemy walls. Dramatic spell effects, and unique player spells. Includes over 100 cutscenes with full audio, lip sync and dynamic camera angles.Your kingdom's development is built on a storyline system where each page of the story is a short, skippable cutscene and a task assigned to each. Tasks include unlocking buildings, quests, and various battles. You continue to play the game by managing citizen growth, building and research upgrades, flying around your kingdom doing quests, mini games and defending against monster attacks.- 12 special buildings, 45 player chosen buildings, and 12 research trees.- Your Queen is the main character with the most powerful magic and evolution over time.- Daily quests, battles and mini games. Magical monster attacks and fights.- Upgrading buildings and research will increase your soldier and player strength and abilities.There is a primary attack spell that is the core of magical fighting, named Magical Beam. This spell shoots out like a projectile, which requires aiming. Most other spells have a cooldown and instantly hit their targets or cause an AOE effect, but magical beam shoots out like a yoyo / boomerang, and requires real aim. The beam also "connects" with other beams in various situations, where both beams meet in the middle, creating a Spell Lock. Then each player uses a slider to move the beam towards the other player by being closest to the slider's target value.New Chapters with more story and activities will be released over time. Around one chapter every 1-2 months is the goal. Chapters have 12-20 tasks in them each. Game will be released with the first 4 chapters.Storyline Roadmap- Chapter 1 lays the base story and is mostly cutscenes unlocking primary buildings and introducing you to the game characters.- Chapters 2-5 is unlocking buildings and quests, with some of monster fights to introduce combat to the player.- Chapters up to 20 "planned" and in testing but not listed to comply with Steam rules. Regular content updates planned.

Detailed Description: "Bunny Space Odyssey: The Countdown" is a hidden objects game: you need to find 100 eared helmets.Explore the scientist's lab, find all the bunny helmets, and start delving into the story of the hopping pixel universe.Just click on the helmet if you find it - and the countdown will begin! Make sure to catch everything! "Bunny Space Odyssey: The Countdown" can be considered a prequel to the big story of the planet FlopHop, so you can also discover parts of the bunny world narration while searching for the helmets. Click on those items where the cursor becomes a magnifying glass instead of a carrot - and you will learn more about the Bunny Space Odyssey world.Will rabbits fly away from Earth, where life is becoming dangerous? Are you ready to embark on this mission?Get achievements for finding helmets, reading lore, playing with the timer and setting new records! Is everybunn ready?Find the link under the 'Basic Info' tab and join the AinkOink Discord Server!
Short Description: Seek out and collect bunny helmets scattered across the laboratory. But wait, bunny helmets with ears? Perhaps the veil of mystery will be lifted, revealing why we're collecting these ear-topped helmets?

Detailed Description: You're invading the peaceful and friendly life of kind vegetables and fruits. Use reward to improve your skills and potato guns in the fight against the fruit and vegetable civilization. Play from third person or top down view.You can choose your own style of play, aggressively and ruthlessly fight with the inhabitants of the fruitland or think through your every move. You can act quietly and stealthily so as not to attract a lot of attention. Fight with crowds of cute fruits and vegetables, or try to make friends with them by planting on a special farm. Your goal is to steal a fruit or vegetable that is needed to make a cocktail. After that, you have to deliver cocktail to the bar. But be careful, fruits and vegetables are able to fight back against anyone who wants to use them for their own purposes.
Short Description: Survivor - Welcome to Fruitland. Your task is to Improve yourself more efficiently than the residents of the city. Improve your skills, weapons and unlock new items, but don't forget that the Fruits and Vegetables are getting stronger too!
