Detailed Description: Step into the grim and eerie depths of the city sewers, where a catastrophic toxic chemical spill has mutated parasites that attacks the local insects and animals and turning them into bloodthirsty abominations. You, as an employee of T.E.N.A.C, is tasked with navigating the hazardous environment to cleanse it of the toxic chemicals that have transformed animals and insects into vicious mutants.Survive the Nightmare Below:In Zooparasite, prepare to face a relentless mutated creatures that will stop at nothing to end your life. Armed with only your wits and a flashlight, you must outmaneuver and outsmart these grotesque monstrosities if you have any hope of making it out alive from the sewers.Unravel the Mystery:As you progress deeper into the darkness, uncover the chilling truth behind the chemical spill and the horrifying experiments conducted in the shadows. Beware, for the more you learn, the more sinister the truth becomes.Key Features:Terrifying Atmosphere: Experience an intense and immersive horror experience as you navigate the dimly lit and claustrophobic sewers infested with mutated creatures.Challenging Gameplay: Survive against a variety of deadly mutants that will test your courage, resourcefulness, and quick thinking at every turn.Exploration and Strategy: Explore the labyrinthine tunnels, scavenge for resources, and plan your every move to outsmart the relentless mutants hunting you down.Mysterious Narrative: Unravel the dark secrets hidden beneath the city streets and piece together the truth behind the catastrophic events that led to the mutant outbreak.Immersive Sound Design: Immerse yourself in the horror with spine-chilling sound effects and a haunting soundtrack that will keep you on the edge of your seat.Are you ready to face the horrors lurking below? Can you survive the nightmare and emerge unscathed, or will you become just another victim of the Parasite?

Detailed Description:
Embark on an epic journey with a courageous band of adventurers as they brave perilous landscapes and face formidable foes in their pursuit of a long-lost relic of unimaginable power.
Through treacherous terrains and daunting challenges, they remain resolute in their mission, fueled by a steadfast determination to safeguard their realm from impending catastrophe.
Delve into a world teeming with action, where every twist and turn unveils new mysteries and dangers lurking in the shadows. 
Magic crackles in the air, infusing the narrative with an enchanting allure that will enthrall readers seeking thrills and escapades in a fantastical realm.

Features:
Full Audio Narration: Immerse yourself in the tale with captivating audio narration that brings every character and scene to life, enveloping you in the heart of the adventure.
Autoplay Mode: A hands free mode to enhance your audiobook experience.
Normal Play: For those who prefer a more leisurely pace, experience the adventure at your own rhythm, savoring every moment of the visual novel-style storytelling.
Unraveling Mysteries: Piece together the puzzle of the artifact's past and its significance, as each clue and revelation brings you closer to unlocking its true power and purpose.

Join the Adventure and let your imagination soar on wings of fantasy and wonder!

Detailed Description: Join The DiscordAbout the GameMusgro Farm is a 3D incremental farming factory game. Start off with a modest farm on a small plot of land and grow it into the farming empire of your choosing. You start with only a couple basic crops to sell, but you'll soon be able to unlock more crops and increasingly complex systems.Fields will grow crops over time. Buildings will assemble recipes. Vehicles will pick up, deliver, and sell products. You can invest in improving the efficiency of each one, but you'll need to balance your choices to avoid overwhelming any one part of the chain. If you wish to pursue peak efficiency then you'll want to optimize your layouts, invest in the right upgrades, and plan out your technology choices. Or you can just relax and watch as the farm runs and the numbers go up.Musgro Farm incorporates elements from both incremental games (near-infinite upgradability, exponential level growth, huge numbers) and factory games (logistics, supply chains, recipes, layout planning). While the game has a relatively chill atmosphere, there are a plethora of optimizations available to accelerate your progress. Build in whichever style you want: a simple farm following market trends, or a massive farming empire spanning for miles and churning out a vast array of complex recipes.
Short Description: Plant crops, combine them into recipes, and distribute them for sale in this incremental factory game. Optimize your layouts and reinvest in your infrastructure to maximize your output. Gain experience to unlock new technologies and expand your ever-growing farm.

Your saves carry over!About the GameForged by battle,Perfected by alchemy,First of his kind,Last line of our defence,Bellator di Alchemia.Castle of Alchemists is an action-RPG and tower defence hybrid where you take on the role of Bellator, an alchemically enhanced super soldier and fight against relentless hordes of enemies from other worlds.Craft items with randomised abilities that only a super soldier can wield, lay down deadly traps and build towers, mutate and advance to your perfection.Crush hordes of enemies as you reclaim the castle from the invaders piece by piece. If they come by the thousands, by the thousands they shall fall.Battle and defeat thousands of invaders from different factions with unique abilities, from a selection of more than 2 dozens of enemies.Craft an arsenal of weapons and items with randomised properties.Mutate and hone your skills through detailed skill trees.Number of traps and towers, each with a range of variants.Apply more than 10 conditions to enemies—slow them, stun them, burn them, freeze them, and more.Utilise synergies to quickly dispatch enemies: put metal traps struck by electric, set ablaze oils, or electrify acid puddles to spread explosive poisonous gases.Advance through levels set in diverse locations; the mines beneath the castle, the bustling forges of engineering, and silent lecture halls devoid of alchemists.Face bosses in special arenas, never-ending hordes in endless levels, or the challenges in increased difficulty mode for greater rewards.  We are a two-person team working on this game with all our power. We are open to your feedback and want to develop this game with you to its best. Join our discord to give instant feedback and be notified about the game updates!

Detailed Description:
It‘s almost midnight again, what's left on today's to-do list? Reply to Client 1's message, finish and send the adjustments requested by Client 2, remind Client 3 about the payment, submit an entry for the competition, help a friend with a new piece by drafting a brief background melody — just postpone that for another day. Hmm... need to buy medicine, take medicine, fix the plumbing, get the train ticket refunded, water the mint... Buying medicine involves filling out forms and making calls, such a hassle, and the pharmacy is closed now anyway, let's deal with it later... A leaky pipe isn't a big problem anyway... Hmm, my stomach hurts a bit, seems like I haven't eaten dinner yet, no wait, I skipped lunch too, but I had a whole bottle of sugary soda — should be ok I guess. How much money is left in my account?... Oh god, when will all this end?... At least the ceramic pot holding the mint is cute, the rustling sound it makes when getting touched under the moonlight delivers a sense of life, as if something in the world will persist forever...

This is a puzzle-solving game involving countdowns and tasks. The game attempts to discuss how people balance the "constrained, fleeting life" with the "grand, eternal humanistic ideals." The main character of the game is a young musical artist named Daan van Leeuwen. Players need to complete tasks to maintain the character's vital signs while simultaneously searching for clues of puzzles to complete different artistic creations following the character's inspirations before the countdown ends. 

One gameplay session will be no more than 15 minutes. If you are experiencing any form of financial hardship, feel free to return for a refund before the trial period ends.

Warning! This game involves mental health issues, and the main character has suicidal tendencies. Please approach with caution. If you feel uncomfortable at any point, please pause the game immediately and seek help.
Short Description: "There is but one truly serious philosophical problem and that is suicide. Judging whether life is or is not worth living amounts to answering the fundamental question of philosophy."

Detailed Description: Have you ever wanted to be the Captain of a space troop?The Comet Force is waiting for your leadership...Comet Force is a Space Arena Shooter Action Roguelite. Build and develop your camp, recruit to compose and grow your troop, collect upgrades and unique effects, and fight ever more waves of enemies. Will your troop remain strong enough to survive until the end? LEAD YOUR TROOP & FIGHT ENEMIESRecruit units from various weaponry classes and grow your troop. Lead your members in fast-paced battles and watch them fight alongside you. Dodge bullets and keep your Captain alive at all costs. Eliminate all enemies and bosses, wave after wave. Collect gems from destroyed enemies. Enjoy a unique sci-fi visual mix of isometric 2D and 3D pixel art with dynamic lighting BUILD YOUR CAMPBuild a camp around the fighting arena. Leverage structures and their unique functionalities: troop quarters, academy, training center, research lab, and more. Upgrade your buildings and unlock new possibilities to improve your troop. Place turrets to assist your troop in combat. Manage your resources wisely to keep up against the enemy waves getting stronger.GET UPGRADESIncrease the strength and health of your troop units. Discover and pick various unique effects to improve the weaponry of classes and give the Captain new abilities. Research new camp blueprints and class weapons. Strategize and adapt to the RNG to build synergies and experiment various play styles.EXPAND YOUR KNOWLEDGEPick your starting Captain among a pool of candidates. Unlock new possibilities for future games. Fill your journal and complete achievements.ABOUT RADIANT SLOTHRadiant Sloth (he/him) is a solo indie game developer from France, He has a passion for creating action roguelikes, and is committed to ethical and sustainable game development. In particular, he strives to maintain honest and transparent communication with the community, advocates awareness of carbon footprint and climate issues, and bans generative AI tools from his creation process.

Detailed Description: In the near Future, a mysterious plague spread, trapping people in endless nightmares from which they could not wake.The Dreamers are a rare group of individuals, gifted with a power called the Dreamers Foresight, allowed them to enter the dream realm.Liquid memories allowed Dreamers to enter other peoples nightmares , But once inside, Dreamers must find and destroy the core of the nightmare. Only then can the dreamer wake.Build your worldBuild As you explore the Dream realm, Find & collect biome Tiles. Strategically align similar tiles to earn better loot.Dynamic Deck BuildingBuild your deck with variety set of cards. Pick cards that work together to defeat nightmare creatures.Challenging CombatBattle nightmare creatures each with unique abilities, while balancing your energy between attack and defense.The Game still a sandbox for your ideas, share your ideas in Discord

Detailed Description: WASDJK is a maze adventure game, but you won't be able to see the maze scenes like in regular games, and only have chaotic operation hints to guide your path. Game controls: From the game name, it can be seen that the game will use WASDJK operation. If you choose to use a controller, the direction control will use the cross key operation, but it will not replace the display of WASD operation. Game mode: -Stage Mode: The basic plot flow allows you to cross traps, challenge strong enemies, and face the final showdown during this maze journey.-Endless Mode: Unlocked after passing through the Stage Mode, there is 2 different types of survival racing challenges.

Detailed Description: The English version of the game is mechanically translatedGame DescriptionThe game is a horizontal shooting game with 5 levels. In the levels, you can get various guns to defeat the enemy, as well as vehicles suitable for the scene to help you pass the level. Each level will add several new enemies, and there is a powerful boss at the end of the level.Plot DescriptionA city is infected with something called "coal", and all the infected bodies will gradually change from the head to "coal" and become aggressive. By the time the news reached the outside world, almost all of the city had been infected. The government sealed off the city and sent two elite fighters into the city to investigate. The two fighters start from the very outskirts of the city and work their way deeper into the city, eventually finding the source in the center of the city.Discussion GroupSince this game is made by me alone, I may encounter various problems, if there are any problems, please add QQ group: 417085785

Detailed Description:
Welcome to CAD Smart Modeling, your complete solution for precise 3D modeling and innovative design! Whether you are an architect, engineer or DIY enthusiast, our app offers powerful features to help you turn your creative ideas into reality.

Characteristics:

• 3D modeling made easy: Use our intuitive tools to create stunning digital models. Whether you are a professional or a beginner, you will achieve amazing results.

• Precise Design: Access advanced design tools to create detailed models for architecture, product development, and more.

• Versatile and innovative: Discover the world of 3D modeling, digital design and product development in a single application.

• Home Improvement and DIY Projects: CAD Smart Modeling is the perfect companion for DIY enthusiasts. Plan, design and build effortlessly with our tools.

• Export and Share: Save your models in various formats and share them with others. Show the world what you've created or collaborate seamlessly with colleagues.

• Creativity without limits: Unleash your imagination and create impressive models for architecture, product design, 3D printing and more. CAD Smart Modeling gives you the freedom to make your visions become reality.

• Tools for all applications: Whether technical drawing, geometric modeling, surface modeling or prototype construction – our app offers the tools for every requirement.

• Creative 3D Modeling: Create unique and impressive 3D models or 3D texts for your social media platforms and impress your followers.

• Import CAD models: Use the import function and easily integrate your own 3D models or select from a variety of 3D models on the Internet to quickly and easily load them into CAD Smart Modeling.

Whether you're a hobbyist, student or professional designer - CAD Smart Modeling is the perfect app to turn your creative ideas into reality.

Download CAD Smart Modeling now and discover the endless possibilities of 3D modeling and design!

Detailed Description: Silent Frontiers: A Gripping 2D Side-Scrolling Strategy Tower Defense Extravaganza. In this forgotten frontier, you become the final line of defense for your city, warding off relentless hordes of monstrous invaders. This is not just a battle for survival; it's a supreme test of wit and strategy.As the campaign unfolds, meticulously plan the growth of your city, utilizing scarce resources to drive a technological revolution, transforming rudimentary defenses into impregnable fortresses. Each upgrade represents not only a surge in power but also a leap in strategic depth.Amidst mounting pressure, skillfully deploy your troops and harness unique skill combinations to construct an impenetrable line of defense. Whether deploying skills or positioning combat units, every decision counts, directly influencing the tide of war.Silent Frontiers demands not just construction but innovation – finding hope amidst despair and illuminating the path forward with wisdom. In this world brimming with uncertainty and challenge, you are both architect and guardian of your city, guiding your people towards the light or risking their fall into the abyss of darkness.Prepare yourself to step into Silent Frontiers, where in this contest of intellect and bravery, you'll prove your strategic prowess by safeguarding these silent frontiers until the very end.
Short Description: Jump into a 2D side-scroller tower defense that's easy to pick up but hard to master. Develop, upgrade, build, and customize troops to defend your territory. Blend strategy and creativity to forge your unique defenses and guard the border.

Detailed Description: Roadlike brings the excitement of classic arcade racing into a modern roguelike setting. Each stage is a new adventure, with procedurally generated tracks that span diverse biomes, from vibrant cityscapes to tranquil meadows. No two races are the same, offering endless surprises and challenges.Unique Biomes: Experience a wide range of environments, each with distinct aesthetics and obstacles.Dynamic Tracks: Procedurally generated tracks ensure a fresh experience every time you race.Ever-Changing Challenges: Adapt to new situations and environments in every race.Customization is key in Roadlike. Do tricks and collect coins during stages to enhance your car with a variety of upgrades, from drift boosts to protective shields. Each upgrade path creates a unique build.Dynamic Upgrades: Equip your car with a range of enhancements to suit your racing style.Unique Builds: Experiment with different combinations to find the optimal setup for various challenges.Strategic Depth: Each playthrough offers new opportunities for strategic customization.In Roadlike, the path you take is as crucial as the race itself. Navigate the map to choose your route, each offering unique challenges and rewards. Whether you seek the scenic beauty of nature or the thrill of urban streets, your choices shape your adventure.Strategic Route Selection: Choose your path based on the challenges and rewards you seek.Branching Paths: Explore different routes for varied gameplay experiences.Influence Outcomes: Your route choices directly impact your race strategy and progression.
Short Description: Roadlike is a roguelike arcade racing game combining classic high-speed thrills with procedurally generated tracks. Customize your car with upgrades and enjoy endless replayability, racing solo or with friends in local multiplayer!

Whether you seek the scenic beauty of nature or the thrill of urban streets, your choices shape your adventure.Strategic Route Selection: Choose your path based on the challenges and rewards you seek.Branching Paths: Explore different routes for varied gameplay experiences.Influence Outcomes: Your route choices directly impact your race strategy and progression.

Detailed Description: [About this game]It's a hybrid of first-person shooter and space combat.There are enemies and allies on the field.Enemies and allies are fighting.Normal fields play as a first-person shooter set in a desolate land, but in order to increase your stats you need to go into inner space and defeat enemy spaceships.There are 10 water tanks placed on the field, and water obtained by defeating targeted enemies will be injected into each water tank until it is filled.The goal of the game is to fill all water tanks.

Detailed Description: BUILD YOUR SHOP Upgrade your store by adding walls, doors, furniture, and decorations to expand your space. These improvements will open up new opportunities to attract more customers. But remember, expanding too quickly can have damaging consequences if not managed carefully.WELCOME CUSTOMERSAs your business grows, so does your customer base. But you need to manage this influx carefully to avoid excessive queues and dissatisfaction. And beware: some customers may have unexpected surprises in store for you...LEVEL UPAs you level up, you will unlock new products to sell, furniture to decorate your store, new job opportunities to strengthen your team, and more.COMPLETE MISSIONThroughout your adventure, you'll have the opportunity to complete a variety of missions that can be very rewarding. These missions are designed to provide a varied experience and avoid repetition. In addition to the rewards, these missions can be upgraded over time to become more difficult, but also more lucrative. Missions are unlocked based on your experience level, allowing you to progress and discover new challenges as you become more skilled.Other characteristics: Improve your character In addition to developing your store, you'll have the opportunity to improve your character's skills. Improve your sales efficiency to attract customers faster, earn more money selling furniture, or master inventory management to increase your profit on items.Talking to the locals The inhabitants of Marketing City can reveal key elements of the game's storyline, give you invaluable advice on your daily life, give you useful tips on how to manage your shop, or even inform you about trends in the product market: which items are selling for more today, or conversely, which items are being bought for more...Master item scanning Use QTE combos to scan items efficiently and earn cash or XP bonuses. Stay focused, as a mistake could break your combo and cause you to lose your benefits.

Detailed Description: OverviewOdd Night is a psychological horror game that places you in an endlessly repeating corridor in a Victorian mansion. Every time you enter the corridor, something will change. Make sure to memorize all the details of the room, so you can spot any differences once they occur.Use the camera to take pictures of everything that seems odd. You are only allowed to take one picture per loop, so be sure to not waste it. Taking pictures of things that are supposed to be there counts as a mistake and will reset you to the start.Test your limitsThis game tries to put you in stressful situations of varying degrees. Anomalies can be small deviations in the structure of the corridor, but they can also open up completely new parts of the world or, in the worst case, even try to end your run for good.Esacpe the loopEvery time you clear a room correctly, your current streak increases. Every mistake will reset your streak to 0. If your streak reaches a high enough count, you win the game.
Short Description: You're stuck in an endlessly looping hallway, but every time you enter it, something seems to be different. Try to spot everything that isn't supposed to be there, but most of all, make sure to get out alive.

Detailed Description:
"The Hope" immerses players in a chilling first-person horror survival experience, where they assume the role of Sebastian, a grieving father haunted by the disappearance of his daughter, Emily. When Sebastian receives a mysterious letter beckoning him back to his long-forgotten hometown, he embarks on a desperate journey filled with perilous encounters and heart-wrenching revelations.

As players step into Sebastian's shoes, they find themselves thrust into a town veiled in darkness, its streets echoing with the whispers of forgotten secrets and lurking terrors. Armed with only a dim flashlight and his unwavering determination, Sebastian must navigate through the eerie landscape, uncovering clues and confronting the horrors that lurk in the shadows.

Driven by the faint glimmer of hope that Emily may still be alive, players must traverse abandoned buildings, winding alleyways, and sinister landmarks, all while contending with supernatural entities and enigmatic puzzles that block their path. Every step forward brings Sebastian closer to the truth, yet also deeper into the heart of darkness that envelopes the town.

As the narrative unfolds, players will unravel the tragic history of Sebastian's old town and confront the malevolent forces that seek to consume it. Along the way, Sebastian's own sanity will be tested, as haunting visions and spectral apparitions blur the line between reality and nightmare.

Through immersive gameplay mechanics and atmospheric storytelling, "The Hope" challenges players to survive against overwhelming odds, using their wits and resourcefulness to outmaneuver the horrors that await. Can Sebastian uncover the truth behind Emily's disappearance and rescue her from the clutches of darkness, or will he become lost in the labyrinth of despair that threatens to consume him?

With its hauntingly beautiful visuals, spine-tingling sound design, and emotionally resonant narrative, "The Hope" promises an unforgettable journey into the depths of fear and despair. Will Sebastian's quest for redemption end in triumph or tragedy? The answer lies in the player's ability to navigate the darkness and hold onto hope in the face of overwhelming despair.
Short Description: Join a desperate father in his quest to find his daughter, in this first-person horror survival game. Unravel the mysteries of his old town and confront unimaginable horrors to reunite with his lost daughter.

Detailed Description: Painted In Blood is currently in development.A Love Letter To All My Beloved FPS GamesWith 30 years single-player FPS gaming history, I created this game with my whole life's passion, I want to use this game to express my love to the FPS genre, let you adventure through a strange world full of dangers, imagination and excitement;  kill eerie monsters from your weirdest dreams with badass weapons.  Finally, to realize my creative vision as an artist to the interactive medium.Game FeaturesImmersive Single-Player Campaign:Experience a linear and focused single-player campaign with intense combat actions, eschewed open-world mechanics and sprawling skill trees in favor of a tightly-paced journey rich in atmosphere and excitement.Vivid And Atmospheric Environment:Painted In Blood utilizes a dark and gritty aesthetic to create a deeply immersive world. Environments not only boast distinct tones and settings but also employ visual storytelling techniques to enhance player experience. Dynamic Psychological Horror:Inspired by the creator's childhood curiosity of the unknown, Painted In Blood features a dynamic sanity system that alters gameplay and visuals based on your actions. Brace yourself for unexpected horror events triggered by your performance and mental state. Unrelenting Combat:Encounter a bestiary of unique enemy designs, each with distinct behaviors. Master the art of combat as you adapt to the challenges posed by mixing different enemy types.High-Fidelity Pixel Art:Powered by Unreal Engine 5, Painted In Blood pushes the boundaries of pixel rendering. Imagine a world where technology embraced 2D sprites, resulting in a visual style that blends classic aesthetics with cutting-edge technology of today.
Short Description: Trapped in the haunting realm of an artist's twisted nightmare, engage in intense combat with grotesque enemies and monsters, experience unpredictable horror events that unfold dynamically, seamlessly blends classic retro FPS elements with modern elements.

Detailed Description: Game Description:This is a battle simulation game that uses real maps as combat scenes.The design purpose of this game is to simulate real-life battles in a game like manner, providing military enthusiasts and even military staff with the means to analyze and simulate real-life battles.The characteristics of this game:1. You can customize battles and publish them to other players for use; 2. The authenticity of the battle:1) Combat movement is carried out on real-life road scenes;2) The data of combat units is the data of real weapons that the author can find (which will be open to players for voting and editing later);3) The core data in combat is resource consumption, including food, fuel, funds, etc. Similarly to reality, insufficient food can cause a decrease in morale, insufficient fuel, and the inability of armored forces to move;4) The battle is mainly based on player commands, which cannot be changed in real-time. The commands need to be changed in time according to the combat situation to achieve the simulation effect of actual command5) Combat units have actual ammunition supply needs, and if ammunition is insufficient, they cannot attack;6) The distinction between our control, enemy control, our occupied area, enemy occupied area, neutral area, and different areas have an impact on the movement of troops, and the intelligence of troops has an impact on the visible situation of the enemy7) The army has morale, which can be adjusted based on multiple factors. The morale of the army has an impact on its accuracy and can lead to various situations such as collapse and surrender

Along your way you will face multiple enemies and bosses, and the longer you survive the more Quantum Shards you will receive allowing you to increase your base power.SSS brings back the nostalgic feel of arcade games with a modern twist.Use quantum shards to permanently upgrade your ships to allow you to fight to even greater heights.Features Multiple weapon types A skill tree for Meta progression, including but not limited to new weapons, increased base stats, and additional choices 5 unique enemies, 2 elites that spawn every 15 levels. Roguelike upgrade choices while you play.

Detailed Description:
You are a kunoichi who sneaked into Oedojou.

If you think it's not Japan, turn back.

If you think it's Japan, don't turn back.

Escape from patrolling soldiers.

"Oedoshigusa" is a short stealth walking simulation in which the player proceeds while judging what seems to be Japanese culture,
Japanese culture is a short stealth walking simulator.
The "Japanese culture" is based on the author's own prejudice and mood at the time of creation.

It is a so-called "8 like" game and has nothing to do with "Exit 8".

■Play time
10 to 20 minutes

Video distribution guideline
You can distribute the video without permission.
Monetization is possible within the range of functions provided by video distribution sites.
BGM is not included in this work.

Cautions
Ver1.00 requires mouse operation to start the game.

Detailed Description: TOKYO DRIVE is a racing game that uses the location information (*) of actual roads and buildings in Tokyo, Japan (Tokyo's 23 wards).This game is about enjoying driving a car on an open-world map that reproduces (*) the location of real roads.[Features]Most of the roads in Tokyo (Tokyo's 23 wards) are reproduced.Let's drive on the roads of the vast Tokyo Metropolis (Tokyo's 23 wards) (about 600 square kilometers).Fast travel function is available.Day and night cycle (morning to night) is available.You may become familiar with places and roads in Tokyo (23 wards of Tokyo).Can be played on non-high spec PCs.(Can be played with on-board graphics (integrated graphics)).[Reproduction of roads and buildings] (*)Bridges (including overpasses) are not reproduced.The elevation (topography) where roads and buildings are located is not reproduced.(All roads are flat.) (Since there are many cities and few mountainous areas, there are no plans to support this feature at this time.)(The size of buildings is as close to the actual size as possible.)The location, size, and names of roads and buildings are current as of the time of positioning and may differ from the latest information.The appearance of roads, ground, and buildings are automatically set and may differ from the actual ones.　(Only the location and size of roads and buildings are reproduced.)The names of the buildings are mainly public institutions information on the in-game map. (Schools, stations, police stations, fire stations, post offices, etc.)(*)Information from MLIT Japan's Project PLATEAU is used.[Remarks]Currently (at the time of Early Access), it is only possible to drive in the game.　We are planning to add various functions and improvements in the future. Please check the Early Access information in the store for details.Please also refer to the Community Hub's Q&A for current developments. The author is not responsible for any disadvantages caused by the use of this game.    (For example, the author cannot be held responsible if the road information is out of date.　  ) Also, since the game contains a huge amount of road information, it requires several tens of gigabytes of space when installed, so please make sure you have enough free space to play.

Detailed Description: "Dream Addict" is an action RPG set in a world of dreams. In this dream world, various animals and monsters inhabit the landscape. You’ll use swords and skills to defeat these creatures, earning "Battle Memories" in the process. These memories can be materialized at your home base to unlock new skills. By defeating enemies and exploring the dream world, you’ll grow stronger as you strive to reach the edge of your dreams. As you become addicted to this dream world, what will you discover at its end?The World of DreamsDreams are a manifestation of your complex emotions and consciousness. The monsters and inhabitants you encounter are projections of your own mind. Some may turn against you, while others may assist you on your journey. The dream world is a maze of interconnected dreams, where you, as an addict, will wander endlessly. The experiences you gain in these dreams will be the key to navigating this world.SkillsThis system allows you to harness various powers in the dream world, limited only by your imagination. You’ll dream up new abilities based on the memories you’ve collected in your journey. Certain combinations can unlock powerful effects, and you might even discover entirely new abilities. Find your own unique skill set and use it to your advantage as you explore.HomeThis is the house where you reside. It serves as your base of operations, where you can sleep to enter different dream worlds and where you can materialize new skills or enhance existing ones using the memories and experiences you’ve gathered. There may be other things to explore in your house as well...The Dream MasterDeep within the dream world lies a powerful monster, known as the Dream Master. Battles with the Dream Master are inescapable and must be fought to the death. Defeating them allows you to progress to the next dream world and obtain materials needed to create powerful new skills.

Detailed Description: You are the Eye of the Summoner. Protect your tower from the fiendish hordes of paladins attempting to destroy it. Summon your beloved creatures of the darkness and fight to keep the flame of your beacon alive for as long as possible. Collect gold from the battlefield to produce more fighters and repel the righteous invaders.You start your mission with three different units, each with its perks and weaknesses: the Shielder, slow but steady, is ideal for defending; the Scout, fast but weak, is great for collecting gold; and the Blitzer, strong but reckless, is good for attacking in groups.Recycle the souls of your minions to create new and stronger units to contrast the ever-growing menace of those arrogant knights.

Detailed Description: What is this game ?"death Finder" is horror game made by individual and powered by Unreal Engine 5.How to Play?you find yourself outside an old abandon hospital have to look five files of five different people but it is not that easy as there are unpredictable horrors lurk around every corner. you lose when monsters caught you or big giant spiders and when win collected all the five folders and got to the exit door, various jump scares. you also have a door that is locked by a key which you will find in Harp's Office. another door which is locked by a lever in the basement which is allocated in the room before the locked door room. And last door which is locked by password and the password are allocated inside the building next to doors and are 4 numbers (Pay attention to all the details). once you start press F for the flash light as the main theme is darkness, and start looking for the folders, restart when caught by spiders/monster and start againWhat Can you get in the game ?:Monsters/SpidersJump scaresMissions like collecting folders to win the game at the endSome puzzles
Short Description: horror experience, with puzzles to be solved and collecting files to win avoiding monsters and big giant spiders. Walk slow, pay attention to details and read all papers when see. Stay away from monsters and Spiders or risk becoming another victim of the abandon hospital

Detailed Description: Gameplay:A dark image covering the entire screen area, without the presence of any additional extraneous stimuli.Details:  «FROM WALKING SIMULATORS AND NOT GAMES TO BLACK SCREEN»New exciting Action/RPGWhen the habit of consciousness to see the embodiment of rules, goals, victories and defeats in computer games disappears, then we will only see a pure, gameplay work of art.I transformed myself with zero incentives and fished myself out of the whirlpool of rubbish of the Computer Games Industry.I destroyed the horizon ring of invisible walls, and left the circle of conventions, from the boundaries of the world in which the game designer and gaming foundations are contained.This damned ring, revealing more and more new things, leads the designer from the goal to death.And only the cowardly consciousness and the paucity of creative forces in the designer succumb to deception and set their games on the rules, fearing to lose the foundation on which the animal and the industry based their games.Making laws, challenges and punishments is like shackling your feet.Only stupid and powerless designers cover their templates with sincerity.Games need freedom, but not sincerity.Conventions have disappeared like smoke for a new culture, and the game moves towards the self-goal of creativity, towards mastery over limitations.Animal games and its principlesThe animal was the first to lay down the principle of the game.Animals, including humans, have been playing for as long as they have existed. This gaming behavior may have medical, psychological and social roots.In some species, games take on a competitive nature to help them survive through skill development. In order for the game to be fair and productive, rules arise.Thus, play is a principle, an instinct, inherent in animals, which contributes to the development of skills and social connections.Consequently, the original scheme of the animal was the framework on which generations hung more and more new discoveries that they found in their animal nature.And the scheme became more and more complicated and reached its peak at the birth of Arcade and Three-dimensional games.The developers of these two periods wrote the game in its full form, both external and internal.The game was assembled, and its internal state was expressed.But despite their enormous skill, they still did not complete the idea of the animal:	Indulging, as in authority, instincts in code.And it is a mistake to believe that their time was the brightest flowering in media and that the younger generation needs to strive for this ideal at all costs.This idea is false.It draws young forces away from the modern flow of life, thereby disfiguring them.Their bodies fly on airplanes, and art and life are covered with old robes of Meiers and Miyamotos.Therefore, they cannot notice the new beauty in our modern life.For they live on the beauty of past decades.That's why Walking Simulators, Simulators of poor stones, Experimental games, Art games, Not games and Black Screen were incomprehensible.These designers threw off the robes of the past and stepped out into modern life and found new beauties.And I say:	That no industry dungeons can withstand the coming time.	Concepts move and are born, and we make new and new discoveries.	And what is open by us cannot be closed.	And it is absurd to force our time into the old concepts of the past.The technical side of our time is moving further and further forward, and games are trying to move further and further back.That is why all those people who follow their time are higher, greater and more valuable.And shooters of the 21st century are much more than the former romance and challenge of the Arcade and Platformer period.Fig gardenOur time of the 21st century is multifaceted, many conflicting truths are being fought.A shopping area is imagined, where the crowd looks like collectible figurines that have come out of gaming stores onto the street of experimentalism.They laugh, they are indignant, they are surprised that everything is no longer similar, entertaining. And they rejoice when they see old games, franchises, posters, art books, retro console cartridges, keychains, gamepads or joysticks.At the head of the junk square are experienced sellers-authorities, offering high-quality goods, skillfully woven with aesthetics, taste and fun.And others said more simply: «Pure entertainment and nothing more.»Young people flock to these sales festivals, and smart authorities dress in Sakaguchi’s shirt, Miyamoto’s tie, polo from Meier's time, glasses of modern Miyazakis;covering their heads with a philistine cap, young people flaunt themselves on holidays in the garden of industry genres!And the maestros are happy, because the tombstone was erected on modern young souls. Walks were taken with young people through the garden of industry. Action, immersion, fun, fantasy, replayability — everything was here and seemed brilliant.The cessation of pain seemed like joy, in countless transverse plexuses the nodes of the branches of the skill tree converged, but the authorities immediately tried to dispel this impression and explain that under the muslin of design everything comes out differently — «diversity».And it was no longer a meagerness of thoughts, but a «variety of mechanics»; the whole garden of the industry was obsessed with the number of game elements.There were quests, leaderboards, countdowns, rewards, experience bars, victories, defeats and many others. But where it was no longer possible to hide and the stereotypes overstepped their boundaries, the authorities covered up this debauchery with the fig leaves of graphics.The entire fig garden of the gaming industry was guarded so that the uglies would not penetrate its fence, tear off the fig leaves and destroy the beauty of the garden.The youth fell asleep in fragrant graphic well-being, and only the elders stayed awake, protecting them from evil trends.But one fine day a comet appeared on the horizon, the noise and the whirlwind came to the elders, everything trembled from their whirlwind, the tail of the comet — the Screen — swept away, knocking down all the trinkets of the old foundations.ABANDON THE SUITCASES OF WISDOMWe are the generation of the 21st century — the result of the old and the page of a new book, the credit of time opened to us, we have completed a volume of 5 decades, and a new book of old, outdated foundations has been added to our archive library. There, a wise archaeologist will hide it from time, because time does not tolerate traces of its crime and sooner or later eats them.We divide time with a sharp edge and put on the first page a plane in the form of a Screen, black as a secret, the plane looks at us dark, as if hiding new pages of the future. It will be the seal of our time, on whatever and wherever it is launched, it will not lose its face.We released all the birds from their eternal cage and opened the gates to the animals of the zoological garden.Let them peck and eat the remains of your games.And let the freed bear bathe his body between the ice of the cold North, but not languish in the aquarium of boiled water in the garden of industry.I say to EVERYONE: abandon the foundations, abandon aestheticism, abandon playability, abandon the suitcases of wisdom, because in the new culture your wisdom is ridiculous and insignificant.I untied the knots of wisdom and freed the consciousness of graphics.Quickly take off the rough skin of decades, so that it will be easier for you to catch up with me.I overcame the impossible and made abysses with my breath.You are in the nets of the horizon, like fish!I throw your way.Hurry up!— Because tomorrow you won’t recognize me.
Short Description: This game is nothing more than a dark image covering the entire screen area, without the presence of any additional extraneous stimuli.

Game Name: I Wanna Be A Game Dev!
Detailed Description: Graduation is coming. In other words, everything that makes your life great is about to disappear. But that won't stop you from making the most of senior year!Does that mean making new friends (or lovers)? Buckling down on your passion project? Just chilling out? You decide!Features 15-20 hours of story content! Choose what to do after school, whether that be playing arcade games, hanging out at the maid cafe, or deepening relationships with your classmates! Put your dev skills to the test with a variety of minigames and trivia questions! A fully explorable world!Characters Amelia Lee - The perfect student, who can figure out anything except "what kids are into these days." Britney Summers - A lazy class clown who's only made it this far through sheer luck. Chloe Suzuki - The level-headed girl who keeps everyone on track--or so she wants people to think. Daniel Harrington - Son of the school principal, and he won't let you forget it. And many more!
Short Description: Live out your school days as you navigate the rocky world of game development! Can you make an amazing game, or will something get in the way?

Detailed Description:
You begin play as an unknown person in a vast fictional medieval feudal-simulated sandbox.

Listen to the requests of the citizens, trade, plunder, and serve. You can be a nobleman with a fiefdom, usurp the throne, fight endless wars, or betray. 
You can live many different lives, and the numerous NPCs do the same, each with their own intentions.

The consequences of these actions are just as complex and subject to chance as they are in the real world.

Becoming an emperor, advancing military technology, devastating enemy nations, and conquering the world are not the only answers.
Conflict may lead to new conflicts and a cycle of hatred that will ultimately result in the destruction of everything.

Experience the dilemma between war and peace, between wealth and power and moral , and make the difficult decisions that will change the course of the world and its history.

◆Well-crafted sandbox world
A vast and beautiful open world created in UE5.
Many castles, cities, and villages are spotted throughout the world, with changing seasons and regions to explore, forests, rivers, deserts, and more.

◆Freedom
You begin play as an unknown, untitled person.
As you increase your renown by trading, plundering, and listening to the desires of the inhabitants, you will be able to serve a country.
As you rise in the ranks of your country, you will be granted lands as a nobleman, and eventually you will be able to found your own country and conquer the world.
If you are not interested in power, you can accumulate wealth as a merchant and use your economic power to influence the destiny of the nations, or you can become a notorious bandit and continue to attack the forces you don't like.

◆Massive battle
The battle is a real-time fight in which up to hundreds of soldiers from both sides collide with each other.
Take advantage of the characteristics of each soldier type such as infantry, archers, and cavalry to win the battle by positioning yourself in the most favorable positions!
Don't forget to protect the vulnerable bearers who carry food and trade goods.

◆Procedural Story
In this world, NPCs from various positions will act according to their own intentions and desires.
If you kill a king's beloved, he will move his army against you and take thorough revenge at any cost.
But "the enemy of my enemy is my friend". NPCs who originally hated the king may, on the other hand, take a liking to you and side with you.
The procedural story emerges within the game mechanics as a result of your choices and the conflicts between NPCs, making the playing experience unique.

◆ Dilemma
Unlike many Strategy games, conquering the world is not the only answer.
War can easily lead the world to ruin, creating new conflicts and cycles of hatred.
However, simply taking the peace route may be used by enemy countries and may not be enough to keep the discontent of the inhabitants and the feudal lords at bay.
The difficult dilemma between war and peace, between wealth, power, and morality, always forces you to make tough choices that will change the course of the world and history.
Short Description: A Strategy RPG where you live freely in a vast medieval feudal-simulated sandbox. Listen to the requests of the citizens, trade, plunder, serve, own a territory as a noble, usurp the throne, endless wars, and betrayal. The intertwining of your and numerous NPCs' intentions creates unique stories.

Detailed Description: Welcome, Survivors!"Slime Survivor" is a relaxed, exhilarating, stress-relieving survival game where you collect energy to upgrade various weapons with distinctive features into unbelievably powerful killing machines! Traverse the monster ocean and feel the thrill of mowing down enemies!How to PlaySimply: move your character, dodge enemies, collect rewards, and choose upgrades. Easy to pick up, satisfying to annihilate foes.Diverse combinations abound! With a multitude of vivid characters each with their own distinct personalities, and dozens of weapons and passive skills to mix and match, prepare for a myriad of thrilling combat experiences!

Detailed Description: This is Lifting Unlimited, a fun, engaging, powerlifting simulator. Your goal? Become the Strongest Person in the World. Lifting Unlimited involves training and progressing in the three powerlifting lifts, the squat, the bench press, and the deadlift. Immerse yourself in the world of powerlifting! Lifting Unlimited’s realistic weightlifting progression patterns make it a challenge to discover the most efficient way to make progress in each lift. But be wary of large weight jumps which risk an injury! Keep your nutrition up by drinking frequent protein shakes to ensure you continue progressing. Once you are sufficiently strong, you can compete in Local, State, National, and International Competitions, attempting to score the highest total in the three lifts. Your placement in these differing levels of competition earns coins that can be used to customize your character's appearance. Start your weightlifting journey with Lifting Unlimited!
Short Description: Lifting Unlimited is a fun, fast-paced, strategic lifting game. Train in the Bench Press, Squat, and Deadlift to increase your total through difficult progression. Compete in state, national, and international competitions to set Earth-shattering Records! Start your weightlifting journey today!
About the Game: This is Lifting Unlimited, a fun, engaging, powerlifting simulator. Your goal? Become the Strongest Person in the World. But be wary of large weight jumps which risk an injury! Keep your nutrition up by drinking frequent protein shakes to ensure you continue progressing. Your placement in these differing levels of competition earns coins that can be used to customize your character's appearance. Start your weightlifting journey with Lifting Unlimited!

Detailed Description:
Welcome to Topworld, the ultimate adventure in a world full of possibilities! Dive into an epic fantasy medieval world where you have the freedom to write your own story.

In Topworld, every object is destructible. Build your own world by collecting resources and creating fantastic structures. Forge powerful armor and weapons to arm yourself against the challenges of the world.

As a mage, you have an arsenal of unique abilities such as teleportation, a shockwave, a remote-controlled projectile, and even magical fishing! Use these abilities to explore and master your surroundings.

But beware: Topworld is not just a world of building and collecting, but also a world of combat. Face fearsome enemies and engage in exciting battles while wielding swords, drawing bows, and wielding shields.

Beyond combat, there are countless opportunities in Topworld to unleash your creativity. Build houses, lay down paths, decorate with a variety of furniture, and tame wild animals to ride. With terraforming, you can even sculpt the land to your liking, creating rivers and lakes to enhance the beauty of your world. Additionally, you can shape the plant life, designing lush forests, colorful gardens, and serene landscapes that truly make Topworld your own.

And all of this in an enchanting pixel art style that makes Topworld a charming and inviting place. Build your world from the comfort of your own home and embark on an adventure you'll never forget!

Features:
- Every object is destructible
- Crafting system for creating buildings, decoration, weapons and more
- Unique fantasy medieval setting
- Challenging enemies and exciting battles
- Diverse magic abilities
- Build your own puzzles
- Terraforming to create rivers and lakes
- Shape the plant life
- Cute pixel art style that invites dreaming
Short Description: Explore Topworld, a fantasy sandbox game where you, as a mage, uncover a world of possibilities. Craft, build, fight, and create your world in a charming pixel art style. Shape the land to your liking and experience your unique adventure!

Detailed Description: You may also likeAbout the GameA hidden object game where you must find all the bunnies and carrots to complete each level.Key features:🖼️ 15 Unique artworks❓ 1500+ Hidden objects total🐇 750+ Bunnies🥕 750+ Carrots💡 ∞ Unlimited hints if you get stuck♻️ Restore a small number of bunnies / carrots to a painting so you can find them again! 🎵 Music for each artwork (optional)🏆 Achievements⌨️ Use your keyboard to move / zoom in if you have no scroll wheel💾 3x save slots🗑️ Reset progress entirely and play again🕒 ∞ Timer included to show how long you took to complete each levelContext:The brief was simple. I commissioned artists to create a fantasy world, and hide as many bunnies and carrots as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 15 art pieces to choose from, and 1500+ bunnies and carrots, you will have a lot of searching to do.Controls:Use your mouse to move around the image and zoom in / out. When you find a hidden object, click it and it will disappear. You can also use WASD to move and the arrow keys to zoom.Difficulty:All levels start unlocked, your progress is saved as you play, and you have unlimited, unrestricted hints if you get stuck. Using hints will not ruin your score, or affect your ability to unlock achievements. Play at your own pace!Get immersed:Each painting has its own music and ambiance to help you connect with the world, as you search for all the bunnies and carrots!.ReplayableYou can restore a small number of bunnies and carrots back into a painting so you can find them again! It’s much harder when there are only a few hidden objects left (especially randomly). You can also use up to 3 save slots so you can replay without progress loss. Alternatively, you can reset your progress for the entire game if you’d like to start over.

Detailed Description: Welcome to Extermination 1, where fighting for survival is your only option in a world overrun by an unknown virus. As chaos reigns and safe havens vanish, step into the shoes of multiple characters, each with their own unique starting skills, abilities, and weapons. Battle waves of infected enemies to improve your skills and collect weapon upgrades. Forge your path to survival with permanent upgrades, enhancing your abilities after each hard-fought victory. But beware; the challenges ahead are relentless, as you are outnumbered. Liberate land from thousands of infected to create a chance for a better future in Extermination 1.FeaturesPermanent Upgrades: Customize your survival strategy with permanent upgrades that persist across playthroughs, enhancing your abilities and increasing your chances of survival with each successful run.Multiple Playable Characters: Choose from a diverse cast of characters, each with their own unique skills and strengths, offering a variety of gameplay experiences as you navigate the perilous world overrun by the infected.Waves of Infected Enemies: Face relentless waves of infected adversaries, each more challenging than the last, putting your skills and build to the ultimate test as you strive to outlast the relentless onslaught.Superweapons: Unleash the fury of superweapons, combining your top-tier arsenal into devastating weapons of mass destruction. From ingenious modifications to your most powerful firearms, create awe-inspiring tools to turn the tide of battle in your favor.
Short Description: Find the most efficient way to reduce the infected population in casual rogue-lite game Extermination 1. Adapt. Overcome. There are no limits stopping you from snowballing in this reverse bullet hell.
About the Game: Welcome to Extermination 1, where fighting for survival is your only option in a world overrun by an unknown virus. As chaos reigns and safe havens vanish, step into the shoes of multiple characters, each with their own unique starting skills, abilities, and weapons. But beware; the challenges ahead are relentless, as you are outnumbered. Liberate land from thousands of infected to create a chance for a better future in Extermination 1.FeaturesPermanent Upgrades: Customize your survival strategy with permanent upgrades that persist across playthroughs, enhancing your abilities and increasing your chances of survival with each successful run.Multiple Playable Characters: Choose from a diverse cast of characters, each with their own unique skills and strengths, offering a variety of gameplay experiences as you navigate the perilous world overrun by the infected.Waves of Infected Enemies: Face relentless waves of infected adversaries, each more challenging than the last, putting your skills and build to the ultimate test as you strive to outlast the relentless onslaught.Superweapons: Unleash the fury of superweapons, combining your top-tier arsenal into devastating weapons of mass destruction. Detailed Description: Embark on an enchanting adventure as a fledgling witch. You awaken on a world where magic is a tool for creativity, exploration, and connection. Build, Explore, and collect ingredients to craft spells.  Explore a vibrant, hand-crafted world brimming with secrets, enchanted creatures, and rich history. Along the way, you’ll interact with unique creatures, both mundane and magical alike. Grant wishes and help develop towns at Witching Wells. Watch the towns, and your relationship with their denizens, grow.  Dynamic Magic SystemCombine spells and ingredients to create powerful new spells:  Basic spells can be created and combined to create new spells altogether. Mix the glow spell with the Color spell and a touch of light from the full moon and you get the Neon spell. Discover and experiment with many other combinations, both powerful and unorthodox.A Magic Sandbox:  The entire world is your magical sandbox—every object can be affected by your spells. Change the weather, grow a glowing forest overnight, levitate entire villages. Every element of the world is interactive, its potential only limited by your creativity.    Transform objects with your magic: Create flying brooms, magical plants that grow unnatural ingredients, gardening tools that work twice as fast, and many more. Hundreds of hidden behaviors lurk within your possessions and furniture, unlock them with the right spell and a tap of your wand!   Customize your own Witches Den!Build anywhere: Choose the perfect spot in the world to build your magical home. So long as you're willing to endure any hazards or existing residents, every inch of the world is available real estate!Style it to your liking: Craft and customize everything in your den. Create your personal haven according to your tastes, equipped with whatever you decide.Collect functional furniture: From shelves and signs, to cauldrons and wand-crafting stations. Collect functional furniture to aid you in your witchy pursuits!   Towns and WishesGrant Wishes:  Mortals will ask for your magical assistance. Constructing a house built to their specifications, delivering a cake to a friend that lives far away, warding away threats to the town on a full moon, and many other requests that only a witch can handle. Fellow Witches may ask for your help in their endeavors as well.  As you grant wishes, you grow closer with others, revealing new storylines, gifts, and interactions. Watch towns evolve:Some wishes cause towns to grow and change dynamically. Make choices about who moves in, what kinds of buildings are constructed, and how the culture of the town evolves. Create your own hub:Need more stone? Help a quarrier move in.A place to buy alchemical ingredients? Befriend the Potion Shop owner and convince them to open a store in your town. Grow towns and their functions according to your needs.   Exploration and DiscoveryA World of Wonders: Venture across a vast  landscape, each corner of the world offering its own unique environment, lore, and challenges. From tranquil forests to mysterious ruins, every location is brimming with hidden secrets, collectibles, treasures, and stories to uncover. Engage in Minigames and Challenges: The world of Witching Well is filled with delightful surprises. Partake in local festivals, Test your skills in various magical minigames found around the world, help creatures solve their own quirky problems; there's always something fun and rewarding around the corner. Dynamic Living Ecosystem:  The world responds to your actions. Seasons shift, weather patterns change, and creatures roam freely, reacting to your spells and presence. Your interactions with the world shape the environment.
Short Description: Welcome to 'Witching Well,' a magical world where creativity thrives. Master unusual and powerful magic and use it to shape the world around you. Build, decorate and create vibrant villages filled with unique characters. Grant wishes, make friends, and have fun. Your journey begins!

Detailed Description:
"MythicZon is a charming 3D game that combines survival, zombie combat, and resource management. In this game, you'll encounter a terrifying world overrun by zombies, and your goal is to survive while battling hordes of the undead.

Key Features:

Survival: Stay alert and avoid zombie wandering. Use survival skills to endure day and night.
Weapons and Upgrades: Collect different weapons, including rifles, pistols, and grenades. Upgrade your arsenal to enhance its effectiveness against zombies.
Unlocking Doors and Collecting Currency: Explore the surrounding areas, unlock closed doors, and search for money and resources. Some areas may require you to unlock doors to access new areas.
Base Development: Build a sturdy base to survive. Upgrade buildings and enhance security to protect yourself from zombie attacks.

MythicZon offers an entertaining and immersive experience. Are you ready to face the horror and challenges? 🧟‍♂️🔫"
Short Description: "MythicZon: a captivating 3D game merging survival, zombie combat & resource management. Navigate a world overrun by zombies, survive their onslaughts, upgrade weapons & fortify your base. Ready to face the horror? 🧟‍♂️🔫"

Detailed Description: Life isn't easy as a futuristic rideshare driver, especially when people keep leaving bees in your passenger seat. Take the helm in this cyberpunk comedy. Game Name: さいこねえとデスゲーム
Detailed Description:
This is a game about sisters who have decided to participate in a death game, and have to collect bills and deposit them into an ATM in order to survive. Explore to achieve your goals while avoiding TVs that will kill you if you see them, dangerous floating objects, and more.

Floating objects move quietly. If you relax, it will be behind you. A collar with a built-in sensor is attached to the sisters' necks, which reacts to floating objects or the gaze of the television to kill them.

The death game venue is made up of panels. Panels with floating objects on top will turn yellow. Yellow panels are dangerous. If you get too close, you'll die.

This work is created with Unity.

Detailed Description:
In this mechanically challenging 2D hack and slash game, survive through waves of enemies in an ever increasing difficulty, having the satisfaction of feeling your improvement as you learn the enemies and adopt new strategies to deal with them.

Loot, Merge and Upgrade your gear to help you in this difficult adventure.

Beat your friends high score on the endless stage, proving you got the hang of how to survive in Arkhaanis One. 

CONTROLLER HIGHLY RECOMMENDED (the game was not balanced nor made with mouse and keyboard in mind, although it works, it plays a LOT better with a controller).

Detailed Description: to get the latest updates on current and upcoming game relevant news!Possibly find some new friends to play with or against!No Pants!Pantless is a wild, physics-based game where pants are strictly prohibited! Inspired by the likes of Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy, this game challenges players to navigate through increasingly absurd and challenging terrains—all while hilariously lacking trousers. Whether you're flailing up a hill or tumbling towards a new obstacle, prepare for uncontrollable laughter and shouting.Physics-Based Challenges: Master the art of movement with a complex physics engine that makes each step unpredictable.Multiplayer Mayhem: Connect with friends and play through the chaos together in real-time multiplayer mode. Possibly even troll your friends by headbutting them?Vibrant Worlds: Each level brings its own unique theme and set of ridiculous challenges that will test your patience and skills.Customizable Characters: Express your style with a variety of tops, hats, and accessories—pants are off-limits!Baby Mode: Not a fan of relentless difficulty? 'Baby Mode' introduces checkpoints to help you keep your cool.
Short Description: Pantless brings a hilarious twist to the rage-inducing game genre inspired by Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy. In this third-person, physics-based game, players control customizable characters hilariously devoid of pants, navigating through chaotic and fun challenges.

Detailed Description:
Players assume the role of an apocalyptic survivor, establishing defense and survival facilities at their chosen stronghold to maintain survival and accommodate more survivors. 
1. Players collect various resources around the stronghold, create and build various survival facilities and defense weapons. 
2. The enemies in the game have visual and auditory abilities. When exploring outside the stronghold, it is important to use weapons reasonably to avoid being surrounded by zombies. 
3. Introduced defense facilities such as automatic turrets and anti horse defenses to assist players in defending their strongholds. 
4. The number of enemies will increase over time.
Short Description: This is a game that combines construction, shooting, and tower defense with a third person apocalyptic theme. In the apocalyptic environment, let players build apocalyptic strongholds that are suitable for their survival.

Detailed Description: This game is NUTZ! Get ready to dive into an action-packed 2D platformer that pits a group of feisty nuts against a sinister rodent gang! Embark on this nutty adventure where you’ll control our courageous nut heroes, each with their unique abilities, as they navigate treacherous levels and take on massive rodent bosses!!Can you help the Nutz squad restore balance and enact their revenge on the evil rodent gang!?Prepare for intense boss battles that will push your skills to the limit! Each battle will drive you nuts! Massive, Tough, yet sometimes quirky bosses will challenge you in both strategic solo showdowns and chaotic 5v1 free-for-alls. Avoiding screen filled attacks and exploiting their weaknesses will put you through a test of wit and reflexes. These battles are more than just fights—they’re epic nutty chaos!Levels are packed with a ton of collectables waiting to be discovered! From elusive power-seeds that boost your abilities to rare trading cards and comic books that tell stories of this nutty world, there’s always something to find. Gather coins to unlock special features, and hunt down costumes to customize your characters with style! With each level teeming with secrets and surprises, collecting becomes an adventure of its own!Get ready for some nutty surprises! Hidden in every level are awesome bonus rooms waiting to be found! These rooms mix things up with all sorts of fun, from arcade machine challenges to mini-games that’ll keep you on your toes! Each bonus room is a burst of excitement and add a whole new layer of extra fun to your adventure!Play as all 5 nutty heroes, each with their own unique abilities! Learn their platforming playstyle and unleash their powers to take down the rodent gang together!Pete & Penny PeanutMeet Pete and Penny Peanut, the tiny but mighty duo! These twins may be small, but together they're unbeatable! You control both twins as they team up in levels packed with puzzles, challenges, and epic platforming fun! It's all about teamwork as you guide these two through nutty obstacles!Sgt. AcornSay hello to Sgt. Acorn, the tough but lovable leader of the gang! He's got his own special slam attack and a crew of soldier minions ready to help out. Together, they're unstoppable! Get ready for some serious puzzle-solving and obstacle-busting action!Walter WalnutWalter Walnut may be an old-timer, but he's still got plenty of tricks up his sleeve! With his speedy dash attack, he's all about classic platforming fun. And watch out for his surprise gas attacks—they'll catch those sneaky rodents off guard every time!Peggy PistachioIt's Peggy Pistachio, the seed-slinging sassy superstar! She's got powerful pistachio seeds that she can use to blast herself to new heights or take down targets with style. Get ready to solve puzzles, discover hidden spots, and conquer challenges with Peggy's awesome seed shooting power!Game Features:Experience classic 2D platforming reminiscent of beloved titles like Donkey Kong Country, Super Mario, Rayman Legends, and Loco Roco!Dynamic physics-based characters and environments ensure puzzle-solving feels fresh and exciting with each playthrough.Embark on adventures with 5 unique main characters, each with their own abilities and weaknesses, guaranteeing every level offers a fresh challenge.Explore compact levels with both vertical and horizontal traversal, encouraging players to uncover secrets in different ways.Discover hidden collectibles throughout each level, including essential items, readable comics, and cool costumes!Prepare for intense boss battles, featuring both solo showdowns and thrilling 5v1 encounters to keep the excitement flowing.Power-up your characters by upgrading their skills and unlocking new abilities as you progress through the game.Encounter a colorful cast of side characters and enemies, adding depth and variety to your platforming journey.Vibrant and lively worlds, filled with unique enemies that challenge you to navigate carefully towards your goal.Uncover bonus rooms in every level, each tailored to the character in charge, offering exciting surprises and rewards.Discover arcade mini-games sprinkled throughout the game, providing a fun diversion from your heroic nutty adventure.Enjoy a fully unique soundtrack that sets the mood for epic boss battles and adds a chill, yet quirky vibe to your platforming escapades.

Detailed Description: A soul ready for reincarnation mistakenly enters the world of "SHE" in a rule-based  game."The Rule Of SHE" is a role-playing game that explores the character of "SHE"  In each scene, there are various rules that you are required to follow.  Violating these rules will bring misfortune upon you.  By following the guidance of the rules, you will delve into the deeper secrets of this world and uncover the truth hidden behind all these rules.When you have gained insights and understanding of this eerie world, it will be the time for a successful reincarnation.Game Features1,  A poetic short narrative-driven puzzle game.2, A bizarre and slightly eerie world view with up to 20 original BGMs.3, Carefully designed puzzle gameplay where switching between multiple characters can trigger different storylines.4, The game includes boss battles and chase mechanics.Gameplay Rules1, This is not a game with a single storyline. Please explore any and all branching narratives.2, Do not trust me;  trust the rules that are set within each room of the game.3, Remember to turn on the lights during your gameplay.4, The rules of the game do not apply in your real-world life.5, If you find yourself in a dilemma regarding choices, trust yourself.If rules can lead to a deeper level of the world, then what would happen if they are not followed? Between reality and illusion, can you still remember who you are?The choice is yours; it belongs to you.
Short Description: A soul about to be reborn mistakenly enters a world of strange tales filled with rules. Beware! This place is fraught with danger, and to successfully complete the rebirth, you must follow the rules of this world. The world will correct any soul that violates the rules. Will you comply or defy?

Detailed Description: This product is only playable in JAPANESE!This product is only playable in JAPANESE!This product is only playable in JAPANESE!-----"Horoboshihime" is a small and concentrated Roguelike RPG.Small and concentratedThis game is completed by simply advancing 100 steps and defeating the last boss.This game is designed to be short but with crunchy combat and powerful growth.It is a simple adventure that the protagonist alone takes on, but a series of profound choices are continuously pushed upon you.The game takes an orthodox style as an RPG, and you become stronger by leveling up and purchasing equipment.As you level up, you randomly learn skills and abilities (passive effects).There are only 10 skills in total, but they are meticulously designed and can have dramatic effects depending on how they are used.There are only 10 abilities as well, but which ones you choose to set will greatly change your strategy.Roguelike RPGAmong the characteristics of what is called a roguelike,"Horoboshihime" has the following* RandomnessRandom learning of skills and abilities, as well as changing circumstances, allow players to have fun again and again.* PermadeathIf you lose, you lose everything. It is based on the premise of progress through repeated play.High tempo storyThe story is fast-paced. There are no branches.The story takes place in a world on the brink of extinction due to the emergence of monsters with overwhelming power.Humanity has formed an organization called the "Counter's Guild" to resist extinction.The protagonist is "Ayame", a young girl who has joined the guild.Ayame had one strange certainty that others did not.It was an unrealistic and tiny idea, but it drove her to take dangerous actions.Ayame was in a position to influence the fate of many people, and she became unable to turn back.After much conflict, she makes a decision.No WeightBoth in battle and in the story, the game can be played comfortably because inoperable time is eliminated as much as possible.
Short Description: This is a small and concentrated Roguelike RPG. It offers short but crunchy battles and powerful growth. It is a simple adventure that the protagonist alone takes on, but a series of profound choices are continuously pushed upon you.

Detailed Description: ✨🔍  mystical detective furry visual novel  👻✨About the GameOur love for fairytales can stay with us for years and years. We're here to show you that adults love them too. And love them passionately. Or should we say — love the more... passionate fairytales?Here come the spicy readings of famous stories with lascivious beauties, princes, dwarves, giants and witches... Everyone you've been waiting for is here for you!What if the Little Mermaid gets more from the sea witch than just... legs? What if Rapunzel discovers the hidden potential of her hair? Hansel and Gretel are long past being kids, and they're ready to defeat the witch in a different way. And speaking of the Red Riding Hood and the Wolf... Those two can definitely come to a mutually beneficial agreement.In these series you can pick a character who suits you more ❤️What would you prefer?A hot classic? 🍆🍑Steamy manly embraces? 🍆🍆Tender feminine care? 🍑🍑Our all at once? 👀This time we intend to satisfy every request! ❤️There are many retellings of old fairytales, and we want to share our own recipe — perfectly spiced, peppery, and certainly very furry!Features:• Several fairytail stories where you can choose your character’s gender!• Original illustrations• Longer animated sex scenes with sound effects and voiceover• Branching narrative, hard choices, sloppy rewards• Updated Match-3 gameplay with new goals and features
Short Description: ✨Beloved classics in a spicy, furry wrapping. ✨ Adult fairytales with steamy beginnings and happy endings! Choose your character’s gender, solve match-three puzzles, enjoy the fully voiced animations, and find out how your story ends!

Everyone you've been waiting for is here for you!What if the Little Mermaid gets more from the sea witch than just... legs? What if Rapunzel discovers the hidden potential of her hair? Hansel and Gretel are long past being kids, and they're ready to defeat the witch in a different way. And speaking of the Red Riding Hood and the Wolf... Those two can definitely come to a mutually beneficial agreement.In these series you can pick a character who suits you more ❤️What would you prefer?A hot classic? 🍆🍑Steamy manly embraces? 🍆🍆Tender feminine care? 🍑🍑Our all at once? 👀This time we intend to satisfy every request! ❤️There are many retellings of old fairytales, and we want to share our own recipe — perfectly spiced, peppery, and certainly very furry!Features:• Several fairytail stories where you can choose your character’s gender!• Original illustrations• Longer animated sex scenes with sound effects and voiceover• Branching narrative, hard choices, sloppy rewards• Updated Match-3 gameplay with new goals and features
