Detailed Description: Captive: You Are My Idol is a fictional game where the player is kidnapped by their biggest fan with the delusion of them belonging together. During the day, Aylen is encouraged to play his game, and during the evening, she is brought upstairs to enjoy his home-cooked dinners. However, these dinners are the most critical moments for Aylen. Will you, as Aylen, decide to investigate your surroundings and plot your escape? Or will you attempt to deceive your kidnapper with your words? Then again, there's always the third option, where the first two never had a chance to start.Key FeaturesUse point-and-click to examine your surroundings in first person.Made choices that can drastically change how the game ends.Charm your kidnapper or fail miserably.Stealthily solve the Puzzle Cube while your kidnapper tries to find you.Make bad decisions and outright flop in front of your kidnapper.Fall in love with your kidnapper and play his game.Message from the developerHi, I'm TheOdie, creator of Captive: You Are My Idol (referred to as Captive from here on out) and the one and only person of Nightmare Pug Studios. Captive, like most of my games, is to push the boundaries of RPG Maker. In some ways, you can consider my games as experimental horror games. Anyway, the unique concept here is to use 2D and 3D to greatly emphasize the horror and tension between scenes, while adding new elements for each perspective.The story of Captive and its split paths has been an idea since 2020. I hope you find one route entertaining and enjoyable enough to see where the other route(s) take you :).Also! If you're a fan of retro game manuals and behind-the-scenes developments, the supporter edition comes with an eBooklet as my way of saying thanks for your support :D
Short Description: Aylen is a horror let's player who gets kidnapped. One moment, she was shooting the intro for her next video, and the next, she was waking up her biggest fan's basement. There are only two means for escape: examine & plot in secrecy, or use your words to deceive him. Or willingly accept him. (Don't)

Swords and witchcraft , dungeons, dragons and breathtaking intimate adventures. What more can one wish for? After all, fantasy can make the boldest and wettest of dreams come true.And most importantly — all our stories do indeed have a happy… ending! Game Name: Fadin's Vacation in the Parallel Kingdom
Detailed Description: "Fadin's Vacation in the Parallel Kingdom" draws inspiration from 90s classics such as Contra III, Super Mario, Shockman Zero, Excitebike, and Super Metroid. Its aesthetics and difficulty are influenced by games like Celeste. However, make no mistake, "Fadin's Vacation in the Parallel Kingdom" was created to be a new and unique 2D platformer, featuring original characters, vibrant colors, and vastly different stages with each step of the game's progression. Nevertheless, it includes features designed to teach beginner players how to develop and evolve within the game. You control the game using the directional pad and five buttons: action, action2, jump, switch, and dash. In each stage, you'll control new characters: Fadin, Lizyanda, Cowrumble, Pudim, and Mousse, each with their own mechanics and challenges. The game will feature a story mode, a stage selection mode to practice stages, and a challenge mode unlocked through the story mode.
Short Description: Fadin's Vacation in the Parallel Kingdom is a 2D action-platformer that combines elements of Shoot 'em up, Beat'em up, and Metroidvania to challenge players. Explore the parallel realm with Fadin and embark on exciting adventures while facing formidable enemies and uncovering hidden secrets.

Detailed Description: Welcome to the whimsical world of "Apples and Bananas"! Dive into a charming adventure set on Fruit Island, home to various fruit nations and kingdoms. When the mischievous Dr. Banana brainwashes his banana followers to declare war on the peaceful Apple Nation, it's up to Jack the Apple to save the day!In this top-down 2D pixel shooter, guide Jack through colorful landscapes and face off against hordes of brainwashed banana soldiers. With engaging gameplay and fun mechanics, embark on a quest to stop Dr. Banana's evil plans and restore harmony to Fruit Island!Embark on an epic journey filled with humor, action, and fruit-themed fun in "Apples and Bananas"! Will you be able to save Fruit Island from chaos and restore harmony between apples and bananas?

Every level up will give you a chest where you can pick one of 3 goodies inside!Express yourselfDecorate your paintbrush with icons and sparkles! Detailed Description: 🏜️ Sands of Supremacy is a single-player, side-scrolling strategy/resource management hybrid 2D game set in a futuristic desert landscape on an unknown planet. Developed by Divinus Games, the game combines survival, strategy, and resource management elements to create a challenging and immersive gameplay experience.☠️ In Sands of Supremacy, your primary objective is to survive for days, managing resources and defending your base against relentless waves of enemies. The game’s dynamic day/night cycle adds an extra layer of strategy. During the day, visibility is optimal, and you can focus on gathering resources and preparing your base. At night, enemy activity increases, requiring a robust defense strategy to survive the onslaught.⚙️ As the leader, you must control various characters with unique abilities. Each character brings specific strengths and bonuses against certain enemy types. You’ll manage resources like alloy and energy, crucial for constructing and upgrading buildings, and recruiting different types of droids to assist in your defense. Buildings include the Town Center, which is the heart of your operations, various recruiter buildings for different droid units, and defensive walls that can be upgraded to enhance your defenses.⚖️ Prepare to dive into the unforgiving world of Sands of Supremacy, where every decision matters, and every day brings new challenges. As you uncover the secrets of a once-great civilization buried beneath the sands, you’ll need to leverage your strategic prowess and resourcefulness to protect your base and ensure the survival of your people. With its compelling blend of strategy, resource management, and survival elements, Sands of Supremacy promises an engaging and intense gameplay experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Are you ready to lead your people to supremacy in the harshest of environments? The sands await your command!

The game combines survival, strategy, and resource management elements to create a challenging and engaging gameplay experience.

Detailed Description: In Clash at the Crossroads, step into the boots of a lone archer tasked with defending his village against relentless enemy waves. In a vivid 3D medieval world, your precision, strategy, and timing are all that stand between safety and destruction. With intuitive gameplay mechanics, each arrow shot requires careful aim and perfect timing to ensure maximum damage against advancing foes.  FEATURES Engaging 3D Shooter Action: Experience the thrill of defending your village from the vantage point of a watchtower, using only your bow and your wits. Innovative Gameplay Mechanics: Master the unique shooting mechanic, where timing your release at the perfect moment unleashes devastating attacks. Progressive Difficulty: Face increasingly challenging waves of enemies approaching  your village through three distinct converging pathsEmbrace the role of the Archer, and challenge your skills with each wave. Can you protect the village from destruction?

Detailed Description: ABOUT THIS GAMEDuncan, a brave knight is chosen to save his homeland from the forces of darkness, he sets out to defend the Kingdom of Pantheron in hopes of uniting the 5 Dik Crystals, while meeting some interesting people along the way. Match gemstones to defend against creatures and villains while getting to know new friends and allies that will help you on your journey, then enjoy the time spent with them in the best way possible.With each victory, you'll earn valuable coins that can be used to upgrade your skills and abilities, making you an even more formidable fighter. As you progress through the game, you'll encounter new types of enemies, each with its unique strengths and weaknesses. You'll need to use all your wits and strategy to outsmart these foes and emerge victorious. In this game, completing quests will not only earn you rewards and help you progress through the story but also unlock interactions with various characters. These characters will have their unique personalities, backstories, and motivations, and you'll have the opportunity to get to know them better and have fun with them.WORLDThe continent of Orgathus is a vast and prosperous land blessed by a celestial protector known as the Divine One, who was able to achieve peace by sealing away The Dark One, a fell demon and destroyer of worlds, 1,000 years ago with the power of the 5 Dik Crystals. The continent is divided into 5 kingdoms that live in relative harmony, Patheron, the Holy Kingdom of Prosperity, Aurelios, the Kingdom of Enchantment, Aquatous, Kingdom of the Sea, Kharterah, the Draconic Empire, and Luvielle, the Kingdom of the Faire-Folk, all of which are watched over by the Guardian Angels of the Astral Plane, a realm in the clouds. The population of Orgathus mainly consists of male beings who often engage in sexual interaction to honor the Divine One and always expose themselves to the elements, in return, they allow them to live a long and healthy life, as the power of love is the cornerstone of the Dik Crystals' existence and power. As of recently however, the seal has begun to weaken and the darkness has begun pouring back into the world in the form of a demon called Inikka who has sworn himself to the Dark One and has established his own Empire within a nearby land overseas known as the Outerrealms, with the intention of conquering all of Orgathus with his army of The Shadowless, corrupt creatures who can influence the minds of the people, replacing love and compassion with pure lust and aggression, turning them into hulking beasts of unbridled sexual intensity. The only hope of saving the continent is a pure-hearted hero chosen by the Guardian Angels to become the next Celestial Knight to reunite the 5 Dik Crystals within each Kingdom and prevent the resurrection of the Dark One once again.The Holy Kingdom, Pantheron lies at the center of the continent and is a very prosperous country that is very ahead of its time, dedicated to the Guardian Angel Ramiel and the Divine One. Pantheron contains several thriving cities and tribes, home to a large population of humans, elves, and barbarians who live together peacefully, ruled by the kind-hearted King Jericho and his 5 sons. The city is well known for its bountiful harvest as well as its advances in technology thanks to the power of the Earth Dik Crystal entrusted to them by Ramiel to watch over until the day it is needed. The country’s colors are blue and gold to represent the sky and sun, the home of the angels.CHARACTERSRace: Human Age: 22 Hometown: Remaire City, Pantheron Kingdom Occupation: Knight, Blacksmith (part-time) Duncan Carpenter is part of a wide-scale, Blacksmithing family company, currently owned by his father, and next in line to inherit the business as the oldest of the next generation. After the death of his Mother, Duncan swore to do everything he could to keep his Father and younger Brother safe, which became a challenge after the invasion of The Shadowless. After proving himself in battle, the angel Ramiel gifts Duncan the power of a celestial knight to protect the realm from the forces of darkness. Duncan gives all that he can to protect the people of Patheron and beyond, with new friends by his side, he sets out on his journey to find the 5 Dik Crystals, free the continent of Orgathus from the Shadowless, and bring the world into a new era of peace.Race: Elf Age: 21 Hometown: Faldon Village, Pantheron Kingdom Occupation: Retainer James is an elf from a village close to the city, and the grandson of the village chief, polite and noble, James strives to be the very image of perfection. James comes from a highly religious village heavily devoted to the Guardian Angel Ramiel's teachings, home to the Guardian's Cathedral, though he has yet to prove himself, he strives to be a strong a capable protector. After witnessing Duncan help defend his village, he recognizes him as the Celestial Knight and decides that the best way to prove his worth is by his side as his retainer, so he sets off on his journey across Orgathus by his side. Despite his prim and proper nature, he begins experiencing interesting feelings towards Duncan and his company, feelings that he's not sure if he should hold in or let loose for the good of the world.Race: Karnyx Age: 1000+ Hometown: ??? Occupation: None Claiming to have descended from the Astral Plane with no memory of his past, Xander spends his days as a wandering traveler, going from place to place all over Orgathus. Xander has the ability to heal the sick and injured by transferring his own energy into them through sexual contact, at the same time, he is also a bard who often plays a flute. Xander joins Duncan on his quest as he feels a certain familiarity to him, in hopes that he can find his lost memories and return home, though while he appears to be a kind and friendly young man, perhaps there is more to this man than even he realizes.Race: Barbarian Age: 26 Hometown: the Temple of Strength, Pantheron Kingdom Occupation: Retainer Kostas is a barbarian from an expansive citadel north of the kingdom, close to Kharterah, where the people value strength and might above all else, and while he is loud, brash and profane, Kostas is regarded as the champion of the barbarians. Kostas is considered to be the strongest of all, yet, aside from his 12 brothers, he has yet to find an actual challenge where he doesn’t need to hold back his strength until the day the Shadowless invades Pantheon and bears witness to the Celestial Knight Duncan as he defeats them with ease. Kostas declares himself as Duncan’s ward, hoping to find the challenge he has been searching for all his life, intending to come back a true champion worthy of the title, while at the same time, hoping to make Duncan his mate as he sees him as the perfect match for him in many ways.Species: Angel Age: 3000+ Hometown: The Astral Plane Occupation: Guardian of Orgathus Ramiel is the Astral Guardian of the continent of Orgathus, providing health and prosperity to all and does his best to keep the peace, as he is a firm believer that the people should love each other as they would love themselves. Ramiel was once in love with an archangel named Raziel, who saw something good in him that nobody else could see, but the other angels objected strongly to their union, believing that Raziel was nothing more than an Incubus and was corrupting him, so he was banished to the mortal plane. That day, Ramiel swore that he would never let anyone be judged based on appearances ever again, however, after discovering that a demon resembling his former lover, has unleashed the Shadowless on the world, he chooses Duncan as the new Celestial Knight in the hopes that he can save him from himself before he plunges the world into darkness.Species: Incubus (formerly Archangel) Age: 3000+ Hometown: The Outerrealms Occupation: Ruler of the Shadowless Empire Raziel was once an archangel of the mortal plane, watching over humans from the sky and partaking in their traditions and activities while entertaining them with a variety of tricks and trades. He had once fallen in love with the guardian angel Ramiel, who invited him to the Astral Plane, in the hopes of uniting the two planes into one community, a notion that the angels objected strongly to due to their belief that all angels must not directly interfere with humans, accusing Raziel of corrupting Ramiel to abandon his duties as the next guardian. As punishment, Raziel was forced to cover his face with a demonic mask that would not release him until he was to find someone on the Mortal Plane who could love him as himself, which most mortals could not bear to do so as they found his appearance terrifying. Rejected by the very people he thought were his friends, Raziel retreated to the Outerrealms where he chose to become exactly what the world had accused him of being, an Incubus, by unlocking the power of the Shadowless, Raziel, under the name “Inikka” aims to conquer the continent of Orgathus, through pure lust and depravity caused by the Shadowless creatures’ influence. Deep down, he truly hopes that he can find the one person who can free him from his curse.
Short Description: An NSFW match-3 game for fabulous gay or bisexual gaymers, offering light-hearted entertainment and relaxation. Players progress through match-3 rounds, developing their power and skills to conquer handsome and hot guys within the game, engaging in NSFW interactions with them.
About the Game: ABOUT THIS GAMEDuncan, a brave knight is chosen to save his homeland from the forces of darkness, he sets out to defend the Kingdom of Pantheron in hopes of uniting the 5 Dik Crystals, while meeting some interesting people along the way. Match gemstones to defend against creatures and villains while getting to know new friends and allies that will help you on your journey, then enjoy the time spent with them in the best way possible.With each victory, you'll earn valuable coins that can be used to upgrade your skills and abilities, making you an even more formidable fighter. As you progress through the game, you'll encounter new types of enemies, each with its unique strengths and weaknesses. You'll need to use all your wits and strategy to outsmart these foes and emerge victorious. In this game, completing quests will not only earn you rewards and help you progress through the story but also unlock interactions with various characters. These characters will have their unique personalities, backstories, and motivations, and you'll have the opportunity to get to know them better and have fun with them.WORLDThe continent of Orgathus is a vast and prosperous land blessed by a celestial protector known as the Divine One, who was able to achieve peace by sealing away The Dark One, a fell demon and destroyer of worlds, 1,000 years ago with the power of the 5 Dik Crystals. The continent is divided into 5 kingdoms that live in relative harmony, Patheron, the Holy Kingdom of Prosperity, Aurelios, the Kingdom of Enchantment, Aquatous, Kingdom of the Sea, Kharterah, the Draconic Empire, and Luvielle, the Kingdom of the Faire-Folk, all of which are watched over by the Guardian Angels of the Astral Plane, a realm in the clouds. The population of Orgathus mainly consists of male beings who often engage in sexual interaction to honor the Divine One and always expose themselves to the elements, in return, they allow them to live a long and healthy life, as the power of love is the cornerstone of the Dik Crystals' existence and power. As of recently however, the seal has begun to weaken and the darkness has begun pouring back into the world in the form of a demon called Inikka who has sworn himself to the Dark One and has established his own Empire within a nearby land overseas known as the Outerrealms, with the intention of conquering all of Orgathus with his army of The Shadowless, corrupt creatures who can influence the minds of the people, replacing love and compassion with pure lust and aggression, turning them into hulking beasts of unbridled sexual intensity. The only hope of saving the continent is a pure-hearted hero chosen by the Guardian Angels to become the next Celestial Knight to reunite the 5 Dik Crystals within each Kingdom and prevent the resurrection of the Dark One once again.The Holy Kingdom, Pantheron lies at the center of the continent and is a very prosperous country that is very ahead of its time, dedicated to the Guardian Angel Ramiel and the Divine One. Pantheron contains several thriving cities and tribes, home to a large population of humans, elves, and barbarians who live together peacefully, ruled by the kind-hearted King Jericho and his 5 sons. The city is well known for its bountiful harvest as well as its advances in technology thanks to the power of the Earth Dik Crystal entrusted to them by Ramiel to watch over until the day it is needed. The country’s colors are blue and gold to represent the sky and sun, the home of the angels.CHARACTERSRace: Human Age: 22 Hometown: Remaire City, Pantheron Kingdom Occupation: Knight, Blacksmith (part-time) Duncan Carpenter is part of a wide-scale, Blacksmithing family company, currently owned by his father, and next in line to inherit the business as the oldest of the next generation. After the death of his Mother, Duncan swore to do everything he could to keep his Father and younger Brother safe, which became a challenge after the invasion of The Shadowless. After proving himself in battle, the angel Ramiel gifts Duncan the power of a celestial knight to protect the realm from the forces of darkness. Duncan gives all that he can to protect the people of Patheron and beyond, with new friends by his side, he sets out on his journey to find the 5 Dik Crystals, free the continent of Orgathus from the Shadowless, and bring the world into a new era of peace.Race: Elf Age: 21 Hometown: Faldon Village, Pantheron Kingdom Occupation: Retainer James is an elf from a village close to the city, and the grandson of the village chief, polite and noble, James strives to be the very image of perfection. James comes from a highly religious village heavily devoted to the Guardian Angel Ramiel's teachings, home to the Guardian's Cathedral, though he has yet to prove himself, he strives to be a strong a capable protector. After witnessing Duncan help defend his village, he recognizes him as the Celestial Knight and decides that the best way to prove his worth is by his side as his retainer, so he sets off on his journey across Orgathus by his side. Despite his prim and proper nature, he begins experiencing interesting feelings towards Duncan and his company, feelings that he's not sure if he should hold in or let loose for the good of the world.Race: Karnyx Age: 1000+ Hometown: ??? Occupation: None Claiming to have descended from the Astral Plane with no memory of his past, Xander spends his days as a wandering traveler, going from place to place all over Orgathus. Xander has the ability to heal the sick and injured by transferring his own energy into them through sexual contact, at the same time, he is also a bard who often plays a flute. Xander joins Duncan on his quest as he feels a certain familiarity to him, in hopes that he can find his lost memories and return home, though while he appears to be a kind and friendly young man, perhaps there is more to this man than even he realizes.Race: Barbarian Age: 26 Hometown: the Temple of Strength, Pantheron Kingdom Occupation: Retainer Kostas is a barbarian from an expansive citadel north of the kingdom, close to Kharterah, where the people value strength and might above all else, and while he is loud, brash and profane, Kostas is regarded as the champion of the barbarians. Kostas is considered to be the strongest of all, yet, aside from his 12 brothers, he has yet to find an actual challenge where he doesn’t need to hold back his strength until the day the Shadowless invades Pantheon and bears witness to the Celestial Knight Duncan as he defeats them with ease. Kostas declares himself as Duncan’s ward, hoping to find the challenge he has been searching for all his life, intending to come back a true champion worthy of the title, while at the same time, hoping to make Duncan his mate as he sees him as the perfect match for him in many ways.Species: Angel Age: 3000+ Hometown: The Astral Plane Occupation: Guardian of Orgathus Ramiel is the Astral Guardian of the continent of Orgathus, providing health and prosperity to all and does his best to keep the peace, as he is a firm believer that the people should love each other as they would love themselves. Ramiel was once in love with an archangel named Raziel, who saw something good in him that nobody else could see, but the other angels objected strongly to their union, believing that Raziel was nothing more than an Incubus and was corrupting him, so he was banished to the mortal plane. That day, Ramiel swore that he would never let anyone be judged based on appearances ever again, however, after discovering that a demon resembling his former lover, has unleashed the Shadowless on the world, he chooses Duncan as the new Celestial Knight in the hopes that he can save him from himself before he plunges the world into darkness.Species: Incubus (formerly Archangel) Age: 3000+ Hometown: The Outerrealms Occupation: Ruler of the Shadowless Empire Raziel was once an archangel of the mortal plane, watching over humans from the sky and partaking in their traditions and activities while entertaining them with a variety of tricks and trades. He had once fallen in love with the guardian angel Ramiel, who invited him to the Astral Plane, in the hopes of uniting the two planes into one community, a notion that the angels objected strongly to due to their belief that all angels must not directly interfere with humans, accusing Raziel of corrupting Ramiel to abandon his duties as the next guardian. As punishment, Raziel was forced to cover his face with a demonic mask that would not release him until he was to find someone on the Mortal Plane who could love him as himself, which most mortals could not bear to do so as they found his appearance terrifying. Rejected by the very people he thought were his friends, Raziel retreated to the Outerrealms where he chose to become exactly what the world had accused him of being, an Incubus, by unlocking the power of the Shadowless, Raziel, under the name “Inikka” aims to conquer the continent of Orgathus, through pure lust and depravity caused by the Shadowless creatures’ influence. Deep down, he truly hopes that he can find the one person who can free him from his curse.

Detailed Description: Overview:Invasion: Phoenix is a passion project by a solo developer and lifelong gamer eager to bring back the glory days of video gaming! An alien empire hellbent on conquering Earth has arrived at our doorstep, and humanity is in total anarchy. Delve into this meticulously crafted 2D top-down pixel art RTS and sign up with the Earthen Union to take back Earth from the clutches of the Zyrex Empire. Or, will you instead join the Empire and fight to crush humanity under your boots? The choice is yours.With custom matches available now, and a roadmap promising expansive campaigns and thrilling updates, Invasion: Phoenix vows to revitalize the RTS genre wish a dash of sci-fi magic. Earth hangs in the balance; can you save it, or will you enslave it?Key Features:Singular Vision, Limitless Ambition: Witness the culmination of a lifetime of passion and unwavering commitment as a new universe is brought to life, teeming with intrigue and possibility. Return to the glory days of gaming and get lost in the experience.Expansive Campaigns on the Horizon: Anticipate the unveiling of single player campaigns for the Earthen Union rebels and the authoritarian Zyrex Empire. Destroy your enemies and claim Earth as your own across a variety of missions and environments, each brimming with challenges and triumphs.A Diverse Arsenal at Your Command: Assume control of a formidable array of units inspired by the vast expanse of science fiction, ranging from conventional Earth military hardware, to the awe-inspiring Zyrex Empire, to the cutting-edge technology of the Coalition of Life.Devastating Combat Powers: Harness the might of devastating combat powers unique to each faction, from precision airstrikes and tactical mercenary deployments, to the terrifying fury of orbital lasers. Seize control of the battlefield with strategic finesse and unleash chaos upon your adversaries.Dynamic Gameplay Environments: Immerse yourself in eight distinct custom match game modes, encompassing timeless classics like Capture the Flag and deathmatch, alongside innovative additions such as Terror mode. Tailor your experience to your preferences with toggle options, ensuring endless variety and replayability.An Endless Ocean of Lore: Immerse yourself in a galaxy steeped in history and mystery, supported by an extensive collection of codex entries that peel back the layers of Invasion: Phoenix's enigmatic narrative. Prepare yourself for a journey of discovery that transcends the confines of the game itself, and opens the door to a compelling new universe.An Original Soundtrack to Enrich Your Experience: Immerse yourself in the captivating melodies and atmospheric soundscapes of Invasion: Phoenix, crafted with care and attention to detail by the developer themselves. Let the music transport you to the heart of the conflict and elevate your gaming experience to new heights.Early Access: Embrace the opportunity to shape the destiny of Invasion: Phoenix in its early access phase. Engage in custom matches today, and stand at the ready for the release of updates and campaign mode that promise to expand the game's horizons, and revitalize the RTS genre.Forge Your Destiny:Are you prepared to heed the call and carve your name into galactic legend? Embrace the challenge, seize the opportunity, and embark on a journey that will test your mettle and redefine your perceptions of gaming!

This simple platformer will test your skills and reflexes as you race against the clock with our charming and voluptuous anime girls. Dive into a world filled with challenging obstacles, skilled precision-jumps, and hidden secrets waiting to be uncovered.

As you progress through the game, you'll unlock special features, including revealing outfits and nudity options for your favorite characters. Each level is designed to push you to your limits, with thrilling platformer challanges, and unlockable mini-games.

Fast-paced time trial gameplay, race against the clock
Challenging, precise platforms with no added coyote time, and no checkpoints during levels for an extra layer of difficulty
A cast of beautiful, busty anime girls
Unlockable outfits and nudity options
Mini-games that provide a fun diversion from the main platformer
Track Your Progress: View a comprehensive records screen showcasing your best times
SFW Mode Button
Different camera angles you control
Diverse difficulty levels, from easy to impossible

Detailed Description:
"Fun Gus" presents a chilling challenge: endure the madness of a sewer-bound existence where effort is senseless and sanity slips away. In this grim survival game, you're Gus, cultivating useless wealth by trading mushrooms in a toxic underworld. With no way to spend your earnings, each transaction mocks the futility of your struggle. "Fun Gus" is a first-person farming simulator that is anything but ordinary. In this game, you'll nurture and sell a variety of mushrooms in the grimy confines of a city sewer. With no overarching goals beyond the simple act of survival, "Fun Gus" offers a laid-back, mindless escape into a world where the absurd meets the mundane. Are you insane enough to play? How long can you last in a world where survival is a cruel joke? Test your limits in "Fun Gus," where the real challenge is not just to survive, but to face the absurdity of persistence. 

KEY FEATURES:
 * Unique Setting: Cultivate your mushroom farm in the dark and damp environment of a city sewer, beautifully rendered in realistic graphics with whimsical touches.

 * First-Person Farming: Experience the world from the perspective of Gus, a dedicated mushroom farmer navigating the challenges of underground agriculture.

 * Economic Simulation: Master the art of mushroom trade. Harvest your crops and sell them to the surface dwellers, managing resources to keep your operation thriving.

 * Relaxing Gameplay: Immerse yourself in a game with no pressure. "Fun Gus" is all about the experience of escaping reality, offering players a chance to unwind in a bizarre yet charming setting.

 * Absurd Humor: Engage with quirky characters and enjoy humorous interactions that add light-hearted fun to your subterranean exploits.


Embark on the most peculiar farming venture you’ll ever experience with Fun Gus. Whether you’re in it to enjoy the strangely therapeutic act of mushroom farming or to laugh at the ridiculousness of its premise, "Fun Gus" promises a unique, relaxing, and entertaining gameplay experience with every play! "Fun Gus" is developed by an up-and-coming developer based out of Texas, Devin Jones!

Detailed Description: This is a prequel for My New Memories. You don't have to have played the main game to understand the story. Experience the story of the Main Character before he reunited with the love of his life - Anna. Meet characters you will also meet in the main game and experience how the MC went through university to eventually become the best architect in his city! Reunite with Bethany ( your mother ) and Sabrina ( your twin-sister ) and see how those relationships developed over time!During your time at the university you will experience love and lust for the first time. What special relationship did you have with your twin sister even before you became more than just siblings? How did your feelings for your mother change over time? And who did you experience your first times with?Meet the characters!Sabrina ( name can be changed ) , your twin sister. Both of you start university at the same time and as usual, you two are very close. She was there for you when you experienced the biggest loss in your life and knows exactly how you feel. But there is more between you and her than just the love of siblings...Bethany ( name can be changed ), your mother. She had to raise you and your sisters on her own ever since your parents divorced. She does everything for her children and is always happy to have a talk with you about anything. But it also seems the interest in each other grew a little more intense ever since you entered adulthoodLea, one of your best childhood friends. She lives next door with her mother, Katharina, and has basically become part of your family by now. She was there when Anna and her family had to leave and she was also very close with them. While you two jokingly flirted with each other over the years, starting university has certainly intensified this. Maybe it's time you two become more than friends...Katharina, Lea's mother. She and your mother have become very good friends and they basically see each other every day. You always had a huge crush on her but never had the confidence to act on it. Now that you are going to university you noticed that her looks also changed. Katharina knows what she wants and if you decide to let her, she can become the woman you always desired.Jackie, your best friend. You two were basically the troublemakers of the neighborhood for most of your time as children. She is like another sister to you, but sometimes even closer than that. Recently she found something out about her family that turned her life upside down, something she told only you about. She also goes to the same university you, Sabrina and Lea go to, so there is plenty of time to catch up because she was gone for quite some time...Rei, an exchange student from Japan. You will meet her on your first day in the university and immediately take an interest in her - Something that is very mutual. Something as simple as showing her the mall in your city can quickly turn out to be a love story you have never seen before. It's like you two just click...A completely new experience.Amelie, a student you meet at your university. Being bullied for most of her life because of her size, you quickly learn that she might look fragile, but verbally she is very active. You help her out during a very emotional situation which leads to you two becoming friends. Since men especially always bullied her it will take some time for her to fully trust you...F.A.Q:How much will the game cost?The price will be $4.99, with conversions to your currency to match that price.Why is there a prequel when the main game is still in early access? And the last update has been a while?Due to some personal things that happened that you can read up on the main game page, I was forced to shift my work from My New Memories to this prequel so I can keep honing my skills in rendering. The first playable version of the prequel gained a lot of positive feedback, so I decided to continue to work on it.So once you can work on the main game again, will you abandon this version?Not until it's fully completed. So as long as I can't work on the main game, I will provide updates and introduce new characters.Why is the game not free, then?My first decision was to make it free, but due to increasing legal fees because of the battle I'm fighting as of writing this store description, I decided to ask for a small price.Will there ever be any paid DLCs or do I have to pay again for future updates?No. Every future update that I will release until I can fully return to the main game will always be free. There will never be any paid DLC for this gameThis game is very story heavy, please keep that in mind before you buy it. It focuses more on the story than it does on the lewds. While there are lewd scenes in the game, they are not the focus.A Story-Rich Visual Novel  that includes character interactions, development and extremely wholesome momentsHigh quality images and animationsNo game overs, no bad endings.
Short Description: My New Memories: The Beginning tells you the story of My New Memories before you reunited with Anna and started a family. Find out how the MC turned out to be the man you know from the main game - The loving and caring husband and the protective and wonderful father!

But it also seems the interest in each other grew a little more intense ever since you entered adulthoodLea, one of your best childhood friends. She lives next door with her mother, Katharina, and has basically become part of your family by now. She was there when Anna and her family had to leave and she was also very close with them. While you two jokingly flirted with each other over the years, starting university has certainly intensified this. Maybe it's time you two become more than friends...Katharina, Lea's mother. She and your mother have become very good friends and they basically see each other every day. You always had a huge crush on her but never had the confidence to act on it. Now that you are going to university you noticed that her looks also changed. Katharina knows what she wants and if you decide to let her, she can become the woman you always desired.Jackie, your best friend. You two were basically the troublemakers of the neighborhood for most of your time as children. She is like another sister to you, but sometimes even closer than that. Recently she found something out about her family that turned her life upside down, something she told only you about. She also goes to the same university you, Sabrina and Lea go to, so there is plenty of time to catch up because she was gone for quite some time...Rei, an exchange student from Japan. You will meet her on your first day in the university and immediately take an interest in her - Something that is very mutual. Something as simple as showing her the mall in your city can quickly turn out to be a love story you have never seen before. It's like you two just click...A completely new experience.Amelie, a student you meet at your university. Being bullied for most of her life because of her size, you quickly learn that she might look fragile, but verbally she is very active. You help her out during a very emotional situation which leads to you two becoming friends. Since men especially always bullied her it will take some time for her to fully trust you...F.A.Q:How much will the game cost?The price will be $4.99, with conversions to your currency to match that price.Why is there a prequel when the main game is still in early access? And the last update has been a while?Due to some personal things that happened that you can read up on the main game page, I was forced to shift my work from My New Memories to this prequel so I can keep honing my skills in rendering. The first playable version of the prequel gained a lot of positive feedback, so I decided to continue to work on it.So once you can work on the main game again, will you abandon this version?Not until it's fully completed. So as long as I can't work on the main game, I will provide updates and introduce new characters.Why is the game not free, then?My first decision was to make it free, but due to increasing legal fees because of the battle I'm fighting as of writing this store description, I decided to ask for a small price.Will there ever be any paid DLCs or do I have to pay again for future updates?No. Every future update that I will release until I can fully return to the main game will always be free. There will never be any paid DLC for this gameThis game is very story heavy, please keep that in mind before you buy it. It focuses more on the story than it does on the lewds. While there are lewd scenes in the game, they are not the focus.A Story-Rich Visual Novel  that includes character interactions, development and extremely wholesome momentsHigh quality images and animationsNo game overs, no bad endings.

Detailed Description: Archipelago is a fast paced movement rogue-lite set on a cluster of floating islands. Multiple movement abilities are available to traverse the expanse between islands. The player will need to go from island to island combating enemies to strengthen themselves for the lower levels. The game continuously gets more difficult the further down you go. Incorporate a twitch stream into your game to spice things up! Through multiple chat commands the twitch chat can inflict harm or grant aid to the player.
Short Description: Archipelago is a fast paced movement roguelike set on a cluster of floating islands. Slash, slice, and dash your way through the sky to challenge the final boss. Will skill alone allow you to prevail?

Detailed Description: Inspired by games like Persona 4, Higurashi, and Doki Doki Literature Club, Siren’s Call: Escape Velocity is a tropical cocktail of delicious summertime dread. As a story that begins at the end, all that's standing between you and adulthood are your old party members. Your best friends.After a summer of deadly fights with supernatural creatures known only as "Sirens," you and your friends finally have time to relax and enjoy yourselves. But in the wreckage of a job well done...it's become obvious just how fleeting their time with you actually is. Even so, it's your job to say goodbye to each of them and go to college. It's your job to be an adult.Still, it's five of them versus one of you. And after years of friendship and an entire summer of fighting side-by-side, these people know exactly what it takes to make you want to stay home...for just a bit longer. A game that's designed to make you as unsure of yourself as humanly possible, Siren's Call takes full advantage of every aspect of the visual novel format to deliver a mind-warping storytelling experience. Can you get the "Hell" out of Florida? Will you reach Escape Velocity?
Short Description: Welcome to your endless summer! Escape its influence before the town of Siren's Call erases you completely. This version of the game is a free prologue and covers the first part of this story.

Detailed Description: In Uphill, take control of Glitch, a courageous red robot on a perilous climb. Master the art of precision platforming as you navigate treacherous levels filled with challenging jumps and perilous runs across shifting platforms. Glitch's unique ability to manipulate the world adds a twist: alter the environment to change the behavior of platforms, creating new pathways and overcoming seemingly impossible obstacles. Ascend the treacherous heights, test your reflexes, and unravel the mysteries that lie uphill.

Detailed Description: The magic kingdom’s court magician, Lunaria, is tasked with her allies to investigate a certain ruin. But when the party gets ambushed by some mysterious men, Lunaria’s magic gets stolen and she’s left with no powers! When it’s discovered that Lunaria’s magic won’t recover naturally, she falls to utter despair. But not all hope is lost. Elder magicians speak of five great magicians and their prized treasures. If Lunaria can get her hands on those treasures, then her magic may recover! To help her friends and save herself, Lunaria ventures off on an adventure unlike any other!Features:Classic RPG ExperienceTurn-based CombatLeveling SystemSkill SystemFantasy Setting
Short Description: When the magic kingdom's court magician, Lunaria, loses her powers, she must venture out to find the five great magical treasures to restore her magic.

Detailed Description: Traveling the world and doing good to benefit human society as a whole is what makes being a witch so rewarding. They call this the Law of the Witch--the oath that female magic users must abide to in serving humanity and helping those in need. Witches roam from town to town, saving those who need salvation and then quickly drifting to the next destination. All girls born with magic understand that their fate is to travel the world and abide by the Law. In a small town called Selene lived a witch-in-training, Liz. In order to become an independent and powerful witch, Liz trains every day under her master and mother, Aretta. After finally passing her final exam as a witch-in-training, Liz graduates and becomes a full-fledged magic wielder. As promised by her oath, Liz leaves her village and sets off to the vast world outside. Little did she know, she may be the reincarnation of the Witch of Eclipse--the very woman who saved the world from a great threat in the past.Features:Classic RPG ExperienceTurn-based CombatLeveling SystemSkill SystemFully Voiced
Short Description: After Liz graduates and becomes a full-fledged magic wielder, Liz leaves her village and sets off to the vast world outside. Little did she know, she may be the reincarnation of the Witch of Eclipse--the very woman who saved the world from a great threat in the past.

Detailed Description: Join Discord & Chat With Dev!About the GameIn a world full of monsters, always look for better weapons & skillstones that gain your enemy's ability. Even you can spit poison like the poisonous spider, so slash all of them and look for it. Sharpen your weapon, upgrade your status, and gain experience until you become a Professional Mercenary in this single-player, Action RPG, Hack n Slash Game.Hunt and Slash Your Enemies!As a Mercenary, slashing your enemy is a top priority. Hunt them, slash them all, and hopefully, they drop something good for you. Look for better weaponsOn your future quests, stronger monsters might be hard to deal with. It would help if you prepared yourself for that so look for stronger weapons. There are 30+ weapons you can choose as you like. Use SkillstonesMany monsters have the ability to do something. Poison spitting, Teleporting behind your back, Diving on the land, Dashing, and many more cunning abilities, but you're able to do that if you use a Skillstone. There are 40+ Skillstones that can change the way you approach your enemy. Master it and become stronger!Upgrade thingsSharpen your weapon, upgrade your character status, upgrade your character Inventory, and gain experience until you become a Professional Mercenary and master the way of monster slaying.Pet MonstersLook for a young monster and put it in a cage but don't forget to feed it properly...FeaturesLot of monsters with different abilities that can be mastered.30+ Weapons to use. One-handed Sword, Two-handed Sword, or Spear? choose wisely.40+ Skillstones to master. Poison spitting, summoning, and much more can be mastered using skillstones.Many things to upgrade! Your weapons, potions, inventory, and your character are upgradeable.Pettable monsters! Monsters can become your pet if you find them young.

Game Name: Until Chloe, the New Wife, Falls
Detailed Description: StoryTo save her innocent husband, the newlywed Chloe dives into a dungeon with her husband's friend. However, the adventure is not peaceful, as there are sinister plans being schemed behind the scenes.GamePlayers control Chloe as she ventures into the dungeon to save her husband. Progressing through randomly generated dungeons, players select destinations while encountering events, treasure chests, and formidable enemies. Combat is turn-based command battles. Enemies will assault Chloe, but even her allies have their eyes on her. To earn money, Chloe must undertake various "jobs" in town, some of which are indecent... Can Chloe protect her chastity and save her husband, or will she succumb to the darkness?・H-scenes: 36 types (most scenes have at least 2 base CGs + variations)・Base CGs: 111 (with variations: 185)・Dress-up standing portraits: about 30 types (with variations: over 40)FeaturesJRPGNTRDress-up optionsRoguelike dungeonsAuto-battle functionCheat mode availableMultiple endings

Detailed Description:
"Show Me How to Live" is a minimalist aesthetic shoot 'em up game, in which we control a ship that must navigate and understand the perspective of a person capable of seeing the senselessness of life but unable to do anything about it.

With simple mechanics and high difficulty, "Teach Me How to Live" offers a brief but intense journey not suitable for everyone.

Designed and developed by a single person, with the aim of showcasing a gloomy way of viewing life.

— Play and discover how someone who can't find meaning in life sees it.

— Test yourself against the most challenging enemies.

— Demonstrate your skill during 6 intense chapters.

— Discover yourself as you navigate through an intense narrative that will give you much to ponder.

Detailed Description: SLAY THE WORLDIt's the End of the World. A series of natural disasters have been set in motion that will wipe out the world of man in a few short days. Time enough to test your wits and skill against the madness. Build a deck before and during a run, upgrading cards to face the challenges present in each stage. Every enemy poses a different threat, with multiple attack types and maneuvers. Defeat is only a setback - your progress in each run provides you with the means to improve your deck going forward. This is the deckbuilding roguelite for adults.FIGHT OR DIEFast-paced card combat against a wide variety of foes. Use your attacks strategically to defeat enemies. Anticipate their actions to minimize the damage you take - to prologue your inevitable death? Or, perhaps, to win.GROW AND EVOLVEDuring a run you will have opportunities to expand and customize your deck. Add new cards for stronger attacks and to gain new options in combat. Each individual card may be upgraded as well, choosing from a variety of effects including buffs and attack damage.LEARN AND MASTERBetween runs you can spend Useless Trinkets obtained during previous runs to unlock better cards. You may also lock away cards you no longer wish to appear in your deck. In this way, you can craft the deck you start each run with to your own style and approach while increasing in power to make it further with each playthrough.EXPLORE AND CONQUERThe land of Zoryavia is a fully-realized dark fantasy kingdom. As you cut a bloody swathe through the country, you will witness firsthand the breakdown of society and the crumbling of order. You will collect various discarded items, each with a story to tell about the world, its past, and its people. You may also learn of darker things unknown to men - the old gods and beasts that dwell beneath the earth. Will you be strong enough to reach the source of the calamities? Only time will tell.
Short Description: Deckbuilder. Roguelite. Metaprogression. Words are a weak attempt to describe reality - in Annuit Coeptis you use cards to wreak violence across a land poised upon the brink of destruction. Will you defy the End of the World?
About the Game: SLAY THE WORLDIt's the End of the World. A series of natural disasters have been set in motion that will wipe out the world of man in a few short days. Time enough to test your wits and skill against the madness. Build a deck before and during a run, upgrading cards to face the challenges present in each stage. Every enemy poses a different threat, with multiple attack types and maneuvers. Defeat is only a setback - your progress in each run provides you with the means to improve your deck going forward. Detailed Description: Welcome to ALWThe most intense, high energy and badly managed UK indie wrestling promotion. Your newly hired manager has planned for you to be their new top star! The way to do that? Conquer every event around the country and make your way to the biggest UK wrestling pay-per-view, ‘Ladderversary’.Action after the bell!The fight that happened in the ring was nothing… after the bell is a different story. It seems that the locker room is not a massive fan of you coming in and taking the main event spots. You need to fight luchadors, big meaty men, brawlers and hardcore legends using a range of weapons from baseball bats to bowling balls to rubber chickens. Hit the wrestlers or to cause an earlier retirement throw your weapon full pelt at them.  Improve your out-of-ring knowledgeUnlock more weapons to defend yourself from the backstage brawlers by collecting special objects in each level. Weapons like the whoopie cushion, fan signs and even a bottle of baby oil that can slip up frustrated wrestlers.The locations He might talk the talk but your manager may have got confused on some of these events. Fight in shopping centres, high schools, piers, trains and more absurd locations based on real-life towns in the UK like Harwich, Grimsby and more! Remember every territory comes with a local legend to battle...You want more?!?Complete the story mode? Got the highest times on the leaderboard? Had a five-star classic backstage at every event? Collected all the additional weapons? Defeated every local legend? Made it through rumble mode? We better put you in the Hall Of Legends!
Short Description: Wrestler Rush is a first-person, chair-throwing, backstage wrestling, kerfuffle where you concuss wrestlers backstage with an array of weapons from chairs to bowling balls across the UK wrestling independent scene!

Game Name: Hypnosia - Application d'Hypnose avec Reconnaissance Vocale
Detailed Description: Only in French, sorry.Why?Because Hypnosia contains hypnotic sessions that can't just be translated, they need to be completely rewritten.When?It's not planned for now but, who knows...About HypnosiaHypnosia is the first self-hypnosis aid application that allows you to use your voice to influence the course of the session.Hypnosia builds the session as it goes along based on your responses, similar to a “choose your own adventure” book, with multiple possible session courses.Download the demo: A first discovery session is offered with the theme “freeing the mind”, to relieve an overload of thoughts and focus on what's essential.Integrated voice recognition allows you to better define what you wish to change, whether it's to stop smoking, sleep better, change a habit, manage stress, improve your self-confidence, lose weight, transform sensations, or positively project yourself.To ensure maximum confidentiality, Hypnosia operates entirely offline, so you are free to say whatever you want and to make the most of your session.Hypnosia is also available on Android and iOS smartphones!

Detailed Description:
This is an exciting top-down pinball challenge game with shooting as the core gameplay. In this challenge, you will control the ball to hit the small monsters filled with numbers on the screen. Each successful hit reduces the number until the monster disappears, and you will get points.

There are special elements in the game that can enhance your strength. Defeating monsters with a key mark will increase your attack power, making the ball more powerful. Additionally, defeating monsters with a ball mark will also increase the number of your balls, providing more opportunities for continuous shooting.

But be careful, the monsters will continue to attack. If they pass the bottom red line, the game will end. At the end of the game, you will receive a gold coin reward based on the points you have earned. Use these coins to purchase items to enhance your abilities, choose the right items to get higher scores in the game.

Collect enough keys to unlock beautiful CG images in the gallery. These images will record your achievements in the game and become your precious collection.

Are you ready for this pinball challenge? Enjoy the fun and achievements brought by shooting!

Detailed Description:
After a long voyage in space, Kali, Jenna, and Heather have returned home only to find that their planet has been invaded by an alien threat.

Fight your way through an infested starbase, rescue the remaining trapped Humans, build a resistance to battle the invasion, and defeat the alien queen. You'll need to to everything you possibly can to sabotage, impede, and ultimately defeat the invaders. Gather equipment and skills to improve your chances of saving your planet and finally getting back to a normal life.

Solward is a first-person party-based science fiction dungeon crawler RPG with grid-based movement and realtime combat.

Detailed Description: IntroductionExperience intense 3D bullet hell action in an advanced laboratory where you, as an AI from the distant future, participate in combat simulations. Continuously swap and combine various modules to repeat training and perfect your skills. Experience 3D bullet hell action with your unique combination of modules.How to PlayTraining Start: Begin combat and tackle ongoing enemy waves; bosses must be defeated within a time limit.Module Selection: Choose your player modules. Locked parts can be unlocked with achievement rewards or achievement points.Enhancement Center: Enhance your player's stats. Enhancement points are obtained as a byproduct of combat training. (Currently, all enhancements (perks) are passive, but future updates may include active special abilities.)Achievements: Earn achievements based on the progression of various content. Rewards can include achievement points or module unlocks.Controls[W, A, S, D]: Move, move camera in perk (enhancement) scene[Left, Right Click]: Use left, right weapons[Q, E]: Use shoulder weapons[L Shift]: Booster[Mouse Wheel Click]: Lock On (force targeting of enemies)[`]: Open control guide[ESC]: Pause (during game), Skip (tutorial)[Tab]: Skip dialogue (tutorial)
Short Description: Become a future AI and delve into 3D bullet hell action in an advanced lab. Combine various modules, repeat combat training, enhance stats with research points, and earn achievements to develop your unique combat style. Enjoy overcoming waves of enemies and defeating bosses within time limits.

Detailed Description:
This is a virtual tour for a real-life photography studio. 

In this game,

-You can explor every studio locations, find out where is the bathroom, dreesroom and where to get support.
-All scenes were molded base on real sets, so the structure demontion will be correct.
-Using a cinema camera viewfinder to pre plan your project, get the best camera location and choose a right lens.
-Make some screenshots and delever to art department to start design.
-All this can be done before you start a real scouting, can save you a lot of time.

To have a best experience, it's recommended to use a 16:9 monitor and hardwear ray tracing GPUs.

Notice: In this game, the scene layout and scale are accurate, but real set decoration can be different.

Detailed Description: An adventure autobattler game based on customizable dice rolls and rogue-lite elements, inspired by real events in 16th century Brazil. Build your own dice, strategically choosing each face, and defend the region of Pindó from the Whitecloak invaders!Unique battle mechanics: Engage in real-time automatic combat based on customizable dice rolls and use active skills, providing a harmonious experience of strategy, luck, and action.Forge the perfect die: Customize each face of your die with unique abilities and see them in action as they are rolled! Strategic die-building is essential to overcome each challenge.Character customization: Create different builds through talents, collectible artifacts, equipment, and battle drums - powerful abilities that can be activated by the player, resulting in significant effects!Rogue-lite elements: Explore randomly generated maps and encounter a variety of enemies, events, and surprises in each playthrough. Game knowledge and the ability to adapt to circumstances are essential for success.Indigenous fantasy: Immersed in 16th century Brazil and its diverse indigenous cultures, the world of YVY offers a unique layer of fantasy, providing an authentic and engaging experience.Thematic events: Encounter a variety of events with risks and rewards that enrich both the gameplay and the thematic universe of the game, offering unique challenges and enticing rewards.Engaging storyline: Explore the struggle of indigenous peoples against colonial invaders, highlighting a perspective rarely seen, and introducing customs, experiences, and characters of the Mão da Terra people, providing an exciting and immersive narrative.

Game Name: Adventure Of Baldero I and II
Detailed Description: Play as the hero Baldero and stop Lord Marn from destroying parts of Ervenfell. Defeat many immortal Abominations and prevent Marn from releasing them again.Adventure of Baldero 110 Levels, 3 hearts, 1 hero. A short game that served as the basis for Adventure of Baldero 2.Adventure of Baldero 214 Abominations, 13 Spells, 3 passives, 7 difficulties and much more. Consuming all of your magic takes your life points away. Upgrades can be purchased at the market within Larian Village. The adventurer's guild offers more content and opportunity to earn silver coins.Lord Marn is releasing Abominations in the area where Baldero, our bold and bald hero, took a nap to rest up. The Goddess of mercy, Myla, enters Baldero's dreams to warn him of the up-coming battles. There are many foes to fight before Baldero can stop Marn, will you help him?A retro action adventure platformer.Mostly inspired by Megaman 4 on the Gameboy, but has elements of other classics.This is part of the Ervenfell and Eramirth Universe.

Detailed Description: Introduction When night falls, she wanders into another world.Moonless Moon is a text-based adventure game following a girl as she travels through a variety of different worlds.Night brings her to a desert on the moon, a coffee shop inside of a tunnel, an island in the sky, and many more worlds beyond the realm of reason.The PlotYomichi is a normal girl living an average student's life—except for one thing: sometimes, after sunset, she finds herself transported into a different world.Be it a desert on the moon, a coffee shop inside of a tunnel, or an island in the sky, she enjoys her time in these new places, making friends each time.However, this leaves her with some questions.Do I really have to live in my daytime world? Is that life, the one where I go to school each day, the real one?In this story, she tries to find out more about the worlds surrounding her and what they mean for her.The CharactersYomichi, the girl who travels from world to world, and the many unique friends she makes in the process.What makes it uniqueMoonless Moon feels like a music video that you can play through, full of unforgettable art and music.During the "riddle" parts of the game, you will have to complete the story yourself to go forward. These are fun, intuitive puzzles where you look for keywords and place them in the text.Moonless Moon features several original tracks with animated music videos to go along with them. Dive into this unique world and its who's who of musical talent.Depending on your choices, the story will progress toward different endings.ANMCANMC is a project to create music and indie games based on the stories written by Kazuhide Oka. Several artists, including many from KAMITSUBAKI STUDIO, joined in, making for an incredible collaborative effort to produce an amazing array of songs.Moonless Moon is the first work by ANMC.The StaffProduction: KAMITSUBAKI STUDIOScenario and development: Kazuhide OkaCharacter design: HizumiKey visuals: Okusora KeitaLogo art: JEFF99English Translation: Marco GodanoSimplified/Traditional Chinese Translation: flankoiVideo & Image Sharing GuidelinesPlease adhere to the following guidelines when posting gameplay videos and imagesrelated to the full version of "Moonless Moon".Do not use excessive editing or processing that prevents others from correctly grasping the content of the game.Do not extract individual elements included in this game, such as background music or character images.Do not redistribute for profit. However, the normal monetization of videos on sites like YouTube is allowed.Do not combine it with content that is contrary to public order and morals, or combine it with illegal information.Do not make posts that include modifications to this game, data mining results, etc.Do not reprint videos or screenshots created by third parties without permission.This game includes songs managed by JASRAC and NexTone, so you may receive a notice of a copyright claimif you post a video that contains these songs on YouTube.However, as long as you adhere to our guidelines, you do not need to delete the video.*These guidelines may be updated at any time without notice.Please check here for the latest version of these guidelines before you post content.Last Updated: Aug 8, 2024.

Detailed Description:
Welcome to DO OR DIE Frontal Warfare.

This game focuses on strategy based action along with the Arcade feel which all players know and love. It is the choice for players who love strategy based actions and those who want realism combined with arcade. It's notable game modes such as: PVP, Battle Royale, Clearing Rooms and many more gives players the freedom of choosing their favorite game modes across a wide range of game modes to choose from.

Battle Royale: Drop in the battle zone and be the #1 survivor. Loot, Plan and Survive. Watchout for the wave and other hostiles. Play Solo or Duo with you friend or drop in with your squad in the battle zone. Timing and being Alert is key here.

Player vs Player: Face off against other players in this game mode. From 1v1 to Deathmatch. All the industry favorite modes are here to choose from.

Clearing Rooms: Tactically clear out enemy areas within close quarters with your squad. Face dynamic types of enemies each with their unique loadouts and behaviors.
Short Description: DO OR DIE Frontal Warfare is a FPS game with online team-based game play that takes place in a variety of fictional locations interpreted around the world. It brings a grounded, wide variety combat experience to the players.

Detailed Description: Ding Dong Dang is massively multiplayer online casual and competitive game, with easy and enjoyable casual gameplays and a variety of 3D characters. There are three islands for you to explore as you want. Enjoy punching any players aside! Jump to find the perfect viewpoint! Head for interaction areas to unlock new actions! Get golds everywhere! Don't forget to greet your friends in Lobby. There might be surprises for you!Ding Dong Dang allows 4 players to join the game simultaneously. You can easily play diverse game genres without entry barriers! The private room function will make it easier for you and your friends to compete together. Bring you double joy! In Ding Dong Dang, you can experience mini-games with different gameplays such as competition, survival, level-breaking, treasure hunting, racing, sports, puzzle, shooting, etc., making your gaming experience full of fun! Single-player games bring you back to the childhood. Challenge continuously, get higher ranking, enjoy the thrill of stage clear!Spin to unlock heroes. Merge the pieces of the same hero to level up, build your strongest team and then take on powerful enemies!Of course, you can earn extra rewards from Ranking, Achievement and Gallery, by beating others in-game and completing Tasks!Are you ready to beat them? Come and choose your character to join Ding Dong Dang NOW! Invite your friends and families to download Ding Dong Dang. Share love and joy in Real-Time!note: Crayon Shin-Chan IP related artwork is under supervision.Please stay tuned for occasional game updates. We always put players' gaming experience first!

Each island has its own style. Double fun to invite friends to play together! Ding Dong Dang will definitely bring you infinite happiness!

Detailed Description:
The crazy and hardcore game is a parody. The great hero Medved Hellraiser returns again to please the player with trash, cringe and frenzy! This time the developers pushed the great hero straight into the universe of the Green Elephant! You have to fight Pakhom Poekashchiy and Brother Epifan, and also save the world from the main villain of this game - Gill Bates - an evil genius who decided to perform anal chipping on all of humanity! Medved Hellraiser 3: Green Elephant is a 3D first-person shooter where you have to fight monsters, gopniks, debt collectors and homeless people! Among the innovations, we can note the system for purchasing weapons and ammunition: earn stars and buy new weapons and ammunition to defeat powerful bosses! The game is quite hardcore, but you can choose the desired difficulty right before the battle. Also, special conditions appeared in battles, for example: kill enemies only with Headshots, or use only an ax. In addition, even a scroller level has been introduced, where the player, together with the Colonel, will have to ride White Horses, right to Gill Bates' base!

-Nice graphics!
-Famous characters - memes!
-Hardcore and interesting gameplay!
-Ability to clean the toilet!
-Humor, frenzy!

Detailed Description: EVIL IS LUKRINGSpyrit Walker is a Survival Horror FPS set in a Weird Western world trapped in a perpetual night.Grab your revolver and venture into the darkness, will you figure out the secrets of this world and grow strong enough to fight off EVIL?Meet a strange cast of characters with their own quirks, powers and goals. You choose who to listen to and who to trust.Kick, shoot and explode your way through the legions of EVIL sent after you.An open world full of secrets, explore in any order you want.Multiple horrific creatures roam this land. Find their weaknesses to take them out for good.Find powerful weapons and abilities to gain an edge in combat and access new locations.Can you cleanse this land of EVIL, or is everything not as it seems?
Short Description: A Weird Western world trapped in a perpetual night. You must fight to survive, rescue strange characters, unlock powerful weapons and abilities in hopes of ridding this land of EVIL. Explore the open world and complete objectives in any order you like alone or in CO-OP as a SPYRIT WALKER!

Detailed Description: Bite Night is a comedic first-person horror game that explores the idea of what if the big scary monster was bad at being big and scary. You play as a gas station attendant who must work the night shift in a rural gas station when things start to go bump in the night. You must try to juggle your responsibilities as a worker while dealing with a monster who may be much less scary and more of a pain in the neck but no one knows how many monsters lurk in the night.Key Features:First PersonBlend of Comedy and HorrorApprox: 30mins playtimeRetro Graphics

Detailed Description: Shoot or Die - Join the ultimate battle against relentless enemy droids! As the last human survivor, you'll wield futuristic weapons, including the destructive Fireball and protective Shield, to conquer the ever-growing robotic uprising. Navigate through expanding battlefields while strategically annihilating foes. Dodge enemy traps and confront the swift but fragile Green Menace. Every level unveils new challenges, and every victory brings you one step closer to saving humanity. With a range of powerful perks and upgrades at your disposal, can you outsmart, outmanoeuvre, and outlast the mechanical horde?
Short Description: 'Shoot or Die' is a thrilling 2D shooting game where you take on the role of the last human survivor facing a robotic uprising. Arm yourself with powerful weapons, such as the Fireball and Shield, and utilize game-changing perks, to navigate dynamic battlefields and outwit cunning enemy droids.

Detailed Description: Rhythm Witch: Beat Death is a game that melds rhythm and survival. Attack to the rhythm of the music while dodging monsters who move and attack to the beat. On your journey to eternal beauty, defeat dancing freaks, ghouls, dragon, and more!Sibel the Rhythm Witch is a necromancer whose one and only goal is eternal beauty. Dyeing her hair, bathing in blood, collecting magic and mystical herbs, modifying her body... She'll do anything if it'll make her more beautiful! Of course, the hard and dirty work is left to the skeletons she summons. On her quest for beauty, she hears tell of the Deathless Tower, which spawns an endless stream of monsters, and—so the rumor goes—holds a treasure that grants immortality. If she gets her hands on that treasure, she can stay young and beautiful forever! What's there to wait for? Skeletons! To the Deathless Tower!Gameplay:You need to strike in rhythm with the music, accumulating energy to launch attack skills. Monsters move and attack in sync with the music, and you can predict their movements to dodge their attacks.Precise rhythmic strikes quickly build your fervor meter; when in a fervor state, you gain double beats to unleash more attacks. Continuous combos also boost your attack efficiency, allowing you to unleash powerful attack skills more rapidly.

Detailed Description: PinYuAn Tales is a text-based AVG with thematic elements of weirdness and sidekick adventures.The main character Bai Qiming, who is engaged in the game art industry, was laid off during the hard time of employment, and trying to find a way to change his career to the psychic media, he met a strange young man in a live broadcast, and was involved in a series of strange events in the daily life of the end and where to go from here.Weirdness and friendship, dreams and reality, the future of the road and the hidden truth by you to discover to explore.characterAbout the game content◈The full plot is about 85,000 words of text and nearly 30 beautiful CGs for 2~4 hours of play.◈The ending consists of 5 BE + 1NE + 1HE, with an additional chapter of plot included after the HE.◈The game contains psychic horror, death, gore, and supernatural elements and contains Bromance tendencies, so please use your discretion to purchase as needed.◈The game contains a small number of reflections on the direction of life, the workplace, reality/idealism, the future and other related abstract issues, in the hope that it can bring empathy and encouragement to peers who are also in a state of anxiety and confusion in the difficult employment environment of the Great Layoff.About the Production Team◈小青蛙妙妙制作组An indie game Team formed by two friends from college.◈Script - Programming - UI - Art - Video：青蛙梨◈Character Design - Art：阿猹◈weibo:@小青蛙妙妙制作组I hope to receive more feedback on your play!

Detailed Description: Just UpdatedThe game features many improvements, including better graphics, better controls and many new maps, such as the first version of Byilhan's Hotel, an abandoned hospital, the Backrooms and a museum. You can now select the difficulty you want, so that anomalies can be more or less difficult depending on your choice.About the Game"Exit16: Byilhan Hotel" is a "walking simulator" & "Spot the Difference" game. The game challenges players to unravel hidden anomalies strewn across the enigmatic corridor of the Byilhan Hotel.Each floor of the hotel presents a unique canvas, with some adorned by the peculiarities of anomalies while others maintain an eerie semblance of normalcy. Your task is to discern the subtle nuances that distinguish the ordinary from the extraordinary, as every object, every angle, and every shadow holds a potential clue.Traverse the hallways with caution, for not all anomalies reveal themselves readily.If you suspect there is an anomaly, turn back. If you believe everything is normal, that there are no anomalies, do not turn back and continue down the corridor. If you make a mistake, you will know by looking at the level number. If the number has increased, you have made the correct choice. If you return to level 1, you have made a mistake and will need to start over (the anomalies will be different). The goal is to reach the final level.Navigate the twists and turns of the Byilhan Hotel, unraveling its mysteries one anomaly at a time.Key Features:Repeating Hotel Corridor: Explore a hauntingly repetitive environment, where each step could lead to discovery or deception.duration: The length of the final game has not yet been defined, but should be around 30-40 minutes. The demo should last around 10 minutes.
Short Description: You're locked in a hotel full of anomalies. You must find all the anomalies in each level to escape.
About the Game:
"Exit16: Byilhan Hotel" is a "walking simulator" & "Spot the Difference" game. The game challenges players to unravel hidden anomalies strewn across the enigmatic corridor of the Byilhan Hotel.

Each floor of the hotel presents a unique canvas, with some adorned by the peculiarities of anomalies while others maintain an eerie semblance of normalcy. Your task is to discern the subtle nuances that distinguish the ordinary from the extraordinary, as every object, every angle, and every shadow holds a potential clue.
Traverse the hallways with caution, for not all anomalies reveal themselves readily.

If you suspect there is an anomaly, turn back. If you believe everything is normal, that there are no anomalies, do not turn back and continue down the corridor. If you make a mistake, you will know by looking at the level number. If the number has increased, you have made the correct choice. If you return to level 1, you have made a mistake and will need to start over (the anomalies will be different). The goal is to reach the final level.

Navigate the twists and turns of the Byilhan Hotel, unraveling its mysteries one anomaly at a time.

Key Features:
