Detailed Description: Impossible Island is an exciting adventure game that combines elements of strategy, exploration, and survival. Players become part of an expedition that is stranded on a mysterious island and must face various challenges to survive and uncover the secrets of the island.Game FeaturesMysterious Island: A vast and detailed island waiting to be explored. Different climatic zones, dense forests, high mountains, and deep caves make this world rich in various animal species and natural dangers.Resource Management: During exploration, you need to gather food, water, and other resources to survive. Use the collected resources strategically to build shelters, set traps, and protect yourself from enemies.Puzzles and Secrets: Discover ruins of ancient civilizations and secret passages in the depths of the island. By solving challenging puzzles, you can open new areas and learn more about the island's history.Dangerous World: During exploration, you will encounter various enemies. Dangerous creatures and natural challenges will make your struggle for survival harder. Think strategically to confront your enemies and develop the necessary survival tactics.Multiplayer Mode: Play together with your friends to overcome challenges. By collaborating, you can gather resources, defeat enemies, and uncover the island's secrets together.Dynamic Weather System: The game features a dynamic weather system that provides a more realistic experience. Rain, storms, and day-night cycles will influence your strategy and increase the significance of every moment.Impossible Island is not just a survival game; it's an experience filled with exploration, friendship, and strategy. Are you ready to dive into this dangerous yet fascinating world and uncover the secrets of the island? Click to start your adventure!

Detailed Description: A game about building and exploring connections. Explore a unique and vibrant world, meeting diverse characters while you explore and build connections with the community. A game selected in the first Outersloth (Innersloth Development Fund) group! Narrative ExplorationA game filled with captivating locations, items and people. Learn to master the Fivehold Factor as you build a mental model of the fantastical world around you.Speak with people to learn about the world as it is, as it was, and as it will be. Become part of the community to learn even more. Build and DestroyDeconstruct abandoned LiFE corporation facilities and re-purpose their parts to build and replace essential structures in the community.A roving research labRide around with your ROV-R research lab as you uncover depth, discover mystery, and unravel what The Mossfield Archives contains. Research new technology to solve problems and reshape your daily life.

Detailed Description: Plot and worldviewIn the dark world where demons rule, a group of warriors who fight against the dark forces stand up, bring a beam of justice to mankind, and open an unprecedented adventure.Your hero needs to constantly challenge a variety of different levels, step by step into the heart of the devil, clear all kinds of demons and ghosts, restore the peace of the human world.World mapThere are 6 chapters in the game, each chapter contains 8 levels, and the events encountered in each level have a different experience, the monsters encountered, the treasure chest obtained, the unknown trap encountered, the new altar Buff bonus, the new dropped equipment and so on are unknown.CHARACTERSThe character can wear 9 different parts of the equipment, equipment contains 5 qualities: white equipment, blue equipment, gold equipment, dark gold equipment, legendary equipment.Characters have 13 primary attributes and 19 secondary attributes, full of rich gameplay and experience.Heroes also have dozens of skills to learnEquipmentIn the game, equipment is a very important and rich gameplay.Quality: Includes 5 qualities: White equipment, blue equipment, gold equipment, dark gold equipment, legendary equipment.[White equipment] is more common and low quality, but under the magic of the blacksmith master, you can easily convert the equipment into dark gold quality with a novice hammer, combat effectiveness and demonic properties will be greatly improved, and it is also a very good choice.[Blue equipment] Compared with white equipment will have more magic properties, combat effectiveness is also greatly improved, and it plays a very important transition role in the upgrade stage. There will also be some attributes that the more advanced equipment does not have.[Golden equipment] A more advanced quality, and then after the blacksmith master's heart grinding, you can obtain higher combat effectiveness.[Dark gold equipment] Compared to gold equipment, has more combat attributes, in the battle to get dark gold equipment, can be used directly, usually without more forging is already a good equipment.Legendary equipment: Legendary equipment that has survived thousands of battles of the ancestors, this quality is born with higher combat attributes.[Jewelry] Jewelry also contains different qualities, higher quality can obtain higher combat output, jewelry can also be polished by various methods such as washing, extraction, synthesis, etc., to obtain higher combat performance.Parts: According to the role can be divided into helmets, clothes, gloves, leg warmers, necklaces, rings, weapons, shields, wings.Weapons: A character can wear a two-handed weapon or a one-handed weapon, and a second-in-command can hold a weapon or shield with a one-handed weapon.Equipment level: Each equipment has a level, the character level needs to be higher than the equipment level to wear, of course, if the equipment is set with degraded jewelry can also be worn.Difficulty levelThere are four difficulty levels in the game: Normal, Nightmare, Hell, and Purgatory. Players need to reach a certain level in order to move to the next difficulty.Monsters, equipment drops, traps, altars, etc. appear randomly in all levels of the game, and the battle after reloading the map is also a completely different experience. The bonus properties of the hero's equipment will affect the random events you encounter in the game, such as dropped equipment, gold, traps, monsters, etc., will change; There are hundreds of achievements, DIY to create super God equipment, black market and exchange, hero strategy to team up and so on are greatly enriched the game play.QuestThe game designed a rich and interesting main task, according to the completion of the task to promote the development of the plot, when the completion of a main task, will get rich material rewards.Of course, in addition to the main mission, the game also adds a variety of side missions, making the game experience more colorful, and can get a lot of rewards.Equipment buildingFacing different demons, it is best to have different equipment, at this time you can come to the forge to see, let the blacksmith master according to your needs to create different equipment:Fortification: After the equipment is strengthened, it is easy to improve the combat effectiveness of the equipment.Composition: Equipment can also be synthesized to create other different equipment, which can be added in more details by the blacksmith master.Inlay: If the equipment is inlaid with jewelry of different attributes, the performance of the equipment can be greatly improved and the combat effectiveness can be improved.Engraved: Equipment can be engraved, the main feature is to make a certain performance of the equipment greatly improved, but other attributes will be reduced, break the balance, according to the needs of the player and have a special use.Synthetic formula: The game has a rich variety of synthetic gameplay, including inscription, equipment building, jewelry and other nearly 40 kinds of gameplay.AchievementsThe game contains more than 100 achievements waiting for players to unlock, after obtaining achievements can also get rich material rewards.

Detailed Description: Shadows of the Werewolf is a survival horror adventure where a couple must escape a vicious werewolf and other deadly creatures. Explore eerie locations, make strategic decisions, uncover the dark secrets behind the horrors, and survive at all costs.Cinematic StorytellingAn intense mix of horror, suspense, and action, brought to life through immersive cutscenes and dramatic moments.Survival Gameplay and Physics-Based Combat:Hide, fight, or use the environment. Engage in dynamic combat where both characters and objects react with physics. Use limited durability items to block, attack, or throw at enemies, your choices shape every encounter.Atmospheric EnvironmentsExplore dangerous locations like a suburban house, a haunted forest retreat, a garden maze, and beyond.Resource Management and ChallengesManage your limited inventory carefully to survive deadly encounters and solve tense puzzles. Every item matters as you navigate dangerous situations and keep the suspense high.Difficulty SettingsChoose between Easy, Normal, or Difficult modes to tailor the experience to your playstyle. Whether you’re in it for the story or the ultimate survival challenge, there's a mode for every type of player.

Detailed Description: Welcome to A Matching Game! This is a simple game of selecting two cards and trying to find more matches than your opponent. Enjoy some lo-fi music as you try to beat Robo Dog in levels that get progressively harder. The further you get into the game, the smarter Robo Dog becomes!There are 30 levels to play against Robo Dog Time Trial modes (Mini, Large and Mega) to test your speed Lo-fi music to enjoy while playing 20 different avatars to choose from 8 different card backs to unlock  A Family Friendly game, great for all ages!

Detailed Description:
In 2055, on a Earth devastated by environmental pollution, a small creature is born amidst the waste and litter carelessly discarded by humans. 
This small life form navigates through a puzzle of obstacles and debris larger than itself.
The creature embarks on an adventure, seeking an unpolluted and beautiful world that might still exist somewhere.

- Escape from a world devastated by environmental pollution and find a beautiful place.
- Beware of obstacles made of trash and waste discarded by humans.
- Enter objects larger than the small creature to solve puzzles and escape.
- Avoid mutated creatures caused by environmental pollution.

Detailed Description: Join Our DiscordAbout the GameMonsters of Moldred is a neo-gothic autobattler time and resource management sim.On the Job:Move from location to location on the map, hunting monsters to awaken the horror of Moldred and to gain monster traces to sell. With your hard earned gold, make use of services such as Inns, Taverns, Markets, and Hospitals.Prepare for the Hunt:Keep your hunters rested, well fed, and stocked with items to stand a chance in battle. Research monsters and hunt them during the time of day they’re weakest to further get an edge.Persevere in Battle:Make the right choices of who should go on a hunt and who should stay behind, taking into consideration your hunters’ individual levels of vitality, pain, fatigue, and hunger. All your hunters’ stats make a difference in the outcome of a battle - such as the time it takes to hunt, chances of injury, losing items, and more.Time is of the Essence:Manage your time and resources well to keep Moldred from crumbling into ruins and your hunting party together. Increase your Fame and decrease Darkness whenever possible.Plan your routes across the land and use your time wisely. Only by being efficient and capitalizing on your current situation do you stand a chance of awakening the final monster and saving the land of Moldred.

Detailed Description: Joın DiscordAbout the GameYou are a child who lost your mother at a young age soon after you lost your father. You're trying to hold on to life in a small town called Tawny with your stepmother. Stepmom has a clothing shop, and you are an assistant in a photo studio. Losing your father a few years after your mother's death caused great trauma to you. For this reason, you wanted to go to the house of the step-aunt, who lives in SunCity for a short time, and get through the mourning process quickly. That's where your intrigue, sex, fun and career adventure starts for you.Sun City is a choice-driven, adult Visual Novel that includes in the demo version:400+ static images and 6+ animated scenes30 minutes game timeAn intriguing mystery4 original songsInteracting with a variety of womenObscene scene with a womanEpisode 1 Demo

Detailed Description: Embark on a journey of stealth and intrigue in "SHADOW HUSH", as you take on the role of a highly trained agent on a dangerous mission to uncover and dismantle the dark secrets of the powerful corporation GUARD. Intense Stealth Gameplay: Utilize your stealth skills to infiltrate a high-security GUARD base, evading surveillance and armed enemies while seeking to reveal its darkest secrets. Rich and Interactive Environment: Explore a meticulously designed base, filled with secret areas, security cameras and patrolling guards. Strategic Combat: Face tactical combat challenges when stealth fails, using a variety of improvised weapons and carve your way through the GUARD base. Intriguing Narrative: Uncover a gripping story full of twists and mysteries as you unravel the secrets behind GUARD's clandestine operations. The deeper you infiltrate, the more sinister the revelations become. Immersive Graphics and Audio: Enjoy stunning visuals and atmospheric soundtrack that immerse you even further into the dark and dangerous world of "SHADOW HUSH".Prepare for an exhilarating gaming experience, full of adrenaline and tension, where every move could mean the difference between success and failure. Do you have what it takes to uncover the truth behind GUARD's mask? Your mission awaits.

Detailed Description: Run, jump, shoot, and think your way through 35 levels of technological mayhem in Station Zeta. The station is a deathtrap, the robots are out of control, and the crew is no help at all. It won't be easy, but with a bit of brainpower (and a lot of reflexes), you might just make it out alive. And if you're feeling charitable, you might just save everyone else along the way.Welcome to Station ZetaYou warned them all.As Station Zeta's resident SPOSHA inspector, you've been telling them for months the whole place was one duct tape roll away from falling apart. But did anybody listen?No, of course they didn't. No one ever does. Instead, they decided to mine Starcoins on the station's computer core, which you absolutely  told them was a terrible idea for multiple reasons.Now the core's melting down, the robots have gone berserk, and even the coffee maker is trying to kill you. Well it takes more than that to keep a SPOSHA inspector down. Sharpen your wits, grab your blaster, and do what you need to do to get off this orbital deathtrap. 35 levels of puzzles, plasma beams, and platformingSnappy pixel graphicsAdvanced morality system with one choice and no impactIn-game timers and unlockable level select for nailing your speedrun
Short Description: Run, jump, shoot, and think your way to safety in this retro-inspired 2D puzzle-platformer. Station Zeta is out of control, and you'll have to deal with crazed robots, terribly designed station machinery, and blatant safety hazards as you try to make your escape across 35 levels.
About the Game: Run, jump, shoot, and think your way through 35 levels of technological mayhem in Station Zeta. The station is a deathtrap, the robots are out of control, and the crew is no help at all. It won't be easy, but with a bit of brainpower (and a lot of reflexes), you might just make it out alive. And if you're feeling charitable, you might just save everyone else along the way.Welcome to Station ZetaYou warned them all.As Station Zeta's resident SPOSHA inspector, you've been telling them for months the whole place was one duct tape roll away from falling apart. But did anybody listen?No, of course they didn't. No one ever does. Instead, they decided to mine Starcoins on the station's computer core, which you absolutely  told them was a terrible idea for multiple reasons.Now the core's melting down, the robots have gone berserk, and even the coffee maker is trying to kill you. Well it takes more than that to keep a SPOSHA inspector down. Sharpen your wits, grab your blaster, and do what you need to do to get off this orbital deathtrap. 35 levels of puzzles, plasma beams, and platformingSnappy pixel graphicsAdvanced morality system with one choice and no impactIn-game timers and unlockable level select for nailing your speedrun

Detailed Description: Journey to Foundation is a story-driven sci-fi adventure set in Isaac Asimov’s Foundation universe, built from the ground up for VR.You are Agent Ward, a galactic spy with the Commission of Public Safety. What begins as a mission to investigate deserters in the Periphery quickly becomes a battle for control of all humanity.Throughout your journey, you’ll be faced with difficult choices. Decide whether to befriend or double-cross people, determine who lives and dies, and help different factions rise or fall in this branching story.Will you fight for a dying Empire, or will you join the Foundation to help rebuild what has been lost?CHOICE & CONSEQUENCEMake your decisions wisely - they can impact your journey and how others perceive you.UNIQUE MENTAL ABILITIESUse the power of Mentalics to influence or destroy your enemies and read their minds.TOOLS OF THE EMPIREDisguise, blast, and hack your way through the galaxy with stealth, combat, and puzzles.KEY FEATURESExperience a gripping narrative adventure unlike anything else you can find in VR, with 6-8 hours of gameplayInteract with over 90 fully voiced characters brought to life by a top-tier voice cast including Jennifer Hale, François Chau, Jason Hightower, and more…Participate in the drama through an immersive conversation system where you make gestures, look for hidden dialogue choices, and interact with objectsAccessibility options to make your journey comfortable: continuous movement, teleportation, snap turn, smooth turn, and vignettingAvailable with full voice acting and text in English, French, German, and Spanish
Short Description: A story-driven adventure among the stars, Journey to Foundation puts you at the center of your own sci-fi saga. Unleash your unique Mentalic abilities, gain information through diplomacy or coercion, and choose who to trust. Where will your journey lead you?

Detailed Description: Create and care for your unique ecosystem, filled with animals like rabbits and foxes. Keep your animals happy to earn precious leafpoints. Watch your rabbits grow and reap greater rewards over time! Use leafpoints to buy new animals and aquire upgrades such as enhancing the quality and quantity of food you can spawn in your ecosystem.Advance through levels by unlocking special chests with your leafpoints. Each chest contains a unique companion with special abilities to help you maintain your ecosystem. Strategize with up to three companions per level to maximize efficiency. For instance, Daisy breeds baby rabbits, while Ferdinand lays eggs that yield hefty leafpoint bonuses.Protect your ecosystem from invading monsters emerging from portals. Each enemy presents a unique challenge, from the single-targeting swamp golem to the formidable Granite Guardian with its powerful distance laser attacks. Defeat these threats quickly for valuable rewards, and upgrade your weapons to handle tougher foes.Dive into Equiverse and enjoy the fun and excitement of creating, nurturing, and defending your very own ecosystem!
Short Description: Experience the ultimate ecosystem simulator! Equiverse is a hectic simulation game where you care for different species of animals, earn income by keeping them happy, unlock helpful companions, and defend against invading monsters. Can you keep your ecosystem thriving?

Detailed Description: A strange, unfamiliar environment greets you: Towering walls, fathomless pits, ledges and ropes connecting rooms in the strangest of ways. This...castle? How did you get there? Why is your skin blue? And what on earth is this talking cat? There must be something around here to serve as a clue.You play as a ghost, and that comes with its perks; Making objects float through the air, moving massive pillars weightlessly and freezing things in place are all possible through possession. And now that you've ditched your body, jumping twice in the air is as easy as pie. But... it's not all smooth sailing, you'll quickly find that the castle has some magic of its own.Embark on a journey facing the many challenges navigating this strange castle poses, with each step bringing you closer to remembering who you are, and what got you there.

Detailed Description: Immersive 6 degree of freedom 1000kmh+ high speed flying experienceTunnel: Over 2000 different possible stylesThe tunnel is procedural random generated from many possible different styled units, forming huge amount of potential combinations, giving new experience and mood each play!Supports PC & Meta Quest 2 VRMinimal discomfort with control mechanism of “steering by tilting your body”:Tilt L/R to steer L/R, Tilt backward to steer up, Tilt forward to steer down.You can even feel the gravity when you steer up and down!GameplayYou will be driving through an infinitely long sci-fi tunnel as fast as possible to try to escape from a plasma blast chasing behind you. Collect energy spheres for life-saving speed boosts. Survive as long as you can!The background music's pace is linked to the speed of the spacecraft, to maximize your speed induced excitement!
Short Description: Immersive 6 degree of freedom 1000kmh+ high speed flying experience! Drive fast and carefully to survive from a plasma blast as long as you can. Over 2000 different styled tunnels to explore! Support PC & Meta Quest VR.

Detailed Description: Join The DiscordAbout the GameJump into this fast paced 3 v. 3 Sports Shooter, where goals meet gunfire.Choose your class, get onto the field, shoot to kill, and score to win. Compete as powerful strikers to get the ball into the opponent’s goal, at all costs. Through a mix of tactical shooting, sports strategy, and finesse - dominate the league!COMPETE IN THE ULTIMATE SPORTS ARENA: Tackle opponents, pass the ball to teammates, block incoming shots, and eliminate anyone standing between you and the goal to score and win. As a team, you’ll shoot, score, and strategize your way to victory.SELECT YOUR STRIKER: Choose from a stacked roster of 10+ strikers, each with their own unique abilities and playstyles. Whether you prefer the speed of light strikers, the disruption of medium strikers, or the power of heavy strikers - find your niche and own the field.UNLEASH YOUR INNER BEAST: Suit up with a huge arsenal of weapons and abilities. From rocket launchers and assault rifles to hydro cannons and teleport grenades, there’s a full range of offensive, defensive, and strategic skills and weaponry to master.TRAVEL THE GLOBE: From New York to Tokyo, compete at iconic locations across the world. Each arena offers varying routes and cover to learn and capitalize on.SPEED KILLS: Experience adrenaline-pumping gameplay where speed is your greatest weapon. Dash across the arena, charge your shot, and outplay opponents to beat the buzzer. SHAPE THE GAME: Help influence the evolution of the game, as we make updates and improvements based on community feedback.Ready to cause chaos this season? Wishlist now, and join us in the arena!

Detailed Description: Welcome to Work Beasts! In this game, you'll step into the shoes of a entrepreneur tasked with running a business. But here's the twist: you won't be managing just any regular workforce. No, you'll be harnessing the unique talents of mystical creatures like humans, goblins, and fairies to propel your business to success!At the start of the game, you'll choose your business contract. Whether it's programming, editing or making art, each contract comes with its own set of challenges and opportunities, so choose wisely! Humans are reliable and skilled workers, capable of tackling a variety of tasks with precision and expertise, and it is not much difficult to manage their needs. Goblins, on the other hand, may be a bit mischievous and difficult to manage, but they possess unique abilities that can't be matched. Each race has unique characteristics and you will need to mix them in order to achieve the greatest productivity.Managing these mystical creatures isn't just about putting them to work – it's also about keeping them happy and motivated, after all if you had to work 24 hours a day you too would have a burnout. The giant human, for example, works better if you give him a beer. Goblins, meanwhile, work better if you don't push them outside of their comfort zones, so give them medieval equipments and they will be grateful for not having to learn all this new technology.As you navigate the ups and downs of running your business, you'll encounter all sorts of obstacles, from taxes to magical occurences. But fear not! With the right combination of strategy, teamwork, and a lots of luck, you'll overcome any challenge that comes your way.So gather your work beasts, roll up your sleeves, and get ready to embark on the road to success!
Short Description: Manage your workforce of mystical work beasts! Increase your team productivity in order to complete the most difficult jobs and earn lots of money, after all, the government won't leave you alone if you don't pay your taxes. Oh, don't forget to give your employers a coffee sometimes.

Detailed Description: Train simulator: A Journey Through TimeStep into the golden age of railroads, manage your own train, and explore meticulously designed, breathtaking landscapes. Customize and upgrade your train to offer your passengers unique comfort and luxury.Dynamic Railway Management ExperienceEngage in various activities, from signing lucrative contracts to transporting goods between bustling stations. Personalize your carriages, enhance your train's functionality, and provide excellent service to satisfy your passengers.Captivating Visuals and Relaxing AtmosphereImmerse yourself in a world full of beautiful scenery and a relaxing atmosphere. Travel through forests, vast plains, mountain slopes, and snowy terrains. No matter what environment you travel through, the beauty of your journey will always be with you.Develop and expand Your BusinessSign contracts, transport goods, and wisely use your resources to grow your business. Purchase new carriages, improve your train's capabilities, and provide your passengers with an unforgettable travel experience. With each successful delivery, you'll earn the money and prestige needed to advance your career and unlock new opportunities.Create Your Perfect TrainFrom the color of the carriages to the interior decoration, Train Simulator allows you to customize your train according to your unique style. Enhance the passenger experience with various services and amenities to make each journey as comfortable and enjoyable as possible.Join the AdventureTake on the role of a train conductor and create a legend in Train Simulator. With engaging gameplay, stunning visuals, and a relaxing atmosphere, this game promises an unforgettable train experience. Your journey to becoming a legendary train operator starts here.
Short Description: At the end of the 1800s, make a difference in the railway industry with your own train. Customize your train and offer luxury and comfort to your passengers. Grow your business with interstation travels, profitable contracts, and new wagons. A relaxing and enjoyable adventure awaits you.

Detailed Description: BeachHead Gold EditionStep back into your (childhood) memories with the BeachHead Gold Edition! Relive the exhilaration of defending the beach against relentless enemy forces in three iconic titles: BeachHead 2000, BeachHead 2002, and BeachHead 3000 (Desert War). Do you recall your best score? How many levels did you pass? Whether you spent endless hours playing solo or sharing with your dad, son, or friends, it is time to let go of the everyday noise and get lost in the memory of a great gameKey Features:Three Classic Titles: Play BeachHead 2000, BeachHead 2002, and BeachHead Desert Striker, beloved classics that have stood the test of time. Immerse yourself in intense first-person shooter gameplay as you defend the beach against waves of enemies.Level Editor: Unleash your creativity with the included level editor for all three games. Design custom levels, create unique challenges, and share your creations with the community.Compete on the Leaderboards: Test your skills against other players on the dedicated leaderboard for player-created levels. Rise to the top and prove yourself as the ultimate BeachHead champion.Enhanced Compatibility: Play on modern Windows versions with ease, thanks to enhanced compatibility features. Say goodbye to technical hurdles and enjoy seamless gameplay right out of the box.Optimized Controls: Say goodbye to mouse sensitivity issues with our revamped game launcher. Enjoy precise and responsive controls for a smoother gaming experience.Join the Battle: Whether you're a seasoned retro gamer longing for a nostalgic trip down memory lane or a newcomer eager to experience classic arcade action, the BeachHead Gold Edition offers something for everyone. Relive the glory days of gaming and immerse yourself in the timeless thrill of defending the beach against enemy onslaughts. With its classic gameplay, enhanced features, and compatibility with modern systems, this edition is a must-have for retro gaming enthusiasts and newcomers alike. Get ready to embark on an unforgettable journey and unleash your inner arcade hero in the ultimate battle for victory!

Detailed Description: ORIKA is a fun 3D action-adventure and story-rich game inspired from 3D  Platformer games, where the robot ORIKA sets out to clean up polluted water environments. Explore beautiful landscapes, solve puzzles, and overcome challenges in this exciting adventure to restore clean water. Join ORIKA on this thrilling journey to make the world a better place!Explore beautiful landscapes, solve puzzles, and overcome challenges in this exciting adventure to restore clean water. Join ORIKA on this thrilling journey to make the world a better place!Story Of ORIKAAwakening at the bottom of a polluted lake near a ruined factory, ORIKA, a small robot with a lost memory except for its name, emerges from the water to receive signals from a nearby boat. Through the radio, a former factory worker, now imprisoned for sabotaging the polluting facility as he told ORIKA, pleads for ORIKA's help. He urges ORIKA to use the boat to clean up the water and sell the waste to upgrade the vessel. In return, he promises assistance in restoring ORIKA's memories. Join ORIKA on this quest to cleanse the environment, enhance the boat, and unravel the mystery of its forgotten past!

Detailed Description: From Outerloop Games comes Project Dosa, a game about life, love and loss. Join sisters Samara and Amani as they eat the world and taste everything life has to offer. Reunite with the people you love, defeat the forces of capitalism (metaphorically) and eat one last meal before saying goodbye.BATTLE AND BONDJourney across a vibrant world to reconnect with estranged friends and family. Battle them in fantastical turn-based narrative combat to reconcile past hurts and open up the possibilities of friendship and love. Grow your bonds with them over time.COOK DELICIOUS MEALSFood is more than fuel - it's community, culture, history, shared memories. Discover new recipes through exploration and conversation, and cook for friends, family and local communities to heal rifts and reconcile relationships.UPGRADE YOUR MECHDiscover and shape your spirit-mech's mechanical and fantastical abilities as you traverse the world, cook and battle together.
Short Description: Platform through a vibrant world in an upgradeable mech and cook delicious meals. Fight off corpos in turn based combat, discover new recipes, build up your reputation with local communities, and bond with friends and family on a journey to taste everything life has to offer.

Detailed Description: 在被人遗忘的世界角落，传闻存在着一个伟大的遗作：罗森图鉴。那是由某位智者打造的一座层层相连的立于深空的高塔，是由数十座不同环境的浮空岛组成的深邃的迷宫空间，其中有森林与沙漠、有冰原与火山，有着各种奇异的生物与数不尽的财富。 不知何时，你的意识进入一副陌生的身躯，从罗森图鉴的内部醒来。你的命运——该何去何从？#浮空岛与传送门 罗森图鉴由数十座浮空岛构成，由传送门相连接，难度逐步提升，供玩家探索与挑战。#职业与技能 游戏提供了5种职业用于构建玩家的战斗风格，扮演团队中不同的角色，在此基础上玩家可以自由组合技能，发挥智慧与想象力。#装备和道具材料、图纸、道具和装备等等可以从npc商店购买或者击败魔物来获得，利用游戏内的一切资源充分武装自己，提高战斗力。 #建造专属领域达到一定等级后，玩家可以解锁专属领域。玩家可以在领域内建造金矿、炮台、攻城战车等各种各样的建筑，用于帮助玩家成长或者进攻与防御。#排位与团战 在充分建设专属领域并布置好阵型后，玩家可以邀请好友一起参与排位战，与其他拥有专属领域的玩家对战，击败他们以提升段位与积分并获取丰厚的奖励。#极高的组合与操作上限虽然每个职业的技能树有限，但游戏支持角色利用扩展插槽来扩充自己的技能库，随着游戏不断更新推出新的技能，玩家可以用的技能组合也会越来越多。在战斗中，绝大多数技能都需要玩家自己瞄准并释放，这也意味着玩家可以通过自己的移动跳跃或位移技能来规避伤害。此外，较快的战斗节奏要求玩家快速做出决策。#排兵布阵的策略排位战一旦开始，对战双方的进攻与防守将同时进行，攻城武器将沿着预先设定的位置投入敌方领域，确保自己领域不被摧毁的同时尽可能破坏敌方的阵地！请务必在合适的位置摆放合适的建筑，以确保它们能够充分配合并发挥最大的作用！
Short Description: 欢迎来到《罗森图鉴Online》！这是一款高难度与高策略性的MMO角色扮演游戏，将带您进入一个庞大的虚拟世界——一个由数十座浮空岛组成的巨型遗迹。在这里，您将于其他玩家一起战斗，一起成长，探索与挑战未知的难关！或是建设专属领域，布置阵型，参加排位战，与其他玩家争夺排名，展现您的智慧与技巧，赢得荣耀与财富！

Detailed Description: Combine the three primordial Facets of destruction, resilience and movement into powerful abilities to defeat your corrupted creations. Find your way to counter your enemy attacks by mastering a diverse and adaptable moveset in this small colorful 2D bossgame Find Your Playstyle Siaty wields the 3 Facets of destruction, resilience and movement. In battle, these Facets can either be used separately or merged to create a wide variety of abilities. Long range attack, close range attack, dash forward, backdash, protective shield, teleportation, timed defense, ... Master Siaty's versatility and find your way to overcome whatever is in front of you. Reconnect with your past and repair what has been corrupted. Siaty has been detained for a long time. When they come back, some of their creations have been corrupted by their absence. They will have to deal with those that have become too dangerous to be left free. What to Expect From Siaty's Return A light-hearted bossgame made with love by two developers An original gameplay where you mix Facets on the fly during battleAn in-depth tutorial to help you master the character's movesetFour different bosses, each having 2 difficulties and unique mechanicsOptional secondary objectives for each fightA light background story unfolding as you progress through bossesBetween 3h and 5h of gameplay PLEASE NOTE THAT A CONTROLLER IS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED TO PLAY SIATY'S RETURN

Detailed Description: "ShootStar" is a 2D shooting action boss battle game.Choose the right equipment for each boss, fight and reach your destination!This game was inspired by "Cuphead" and "Mega Man".OptionLanguage can be set to either Japanese or English from the title.Sound volume can be set from the Pause menu.Video Distribution GuidelinesDistribution is available to both individuals and corporations without permission.Monetization is only possible when using the functions provided by the video distribution site.We would appreciate it if you could include the name of the game in the title of the video or streaming video, or include a link to the Steam page in the summary.We are not responsible for any damage caused by the distribution of this game video.Bug where the opening story doesn't play on first playAs a countermeasure, if you see this message in the bottom right corner when playing for the first time, please reset your save data.

Detailed Description: Ultrakanoid is an exciting game that will allow you to immerse yourself in a nostalgic atmosphere. In this game, you will control a platform and juggle fish, which must break blocks on the playing field to complete the level.Game process:The game has various bonuses and enhancements that will help you complete the levels.With each level the game becomes more difficult and more interesting. The blocks become stronger and new obstacles appear.Peculiarities:— Vivid graphics and sound effects.— Bonuses and enhancements to help you progress through the game.— Simple controls that will allow you to quickly get used to the game.Ultrakanoid is a great way to spend time and have a lot of fun playing the game.

Detailed Description: "We keep circling around the same place, and we don't even know why we're fighting. I wonder if we'll ever find out."how to play:・Gold bag icon (income commensurate with level).・Skeleton icon (battle with random enemies, earn money commensurate with your level if you win, pay commensurate with your level if you lose).・Crossed bone icon (basically the same as the skeleton icon, but the damage dealt is added to your bankroll, and the damage received is subtracted from your bankroll).- Skeleton and bones icon (when stopped, you will face off against a random player. The loser will pay money to the winner).- Sword icon (equipment obtained randomly, appearance reflects each player, attack power and defense power also change).- Medal icon (obtain random experience points appropriate to your level).・Castle icon (buys a castle when it stops, expands it every time it stops, and pays the owner money commensurate with the castle's level when another player stops).- Gold nugget icon (when stopped, all players except the stopped player pay money to the stopped player according to their level).- Coin icon (when it stops, the coins of the player who stopped and the other players are exchanged).- Helmet icon (stationary player and random player exchange equipment).-Lightning icon (when it stops, a tornado will appear on the stage for a while, and if you touch it you will lose gold).- House icon (pays money to the owner of the house when it stops).In battle, you gain experience points by inflicting damage on your opponent.You play with yourself and 3 other CPUs.To give you a brief overview of the game, it's Sugoroku with sword fighting elements.Roll the dice when it's your turn. Proceed by that number.The CPU also rolls the dice.There are ghosts wandering around the stage, and if you come into contact with them, you will be deducted $50.Cash on hand starts at $1000 each.There are various types of icons in the game (see above).The effect will be activated. However, another player is already stopped on the icon.If it is, it will be invalidated.As you play, if a player has a negative amount of money, the gameThe session will end.The player with the most money at that time will have his own rule on the next play.The state in which the equipment with the highest limit of the concept of user level is equipped at the start of the next game.It will be in a state. A player whose bankroll becomes negative is a loser level.You will move up by 1, and the next time you play, you will start with $100 more in your bankroll.To express this in words, the winner goes on the defensive, and the loser gains a chance of winning in the next battle.This means thatWinners' names and winnings will be recorded on the money leaderboard.------------------------------------*Keyboard operation is not possible.*The audio for this game is provided by Ondoku.

Detailed Description: In ANGST, you awaken alone in a vast, frozen wilderness, where survival is your only goal. The icy winds howl, wolves prowl the dark forests, and every resource must be fought for. Chop down trees to build fires that stave off the biting cold, craft weapons from scavenged materials, and struggle to stay alive. The world of ANGST is unforgiving, but beneath the snow and ice lie secrets waiting to be uncovered. How long can you survive in this hostile land before the darkness closes in? By day, you hunt and gather, chopping wood to build fires and crafting weapons to protect yourself. By night, the wilderness comes alive with deadly creatures and strange entities that react to your actions. Some will guide you, while others seek to end your journey as quickly as it began. Don’t trust everything you see—some things want to help, while others lurk in the shadows, waiting to strike. How you navigate the world is up to you, but survival is never guaranteed.As you navigate the wilderness, uncover the mysteries hidden within the hollow. Who are you, and why are you here? Complete quests that slowly reveal the world’s hidden past and your place within it. Encounter mysterious entities that react to your choices, subtly pushing you toward your fate. The story unfolds through exploration and survival—each quest brings you closer to uncovering the truth, but every step deeper into the wild also brings greater peril.Every choice in ANGST shapes your survival. Brave the wilderness by day, gathering food, wood, and supplies to endure the night. Craft tools, weapons, and shelter to push deeper into the Hollow’s dangerous biomes, where each death teaches you a lesson and unlocks new skills. Adapt to the ever-changing environment, upgrade your character, and choose how you evolve to face the escalating threats. Build a survival strategy that suits your play style, but remember—what works one day may not save you the next.Step into an expansive world where no two survival experiences are the same. Explore dense forests, frozen rivers, and desolate plains, each biome presenting unique challenges. Scavenge through abandoned cabins, cut down trees for firewood, and fish in icy waters. But beware—every sound in the distance could mean danger, and the deeper you venture, the deadlier it becomes. The open world of ANGST is as beautiful as it is brutal, and only the most prepared will survive its many dangers.Survive the wilderness of ANGST alone or with friends. In online co-op mode, team up with others to explore The Hollow together. Share resources, fight side by side against predators, and work shoulder to shoulder to craft tools and build shelter. Brave the hostile environment, uncover its secrets, and see how long you can survive in this frozen limbo.
Short Description: ANGST is a solo & co-op wilderness survival game set in a freezing, gritty, stylized Low-Poly limbo-like world. Craft tools and weapons, hunt, fish, and fight to stay alive. Upgrade skills to venture deeper into the wild, but be warned: what lurks there can thwart your plans. Survive the ANGST!

Detailed Description: ”Re:Connect” is a programming puzzle adventure game in which you connect codes.You play the role of a “Bug Repair Program” and explore the computer world.Use your power to invade the system and fix buggy programs!【What kind of puzzle?】Sokoban-style puzzles based on the motif of electronic circuits!A one-stroke puzzle that stretches and connects codes!A programming puzzle that connects logic lines!"Connect" the codes and “program” the rules! 【What kind of adventure?】The stage is set in the world of “inside the computer”,The stage is set in the world of “inside the computer”, where “AIs with hearts” are doing their “work”!AI is just a program, right?Let's break into the AI and see its thought process!...But..,But be careful of “Mind bug”...!【Who should play this game?】People who like puzzle games!People who want to see the world of computers!Children who want to learn programming!And for those of you with a “bug” in your heart...This game is perfect for learning programming, social studies, and learning about the mind! Come on! Let's go on an adventure to reconnect bugs with “Re:Connect”!

Detailed Description: Can YOU tell what is and isn't cake?We've all been out and about at the grocery store or movie theater and thought... "Is that a hyperrealistic cake??" Not affiliated in any way with any game shows that ask similar questions, Slice of Life allows you to finally answer that age old question.Features:First-person knife action: Use a controller or keyboard/mouse to walk and hop around a small city.A short cake-themed experience: A linear micro story meant to provide an hour or so of cathartic slicing and, I dunno, personal growth alongside a knife-wielding protagonist.One and done: This experience is not meant to be addicting or provide endless replay value. Just play through the end and move onto the next fun little indie game.Make the perfect cut and explore a destructible worldWalk about your own little sandbox city and cut up what you want to cut up! Discover what is and isn't cake the only way that makes sense: by cutting in. If you've ever wanted to safely destroy everything in a cubicle-farm office building, now is your chance. You might even find some cakes there!
Short Description: In this casual, first-person slicing sim, you take control of a citizen in a small town who is convinced that everything around them is cake. Use your trusty knife to slash your way through books, trees, dumpsters, and just about everything in town to prove what you know to be true: it's all cake.

Detailed Description:
This 2D game is about a seahorse and what it’s like to be one for a day! The protagonist must go through a series of challenges until finding its mate, each being totally different. The game also features real information about marine life along with light humor to make everything more fun. Could you be a seahorse? Find out with Ziggy. In this underwater adventure, which consists of a sort of obstacle race to reach the protagonist’s main goal, you will discover more about the life of a seahorse!

This game was made aiming to be for all ages and to present an educational character. Please, enjoy!
Short Description: Survive with Ziggy through the challenges of a carioca marine life in search of its ideal mate. Take the opportunity to learn more about the life of a seahorse and its daily challenges, as well as predators and prey!

Detailed Description:
This scroll painting "The Song of Everlasting Sorrow" was created by Kano Sansetsu during Japan's Edo period. The complete set is divided into two volumes, depicting the tragic love story of Emperor Xuanzong of Tang and Consort Yang. The first volume illustrates the events from Emperor Xuanzong's obsession with beauty leading to Consort Yang's tragic death at Mawei Post Station. The second volume primarily portrays the emperor's endless longing for Consort Yang.

-----Game Features------

- Relax and enjoy ancient artworks
- Hundreds of unique "cats"
- Soothing ancient music
- Adorable cat sound effects
- 100 meticulously crafted achievement icons

-----Game Operation Tips------

- Press the ESC key to hide or show the in-game buttons
- Click the hint button to quickly find a cat in the scene, usable every 60 seconds
- Click the game's cover logo to view the full HD version of "The Song of Everlasting Sorrow"
------------------------

Detailed Description: Beyond reason is a knowledge-based time-loop game about surviving a tiny open world. Master your hostile environment through a variety of items, weapons, and infinitely stacking upgrades. Use each loop to uncover more of the island's mysteries, as your knowledge of the world is the only thing you keep when time begins again.Key Features Explore a small but dense open world and uncover the mystery of its time loop Fluid first person combat, using a variety of items, weapons, spells, and more Break the game's boundaries through infinitely stacking power-ups A quirky, fully voice-acted cast of characters A short experience designed to be finished in around 2 hours
Short Description: Beyond reason is a knowledge-based time-loop game about surviving a tiny open world. Master fluid first person combat, while uncovering the island's secrets. When you die, you take nothing but your knowledge of the world into the next loop.

Detailed Description:
The worst time to wake up in the middle of nowhere following a car crash is that time in history before smartphones and the internet, there's no way to call for help except finding a landline. Explore the open forest and farm area with caution, something isn't right up here and its dark as hell, there's a flashlight in the car but is it even safe to have it on? Use what's found in the environment and find a working phone to call for help. Through investigating the darkness, a horrific story of what happened starts to unfold. 

What to expect : 
- Explore an unsettling open-ended world in First Person and make use of light-sensitive mechanics to avoid danger and survive through dark & eerie settings.
- Find useful items, uncover clues, watch VHS tapes, solve puzzles, read journal entries and uncover what happened here.
- Retro 3D low-poly 32-bit style visuals, oozing with 90's inspiration.
Short Description: Horror-ambiance in low-poly. Open-ended exploration, investigation, hidden items, interesting puzzles and intriguing dark storyline.

Detailed Description: Step into the driver’s seat as a lovable dog in Coco’s Delivery Service. A casual and open-world delivery adventure set in a quirky animal-filled city. Deliver packages, upgrade your van, and uncover a lighthearted mystery involving a shady corporation’s suspicious sardine scheme.Explore vibrantly pixel art districts, take on the many different delivery challenges, and balance your time between earning cash, sniffing out clues, and interact with the townsfolk.Make friends, build a business, and solve the mystery!✨ Wishlist now to stay updated! Charming exploration: Drive through bustling neighbourhoods filled with quirky animals and vibrant environments.Delivery challenges: Face fun and varied delivery tasks, from timed rush orders to undercover stakeouts.Van customisation and upgrades:  Spend your earnings on new parts for your van to take on new types of deliveries and give it a personal touch.Uncover the mystery: What is actually going beneath the picturesque surface? Detailed Description: K-Bot is an innovative puzzle casual game that cleverly combines classic block stacking and path planning game elements..In this challenging maze world, you will play as a clever little robot whose task is to survive the constantly changing block rain. Your goal is to skillfully control the robot, placing each falling block precisely into its destination. When you successfully arrange and combine to complete a row or column of blocks, they will disappear in a satisfying way, bringing you points and cheers!Main Game Mechanics:When the squares on the field are filled up in a row, that row of squares can be destroyed.The little robot can consume the squares on the field and transform them into a part of its body.Falling blocks that hit the robot’s body will break the body apart, and the broken blocks will join the falling ones to form a new shape. Use this mechanism to take the consumed blocks to the appropriate position.:)
Short Description: K-Bot is an innovative puzzle casual game that cleverly combines classic block stacking and path planning game elements. Players need to strategically move within a dynamically changing play area to achieve the goal of clearing lines.

Detailed Description: The Local Asset Library is an asset management website that can be accessed locally. By entering asset information to organize local assets, users can quickly locate the location of the asset files when needed. It is an efficient asset management tool that can be used to manage portable software, photo collections, videos, game development materials, etc. Designed for game developers  Do you often worry about managing game materials collected everywhere? The scattered material files and difficult to remember content are stumbling blocks in your development process. Now, with a local asset repository, these issues will be easily solved! Easy to input, browse, and search, with your own game material library, making development more efficient and creative smoother.FeaturesAsset Overview - On the asset browsing page, the cover, name, and tags of the assets are displayed for an overview of all assets.Asset Search - Provides a search box to search for assets by name; provides a tag filter box to filter assets by asset tags.Asset Entry - The information you can enter for an asset includes: title, cover, tags, files, description, version, source. It's okay if some information is empty, you can still enter the asset, and there will be no difference when viewing the asset.Edit Asset - You can edit any information of an asset or delete an asset at any time.Simple Interface - Simple, convenient, and fast. Experience the most efficient asset management with zero learning cost.Browser Plugins for Game Asset EntryBrowser plugins are provided to parse the details page of game asset websites and can enter the information of specified assets into the management tool with one click, saving time, effort, and worry.Supported Browsers - Google Chrome, Firefox.Supported Websites - Unity Asset Store, Unreal Engine Marketplace And itch.Continuous Support - If you have other browsers or websites (including non-game asset sales websites) that need support, please contact us, and we will provide unconditional support for them.Multi-language SupportContribution Support - If you find errors in your language or are willing to provide support for a new language, please contact us.Future PlansAsset Categorization - View assets by category on the homepage, and set your own asset types.Asset Sharing - Provide import and export functions for asset information. You can export selected assets and import them into other libraries.

Game Name: 与从画面中出来的我推Vtuber的同居生活 想跟庶民派的吸血鬼大小姐签下契约
Detailed Description: 《Story》Masato Kasukabe is miserable in a job that's constantly overworking him.His only sole pleasure is supporting his favorite vtubers."Ahh, if only my oshi jumped through the screen right now…"Masato starts fantasizing about living with his oshi.But that could never happen for real…Suddenly, he ends up with three of his favorites as his roommates.With vtubers existing in the flesh, a dimension-spanning love story begins…A contract with the (surprisingly frugal) vampire noblewomanTo help with finances while Masato looks for a new job, Ruby gets a part-time job.Despite the struggles, the two of them do their best to support each other at work.But then Ruby notices a new feeling budding inside her, something she's never felt before…《Characters》Ruby D. Sato (CV: Yami Yumezuki)*Main HeroineA vtuber who splits her time between themed live streams and just chatting.While her character concept is that she's a vampire of noble blood, she's extremely frugal with money and can't stomach horror games, so it's unclear if any of that is true.Hipopo Popota (CV: Karen Hanadera)*Not romanceable in this title"A game livestreamer who escaped from the zoo…It's unclear whether she's a horse, a hippopotamus, or some other animal entirely."She's looking for an owner to take care of her so that she can stream 24/7.Amu Amayume (CV: Hinata Kobe)*Not romanceable in this titleA succubus who has come down to the modern world to relieve the fatigue felt by those stuck working crappy jobs.Her goal is to harvest the life energy of her listeners through her livestreams.Because she deliberately tries to give her listeners the wrong idea with her cunning charm, she has a lot of fans.Masato KasukabeAn employee at a web design company.He was a massive otaku back in his university days but hasn't had the time to indulge in his hobbies since entering the workforce, living an empty life consisting of just work and sleep.At some point, he discovered vtubers, and with them, gains a small amount of hope to cling to.《Contents》Japanese voice acting for the main female characters*Before purchasing this product, we highly recommend that you play the demo [Japanese only] to check if the game works properly on your computer in your region.*Casket is the licensor of this game. For inquiries about the product, please get in touch with Tensei Games.
Short Description: A pure love visual novel. Masato Kasukabe finds himself with three of his favorite vtubers as roommates. But then Ruby notices a new feeling budding inside her, something she's never felt before…
About the Game: 《Story》Masato Kasukabe is miserable in a job that's constantly overworking him.His only sole pleasure is supporting his favorite vtubers."Ahh, if only my oshi jumped through the screen right now…"Masato starts fantasizing about living with his oshi.But that could never happen for real…Suddenly, he ends up with three of his favorites as his roommates.With vtubers existing in the flesh, a dimension-spanning love story begins…A contract with the (surprisingly frugal) vampire noblewomanTo help with finances while Masato looks for a new job, Ruby gets a part-time job.Despite the struggles, the two of them do their best to support each other at work.But then Ruby notices a new feeling budding inside her, something she's never felt before…《Characters》Ruby D. Sato (CV: Yami Yumezuki)*Main HeroineA vtuber who splits her time between themed live streams and just chatting.While her character concept is that she's a vampire of noble blood, she's extremely frugal with money and can't stomach horror games, so it's unclear if any of that is true.Hipopo Popota (CV: Karen Hanadera)*Not romanceable in this title"A game livestreamer who escaped from the zoo…It's unclear whether she's a horse, a hippopotamus, or some other animal entirely."She's looking for an owner to take care of her so that she can stream 24/7.Amu Amayume (CV: Hinata Kobe)*Not romanceable in this titleA succubus who has come down to the modern world to relieve the fatigue felt by those stuck working crappy jobs.Her goal is to harvest the life energy of her listeners through her livestreams.Because she deliberately tries to give her listeners the wrong idea with her cunning charm, she has a lot of fans.Masato KasukabeAn employee at a web design company.He was a massive otaku back in his university days but hasn't had the time to indulge in his hobbies since entering the workforce, living an empty life consisting of just work and sleep.At some point, he discovered vtubers, and with them, gains a small amount of hope to cling to.《Contents》Japanese voice acting for the main female characters*Before purchasing this product, we highly recommend that you play the demo [Japanese only] to check if the game works properly on your computer in your region.*Casket is the licensor of this game. For inquiries about the product, please get in touch with Tensei Games.

Recommended Requirements: No information

If you return, of course.// The sequence is disrupted. Some information is concealed from the user to reduce the risk of emotional trauma. Mother.// Confirmation of topic change request... SuccessGather your friends into a squad, with up to 4 players. After landing in a new unexplored world, you'll have one day to bring back as much valuable loot to the ship as possible.But be careful - the local inhabitants may show excessive curiosity towards unexpected guests and even desire to taste you.Gadgets are fun!According to Code 3FSGON2 on the protection of wildlife and to avoid increased risk of injury, you, like other researchers, are not permitted to carry lethal weapons.However, you will have a state-of-the-art spaceship at your disposal, along with a whole arsenal of tools, gadgets, and helper robots to accomplish a wide range of tasks:ScoutingVehiclesTransportationResource extraction from underground depositsAttracting and repelling living creatures of various threat levelsStress reliefProgress without limitsSaving humanity is no easy mission. Every toaster, engine, or rubber expander brought to the space station is a resource that will be directed towards survival by the caring hands of Mother.In return, Mother doesn't demand quotas from you and grants the freedom to upgrade, level up, and move forward, regardless of your results. Detailed Description: END: Awakening  is a narrative-based action-survival game in which you and up to three friends must gather resources, craft weapons and tools, and upgrade your cabin into the ultimate anti-zombie fortress! Venture out into the wilds ruled by brutal Rustler scavengers, or the undead-infested Whitestone City to collect food, water, and medical supplies. Solve puzzles and carefully choose between sneaking and fighting to defeat both human and undead enemies in order to advance the plot and begin to unravel Hecate’s twisted plan. FEATURESDeep Storyline Rooted in Greek Mythology: The Witch-Goddess Hecate has imprisoned all of Olympus in order to unleash her undead wrath upon the world! The enigmatic Hexa corporation manipulates the disaster! Strike out and unearth the mystery!Survive the Apocalypse Side By Side: Join up to three friends on your adventure! Forage together, craft together, explore together, and fight together! Intense Loot-Driven Gameplay: Explore for food and water, medicine and ammunition, as well as powerful weapons and vehicles! Scavenge for resources and materials to upgrade your survival-tools and improve your shelter, fortifying it against all attackers!Face the Apocalypse Your Way: Every encounter tests your skills, reflexes, and decision-making. Will you fight your enemies directly? Will you sneak past them? Will you set traps and ambushes to turn things to your favor before making your move? The choice is yours– as are the consequences. Run, Jump, Glide, Drive: END offers an enormous variety of locations to explore, and exploit. Fight your way through the densely packed city of Whitestone! Scavenge the forests and farms for precious resources! Descend into dangerous military bunkers to face puzzles and powerful enemies, and earn your shot at the rarest loot!TAKE CONTROL OVER THE APOCALYPSEThe open world of “END: Awakening” is alive and ever-shifting. Factions such as the meddling Hexa Corporation and the aggressive Rustlers, along with allies such as Charlotte, Logan, and Celine all offer their own unique resources and questlines to earn their favor– or their ire. Carefully choose to align yourself with; every choice matters, and changes the final fate of the Earth, and what remains of humanity.CONSTRUCT THE ULTIMATE SURVIVAL FORTRESSFortify and upgrade your simple starting cabin into the ideal stronghold! Gather resources to construct powerful defenses such as landmines, Zombie Attractors, spikes, and barricades, and stations for resting and replenishing health for your team. Craft more powerful weapons, increasing damage, range, and carnage! In End, the apocalypse is what you and your friends make of it. CONSTRUCT THE ULTIMATE SURVIVAL FORTRESSEND: Awakening presents a unique story in a unique setting– Ancient Greek Mythology spilling over into a modern zombie apocalypse, as the underworld itself spills out into a dense urban environment! The mystical and mysterious Hecate has imprisoned all the Greek Gods and Goddesses for allowing the world to fall into disrepair– but is the shadowy Hexa corporation working for her or against her? END’s will keep you on your toes at every turn, as you struggle to survive!
Short Description: END: Awakening is a greek myth-inspired, action-adventure survival game that throws you and your friends into a terrifying undead apocalypse. Fight to survive the relentless undead by scavenging, crafting, and building in an expansive co-op experience. Can you live through the END?

Detailed Description: Step into the captivating world of Conjured Through Death, where the boundaries between heroism and villainy blur, and redemption beckons amidst the shadows. In this gripping narrative adventure, embark on an epic odyssey as the protagonist grapples with his own transformation and the forces that seek to control the kingdom. Each level has unique secrets and challenges.Key Features of Conjured Through Death:- Dynamic Combat System: Engage in fast-paced combat with a variety of weapons and abilities. Utilize both physical and magical attacks to defeat your enemies.- Rich Storyline: Immerse yourself in a narrative filled with complex characters, moral dilemmas, and unexpected plot twists that keep you engaged from start to finish.- Exploration and Discovery: Traverse through meticulously designed levels with hidden secrets, lore, and treasures waiting to be uncovered.- Character Progression: Develop your character by unlocking new abilities, upgrading weapons, and discovering powerful artifacts that enhance your combat effectiveness.- Atmospheric Graphics and Sound: Experience a hauntingly beautiful world brought to life with stunning visuals and an immersive soundtrack that enhances the overall atmosphere.- Boss Battles: Face off against formidable bosses that require strategic thinking and precise timing to overcome.A Hero's RedemptionFollow the protagonist's journey from seeming villainy to noble purpose. Despite employing shadowy means, uncover the protagonist's true intentions driven by a desire for redemption and justice. You'll find a lot of the powers and mythic weapons.Embark on an Epic OdysseyTrapped within the confines of a castle he once served, the protagonist sets forth on a perilous journey of discovery and defiance. Navigate hallowed halls thick with betrayal and tension as every encounter tests wit, strategy, and sheer force.
Short Description: Embark on an epic journey set in the days following a dramatic transformation. Trapped within the castle where he once served, the protagonist now seeks escape. As the story unfolds, face challenges and enemies, culminating in a confrontation with the king and a mysterious, powerful creature.

Detailed Description: Special OfferAbout the GameRachel and Zoe have just had their second anniversary and things are not going well for them. A lot of the romance and passion has left their relationship and while they have talked about breaking up, they simply cannot imagine a life without one another. So, thanks to a recommendation from a friend, they book a weekend at a luxurious lesbian-only resort in the Hawaii to receive couple’s therapy from the legendary Dr. Mia Arroyo. During their sessions, Dr. Arroyo finds the curious reason why their relationship is not quite working and gives them a surprising recommendation as to how to save their marriage and re-discover themselves and each other!Weekend in Waimanalo is a romantic comedy yuri visual novel and dating sim. This is a game about love, respect, friendship, self-exploration, and mental health. Explore this hidden side of Oahu, get to know interesting characters, and see how your decisions affect where Rachel ends up and with who!Featuring:Beautiful Anime Character ArtMultiple EndingsHilarious but also dramatic storylineLots of pleasant and positive vibes in gorgeous Hawaiian locations.Hawaiian Smooth Jazz Fusion Soundtrack

Detailed Description: A touching story-driven Jump&Walk game in which you accompany Vincent on his mysterious journey. Each level allows you to immerse yourself more in Vincent’s life and reveals further details of his story. Numerous cutscenes advance the narrative and provide you with a deeper insight into Vincent’s past.Features	Immersive Gameplay: Traverse through beautifully crafted levels, each a window into Vincent’s soul.	Story-Driven Journey: Vincent is a visual novel, a narrative game, where each level you conquer unfolds a chapter of Vincent’s life.	Cinematic Cutscenes: These seamlessly blend with the gameplay, enriching your understanding of Vincent’s past.Join Vincent on his journey!
Short Description: Explore the life of Vincent, a homeless man with a mysterious past, in this Jump&Walk game. Dive into his yellowed sketches, each revealing a hidden memory. Uncover secrets, visit idyllic places, and discover the truth.

Detailed Description: 💟Add in WishList!!💟About the Game※Story Summary Onmyoji, a mysterious profession passed down through the ages, has gradually faded from public view but still exists today. Each Onmyoji team consists of one male "Yangshi," who provides the "Yang energy" needed for exorcism, and one female "Yinshi," who acts as the vessel for this energy, maximizing the power of Yin-Yang.The story is set in an abandoned Western-style mansion. After receiving a request for an exorcism, "Yinshi" Yue and "Yangshi" Yang arrive, only to find the case is much more challenging than expected. As they gradually exorcise the mansion's spirits, Yue and Yang realize that things are not as simple as they seem, uncovering the mansion's true secrets step by step.※Character Introduction Onmyoji - YueYang's girlfriend and partner, Yue is brimming with Yin energy, to the point where she can produce milk even without being pregnant. She wears a bell for purification around her neck and has a sacred mark on her lower abdomen that changes with the influx of Yang energy or Yin force. A homebody who loves dramas and anime, she rarely leaves the house unless necessary, with Yang taking care of most of her daily needs. Yue enjoys her life with Yang and the pleasure of Yin-Yang harmony, showing signs of nymphomania and always being in a state of arousal.※Game Features Full voice acting for the female protagonist by a special voice actressHighly erotic storylineOver ten HCG sets, all animatedImmersive situational puzzlesExclusive story written by light novel author HapiThe game is not scary at all, so feel free to enjoy it
Short Description: This is a light puzzle game where you play as Onmyoji characters "Yang" and "Yue" to exorcise spirits from a mansion. Enjoy immersive, eerie puzzles without any fear!

Detailed Description: This is an action puzzle game about camera magicIn the game, players will play as Miss Talia, a graduate student of the Magic Academy, racing against time!Will you be able to return to the academy before the dorm lights go out? That’s up to you!The Time-Space Magic of the Camera!Copy Space!By photographing close-up objects, create new platforms to keep moving forward!Return to the Past!If you make a mistake in your shot, you can use time magic to return to the moment before the shot!Three Hidden Completion Rewards!Some Unimportant Words:This game was my graduation project made during my study in Tokyo.Because it’s an individual production... there are probably still many points that need optimization and bugs.Now that I'm a working adult, updates may be slow, but I will do my best to fix them!Lastly, I hope you enjoy this roughly 10-minute gaming experience!
Short Description: Lens Adventure is an action puzzle game where you play as Talia, a Magic Academy graduate student. Use the camera's time-space magic to solve puzzles: create platforms by photographing objects and use time magic to undo mistakes. Can you return to the academy before the dorm lights go out?
About the Game: This is an action puzzle game about camera magicIn the game, players will play as Miss Talia, a graduate student of the Magic Academy, racing against time!Will you be able to return to the academy before the dorm lights go out? Detailed Description: Margin of the Strange is a gardening-themed mystery-exploration game about the world of human dreams. You play as Ling, a young man experiencing the phenomenon of "dreaming" for seemingly the first time. He discovers that the dream world is actually a type of ecosystem--a sprawling, crystalline, alien dimension dictated by Strange physical laws. Over the course of 6 weeks, Ling seeks to find out more about this world in order to unravel the mysteries surrounding his own life... and his own death.FeaturesGrow plants to reverse local entropyMake friends, they will have informationStare at lamps and drink sugar water (moth things)Make friends with moths, they will help you with the 3 previous thingsFrom the developers of adventure indie game hit OneShot

Detailed Description: Snowbound: Dead of Winter is a roguelite farming game with tower defense elements. Build your farm, survive the night with a range of defenses, and complete missions to progress deeper into the forest.Your farm is the heart of gameplay. Grow crops, refine them, and sell them for lots of money. Place a variety of buildings to refine existing items, or produce entirely new ones. Choose your strategy carefully, and be careful what you place, or risk angering the forest and becoming overwhelmed at night.Once night comes, go inside your home and manage your defenses. Strike a balance between buying new defenses and expanding your farm to earn enough money to complete your mission. The longer you stay, the more monsters arrive.Should you choose to stay longer in your mission, grow the Witheroot tree for increased rewards. After you complete your mission, spend valuable sap to unlock new buildings, defenses, and modifiers. With new tools, conquer missions at higher forest depths.

Detailed Description: Ant Attack is a game that merges Clicker mechanics with Tower Defense and some elements of Rogue-lite.Your mission is to defend the piece of bread that has fallen from the table from the ants. To do this, you have to collect as many crumbs as possible in the least amount of time possible and then invest them in increasing your power to face increasingly aggressive waves of ants or improving your efficiency in collecting crumbs.The game features:4 acts and 4 bosses, each one more difficult than the last.Over 85 different waves.48 upgrades.4 ultimate attacks with exclusive animations.2 different traps to place on the stage.13 different enemies.Clicker, Tower Defense, and Rogue-lite mechanics.And many more things to discover.

Detailed Description: The once peaceful nation of Escalia is oppressed by two tyrannical leaders who rule with fear and terror. As a last-ditch effort, the local rebels hired you, a legendary strategist and tactician, to help them free themselves. Assemble a team of mercenaries and free the country sector by sector, town by town in turn-based, tactical battles.With Freedom for FreedomComplete your objective however you want, the entire country is open to you as soon as you land. Take it step by step or march on the capital right away. Build alliances and support among the locals or ignore everyone's plea for assistance and stay laser-focused on your task. Recruit an army or take one on all by yourself. No one tells you how to do your job. The choice is yours.Colorful CharactersAssemble a team from a selection of highly trained mercenaries, each with different skills and specializations. And opinions. Lots of them. Some get along, others just hate each other. Choose wisely if you want morale to stay high and everyone at their peak performance.Strategy & TacticsNo war is won on the battlefield alone. If you want to prevail, it is not enough to win a fight, you need to keep the big picture in mind. Plan ahead, fortify liberated towns, train locals to become an efficient militia, cut off enemy supply lines, secure income streams to fund your operation and hire more fighters. There's always something to do on the way to victory.
