Detailed Description: Unfortunately due to geopolitical reason, production is postponed until further announcement.Welcome to AirFlow, where the vast expanse of the sky becomes your battleground! Prepare to embark on adrenaline-fueled adventures in epic aerial combat like never before. In AirFlow, you'll pilot powerful airplanes in intense battles for sky, land and sea, mastering the art of dodging enemy fire, while strategically outmaneuvering foes to claim dominance over the skies. Are you ready to take control and rule the heavens? Join the fray and soar to new heights in AirFlow!Planned Key FeaturesGame settings (As in pre alpha development stage, all features are subject to change) Game settings are in fantasy, futuristic, steampunk / dieselpunk postapocalyptic world, with procedurally generated islands. So each game is different experience.  Possible to play together in split-screen mode, in co-op, or as an opponents with family member, or friend on the same PC (none online).Your responsibilities as a pilot and squadron commander You are the pilot and squadron commander of Diesel Strider nation. You are responsible for building and managing your squadrons of fighters and bombers, to assist in avionic missions against Nano Nexus Syndicate. As the pilot with your assisting squadrons, you will be fighting against other airplanes, which are protecting enemy territory, as well as islands and naval defenses. You need to eliminate all enemies, while protecting own assets and aircraft carrier, from enemy attacks. Avionic missions are starting on aircraft carrier, or occupied air fields on islands, to attack enemy territories, and capture them back. Gaining access to more captured islands, allows to improve economical aspect of the islands and to build more specialized airplanes. You need to take care about your own airplane, as loosing it can imply significant cost. With an extra option, to play on high difficulty, with only one life. Agile fighters are responsible to protect slow heavy bombers missions.Islands mechanics Islands are procedurally generated, so setup of island is different between games. Map size is limited to max 20x20 km. When island is cleared from the enemy population, you will be able to capture it, by landing on abandoned airfield and then repopulate it with own inhabitants. Captured islands can be rebuilt with simplistic management mechanics, from strategic map management. Towns and AA defenses will be possible to improve and upgrade. Population on the the islands play significant importance in the island's economy. Captured islands also unlock new upgrades components, for modification of airplanes.Airplane mechanics Friendly airplanes will be able to assist you in the air combat missions. Enemy airplanes will be produced and will be protecting own territories, as well as attacking occasionally opponents territories. Simplistic upgrade mechanics for airplanes, like engine power, bombs, rockets, machinegun, laser damage, Onboard ammunition and fuel is finite, and need to be taken care of. Once landed in the base, each next run will require to choose right equipment for next flight missions, to select i.e. bombs, rockets, torpedoes.Strategic Strategic part is related to organizing squadrons of airplanes and giving them mission order to fly into destination.  Also giving orders for bomber missions, to attack target.  You will need to assist and protect bombers with fighters. That can be done only when landed in the base.LoreIn the post apocalyptic world, decades after the human population was decimated by raging wars and pandemics, once prospering great nations, devolved merely into a glimpse of what was once recognized. Its place however wasn’t completely deserted, but instead it gave an opportunity to rise and been overtaken by rapidly evolving AI and altered humans into cyborgs.AI and cyborgs have established the Nano Nexus Syndicate, called NNS. Mostly collaborating with other large networks of NNS, evoliving this way into hyper brain. But even such a super organism is not without its own faults.On the other spectrum, human populations were creating their own closed enclaves. Not only conflicting with the cybernetic controlled world, but also constantly fighting among themselves, for now very scarce resources. Often forced to move, while leaving diesel and steam engines fumes behind, giving these groups the infamous nickname, Diesel Striders. In short DS.For those in DS who were in a better position and brave, or stupid enough, were trying to escape main continents and look for an oasis of freedom elsewhere. Large established groups of riders and looters wasn’t something unheard of. Scavenging for places to salvage what's possible, in a such scarce in resources world, looking and securing places to live in, was one of the human priorities. And yet, continuously challenged by invigilating NNS.DS were attempting invading often ocean islands, as these were much easier to protect such establishments against NNS once fortified. It happened often however, that such places were well secured already and taking over wasn’t as that simple, as it may seem. Large forces had to be used, to penetrate fortifications and borders of NNS. That required a lot of resources alone, but was an opening for inventions and abilities to use, what was available on hand at given time.
Short Description: The sky is to becomes your battleground! Prepare to embark on adrenaline-fueled adventures in epic aerial combat like never before. In AirFlow, you'll pilot airplanes in intense sky and land battles, mastering the art of dodging enemy fire, to claim dominance over the skies and land.

Detailed Description:
MetaCampus is a cutting-edge XR educational platform that revolutionizes the way we learn, making it immersive, interactive, and engaging. We use AI-assisted technology, virtual reality environments and educational games to fuel curiosity and deepen learners' understanding.

Our vision at MetaCampus is to revolutionize education through immersive and interactive learning experiences. We aim to transcend geographical boundaries, transforming learning into an engaging journey powered by AI and filled with exploration and collaboration. Our goal is to empower global learners, nurturing their curiosity while equipping them with vital skills for a rapidly evolving future.

Detailed Description: Jeweler Simulator: Prologue offers a more limited experience than the full version. It is a completely free version with fun mechanics where you can buy and sell products by managing a jewelry store and grow your business with the profits you earn. Prologue version includes silver and gold items. Jeweler Simulator: Prologue is full of customers who want to sell you their rings and necklaces. Test and evaluate the authenticity of products. As you engage in buying and selling, keeping your store clean, you earn the opportunity to improve your skills, becoming a better jeweler with each passing day. Purchase more luxurious furniture, master your profession, and raise your prestige. Let people be dazzled by your brilliance!Before buying a product, it’s important to check if it’s real. You should look for damage on metals and see how they react to magnets. For stones, you need to check their color, clarity, carat, and cut carefully. Different mini-games will help you do these tests.You can bargain with customers who want to sell you something or buy from you. There is also a variety of dialogues, so you can have different conversations with each customer. Some of these conversations are wicked.With cool display cases, nice counters, and useful storage, you can make your shop look better. You can place the furniture how you like and store more items to sell at the same time.
Short Description: Jeweler Simulator: Prologue Become the King of Precious Stones! Equip your store with the most dazzling diamonds and put them up for sale to acquire even better ones. Rise in the leaderboard with the prestige you'll gain and become one of the world's top jewelers!

Detailed Description: Labyrinth Hotel is an immersive first-person, action-adventure, platformer video game featuring driving and shooting levels. The game offers three endings: two are straightforward, but achieving the true ending requires some backtracking and swimming. The setting is dark and realistic, contrasting with the bright, cartoony characters and cel-shaded enemies, making them stand out and instantly recognizable.The environments also present stark contrasts. You'll navigate tight spaces and cramped hallways that evoke a sense of entrapment, and vast, foggy areas populated by large creatures, which may or may not be passive, playing into the fear of the unknown.Some levels contain guest books that can be collected and read later, providing additional insights into the world and its characters.All the enemy and boss models are made by me therefore they are completely copyright free and can be used by anyone who is interested in game development.Notice: I've added an Introductory guide/manual on the right below release date, so if some of the more unique mechanics are a bit confusing that should explain them in more detail than the tutorial.
Short Description: Labyrinth Hotel is an immersive, first-person, action-adventure game where the player wakes up locked in a jail cell and must escape, but the only way out is through the Hotel. Contains 20 unique levels, 4 bosses, many unique characters, a cool crt effect, and many secret levels.

Detailed Description: Two teams of mushrooms fight it out. Currently, there are three classes to choose from, 2 towers, and 1 minion. The first team to destroy the other team's boss wins the game.
Short Description: Prepare for a captivating battle of wits and wills in this fungi-filled fray. Grow your mushrooms, empower your team, and conquer the forest!
About the Game: Two teams of mushrooms fight it out. Currently, there are three classes to choose from, 2 towers, and 1 minion. The first team to destroy the other team's boss wins the game.

Detailed Description:
Dive into the heart-pounding action of Monstrosity, where your legacy unfolds in a world teeming with hideous creatures and fearsome adversaries. Drawing inspiration from classic 8-bit and 16-bit era games, this 2.5D action-platformer delivers a fusion of nostalgic gameplay and modern enhancements that will captivate both seasoned veterans and newcomers alike! 

Take the excitement to new heights with our intense multiplayer mode! Engage with 2 to 6 players to showcase your skills, outmaneuver your adversaries, and emerge victorious in thrilling clashes of skill and reflexes!
Short Description: Monstrosity is a 2.5D action-platformer inspired by classic 8-bit and 16-bit era games. Explore a planet filled with twisting caverns, hideous creatures and horrifying bosses, while using your mutated arms for weapons! Or blast your friends in our epic PvP mode

Detailed Description:
Initial Story
In the 80s, our hero, a young man named Bruno, lives an apparently ordinary life in his small town. One beautiful day, while playing with his friends and kicking the ball into the attic window of his house, Bruno goes in search of his ball. Upon entering the attic to look for his ball, Bruno discovers an ancient artifact with a bright glow. Upon touching the object, he is suddenly enveloped by a strange aura, fainting shortly afterward. As night falls and he begins to sleep, he is haunted by intense and recurring nightmares. Every night, as he falls asleep, he is transported to a dark and disturbing realm where he faces his deepest fears. In the most recent nightmare, he finds himself in an unfamiliar room, and the only way out is a strange door. Upon crossing it, he enters a cycle of nightmares that seems endless, where he sees no way out other than facing his worst fears.

Features:
Pixel art and animations
Action-packed gameplay, focusing on melee combat combos, dodging enemy attacks, and shooting arrows against opponents and casting spells
Intense and mind-bending boss battles
Extensive exploration of a narrative-rich world and atmosphere

Detailed Description: Casual WW2 naval turn-based strategy: attack/defend, search & destroy, build ships and airplanes. Clear and simple combat and move. Fast, re-playable board game style strategy.  Easy combat execution and control: just plug and play. Different mission objectives (destroy, conquer, defend, escort, kill-them-all).Sort of dynamic XXL battleship game, with over 70 moveable ship/aircraft/submarine/artillery unit types, with huge tactical and strategic maps, and unit production.  Non-historical and historical missions, campaigns and death-matches from World War II. Pixel perfect, 2D, retro style, WW2.  Features-New air-carrier based aircraft units (deck dive bombers, anti-sub, torpedo bombers, deck fighters) -More than 70 combat unit types: ships, submarines, aircraft, radar, anti-air and coastal artillery (20 new unit types) -new Air Base objects: base your non-carrier fighter/bomber wings around Air Bases. Protect it with new anti-air artillery types (Single Air Base capacity: up to 8 air wings ) -New tactical maps: USA East Coast, Britain, Great Pacific, North Atlantic, North Africa, Iceland, Norway, Eastern Mediterranean, plus improved B&C Pacific maps incl. Guadalcanal, Saipan, Guam, Tarawa, Aleutians, Japan Sea.-Control WW2 navies: US Navy, Royal Navy, Kriegsmarine, Royal Canadian Navy, Royal Australian Navy, Italian Regia Marina, Imperial Japan Navy  -Ships and aircraft production: create your own fleet (up to 200 units), equip your aircraft carriers with naval air wings, earn production points and get more ships/subs/planes/artillery units during the missions  -Group movement: simultaneously move your task forces up to 100 ships   - Unlimited game-play: WW2 scenarios, death-matches and campaigns with various missions and objectives: conquer ports, destroy enemy units, neutralize air bases, defend your own ports and airfields, secure convoy, kill-them-all   -Tactical / strategy maps mode, with zoom-in-out option   -New unit type attributes: Fire Power (Air, Surface, Anti-sub) and Fuel capacity, in addition to Armor, Radar and Speed   -Historic names and more than 100 officer ranksEstimated Playtime: ( 45 hours in total )- 40 missions, Free Hunt and Death-Matches: 20-90 minutes per each scenario- campaigns: 3-6 hours per campaign List of scenarios, Death-matches, Free Hunt and campaigns:Invasion U.S. EastSaipanCrete Operation 1941Tarawa - Detailed Description: Search an incredibly detailed hand-drawn environment for spanners. When you find one, click it to mark it as yours. The game is won once everything has been found, and a scoreboard will be displayed showing who found what. No time limit, just you and your friends. Singleplayer is available too!Full level previewThe colours can be customised ingame to be less harsh on the eyes.Difficulty: MediumWays to play together:🖱️ Mouse (Default)⌨️ Keyboard (WASD, TFGH, IJKL, or arrow keys)🎮 Gamepads (Click here for detailed gamepad info)▶️ Steam remote play📶 LAN (Over the same wifi)🌐 Online (Experimental, connectionless, no port forwarding needed)And any combination of the above! Or play by yourself in singleplayer too!What’s in the box?🌄 1 hand drawn panoramic level🔎 100+ hidden objects to find💬 Ingame chat💡 Unlimited hints🏆 Paced achievements🎨 Different colour theme options for tired eyes🎵 Relaxing music (can be disabled)Scoring modes:- Incremental score: Each object is worth 1 point- Multiplier scoring: Objects progressively get more valuable towards the end of the gameOnline multiplayerThis game uses an experimental form of P2P, so both host and player must enter each other’s IP addresses to connect (these settings are remembered between games). This means that you won't need to port forward, and also means that the game isn't reliant on a matchmaking server. But it also might not work at all in some circumstances. It will work best on home modems, but may not work on large wifi networks with extenders. In this case, you'll either have to port forward, use a VLAN service, or use steam remote play.Seamless binging experienceSettings and recently connected players will be remembered across all the games in the series, so you won't need to keep entering IP addresses unless they've changed. In just a few clicks, you can all be reconnected in the next game.Streamer friendlyOnce you've set it up, IP addresses will never be shown in-game by the UI.Coop or versus?It’s up to you! Each player selects a colour, and then what they found glows that colour. But you could just use the same colour for everyone. When playing online, all your local players become one team/colour anyway.ControlsSearch the image by clicking and dragging with the mouse. Click objects to mark them as found. Alternatively you can use any set of arrow keys (e.g. WASD + E to 'click') or gamepads.A balance of achievementsAchievements are granted for the important milestones of the level, such as the first object, half way through, and the last few.Credits:Scene drawn by @septian3alfandi (instagram)

Detailed Description: AboutIt's a story about a frustrated executioner in late 17th century. He felt sick at his job and ran away from the gallows. It aroused a riot of monsters, he had to clean up this cruel mess, and find out the truth about the "Gloomy Oil" of this crazy world.It's a Retro PS2 style Dark Fantasy Action-RPG, you will use various skill to knock down your enemies. Inspired by the Book : The Hangman of Paris by Claude Cueni, and the Paintings of Zdzisław Beksiński. (But it's a story nothing about any Sanson family)About the ControlStrongly recommended to use gamepad such as Xbox controler or PS DualShock. If you have to use mouse, please trigger the "Use mouse" option at "Config" menu.(It's a retro PS2 style, slow action battle system for the survival mechanic and for crafting a better atmosphere, not a "quick-action game". Please notice before purchasing.)Unique art styleSpecial art style makes you immerse into the nightmare of executioner. Half sketch half real rendering a different kind of Baroque times.Different battle systemThis battle machanic encourages you to make critical STAB, back STAB, and keep PARRY to make the EXECUTION HIT, and use your gun properly,  far rather than fighting directly with normal melee attack.Attire systemVarious attires and hats can be changed, they also have different functions. Update your outfit and catch the fashion of early 18th century.Item transfer systemItem Craft System. Collect different items on the road and transfer them into valuable resource, like different kinds of bullets or herbs for example.Multi-EndingsMore than 4 defferent endings. The first time playing takes about 5-10 hours. If you trigger some special endings, it would be much shorter or much longer.

Detailed Description:
NatiPronunci is a native English written pronunciation learning program. This program contains more than 4700 English words. With it, you can pronounce complete sentences in English, or, if you prefer, individual words in English. The program also has an excellent translator of words from English to Portuguese.

NatiPronunci was developed by a team of professionals experienced in the art of English pronunciation and knowledgeable in the Portuguese language.

Detailed Description: Set in the year 2073 in a post apocalyptic Lagos Nigeria, West Africa. Humanity is on the verge of extinction. The earth has fallen into ruin under the threat of an invasive alien species known as the Altrius.  Play as  Chimere Uzoma, a fierce and genetically enhanced human soldier called an "Enforcer", who must protect one of the last enclaves of humanity called "Azure". The Enforcers are created for one purpose: to turn the tide in the war against the Altrius. Dive into a narrative-rich campaign where the survival of humanity hangs in the balance, enhanced by intricate voice acting and a hip-hop/afro-beat infused soundtrack.Key Features:Dynamic Combat System: Master an expansive combo system with interlinking moves across a variety of weapons. From melee swords and spears to projectile-based secondary arms, tailor your assault style to decimate the alien foes.Rich Narrative and World: Explore the remnants of a futuristic Lagos, uncovering the dark plans of the Altrius that could spell doom for humanity.Stunning Visuals and Sound: Experience the vibrant, apocalypse-touched world brought to life with hand-drawn and AI-assisted artwork set against a backdrop of gritty Hip-Hop/Drill/Afro beats. Challenging Gameplay: Engage in relentless enemy encounters and dynamic boss battles that ramp up in difficulty, challenging even the most skilled players.Combat Mechanics:Combo System: Players can seamlessly execute a series of powerful melee and ranged attacks. Every button press matters, with the game allowing for fluid transitions between moves, creating endless possibilities for breathtaking combo chains. Attacks are enhanced by an intricate meter system that allows the player to utilize more effective combos both stationary and air and unleash devastating combos and special attacks. Weapon System: Choose from a diverse arsenal. Melee weapons like swords and spears offer close-quarters combat, while secondary projectile weapons allow for strategic long-range attacks. Weapon choices affect both the visual and tactical aspects of combat.Visual and Audio Presentation:Art Style: The game features a unique blend of hand-drawn graphics and AI-assisted art, creating a visually stunning, yet bleak depiction of a futuristic post-apocalyptic Lagos. Each frame is crafted to reflect the high stakes and intensity of Chimere’s journey.Soundtrack and Voice Acting: Driven by a hiphop/afrobeat soundtrack, the game maintains an energetic pace complemented by laid-back beats. Professional voice acting adds depth to the characters, enhancing the immersive experience.Levels and Enemies:Navigate through diverse environments from ruined cityscapes to alien strongholds. Each level introduces new challenges and enemy types, requiring players to adapt their tactics. Boss fights are elaborate and challenging the player to change their tactics, often requiring players to exploit specific weaknesses and test their mastery of the game’s combat system.Challenge and Replayability:With an advanced difficulty curve that respects player progression, "Obsidian Eclipse: Azure Enforcer" offers a satisfying challenge that invites mastery. Dive into the narrative rich camapign, paratake in challenges and unlock unique episodes.

Detailed Description: A deadly plague, a forbidden ritualExperience the cursed life of a hunter once bound by love and family, now driven to uncover the mystery of vanishing villagers and whispered rituals. Journey through treacherous areas of Ricci Estate where vampiric monsters lurk, while gathering an arsenal of weapons and magic. Fight as Belladonna, where death, madness, and the burden of sorrow weigh heavy upon her every move.Relics of the past, ancient arts restoredEngage with a dynamic combat and magic system, with a variety of weapons that have unique attack patterns, and imbue them with different magic types that alter how you engage with twisted foes.Explore a world of puzzles and secretsSolve unique puzzles and objectives throughout the levels, and search for secrets to uncover the truth behind everything.
Short Description: Darkness twists the minds of those who reside in the Ricci Estate. Once a paragon of class and wealth, the land now lies desecrated with darkness-imbued vampiric terrors. Belladonna, mother of the Ricci family, now returns to her old home to face the threat and put an end to the madness.

Detailed Description: What is it?Time Trials is a turn-based single-player game where you use time travel to  fight and make your way through a lab under siege by an alien threat. While the rules are simple, Time Trials enforces paradox free time travel, which means players cannot take any action that would change an observed event in the future.Features 16 levels of increasing difficulty. Two separate endings. Preview system to assist with time travel. A novel approach to time travel in video games.
Short Description: The first time travel game that approaches time travel from a strictly paradox free philosophy. When in the past, the player is unable to take any action that would alter an observed event in the future.

Detailed Description: Immerse yourself in a bold new story in the beloved Homeworld saga that brings real-time strategic space battles to VR. In Homeworld: Vast Reaches you play as Fleet Command, controlling your ships in vicious combat against a mysterious new enemy. Through a dramatic single-player campaign, direct your fleet to attack, defend, or capture strategic resources to build up your arsenal of ships and achieve victory.Experience this strategy space game through a new perspective — get up close and personal to epic space battles, commanding your ships in real-time all around you. Your fleet is at your fingertips in this new Homeworld story where you can execute strategic attacks on your enemies from any direction or angle. This new perspective in VR allows you to build units, shape fleet formations, and orchestrate combat tactics while you're in the middle of the action.Set between the events of Homeworld 1 and Homeworld 2, you take on the role of Tyrra Soban, a new Fleet Command. Guiding you is Karan S’jet, the legendary hero of Homeworld War, as the original Kushan Mothership is pulled from retirement to serve as the flagship of a new fleet. Together Tyrra and Karan face a new threat, the Radaa, duplicitous interstellar traders who want to obtain your hyperspace core and don’t care if they destroy your Homeworld to get it.

Detailed Description:
Space Warrior: Dark Warrior of Space

Space Warrior invites you to a dangerous and exciting space adventure in which you fight against hordes of hostile aliens. In this fast paced 2D survival game, you will have to use your skills and strategy to survive and save the galaxy.

Deep in space, ruthless aliens have invaded your galaxy. You, as a chosen space warrior, are the last hope to stand up to these invading forces and protect your home. Equipped with a variety of weapons and upgrades, you will launch into space to defeat waves of enemies and uncover the dark secrets of space.

Each level presents unique challenges and obstacles. You must avoid asteroid fields, hide from enemy ships and face relentless alien creatures. Along the way, collect power-ups and bonuses that will help you survive and succeed in your mission. Become the dark warrior of space and determine the fate of the galaxy.
Short Description: Use your skills and strategy to save your galaxy in Space Warrior, a fast-paced 2D survival game where you fight with alien invaders. Each level presents unique challenges and you need to defeat waves of enemies to survive.

Game Name: The House of Da Vinci VR
Detailed Description: Experience the world of The House of Da Vinci like never before in this captivating VR puzzle adventure. Solve complex puzzles, uncover hidden items, and escape inventive rooms, all set in the true spirit of the Renaissance. Use your intellect to uncover the secrets behind your master's disappearance in this must-experience VR game. KEY FEATURESFULL IMMERSION OF VIRTUAL REALITYFinally, you can touch the mechanical puzzles and bizarre inventions with your own hands.SOLVE MECHANICAL PUZZLESBrain twisters and baffling riddles are all based on Leonardo’s inventions.EXPERIENCE THE RENAISSANCEWar machines, complex lockboxes, mechanical puzzles, and room escapes will all test your skills.MASTER UNIQUE MECHANICSDetect hidden objects by seeing through the surfaces around you.PEEK INTO THE PASTAn unusual device allows you to witness events that happened in the past.WHAT’S THE STORY BEHIND THE HOUSE OF DA VINCI?You are Da Vinci’s most promising apprentice. Your master, Leonardo, summoned you to Florence and then disappeared immediately afterward. Your quest begins—a search for the truth. However, Leonardo's workshop is brimming with puzzles, inventions, mechanisms, and objects hidden in every corner of the beautifully decorated rooms. You'll need to use all your brainpower to uncover what’s really happening!We’ve infused our own imagination into the story of the world’s greatest inventor, Leonardo da Vinci, providing players with unique special abilities throughout the gameplay. You will journey back to your early days as a young apprentice, exploring the world of the 16th century, delving into Leonardo’s mechanisms, puzzles, and devices, until you become powerful enough to control time itself and unveil the secrets hidden in the past.Many challenging puzzles are inspired by Leonardo Da Vinci's real inventions and ideas. Mysterious locations have been created based on original artworks and the magnificent Florence, Italy, of 1506.WHO ARE WE? Blue Brain Games is an enthusiastic indie team of graphic artists and developers, all of whom are fans of both 3D puzzle games and the Renaissance genius, Leonardo da Vinci. The House of Da Vinci was successfully funded on Kickstarter in late 2016. After two more successful installments, we are back again to offer you a glimpse of Renaissance Italy from a completely new point of view: yours.
Short Description: Experience the world of The House of Da Vinci like never before in this captivating VR puzzle adventure. Solve complex puzzles, uncover hidden items, and escape rooms, all embodying the Renaissance spirit. Use your intellect to discover what led to your master’s disappearance.

Detailed Description: 🚧 This Game is Still in Development! 🚧Hello, and thank you for visiting the Dive Into The Survival (DITS) store page. This game is currently in development, and we are committed to creating a more polished and engaging experience by incorporating your feedback. There may be some shortcomings, so please keep that in mind when making your purchase. We are dedicated to meeting your expectations through regular updates.About the GameHow would we survive if a zombie apocalypse became a reality? Inspired by that question, we present the post-apocalyptic survival RPG game, "Dive Into The Survival."A world that once held ordinary days has suddenly collapsed, and humanity faces the brink of extinction. In a world overrun with zombies, you must build your base, gather survivors, and protect yourself from the constant threats that loom over you.Key Features[Open World]: Explore various regions and buildings to scavenge resources necessary for survival.[Multiplayer]: Learn how to maintain humanity, cooperate with others, and keep hope alive even in dire situations.[Building]: Construct and fortify your own base to withstand the zombie onslaught.[Survival Elements]: Manage realistic survival needs such as hunger, thirst, and fatigue to keep yourself alive.[Weapon and Equipment Crafting]: Gather materials to craft a variety of weapons and gear to enhance your protection.[Dynamic Weather and Day/Night Cycle]: Experience a realistic survival environment with weather changes and a dynamic day-night cycle.[Parkour]: Use simple parkour techniques to traverse obstacles quickly and efficiently.Jump into Dive Into The Survival now! Test your survival skills and fight to live in this zombie-infested world alongside your friends!

Complete randomized dungeons, obtain epic loot, craft perfect gear and hunt down uber bosses. Talus is a Diablo II/Path of Exile inspired Action RPG set in a vibrant fantasy 2D world.Key Features- Build Diversity. Try any of the five classes: Mage, Ranger, Warrior, Necromancer, Druid, with hundreds of abilities and talents to choose from. - Build Enhancing Unique Items. Tailor your build to your playstyle with any of the 200+ unique items.- Endless Replayability. Complete randomized and infinitely scaling end-game zones.  - Focus on Crafting. Craft the perfect item for your build with gemstones.	- Challenging End-Game Content. Push your build to the absolute limit against the end-game uber bosses.Designed for being fun. There is no room for unnecessary grind/annoying mechanics/time-gated content just to keep you playing for longer. Detailed Description:
"Shopping Simulator" immerses players into an expansive retail experience, expanding upon the charm of the original Nick of Time's Scratch game while embracing its nostalgic Scratch graphics. In this extended edition, players step into the bustling aisles of a virtual mall, brimming with opportunities and challenges as they navigate through a myriad of stores.

Embark on a thrilling journey through a variety of shopping scenarios, each offering its unique set of tasks and objectives. From grocery runs to high-end boutique splurges, the game caters to diverse shopping preferences, ensuring there's something for every player.

As you traverse through the colorful, pixelated world of Shopping Simulator, you'll encounter a vibrant cast of characters, from friendly store clerks to quirky fellow shoppers, each with their own stories and quirks. Engage in lively conversations, strike up unexpected friendships, and maybe even uncover some hidden secrets along the way.

But it's not all leisurely strolls down retail lanes. Players must strategize and manage their resources wisely, balancing budgets, time constraints, and the ever-changing demands of the market. Whether it's scoring the best deals, completing timed challenges, or tackling unexpected obstacles, every decision counts in this dynamic shopping adventure.

With its blend of nostalgia-inducing graphics, engaging gameplay mechanics, and boundless opportunities for exploration, "Shopping Simulator" offers a delightful escapade into the world of retail therapy. So grab your virtual shopping cart and get ready to shop 'til you drop in this beloved ode to the joys of retail therapy!

Detailed Description: DISCORDAbout the GameLast Mile - is a first-person horror game in which you are a driver and drive a car.  Your goal is to escape from the spatial anomaly using your car. As you pass, you will have to explore an abandoned highway and avoid getting caught up in the threats that await you.Immersive ExperienceDriving a first-person car in harsh night conditions will immerse you in the game's eerie atmosphere. The game is set on an old abandoned highway somewhere in Eastern Europe.GameplayThis game is a driving simulator in the genre of horror. You will have to drive through the frightening anomalies that filled the highway.Interact with the surrounding world:In your journey you will be accompanied by your reliable partner - a cat. Send him during short stops to explore the surrounding locations and wait for him to bring useful finds that will help you survive and escape.Use radio, GPS, detectors and headlights to minimize collisions with anomalies and monsters. But don't forget to keep an eye on your battery power level so that your devices don't go out at the worst possible moment.You will have to investigate the mysteries located on this highway, listen to old audio recordings and notes to find the cause of these anomalies.Dangerous EntitiesMore than 10 monsters and 20 different anomalies that can make each playthrough unique. Each monster and anomaly has its own characteristics and behavior.Vehicle ImprovementAs the game progresses, you will have the opportunity to upgrade your vehicle with various devices and technologies to detect and interact with anomalies. These upgrades will not only help you navigate the old highway, but will also provide you with tools to overcome hazards. Each upgrade will bring you closer to unraveling the origin of the anomaly and understanding how to get out of it.
Short Description: Last mile - is a first-person car horror game. It seems that you are in a spatial anomaly, you drive through the same places from time to time, maybe your GPS navigator doesn't work? Or maybe there are really, really strange things happening here.

Detailed Description:
Prepare for an epic clash of strategy and wits in UniWar™, the timeless multiplayer turn-based strategy game that has captivated players around the globe. Enter a world where every decision matters and every move could tip the scales of victory.

Choose Your Path: Select from three distinct races, each boasting a roster of ten unique units, and craft your army to match your playstyle. Build your army, customize your tactics, and unleash your power upon the battlefield.

Endless Possibilities: Engage in daily missions handpicked by editors, or team up with friends for intense 2v2, 3v3, or 4v4 battles. Whether you prefer casual skirmishes or competitive ladder matches, UniWar™ offers an experience tailored to your preferences.

Master the Art of War: With turn durations ranging from lightning-fast 3 minutes to methodical 3 days, you can play at your own pace and strategize to your heart's content. Explore over 50,000 user-created maps and discover new challenges at every turn.

Join the Battle: download now  UniWar™ and rally your friends to experience the thrill of conquest and the partnership of a vibrant community. The world awaits—will you rise to the challenge?

Detailed Description: In 2137, a crisis erupts at a European Space Authority Mars base near Korolev Crater: ancient creatures awaken from the ice. Your mission: defend the base, unravel Martian secrets, and prepare for an epic battle!DEFEND YOUR BASEExperience thrilling tower defence gameplay on Mars. Strategically place and upgrade towers to protect your base from relentless Martian creatures.STUNNING VOXEL ARTImmerse yourself in beautifully crafted voxel art. Explore the Martian terrain and face off against unique alien enemies.DYNAMIC STRATEGYUtilise cutting-edge technology like mines and suborbital strikes. Adapt your strategy in real-time to outsmart and defeat the alien threats.ENGAGING GAMEPLAYExperiment with various defence setups and resource management techniques. Choose from different tower types, each with unique abilities to counter diverse Martian enemies.Created by a passionate solo developer, "The Echoes of Mars" invites you to share feedback and help shape the game. Your survival skills and strategic mind are crucial for humanity's foothold on Mars.
Short Description: The Echoes of Mars is a voxel-style tower defence game. Defend your research base on Mars from ancient creatures by strategically placing towers and using advanced tech.

Detailed Description: JOIN THE DISCORDAbout the GameEarth has witnessed a cataclysmic shift. Artificial intelligence, once mankind's most darling creations, has turned against its creator. As predicted by many, in the late 22nd century technology would rise against mankind, pitting humanity in a war with artificial intelligence. Unfortunately, no one expected humanity to lose. In this combat focused, turn-based strategy, players step into the shoes of one of the few remaining human commanders spearheading the resistance against invading AI forces.Your goal on this digital battleground is simple: complete domination.  Victory will require players to build out a command post where they will construct an army unique to their play style. Limited by a small bank of supplies and the resources around them, players will seek out and recapture finite enemy resources,  and completely remove your foe from this world.  Embracing the role of a commander, you have been given the reins to lead your forces to victory. As you navigate the battlefield you will need to strategically train, deploy, and maneuver an army of your liking on a procedurally generated battlefield.Command your army to remove enemy factions from this world.  Anything less than their complete annihilation is considered a loss.  You may have to think strategically  to maneuver your troops to victory.Build a command post and raise an army of your choosing.  The choices made constructing your battlements will offer a pivotal role in shaping your faction's destiny. As you discover and gather different resources players will unlock the ability to construct new buildings, each contributing uniquely to your strategic arsenal.  Expand your command by creating satellite cities using Rovers, or use Communication Towers to build beyond your starting radius; however, be careful, loss of communication has dire consequences.Allocate your resources to tactfully build and enhance your army. In this turn-based strategy you will need to master resource management in order to expand your command. As you engage in intense battles, cunning resource allocation will likely be the key to overpowering invading forces.Your ability to adapt is a necessity. You will need to continually reassess your defensive strategy as you defend your outpost against the endless onslaught of invading forces. Incorporating advanced technology and strategic retreats will become necessary to ensure the resilience of your command post against evolving challenges.The complete annihilation of your rival is a necessity to eliminate the looming threat of their future invasion. Remember, utter destruction is the key to ensuring your faction's survival.Every choice in your journey will be a calculated maneuver in this relentless war for supremacy, where the value of human life and the pursuit of technological domination are in stark contrast.  Time for a hard reset.
Short Description: Mordfield Command: a sci-fi turn-based strategy where humanity's fate hangs in the balance. Build an army and command forces to shape humanity's future. Lead the resistance to victory or succumb to the control of AI overlords in this tactical, combat-focused 4X.

Detailed Description: A New Platformer Adventure Game for the NESHalloween is in jeopardy! The Phantom has stolen all of the candy throughout the land and has locked it away in Mischief Castle.​Play as Skeleo and Jackolie, the heroes who will take back the stolen candy! fight the bandits, monsters, and big baddies.  Find and collect the candies and secrets that are hidden away.  Navigate the labyrinth that is Mischief Castle and collect the keys to unlock your way to the Phantom's tower.  Get back those delicious treats!FeaturesBuilt to play like your classic NES game. Straightforward pick-up and play gameplay. Simultaneous two-player cooperative gameplayHidden collectible itemsFive unique dungeons and Bosses, with varied enemies.8+ Music TracksBuilt with NESMAKER and Runs on NES hardware, uses mapper30 UNROM 512A Mapper2 compatible rom is included with classic password feature instead of Autosave

Detailed Description: KEEP UP TO DATE!About the GameWelcome to "Instants," a captivating journey that blends puzzle-solving, crafting and heartfelt storytelling. Build up a collection of family photo albums piece by piece and learn their stories in a nostalgic narrative puzzle game.Engage in heartwarming puzzles Arrange the given family pictures chronologically within each album. The pictures serve as clues to their timeline, reflecting the natural evolution of a family story.Piece the story together As you solve the puzzle, a heartwarming story will gradually emerge. Explore at your own pace and put together the tale of one family throughout the generations.Customize your own albums Add your artistic flair and decorate the albums with backgrounds, stickers, typography, and more. Unlock new customization options as you progress and make each album an art piece in its own right!Frustration-Free Experience Need a helping hand? Meet your adorable furry companion who offers optional assistance when facing challenging puzzles.

Detailed Description: Greta Tanner died in her sleep last night.The doctors don’t know what to think. Sure, Greta was old, but not old enough to die without an apparent cause. She didn’t take pills, had no medical problems, and had no recent surgeries.Winter creeps into the small town of Trenton, Alaska. The roads are blocked with snow, and the wind carries an icy dagger.Dr. Grayson, the town’s new resident doctor, examines Greta's corpse. Some bruising. Slight burn marks on her legs – it could be frostbite. Hidden under Greta’s hair are five crescent-shaped wounds. None are severe enough to have been the cause of death, but the marks are fresh and bloody. There has to be a connection.Was Greta murdered? Or is there something else going on in Trenton? Some people in town have been acting weird, and a strange song is singing in the wind. Or is that just madness?Dr. Grayson must find whatever killed Greta Tanner and stop it from killing anyone else.The Sleeping Sickness is an interactive short story that allows the player to guide the main character's actions.Each day, the player chooses where Grayson investigates. The player’s choices will lock and unlock future locations, change dialogue, and alter the story. Choices matter in The Sleeping Sickness.While The Sleeping Sickness includes sounds, graphics, and interactive sections, it focuses on the story.The game is designed to play like a choose-your-own-adventure book and is an excellent choice for horror fans, avid readers, and lovers of creepy pastas. Each playthrough lasts 45 – 60 minutes and covers ~9,000 words. The entire story is approximately 31,000 words (roughly the length of Of Mice and Men by John Steinbeck).Each playthrough will feel like a complete short story altered by the player’s choices. However, multiple read-throughs will be required to uncover the entire mystery.The Sleeping Sickness has six possible endings. Will you experience them all? Will you solve the mystery? Will you cure the sleeping sickness?
Short Description: The Sleeping Sickness is an interactive short story that allows the player to guide the main character's actions. The player’s choices will lock and unlock future locations, change dialogue, and alter the story. Choices matter in The Sleeping Sickness. It is an excellent choice for horror fans.

Detailed Description: # Enigma Of Forest4v1 Werewolf Hunt Multiplayer Horror Game Unveil the mysteries of the darkness and prepare to survive!Enigma Of Forest: Delve into the forest with a group of 5 friends and witness the horrors of nature. But this innocent exploration will turn into a nightmare as one of you succumbs to a terrible curse. One of you is now a werewolf!Cooperate to survive: You will need to work together to find out who the werewolf is and escape its savage attacks. Follow clues, set traps, and trust each other to solve the mysteries of the darkness.Each game is a different experience: Procedurally generated maps and random events make each game unique. You will never know what you are going to face, which will increase the tension and excitement.Feel the tension and fear: Atmospheric sounds and terrifying visuals will rip your heart out and make you feel like a monster is lurking around every corner.Enigma Of Forest offers you:4v1 co-op horror experience Procedurally generated maps and random eventsTense and terrifying atmosphereThe challenge of working together with your friends to surviveThe mystery of finding out who the werewolf is Step into the darkness with courage and fight to survive!# Community

Detailed Description: The official digital client of the card game Algomancy. Definitely still a work in progress.Our plan is to release an early version of the client that is lightly rules enforced as soon as possible to allow matches to take place. The full release later on will have complete rules enforcement.Key points about Algomancy:Turns are global (so neither player goes first, no play/draw disparity)Hands are drafted during the game (no decks needed in the draft mode)Cards are simple but extremely modular (most cards have 1-2 lines of text)The Deterministic resource system ensures players can always play the gameRegion limited interaction enables parallelized multiplayer gameplayYou get all the game cards at once! Absolutely no grinding for content.
Short Description: A competitive card game where you draft during gameplay to adapt to your opponent's strategy. Absolutely free to play with no grinding.

Detailed Description:
Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

The game is a 3D puzzle, the player needs to put in place the missing pieces of the puzzle (items) scattered around the location. To create an entire location.

You need to go to the item, take it by pressing the left mouse button and take the item to the desired location marked in green. If you brought the correct item, it will snap into place and you will receive leaderboard points and achievements for this.

Collect as much items as possible as quickly as possible to get more points for the leaderboard.

If you brought the wrong item, you can throw it away, it will return to the starting location so that you can pick it up again.

Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

The game is a Hidden Object Game. 
In which you need to find objects with a certain design in beautiful locations, and click on them with the mouse.


The game is a 3D level game in which objects and characters are frozen in the picture, you have to find 20 different objects. The system automatically determines which object you need to find at the moment, so the game has a high replay value, you will need to search for different objects each time.

Detailed Description: About this game:This is a single player game, puzzle game, and casual game.This is a small game about love desserts, where players can be controlled to eat corresponding desserts by using the arrow keys (left and right) on the computer.In addition, this game can help friends with dietary needs to diet by playing games. Eating 70% full is beneficial for health. When you need to control your diet, you can play games to avoid excessive food intake and reduce the sugar burden caused by eating Dim sum; This is an interesting little game and also a small tool to help control diet. I promise to donate more than half of the profits to the Love Cafeteria, which provides nutritious and healthy food for low-income groups; It is obvious that this donation comes from my own income.
Short Description: Each level has some tasks, such as eating 3 breads and 3 candies. You need to control the player to eat these quantities of desserts through the directional keys (left and right).If you complete these tasks within the specified time, you can pass this level, otherwise you will fail.
About the Game: About this game:This is a single player game, puzzle game, and casual game.This is a small game about love desserts, where players can be controlled to eat corresponding desserts by using the arrow keys (left and right) on the computer.In addition, this game can help friends with dietary needs to diet by playing games. Eating 70% full is beneficial for health. When you need to control your diet, you can play games to avoid excessive food intake and reduce the sugar burden caused by eating Dim sum; This is an interesting little game and also a small tool to help control diet. I promise to donate more than half of the profits to the Love Cafeteria, which provides nutritious and healthy food for low-income groups; It is obvious that this donation comes from my own income.

Detailed Description: The field is an open field in the desert.[Game purpose]Enemies and allies own a resource called water.You can obtain resource water by defeating an enemy carrying a tank in battle.If you defeat an enemy with a yellow tank on his back, the enemy's resource water will decrease and you can obtain resource water.The goal is to fill up your ally's resource water.After that, you can find out the final objective by looking at the enemy's data panel that can be viewed at any time during the game.[Game features]When you want to get experience points, you can switch to AI control while fighting.When operating the AI, experience points are gained in battle.When controlled by the player, you will recover a small amount of health when you damage the enemy.[Make yourself stronger]If you obtain the sword that appears from the treasure chest, your attack power will increase greatly.Normal attack power is increased by exchanging experience points for status at the console inside the smoking building.

Developer: Beijing Happy Person Information Technology Co., Ltd.
Detailed Description: The heavens have perished; a new reign begins! Strategize behind the curtains and unify the land under one rule! Recruit historic generals under your command, manage your cities, deploy strategic maneuvers, and achieve dominance over the Three Kingdoms!Experience the thrill of the historic battles among the warlords and their quests for ultimate supremacy in the Three Kingdoms!Game Features❖ 24-hour national wars, with constantly evolving territorial battles ❖Train your troops for the day they are needed! Beyond managing territories, immerse yourself in a real national war experience accessible on computers, phones, and tablets. Take your battles anywhere!❖ Cross-server competitions, fight to fame, and become the sole ruler of the Three Kingdoms ❖Tired of facing the same old rivals without challenge? The cross-server system allows you to dominate all servers and become a legendary hero! Additionally, cross-server contests offer extra perks and benefits - don't miss out on signing up!❖ Civil and military officials, legendary Three Kingdoms generals, all at your command ❖Utilize the unique abilities of various generals to arrange your team formations in endless possibilities! Mix and match as you please and assemble the strongest force in the Three Kingdoms!❖ With divine weapons in hand, no battle is insurmountable; develop technology to ensure victory ❖To dominate the world, the indispensable weapons technology system is as crucial as having capable generals and strategists. Develop various technologies, pair with weapon enhancements, and achieve victory in every battle!❖ Offer sacrifices, consult Zhuge Liang’s astrology for favorable winds, and set fire to enemy ships in a chain of flames ❖Explore resources in the black market, participate in sacrifices for blessings, astrology, and chariot systems!❖ Daily national missions, exhilarating and thrilling ❖Every day from 10:00-12:00 AM, 3:00-5:00 PM, and 8:00 PM-12:00 AM, various missions are available. Complete these to earn additional rewards! Join forces with other players from your nation and strategize for supremacy!❖ Multiple Activities, Rewarding Experiences ❖Engage in various activities to boost your combat power. For example, gain experience from Trial Towers, earn gems and iron resources from special stages, and more. Don't miss out!New Player Perks "15 Days Of Valuable Gifts For Continuous Login"Log in daily to receive free coins, resources, and military supplies. On the fifth day, receive an extra bonus female warrior - Zhu Rong, to help you dominate in national wars easily!"level-up Gifts Delight"Players reaching certain levels will receive various level-up rewards!"pass Levels, Earn Plenty Of Coins"Players level 20 and above can earn ingots by completing specific chapters within 72 hours."trials Of the Trial tower"Players level 53 and above can earn gem rewards by meeting certain conditions in the Trial Tower within 144 hours."Arms Catalogue, Compete in Levels for Military Supplies"Players level 43 and above, after unlocking the weapons feature, can earn a large amount of iron by meeting certain weapon level conditions within 96 hours.

Game Name: The Restless Sheep & The Lone Wolf -A Tale of Cutthroat Lovers-
Detailed Description: Another restless, sleepless night... from the mind of Maggot Baits creator Tatsuya Kurashiki comes a twisted love story! FEATURESA thrilling visual novelJapanese voice actingMultiple endingsSTORYKabukicho, Shinjuku. There’s a hotel here where I work as a live-in cleaner—or at least, that’s my day job.By night, I suffer from chronic insomnia with just one cure: killing people. So I moonlight as a yakuza bigwig’s pet killer, waiting for him to toss me a bone and order a hit so I can sleep. Might sound like a fine line to walk, but my life’s pretty quiet. Pretty stable.Until I meet this girl, Azami. Defeating her got me a night of sleep so peaceful, I’ve been mulling over the idea of keeping her around. Thing is, my boss wants her dead, and if I bite the hand that feeds me, there’s my quiet, stable life out the door...CHARACTERSAzamiMarie KedaA mysterious girl who happens to visit the hotel the protagonist lives in. A cheerful and carefree young woman with an ever-present shadow, she ends up being hunted by the yakuza after a client dies on her.Haruhiko NireNetoru IrakusaAn elite detective from Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department’s First Detective Division who wanders Kabukicho, seemingly in search of something, even though his beat is actually East Shinjuku. While he may look kind, he’s a shrewd man who knows not just judo and kendo but various other practical martial arts as well.Sayuki UgaiRen KurenoA detective from East Shinjuku’s Detective Department Section 4 who’s lost any shred of morals or sense of duty. With her propensity for violence and greed, it’s no surprise she’s in the pocket of the Aoike Gathering who rule Kabukicho’s underbelly.Mirei BesshoMurasaki FujinoA brash and intelligent but stubborn young woman. She met the protagonist in Kabukicho and became fast friends with Azami.Yun Shi GuJimu KyariThe owner of an illegal business in Kabukicho. When he was young, he was the leader of a group of hot-blooded Shanghainese militants. Now he has been reduced to scraping together a living under the watchful eyes of the yakuza and the police, yet this does nothing to deter him from sticking it out in Kabukicho.Li Jian RongYukine TakaneThe elderly driver for Yun’s illegal business. Being a warm and sincere man who’s well-liked by the ladies he chauffeurs belies the fact that he was once the boss of Yun and a legendary Chinese gang who exercised power over Kabukicho.Lady DharmaMako AyaneA wheelchair-bound, limbless mass murderer who has weapons stowed within her prosthetic legs. Her modified wheelchair tops out at 50 KPH, allowing her to hunt her prey to the ends of the earth. She’s become something of an urban legend in Tokyo.Mamoru TougiTorowa AndoThe leading subordinate of the Aoike Gathering, the secondary organization under the large-area designated yakuza group known as the S Gathering that rules Kabukicho. A rising star in the organization, he’s one of the candidates to become the leader of the Aoike Gathering. He’s a man of few words and great restraint with the ruthlessness to kill anyone without hesitation should it be required.Shinsuke KaiedaTetsuto FurukawaA member of the Aoike Gathering and assistant to Mamoru Tougi. He’s a bold and unflappable as well as crafty, modern kind of man. Lacking the usual concern for his reputation and pride of yakuza members, he’s willing to work with anyone and everyone to achieve his goals.Kazuyoshi MifuneTooru KishiriThe head of the S Gathering’s third faction, the Mifune Group, and second lieutenant of the Aoike Gathering who’s also in the running to be next in line. He’s an old-school yakuza with an appetite for alcohol and a good time on par with his brute strength. Merciless and cruel but compassionate to his people, he’s a hero to his subordinates.Meng Feng DaGoro IdeA suspicious thug who roams Kabukicho, committing fraud, fencing stolen goods, and cleverly navigating the lines between every faction from the yakuza to the Chinese gangs to the police. He’s also corrupt cop Sayuki Ugai’s pet informant.OndaKazuki NishizakiJust your regular balding, middle-aged day laborer who gambles away his pay on horse or bike track races most days. With his easygoing smile, he’s pretty approachable.The CroneMegumi NishikioriThe old woman who owns the hotel the protagonist lives in, working him like a dog. She’s a well-informed member of the Kabukicho underworld who has ties to the Aoike Gathering and knows about both the protagonist’s hit man side hustle and Yun’s gang member past.“Me”Ryo SugisakiA hit man who suffers from insomnia that renders him eternally sleep-deprived. He’s Japanese—and went by Takeo Muraki for a time—but operates under the Hong Konger identity of “Zeng Heixing” and has made a home for himself in one of the rooms in a hotel on the outskirts of Kabukicho. Normally, he spends his days working there apathetically and only kills anyone when a job comes in. After meeting Azami and getting the best sleep of his life, he can’t bring himself to let her go.
Short Description: In this twisted love story of a visual novel by CLOCKUP, an insomniac must decide whether to protect his position as a yakuza bigwig’s pet killer or the mysterious woman who can put him to sleep.

Detailed Description:
Uncharted World - In the role of an experienced and brave explorer, you set off on an exciting adventure through uncharted lands. Your task is to explore vast expanses, explore wild forests, explore mountain ranges and explore mysterious deserts. Facing various dangers and challenges, you will have to survive in the wild, meet new creatures and uncover ancient secrets.

The game is a mixture of survival and puzzle genres, you need to move around the map and complete assigned tasks.

With each step, you expand your knowledge and skills, opening up new opportunities for exploration and discovery. Will you be able to show your best qualities as a pathfinder, conquer new lands and reveal their secrets, or will your journey turn into a test?

Detailed Description: Escape the temporal limbo in just one thousand seconds in 1000 Seconds, an action roguelike where time is the most valuable artifact. Use your orb to defend yourself against temporal enemies trying to stop you, upgrade it to gain different effects, and don't forget to collect clocks to buy power-ups in shops. But use this resource wisely, as your inventory is limited.OrbsYou have a friendly orb that needs upgrading. Use special stones to grant it new powers.Power-upsYou'll open many chests along the way, but only shop chests can give you power-ups to enhance your orb's performance. Don't forget to collect clocks and keys to open these chests.Try AgainLosing is part of the game, and with each defeat, you'll grow stronger and wiser to face the next challenge.
Short Description: 1000 Seconds is a roguelike – Defeat enemies, gather resources, and upgrade your orb to escape the temporal limbo, but you only have 1000 seconds to reach the end, so be as fast as possible.

Detailed Description: Deep Sea Sweep is a cute 2D platformer where you play as a small fish who wants to give the seafloor its former beauty back. There are heaps of filthy treasure chests down there! Luckily, your yellow neighbour seems to appreciate them a lot, and can probably help you get rid of them. Switch between swimming and classic platform movement by carrying treasures, dropping them on enemies or switches to progress.Play through many short but challenging levels mixing action and puzzle. Controls are easy to pick up, customizable, and allow tight movements. The worldmap has many paths including secret ones. Play through each biome in the way you like!Immerse yourself in tranquil pixel art environments, and meet colorful and cute characters and enemies. Look out for secrets! Find each level's stars to unlock secret harder levels and shortcuts. Change your character's appearance and style with all the pearls you've collected. Challenge yourself by going for better times in each level. Some say deep down at the bottom of the ocean lies a magic pearl that grants wishes... Maybe this would simplify your task. But in the meantime, there's golden trash to take out!
Short Description: Deep Sea Sweep is a cute 2D platformer set on the ocean floor, inspired by traditional flash games. Clean up the sea of all these filthy treasures chests plaguing the various biomes! Swim, jump and bonk meanies on their head in many short but challenging levels with simple but tight controls.

Detailed Description: An erotic VISUAL NOVEL featuring HD graphics, steamy ANIMATIONS, and realistic-looking characters.Meet Lily and James and join them on their quest to revitalize their marriage in a new and exciting cuckold series.Confronted with the monotony of their routine, James encourages his wife to go out with a friend and find herself a younger man. Luckily, a hot bartender is ready to show Lily a good time.GAME DESCRIPTIONEPISODE 1James is unhappy with the direction of his marriage to Lily. He's haunted by memories of their passionate early days, when Lily would come home smelling of other men, and they would spend entire nights between the sheets, releasing the sexual tension between them. Now, all they do is watch the same TV series and have very vanilla lovemaking sessions, reminiscing about those wild nights.Confronted with the monotony of their new routine, he is determined to revitalize their marriage, even if it means sharing his beautiful wife. He encourages Lily to go out with her slutty bestie and find herself a younger man.Will Lily accept the hot bartender's offer to show her a good time?Will James regret sending his wife into the arms of a younger man?Follow the story and find out!FEATURES- HD renders and animations- Video and image gallery

Detailed Description: Shrine maiden Yono takes on the challenge of escaping from numerous haunted houses in this roguelike!Following in the footsteps of her missing Onmyouji brother, shrine maiden Yono arrives at a terrifying place where Mononoke(yokai and other vengeful spirits) live. The very structure of the mansion changes every time you enter. There are three game modes: "Harai," "Misogi," and "Gyou" with "Gyou" being the highest difficulty mode, in which players compete to see how long they can survive in an endless dungeon.                                         　     The goal is to escape from the haunted house and defeat the Mononoke by making full use of the traps and devices hidden in the house!First, confirm the type and number of Mononoke by listening to noises coming from the next room, finding traces of the Mononoke, etc. Try to surmise the fighting style of the Mononoke and defeat them by setting up traps and then calling them over to you by making noises so they fall in the traps you made. You can also try to understand the structure of the mansion and defeat the Mononoke by luring them into open fireplaces and pits. Defeating them in this way allows you to gain and save items as well. Survival here requires knowledge, experience, and courage. When Yono is in grave danger, another side of her personality appears, and she is greatly strengthened. Predicting and controlling this change is also a key to success.Production Staff:Director / Game Designer: Kenichi IwaoMajor works: "Resident Evil", "Einhander", "Parasite Eve 2", "Final Fantasy XI"Character Design：Tatsuya YoshikawaMajor works: "Breath of Fire" series, "Devil May Cry" 4 and 5, "Last Ranker"Programming: Hiroshi OginoMajor Works: "Shiren the Wanderer: Mystery Dungeon", "Fate/Grand Order", "Culdcept Mobile"Various elements have been greatly improved from the previous game!The game has been significantly improved from the previous "Shinonome," with more Mononoke appearing, more traps and items, more dungeons and a big boss. The addition of Yono's other personality is also a new element. Based on the player’s feedback from the previous game, the game content itself has also undergone tuning in order to make it easier to play.
Short Description: The main character is a shrine maiden named "Yono," who has to survive in a haunted houses where Mononoke (yokai and vengeful spirits) lurk, using a limited number of items and traps in this strategy roguelike horror action game!

Detailed Description: Dive into the heart of terror with Shadows Of Despair, a spine-chilling co-op horror experience for up to five players. GAMEPLAYNavigate through eerie, intricately designed maps, each hosting multiple Case Files that blend intense main challenges with three additional objectives. Encounter a variety of foes with unique personalities and humorous voice lines, making every session a blend of fear and dark comedy. Work together to solve puzzles, uncover secrets, and survive the night in an immersive horror adventure where teamwork is your only hope.KEY FEATURESCo-op horror game for up to five playersIntricately designed Case Files with major and minor challengesEnemies with unique personalities and humorous voice linesCollaborative puzzle-solving and secret uncoveringSurvival-focused gameplay requiring teamworkDemonic AI adds dark comedy to the terrorProgression system unlocking new content and mapsDetailed, immersive environments enhance the horrorContinuous updates promise future content and improvements
Short Description: Shadows Of Despair is a co-op horror game for up to five players, immersing you in eerie Case Files with a mix of terrifying and humorous enemies.

Detailed Description: Taxing puzzles meet challenging platforming!In Blockhead, you take control of various blocks and move them around to solve puzzles. Many blocks can move left, move right and jump, but others have different restrictions and mechanics that you'll need to deal with. You'll need a combination of brains and skill to beat all 50 levels!Solve puzzles!The goal of each level is to transport certain blocks to their targets, elsewhere in the level. That won't be easy - you'll have to move other blocks out of the way, use them as stepping stones, or maybe create even more complex structures that you can use to reach your goal. Different blocks have different physics and controls that you can use to your advantage!Tricky platforming!In several levels, figuring out the solution is only half the challenge - you'll still need to pull it off! You'll often need to make some long and carefully-timed jumps, so make sure you don't fall and lose your progress. And keep an eye on the timer - if it runs out, the level will reset!Make your own!The built-in level editor allows you to create up to 5 levels of your own to challenge your friends! Levels are stored as simple, lightweight files that can be easily shared. See what devious challenges you can come up with!Completely free!Blockhead was originally made as a college project back in 2009-2010. This is a remastered version with improved graphics, better controls, and even music from other school and college projects! Of course we're not going to charge money for that - it's yours to enjoy for free!

Detailed Description: Discord CommunityAbout the GameWelcome to the Archipelago! Meet thousands of captains who trade, loot, explore, and fight for dominance over islands and valuable resources in an open world. Сhoose who you will become in this story. Will you be a nameless captain whose shipwreck rots on the shore? Or a legend whose name commands respect among allies and fear among enemies? The Captain's Journey Begins Here Start your journey on a modest schooner and level up as far as the legends go: a 100-gun first-rate ship.  The game features over 50 sailing ships from the 16th to 19th centuries: schooners, galleons, brigantines, frigates, and ships of the line. Each can be upgraded and customized: you can repaint the hull, decorate the masts with flags, and change the design and fabric of the sails. Open World Explore the open world and sail beyond the map into the Boundless Sea. Who knows what secrets await you there? With enough gold, you can even afford a private island. It's a nice place to repair your fleet and store resources brought by your servants from mines and manufacturers. Game Economy Money is the lifeblood of war. How to earn them? This decision is yours to make. 	●  Love to pick fights? Board merchant ships and exchange their holds for gold in the ports.  	●  Feeling like a trader? Set up a production chain. Process raw resources into goods and sell them to other players on the exchange.  	●  Want to see the world? Join reselling and transportation. Tobacco and winemaking are abundant on the southern islands. The freezing North has none of these, but it has iron to sell to make cannons in southern ports.  	●  Looking for ways to relax? Load fishing gear into your hold and head out in search of fish shoals. Fish is food for your crew and a great way to earn money.  Team Play A lone sea wolf is a dead sea wolf. Invite your friends to the game and form a squadron to defend against pirate attacks. Or, if you prefer to strike fear—become pirates yourselves. Looking for epic battles with seasoned players? Join a guild! This is where the real game begins: port battles, team tactics, strategy, intrigues, and diplomacy – we’ve got you covered. Join the endless quest for power in the Archipelago and claim your place in the World of Sea Battle!
Short Description: Sail, fight, upgrade, and trade alongside other players in an open-world MMO set in the Age of Sails. The game features dozens of historical sailing ships, pirates, PvP and PvE, player driven economy and guild wars for territory. Hoist the Jolly Roger and plunder yer way to glory on the high seas!

Detailed Description: Do you wanna walk the streets of Barcelona while looking for cute kitties? You’ve come to the right place!Catcelona: a purrfect city, offers the possibility to do both. Barcelona is the scenery of this hidden object story, where you need to find all 300 cats and guide them to their safe place, their shelter.All our cats are real-life cats, and they have their own lives, likes, and dislikes. We love that about them! It didn’t make sense to just put cats, have you noticed how different they can be and how many amazing stories they hide?If you want your cat to be IN the game you can do it through this link: If you're a shelter or any other cat helping facility, you can write to us at visitcatcelona@gmail.com and we'll be very glad to help you!Barcelona offers tons of amazing places, some of them sure you have already heard about, but others we hope will surprise you.Playing this game, you’ll be able to play out and in well-known spaces like Sagrada Familia or Parc Güell (yes, we love Gaudí!), but you’ll also get to discover some hidden gems like Poblenou’s graveyard or Catalonia's library. And what about sound? Oh, sound is so amazing and powerful!We’ve teamed up with Dash Obradors and got some help from one of our most admired sound makers (name to come!) to create a perfect environment for you to play, have fun but not stress at all.Barcelona has its own sounds, and we wanted to respect that inside the buildings, so go step in and discover everything!Cats don’t differentiate. Sure, they judge, but they love with no exceptions.We needed to respect that, and we’ve created an additional mode for neurodivergent people, and we’ve been formed and helped by accessibility experts so we don’t leave anyone out.That’s also why you can get the game in tons of different languages, meowing is universal, and so are we!Being a stray isn't an easy thing, and this is why this game donates a 5% of every sale to a shelter in Barcelona and promotes the visibility of other shelters all over the world. It is a tiny gesture, but little by little, the world can be different. Do you want to participate?
Short Description: A nice, cozy and entertaining video game that mixes Barcelona's architecture and hidden cats. Find them all!

Game Name: Kimi no Hitomi ni Hit Me
Detailed Description: 《你的眼眸命中我心头》国际中文版拥有超越原始版本的1920X1080的高画质，支持Steam成就与集换卡牌等功能，将于2024年9月13日发售。本作在原版基础上增加了家用机版本独有的人气角色桐原步鸟的路线以及大量新CG。是市面上唯一收录此内容的PC版本。《你的眼眸命中我心头》·《帕露菲重制版》中文版特典活动现正在摩点网进行中，本次我们一如既往为各位带来琳琅满目的周边商品以供选购，也推出了全新的布偶与立体画，并有原画师的限量签名，现正火热进行中，欢迎参与！本作是由日本美少女游戏资深大厂GIGA/Entergram（戏画社）制作的一款校园恋爱喜剧作品。原画与角色设计由创作了《帕露菲》等名作的NEKONYAN携手创作了《金辉恋曲四重奏》的Hisamakumako，以及创作了《想要传达给你的爱恋》的仓泽磨子共同担当；由陆奥龙介（代表作《坂上台风》、《苍之彼方的四重奏》）领衔编剧；种崎敦美、大桥步夕、户田惠等业内当红声优为本作女主角献声。知名声优兼歌手上间江望为本作献唱的三首歌曲均拥有让人一听难忘的魅力。故事与角色介绍游戏玩法《你的眼眸命中我心头》是一部恋爱题材的视觉小说，玩家在其中扮演主角文月章。它的大部分游戏玩法都花在阅读屏幕上出现的文本上，这些文本代表了故事的叙述和对话。文本伴随着角色立绘，这些立绘代表了文月章正在与谁交谈。同时画面上会显示作为故事发生地点的背景图像。在游戏中，玩家会在故事的某些情景下遇到特别剧情CG，这些CG显示的时候画面将不再显示背景与立绘。玩家将有机会体验多达5条故事线，每条故事线都围绕着一位女主角展开。在整个游戏过程中，玩家有多个分歧点可供选择，在游戏进程中遇到分歧点会暂停，直到玩家做出选择。一些决定可能导致游戏过早结束。要完整查看所有的故事线，玩家需要反复重玩游戏并选择不同的选项以将情节推进到另一个故事线中。
Short Description: 《你的眼眸命中我心头》是由日本美少女游戏资深大厂GIGA/Entergram（戏画社）制作的一款校园恋爱喜剧作品。发售后赢得了市场好评，中文版收录了家用机版本中追加的人气角色桐原步鸟的路线以及大量新CG。种崎敦美、大桥步夕、户田惠等业内当红声优为本作女主角献声。

Detailed Description: StoryYou are a small Fire Spirit born in the cold and darkness brought on by the Shadow Plague.  Driven by someone's desperate voice, you embark on an adventure to find the 'Primordial flame'.Explore, fight and reach closer to the world’s heart. What’s at the end of the adventure? Who was the owner of that voice? Why did the world fall into ruin like this? If you find the Primordial flame at the end of your journey, you may also find the answer.   Game Features The World of Dark Spirits Solateria, home to various spirits, has fallen into ruin due to the Shadow Plague. Embark on an adventure in this world of spirits, which appears beautiful but holds dark secrets. Hand Drawn Map Explore the vast world with hand drawn style graphics. Find hidden elements and create shortcuts. Uncover the truth behind this world as you dive into world of Solateria. Enjoy the Fiery Thrill of ParryingDodging and parrying are the core actions. Analyze and counter the enemies' patterns as a fire spirit. Unique Fire Spirit Actions Ignite and consume various objects! Incinerate powerful Bosses into ashes and experience the unique fiery sensation of a Fire Spirit.
Short Description: You are a small fire spirit born in a world of perishing spirits. Driven by someone's desperate voice, you embark on an adventure to find the 'Primordial flame'. Explore the peculiar, hand-drawn world of Solateria, defeat powerful enemies, and uncover the secrets of the world.

Detailed Description: In Whistling Waters, you work on a steamboat spending your days fishing and trying to make a living wage. The sea is not friendly, nor is your boss. Catch as many fish as you can to meet your boss' quota and avoid damaging your ship.FISH to make money. Make sure to reach your quota by the end of each day or else you're fired!STEER the ship to avoid damaging the hull. Make sure the steamboat is heading straight every once in a while.REPAIR the steamboat if your hull has taken damage. Use the grapple to fish out drift wood for repairs or use your extra money to buy planks.NIGHT TIME comes at the end of each day. Turn in the fish you've caught to see if you met today's quota and use left over money on upgrades.A fishing game inspired by Steamboat Willie.
