Detailed Description: The story of DOOT is legend. EARTH, the year 2769. MOTHER GATOR arrived from a distant planet to host her 12th Annual INTERGALATIC HOOTENANNY & BAKE SALE. But first, she's hatched a secret plot with her employees (although they prefer ‘team members’ to feel more included) to EXTERMINATE HUMANITY.Two Words: Plastic StrawsFour hundred and twenty… million years later, DOOT arose from ETERNAL SLUMBER to relieve his bladder - only to find that the earth has been covered a mile high with plastic drinking tubes. Out of the corner of his eye he noticed the remnants of an Award-Winning Peach Cobbler.  Only one creature can bake a dessert this good:MOTHER GATOR DOOT raced to his TIME MACHINE!Oh yeah, I forgot to mention Doot has a time machine.Doot must return to the past to STOP MOTHER GATOR from hosting her INTERGALATIC HOOTENANNY and, time permitting, DESTROYING HUMANITYThis is the story of Doot, a time traveling, blood-lustful Chihuahua from the distant future.This is DOOT-TYPE.Single Player Action  Cinematic Cut Scenes  In Game Commentary by the Developer  Cheats To Mix Up Gameplay  Special Modes
Short Description: 2D Side Scrolling Shoot Em Up action. Cinematic cut-scenes carry the story on a quest to locate Mother Gator's secret weapon. Unlockable cheats will mix-up the gameplay or enjoy a randomizer mode. Game includes commentary by the developer and musical composer on the process of making the game!

Detailed Description: Growing vegetables, raising pigs, opening factories; getting married, buying a house, having a baby.In this game, you will play a character created by yourself, with the freedom to decide their personality, appearance, age, and more. (don't want to decide by yourself, in fact, you can ~). You can cultivate wasteland and sow seeds, you can raise pigs, build factories and run businesses, you can have children with your loved ones (it doesn't matter if you die alone). And the NPCS in the game world will have a full life, ready to experience a different life?The in-game world is divided into six regions, each with unique geography and climate conditions, and you will build your own empire from scratch.There are dozens of crops that can be grown in the game. Modern farms are divided into poultry and livestock, and different types of farms have different management schemes.In addition to planting and breeding, the game also has some adventure elements, you can explore the surrounding Gobi, desert, find a superior traits of the wild plants (eyes too big, give up, this is still the small eyes of the natural advantage), and then bring back to the lab for cross-breeding, tissue culture, maybe become the Frankenstein of the plant world?In addition, there are dozens of factories in the game as many as dozens of production lines to meet your different production needs, such as peanut oil refining can go to the oil refinery, down jacket production can go to the garment factory. If you develop as the industry leader, you can even have the pricing power of the industry's products in the entire market, which will directly affect the acceptance of peer products in the market.Through careful cultivation and various management in the game, constantly expand their planting and breeding scale and control costs, obtain rich benefits at the same time, you can also run a business, a steady stream of talent for their own absorption, add more sources of income.Whether it is planting, breeding or opening a factory, the product will eventually be circulated to the market, and there is a perfect supply and demand system in the game, and the price of the product will fluctuate with the change of the supply and demand relationship and the change of market sentiment. In addition, the game can also establish a different relationship with other NPCS, a good relationship can make their work twice the result, if the relationship crashes, it will not only affect the mood, but also beware of a "major troublemaker" to become a stumbling block on your development road. What do you ask me? Hey, young man, all I can say is "Beat magic with magic". Welcome to try out the card play we built. Not only is it a powerful tool for you to defeat magic, but it can also help you get better offers in rental, real estate transactions, supply purchase negotiations, oversupply supply and so on.Although running farms, factories, livestock farms and enterprises at the same time can seem overwhelming, the goose down in your clothing factory can come from the geese in your farm, and the feed for the geese can be your own feed mill, and the raw materials for the feed mill need your farm, so that each link is linked to your industrial chain to form a closed loop. It will greatly reduce costs and increase efficiency, and you only need to plan behind the scenes to achieve a whole grand business map!Finally, "The Era of Pioneers" is a casual game that simulates farming operations and is suitable for players of all ages. Whether you want to experience the fun of farming under the South Mountain, or standing on the top of the mountain and looking into the distance, "The Era of Pioneers" will meet your expectations. Join us and start a different life!
Short Description: "The Era of Pioneers" is a combination of simulation operation, RPG, turn-based, card-type, Rougelite indie, covering agriculture, farming, business management and many other aspects. Players experience their lives by playing as various characters.

Detailed Description: Welcome to a captivating endless rogue-like first-person shooter game. In this fully hand drawn game, you will embark on a quest to collect powerful programs and navigate through human-infested labs in a bid for freedom. Uncover the intricacies of the story by exploring diverse maps and seeking aid from allies. You will take down enemies and collect upgrades to facilitate your escape from the humans. With a multitude of human enemies to face, you will have to figure out a way to utilize all of your skills and equipment to take them down. There are many levels and secrets to find while taking down the lab rats. There is no end to this challenge, so don't stop moving and see how far you can take it. Master the art of shooting, dodging, and melee combat to overcome relentless foes. Develop tactics to outsmart enemies and navigate through complex environments. Efficiently utilize ammunition, health packs, and upgrades to maximize your pace. Never stand still, or you'll never reach the end.
Short Description: A rogue-like first-person shooter, battling through the human labs. You must escape with your life, and perhaps with others.

Detailed Description: Create vehicles in real-time using an intuitive node-based approach. Fine tune suspension geometry and drivetrain characteristics to create an unique driving experience. Exhibition of Speed is a racing game designed with modders and content creators in mind, where creating and modifying vehicles do not require messing around with extensive, complex and undocumented configuration files.The foundation of the multi-body vehicle simulation engine is designed from the ground up to support all kinds of wheeled vehicles and drivetrain configurations. The flexibility of the simulation is explored through nodes, which are the building blocks of every vehicle. Nodes of different types can be arranged and connected together to form a graph which describes the vehicle you want. As the graph is modified it gets evaluated and the results are reflected immediately on the vehicle being built. The vehicle can be driven while it's being formed and it may be saved and shared with others.The dynamic physical tire model ensures realistic driving behavior and detailed force feedback on the steering wheel. It is capable of producing effects such as camber thrust and relaxation length, which are usually only present in the most advanced racing simulators.In the upcoming multiplayer mode, you'll be able to join online races against other players with your custom car and put it to the test. Other players will be able to see your creation but it's up to you to prove it's the best car in the grid!As the game evolves, more types of suspensions, tires, engines, transmissions and all-wheel-drive systems will become available, enabling a greater variety of wheeled vehicles to be built.
Short Description: Build your own car and go racing.

Detailed Description: Join the discussion groupTo the players from non China:We are building a community for communication, please wait a moment.About the Game"Rimland" is a challenging 2D side-scrolling action role-playing game that invites players to explore a mysterious world filled with dangers and wonders. In the game, players can develop their characters, collecting equipment through combat and exploration to enhance their characters’ abilities and strength. The game offers a variety of gameplay, allowing players to experiment with different skill combinations and equipment setups to adapt to various combat scenarios. Each playthrough brings new surprises and challenges, ensuring a unique experience every time. Get ready, and embark on your adventure!Character DevelopmentPlayers can develop their own characters and improve characters’ abilities and skills through battle and completing quests.Loot SystemExplore the game world, defeat enemies and bosses to acquire rare equipment and treasures.Custom BuildsPlayers can experiment with different combinations of equipment and skills to create unique character builds, adapting to various combat and challenges.Diverse CharactersMultiple different characters to choose from, each with their own unique skills and development paths.Exquisite Pixel Art StyleThe game features a retro pixel art style, capturing the aesthetic of classic side-scrolling games.Thrilling CombatFast-paced battles and smooth action design provide players with an intense and exciting gaming experience, testing not only their skills but also their combat strategies and build configurations.

Detailed Description: This game revolves around a simple yet engaging core gameplay mechanic: by clicking on two identical squares, you eliminate them, aiming to meet the specified elimination targets within each level to progress. Each level is equipped with a unique scoring system, making it a highly enjoyable and stress-relieving game. Up to 100 levels, each featuring a distinctive scoring system!  In the game, eliminating multiple squares at once can transform them into various items. When any two adjacent items are eliminated, they generate even more powerful elimination effects. You can devise elimination strategies based on the current situation to bring two items together.  Utilize four differently effective items!  Multiple squares with unique clearing methods.

Detailed Description: Vr模式说明：此游戏可在标准模式和 Vr 模式下运行。体验vr模式串流前，需要提前打开steamvr及头显相关串流软件。About the Game全球首场迈克尔杰克逊大型虚拟互动演唱会将在「大有空间」举办。「大有空间」是新一代沉浸式空间平台，可通过VR沉浸体验真·元宇宙，并支持VR、手机、电脑三端同享，及百万人同场在线。这里将持续上线各种有趣的活动空间，如演唱会、明星见面会、颁奖盛典、戏剧节、发布会等等，这些活动都将以沉浸式互动方式让用户们获得全新临场体验。在这里你可以零距离和自己的偶像亲密互动，也可以遇到一群兴趣相同的小伙伴们，一起聊天一起玩。除了官方举办的活动空间，这里还有大量创作者打造的创意空间。大有为创作者们提供开放的平台，创作者可以在此完成基于unity的空间内容创作和玩法设计，并进行实时预览，“边造边玩”，将空间创作灵感变为现实作品。

Detailed Description: 开发者的话在这里，你会看到很多有着回忆杀的经典梗:在这里，你无需花真金白银就能体验网游氪金带来的乐趣;在这里，你能享受经典网游玩法，也能无痛体验氪金乐趣，每一次行为都是人生的转折点，也许，你上瘾的从来都不是游戏；最终，在现实和虚拟的思维斗争下，你也会看清国产网游的本质，认识国产网游的套路。About the Game单机玩法模拟网游的乐趣，这是你没有体验过的全新版本用模拟人生的玩法带你体验国产网游当进入游戏的那一刻，你励志放下一切去网游里大展身手，为的就是有朝一日当上网游里的皇城城主！然而，在你爽的同时，却也无意识跌入了无尽的深渊之中...充钱为王，白嫖为寇游戏中648随意充；充完就能让你体验一刀999的快感；充完就可以去野外，去皇城，去竞技场，吊打不充钱的白嫖“玩家”；只要你愿意，随时都可以靠氪金走上游戏巅峰，成为榜一大哥，体验排行榜第一的快乐。氪佬体验，舍我其谁 游戏中能让你真实体验氪佬纵横天下，舍我其谁的感觉。在野外PK中，你可以一人挑百人，体验氪佬极致的PK爽感；在皇城PK战中，你也可以一人攻城或守城，一人挑一城，最终当上城主，睥睨天下；你必须接受所有帮派成员的膜拜，俯视着他们仰望你的样子；同时可以在世界聊天中，享受着所有屌丝一声声大哥的呼喊刷屏！关注我们，就是兄弟，就来添加《中国式网游》愿望单吧！欢迎“氪佬“加入我们游戏官方交流群（QQ）：789573725B站：Wise Games我们期待大伙们踊跃加入游戏玩家群，任何游戏相关版本更新都能第一时间获得，如有问题也能第一时间获得答复！除此之外群内也会不定期做各种抽福利活动，还有机会获得游戏内测资格！
Short Description: 《中国式网游》是一款真实的单机“网络游戏”，游戏完全缝合了免费网游中所有的氪金玩法，然后通过模拟的方式，让你深度体验到氪金大佬的快乐，这可能是你玩过的最“花钱“的单机游戏。 身为一名当代社会的大龄青年老王，你却还在为结婚凑彩礼钱发愁！正当生活紧迫之时，你却意外被某网游弹窗广告所吸引，此刻，命运的齿轮开始转动...

Detailed Description: Embark on the ultimate cosmic quest where your typing prowess holds the key to victory! Prepare for an adrenaline-fueled voyage through the stars in Type Galaxy, the definitive typing adventure that will leave your fingers itching for more!Key Features:Journey Through the Cosmos Blast off into the unknown and navigate through 30 mind-bending levels set against the backdrop of the awe-inspiring cosmos. Unleash Your Typing Skills Get ready to put your fingers to the test with exhilarating typing challenges that will push you to the limit. It is a race against time as you strive to conquer each level and prove yourself as the ultimate typist.Immerse Yourself in the Soundtrack of the StarsLose yourself in the mesmerizing beats of 32 electrifying soundtracks that pulse with the rhythm of the universe.Command Your Spaceship with PrecisionIn Type Galaxy, your keyboard is your spaceship's control panel, and your typing skills are the key to victory.Ascend to Galactic GreatnessRise to the challenge and become the master of the cosmos as you conquer each level and unlock new challenges along the way. With every victory, you'll inch closer to typing supremacy and solidify your place among the stars.Prepare to embark on the typing adventure of a lifetime in Type Galaxy. With its stunning visuals, heart-pounding gameplay, and addictive soundtrack, this is one journey you won't want to miss. Get ready to blast off into a world of typing excitement and become the ultimate typist!

Detailed Description: "The Fading of Nicole Wilson" is a story-driven, folk-horror adventure game dealing with topics like authenticity, personal sacrifice and the cost of fitting in while daring players to unravel a dark, thrilling mystery.Amy, a teenager feeling left behind in her backwater hometown, lands a ghost-hunting job at the secluded Timberline Hotel. She hopes to capture footage that will make her famous. But when her employer is hospitalized, Amy must handle the investigation alone.As she arrives at the desolate, crumbling estate, Amy quickly realizes there are more dangerous forces at play than any supernatural entity.Equipped with her camera and an array of ghost-hunting gear, she descends into the hotel's shadowy corridors, determined to uncover its secrets. However, her investigation takes an unexpected turn as she discovers a web of unsettling clues hinting at a far more sinister truth hidden within the hotel's history that has never been told before.A narrative adventure game combining exploration, puzzle solving and investigationExplore beautiful and haunting locations in Lewis & Clark County, uncovering Helena’s grim, secret truthBinaural audio for a truly immersive experienceIntriguing, touching and adult storytelling, combining mystery with a folk horrorFlawed, relatable characters confronting a net of schemes and lies
Short Description: Feeling stuck in her backwater hometown, Amy jumps at the chance for a life-changing adventure at the derelict Timberline Hotel. Her chance of a quick rise to fame, however, soon turns into a grim investigation as both the living and the dead are hiding dark secrets behind its abandoned walls.

Detailed Description:
Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

The game is a 3D puzzle, the player needs to put in place the missing pieces of the puzzle (items) scattered around the location. To create an entire location.

You need to go to the item, take it by pressing the left mouse button and take the item to the desired location marked in green. If you brought the correct item, it will snap into place and you will receive leaderboard points and achievements for this.

Collect as much items as possible as quickly as possible to get more points for the leaderboard.

If you brought the wrong item, you can throw it away, it will return to the starting location so that you can pick it up again.

Detailed Description: Corporation Inc. puts the players into the shoes of Maria Villalobos, a 25-year-old Honduran native who comes to the United States to work at Corporation Incorporated as their new hiring manager in their ‘revitalization program’. Maria is put on a one-week trial in which she must review 25 applicants daily while judging their qualifications and skillsets. In addition to working against a ticking clock, she has to exercise critical thinking while navigating a skeptical boss, a lousy friend, and the discrimination most immigrants face upon their arrival to America. It’s up to the player how they navigate their first week at Corporation Incorporated.
Short Description: Newly hired for a revitalization program, work against a ticking clock and navigate a skeptical boss, a lousy friend, and discrimination while making hiring decisions. Interactive narrative with timed decisions Critical thinking Prosocial Empathy

Detailed Description: CRUSH YOUR OPPONENTS AND BE THE MASTER OF THE ARENA! Overall The Ball is a fun 2D party game played from 2 to 4 players in which victory is all that matters! A giant ball is in the arena, your goal: send it to your opponents! Get the most points before the time runs out and dominate the competition!AN UNCONTROLLABLE BALL! The ball only bounces around the edges of the arena and never stops! The more you hit it, the faster it will go! PLAY CRAZY CHARACTERS THAT ARE EASY TO HANDLE! Do you prefer brute force, magic or a car? That, we let you decide. What is certain is that each character moves the same way, however, they each have their own abilities!
Short Description: Overall The Ball is a party game played locally, from 2 to 4 players. Bounce a giant ball and eat your friends , play as colorful characters, use your abilities to take advantage and score points! Become the master of the arena!
